56a6(phal chen): klong dang 'gro ba'i nyon mongs dri// 'gro ba rnams la byams bskyed spangs pa// mkha' snyam 'od kyis sangs rgyas rnam par mdzes// rnam par mdzes pa'i chu klung lnga
56a7(phal chen): dga'o// sangs rgyas rang byung yon tan rgya mtsho ste// bsod nams ning ni 'dus byas sdug bsngal 'dor// byang chub lam la rims kyis yongs smin mdzad//
56a8(phal chen): mtsho'i tshogs dpal rnam thar 'di yin no// de la me tog gi lha dang bcas pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ ro dang mdangs thams cad bskyed cing sems can thams
56b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi rab du thob pa ston pa zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lha dus kyi me tog rnam par mdzes pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho
56b2(phal chen): bas dga' ba chen po'i shugs kyis tshim pa skyed pa zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lha rtsal dam pa'i stobs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad yongs su
56b3(phal chen): rgyas pas/ shin tu dga' ba'i spyod yul zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lha mdangs kyi ngang mtha' yas pas rab tu 'gyed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ snying rje mtha'
56b4(phal chen): yas pa'i sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rab du 'gyed cing / rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lha kun gyi rtsa ba 'bras bu'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs
56b5(phal chen): rgyas thams cad mngon tu lta zhing sangs rgyas rnams la yon tan yang dag par bskyed pa ston pa zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lha gtsug phud kha dog sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/
56b6(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad kyi mos pa'i me tog yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lha yal ga dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar par pa ni/ sems can thams cad la phan
56b7(phal chen): ba'i byams pa dang bsod nams rgya mtsho chen po rnam par 'phel ba zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lha spos sna tshogs shin tu grub pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ chos thams cad
56b8(phal chen): la spyod pa kun tu gnon pas rtsom pa zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lha bzang zhing yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad zhum pa dang / yid du mi 'ong
57a1(phal chen): ba rnam par bzlog pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi zhum pa dang / yid du mi 'ong ba rnam par bzlog cing
57a2(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thams cad yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lha kha dog rnam par dag cing 'od dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge
57a3(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba la rnam par lta zhing / 'khor gyi dbang po tshim par byed pa zhes bya'o// de nas lo tog gi lha dang 'jam pa'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ lo tog gi lha'i
57a4(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rang byung ye shes sgron ma skyes pa na// 'gro ba kun gyi skyabs
57a5(phal chen): dang mgon gyur te// ma lus bde ba'i 'gro ba yang dag bskyed// bsod nams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas bla na med// sangs rgyas mnyan na don yod yon tan sprin//
57a6(phal chen): 'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad// chos rgya chen po mi zad rab tu skyed// dus kyi dkyil 'khor lha ni 'di la 'jug/ bde gshegs stobs ni ma lus yongs
57a7(phal chen): su rgyas// 'gro ba dag ni chos kyi legs par mdzes// 'gro ba kun 'dul kun du rnam par snang // stobs dang gzugs kyi mthu yis de mthong ngo // sems
57a8(phal chen): kyi skad cig kun la 'gro mnyam pa'i// thugs rje rgya mtsho sngan chad rnam sbyangs pas// de phyir rdzu 'phrul rnam 'phrul mtha' yas so// de ni mdangs mthong
57b1(phal chen): lha yis rab tu mthong // thabs rnams kun gyi sgo nas don yod par// sangs rgyas 'jig rten kun tu khyab gyur cing // 'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs dag par mdzad//
57b2(phal chen): 'di ni thams cad sgo'i rnam thar to// 'gro ba 'di na mongs yangs gang yod pa// de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i mthus byung te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rgya
57b3(phal chen): mtsho'o// nags tshal rgyan gyi gtsug phud de la 'jug/ 'jig rten rnams kyi byams pa ches skyed de// sems can rnams la phan phyir rang byung skyes// lam
57b4(phal chen): rab dge ba zhi ba rab tu ston// zhi ba sna tshogs dpal gyi rnam thar to// phyogs su sems can yongs smin byed pa'i tshe// bde gshegs spyod pa ji ltar rnam par dag
57b5(phal chen): byang chub shing las de dag sgra yang 'byung // spos zhim dpal gyi lha yis de thos so// rgyal ba 'jig rten yid du myong ba spong // dga' ba ma lus rnams kyang rab tu
57b6(phal chen): bskyed// 'gro ba kun gyi dbang po rnam par sbyong // dge ba snang ba'i lha yis de mthong ngo // 'gro ba kun nas sangs rgyas shin tu 'phags// skye bo kun gyi bsam
57b7(phal chen): pa des mkhyen te// sna tshogs sgo nas 'gro ba yongs smin mdzad// rnam dag kha dog 'od kyi rnam thar to// de la sman gyi lha phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/
58a1(phal chen): phal bsam pa kun nas rnam par lta ba'i gnas pas 'gro ba rab tu gnon zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha tsan dan gyi nags
58a2(phal chen): tshal gyi shugs 'chang ba rnam par thar pa ni/ lta ba don yod pas sems can 'dren pa'i 'od ces bya'o// sman gyi lha 'od rdul med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can
58a3(phal chen): thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rab du zhi bas rdul dang bral ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha ming kun du grags pa'i glang po'i rnam par thar pa ni/ ming sgrags pas
58a4(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho yang dag par 'phel ba zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha spu'i klong kun nas 'od 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ nad thams cad la snying rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi
58a5(phal chen): shugs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha mun pa rnam par sel cing rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba mdongs pa lta bu thams cad kyi/ ye shes kyi mig gi rnam
58a6(phal chen): par byad pa zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha mun pa rnam par sel cing rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu bsgrags pas don gyi dbyings 'byung ba zhes bya'o//
58a7(phal chen): sman gyi lha nyi ma'i 'od 'gro ba'i mchog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad la dge ba'i bshes su ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par
58a8(phal chen): bskul ba zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha phyogs bcur rmongs pa med par lta ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ mos pa'i tshul gyis rnam par dag pa'i snying rje'i snying po zhes bya'o//
58b1(phal chen): sman gyi lha mdangs bzang po kun tu 'gyed pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed cing / sangs rgyas rjes su
58b2(phal chen): dran pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o// de nas sman gyi lha phun sum tshogs pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ sman gyi lha 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam ltas te/
58b3(phal chen): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab ltos// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa rab tu mkhyen// thabs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs
58b4(phal chen): sgo dag nas// sdug bsngal kun las sems can rab tu 'grel// sangs rgyas chos nyid de ltar bsam mi khyab// de'i mthu ni thams cad don kyang yod// skye
58b5(phal chen): rga rnams kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad// tsan dan shugs dang ldan pa'i rnam thar to// sngan chad rgyal ba'i chos nyid dag la ltos// bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' med
58b6(phal chen): spyod pa na'ang // srid pa kun na chags pa gang yang med// de la rdul med 'od kyi lha 'jug go/ rgyal bas bskal pa stong phrag brgyad dag tu// mthong shing
58b7(phal chen): mtshan thos de ni shin tu dkon// tshul rnams kun tu rang byung don yod de// de la rgyal mtshan mchog ni de ltar 'jug/ rgyal ba'i spu yi sgo rnams kun nas kyang //
58b8(phal chen): nang las rab tu 'grel pa'i 'od bkye bas// 'jig rten nyon mongs ma lus zhi bar mdzad// spu mdangs rgyun gyi rnam thar 'di yin no// sdug bsngal las dang nyon
59a1(phal chen): mongs sna tshogs pas// 'gro ba rtag tu mdongs shing rab tu rmongs gyur rnams// sangs rgyas ye shes 'od kyi rnam par
59a2(phal chen): spyod// de ni mun dang bral ba'i lhas mthong ngo // rgyal ba'i gsungs dbyangs gcig las mtha' yas pa'i// chos kyi sgo mo thams cad kun kyang 'byung // de ni sems
59a3(phal chen): can ma lus kun kyang shes// 'di ni sgra dang ldan pa'i rnam thar to// rgyal ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab ltos// srid par sems can yongs su smin byas la/
59a4(phal chen): de la 'gro kun mi mgon sngon du snang // gnyi 'od zhi ba'i lha yi de mthong ngo // sangs rgyas thugs rje'i tshul ni rgya mtsho ste// 'gro ba kun phan don du de skyes so// 'gro
59a5(phal chen): ba kun la lam rnams shin tu ston// de ni phyogs su snang ba'i lhas shes so// sangs rgyas tshogs 'gro dbang rnams 'od yangs pa// phyogs rnams thams cad ma
59a6(phal chen): lus kun tu gang // sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i gzi brjid skyed// mdangs dang 'od du ldan pa'i rnam thar to// de la nags tshal gyi lha yal ga sna tshogs kyi sprin
59a7(phal chen): gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ ye shes kyi rgya mtsho yangs shing mtha' yas pa'i snying po zhes bya'o// nags tshal gyi lnga 'od kyi phung po sna tshogs kyi mig yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par
59a8(phal chen): thar pa ni/ dge ba rgya chen po kun nas sprugs pa'i shugs kyi shes bya'o// nags tshal gyi lha mig gu yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ mos pa sna tshogs kyi mig
59b1(phal chen): rnam par 'phel ba dang / yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya'o// nags tshal gyi lha lo ma med pa'i phreng ba'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
59b2(phal chen): thams cad kyi rgyan yongs su sbyong zhing rnam par sgom pa zhes bya'o// nags tshal gyi lha yal ga rab tu 'phyang ba'i gzi brjid kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ shes rab dri ma med pa'i
59b3(phal chen): sgo kun nas chos kyi dmigs la dmigs shing // kun nas rnam par dmigs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya'o// nags tshal gyi lha dge ba'i 'od sna tshogs pa'i rnam par
59b4(phal chen): thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho la yang dag par 'jug pa'i chos kyi sprin mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya'o// nags tshal gyi lha sgra skad yid du 'ong ba'i
59b5(phal chen): dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra la bzod pa rab tu thob pas/ chos kyi snang ba dri ma med pa zhes bya'o// nags tshal gyi
59b6(phal chen): lha kun nas spos mang po ldang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ spyod pa rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor spyod pas/ yongs su dag par byed cing phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba zhes
59b7(phal chen): bya'o// nags tshal gyi lha kun nas dpal gyi 'od rab tu 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba la phan pa'i don chos thams cad kyi rgyas pa yang dag
59b8(phal chen): par sbyong ba zhes bya'o// nags tshal gyi lha me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / ri'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas skyes pa thams cad la dga' bar lta
60a1(phal chen): zhing rjes su dran pa'i yon tan rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya'o// de nas nags tshal gyi lha yal ga sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus//
60a2(phal chen): nags tshal gyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa rnams la ltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bsod nams kyi stobs dang ye shes stobs rnams
60a3(phal chen): dang // sngon tshe byang chub spyod pas sangs rgyas 'byung // stobs rnams kun gyi rang byung pha rol phyin// 'gro ba kun nas 'phags shing rnam par mdzes// 'gro ba
60a4(phal chen): thams cad snyed kyi thugs rje'i sgo// de bzhin gshegs pas sngon tshe rab tu spyad// rang byung de bas 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// sems can spungs 'od rnam thar 'di la 'jug/
60a5(phal chen): sems can kun gyis bde gshegs mthong mu thag/ mos pa rgya mtsho rnam par dag par 'gyur// rgyal ba kun gyi lam yang yang dag ston// myug gu yid 'ong 'od
60a6(phal chen): kyi rnam thar yin// rgyal ba kun gyi spu'i yon tan 'khor// bskal pa rgya mtsho zad par mi nus te// 'gro ba kun gyi sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// rnam thar 'di
60a7(phal chen): ni phreng ba'i dpal gyis mthong // sngan chad rgyal bas sangs rgyas gang gi rnams// zhing mang rdul med mchod pa de dag dran// kun du shes rab dkyil 'khor rnam
60a8(phal chen): basbyangs// yal ga 'od kyis gzi brjid 'di mthong ngo // 'gro ba kun gyi spyod pa rgya mtsho dag/ skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas thugs su chud// rgyal
60b1(phal chen): ba'i ye shes chags med yin du yangs// sna tshogs rgyan gyi 'od kyis 'di mthong ngo // bde gshegs gsung ni zhi ba rab zhi gsung // dga' ba yangs pa chen po
60b2(phal chen): rnam par skyed// sems can mos pa ji bzhin de dag shes// 'di ni sgra rnams sgrogs pa'i dbyangs kyis mthos// phyogs bcu'i ning gi dbyings rnams rgyas byas
60b3(phal chen): nas// sangs rgyas byin brlabs rgya chen rab tu byung // rgyal ba'i sngon gyi spyod pa dag kyang bstan// kun du dri zhim 'od dpal 'di la 'jug/ ma rungs
60b4(phal chen): sems can yon tan med pa rnams// myos shing 'khor ba kun du 'khor ba dag/ de dag la ni thams cad mkhyen la ston// 'phags pa'i 'od kyi 'khor
60b5(phal chen): gyis 'di mthong ngo // sems can ma rungs sbyor ba spyod pa rnams// bskal pa bye bas sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// gzhan ni bde gshegs skad cig
60b6(phal chen): gcig gis lta// ri'i 'od kyi lha'i 'di mthong ngo // de la ri'i lha rin po che'i rtse mo'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ bsam gtan zhi zhing yangs
60b7(phal chen): la dben pa'i snang ba la/ rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya'o// ri'i lha nags tshal sna tshogs me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i/ gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems
60b8(phal chen): can thams cad kyi bsam pa rnam par lta ba'i dbang po la/ 'jug pas mngon par snang ba zhes bya'o// ri'i lha rdul thams cad dang mi gnas pas/ dri ma
61a1(phal chen): bal @#med pa'i gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas par mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o// ri'i
61a2(phal chen): lha snang bas phyogs su gsal ba'i 'od kyi rnam par smin par/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rnam par ston pa ston pa zhes bya'o// ri'i lha stobs la thub pa med pa'i
61a3(phal chen): snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gti mug yongs su sel ba'i 'od ces bya'o// ri'i lha kun nas gzi brjid dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam
61a4(phal chen): par thar pa ni/ chags pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i rgyan ces bya'o// sdug bsngal yang dag par 'joms pa zhes bya'o// ri'i lha snang ba'i rdul chu bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar
61a5(phal chen): pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa'i yon tan snang ba yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o// ri'i lha kun du rnam par lta ba'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams
61a6(phal chen): cad kyi rmi lam gyi mthar yang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya'o// ri'i lha kun nas sra ba rdo rje'i 'tshams kyi mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ don rgya mtsho rgya chen po
61a7(phal chen): mtha' yas pa dang / 'grogs pa zhes bya'o// de nas ri'i lnga rin po che'i rtse mo'i me tog shin du rgyas par gnas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ ri'i lha 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod
61a8(phal chen): pa thams cad la rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul mi zad tshad med ltos// sngon tshe spyod rab mtha' yas rgyal bas spyad// rnam
61b1(phal chen): thar zhing gi rdul snyed sgom mdzad pas// 'gro ba ma lus dga' ba'i shugs kyang skyed// sangs rgyas sku nas dri med dpal skye ba// yan lag mtshan rgyan 'gro ba kun bkang zhing //
61b2(phal chen): byams tshul mtha' yas 'jig rten kun la ston// nags tshal rgyal ba'i gtsug gi rnam thar to// sangs rgyas sku ni mtha' yas 'gro bar mngon// 'jig rten kun du phyogs bcu bkang
61b3(phal chen): zhing 'phags// dbang po dang ba'i sems can rang shing dga'// rnam thar 'di ni 'phags pa'i rgyal mtshan 'jug/ rang byung mkha' snyam 'jig rten chos ma chags// bskal pa kun
61b4(phal chen): spyod brtson 'grus stobs mi skyo// sna tshogs khams 'gro sbyor bas ma lus 'dul// dga' ba dri med gtsug phud rnam thar to// 'jig rten kun ni dngos gyur mun stag zhugs/
61b5(phal chen): thugs rje der skyed sangs rgyas 'ong zhing 'gro// khams yun rings nyal ba sad par mdzad// rig nas dga' 'od lha'i rnam thar to// srid pa'i rgya mtsho spyad pa sngon spyod tshe// zhing
61b6(phal chen): rdul mnyam pa'i sems can gtso mchog pas// de dag 'gyes bzhin sems can byang chub bkod// zhi ba'i sa ni stobs 'chang lha 'jug go// las kyi sprin sgrib g.yog shing sgrib
61b7(phal chen): pa rnams// snying pa'i sems can sdug bsngal 'khor gzigs nas// de dag mun pa ye shes kyis ni srul// gzi brjid dpal 'od rnam thar 'di sems so// rgyal ba'i sbrulas
61b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas yon tan kun// phyogs dbyings sems can bsam pa bzhin du grag/ rdzu 'phrul rnam pa bskal pa kun du gnas// 'od mang rdul gyi chu bo lha 'jug go/ sems
62a1(phal chen): pal @can kun spyod dge ba rgya mtsho kun// de la phyogs bkang sangs rgyas mngon par snang // sna tshogs thabs kyi 'jig rten chos kyang ston/
62a2(phal chen): tshul mngon mig gi lha'i 'di thos so// chos sgo rgya mtshos mi zad tshad med pa// sangs rgyas gsung cig sems can kun la gsung // bskal pa kun rjod 'jig rten mang la ston/
62a3(phal chen): rdo rje tshul mig 'di yi gnas la 'jug/ de lasa'i lha dpal gyi me tog kun nas shin du rgyas pa dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ skad cig skad cig cing sems can thams cad la
62a4(phal chen): byams pa dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o// sa'i lha bsod nams brtan pa bzhin dad bsags pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi
62a5(phal chen): bsod nams kyi stobs dang / shugs kyi rgyan ces bya'o// sa'i lha sems rin po ches rgyas pa'i rnam par thar pa ni ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs sgom pas/ rnam par spyod pa dri ma med pa
62a6(phal chen): zhes bya'o// sa'i lha'i dus dus su dge ba'i mig rab tu ston pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad dga' zhing bde ba dang rtse ba zhes bya'o// sa'i lha'i gser gyi mig gi
62a7(phal chen): dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ lus thams cad yongs su dag par byed pa'i tshul ston pa zhes bya'o// sa'i lha spu las spos kyi 'od rnam par 'byed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas
62a8(phal chen): thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par sgom pa brjod pa zhes bya'o// sa'i lha sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba'i sgrogs pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad smras pa'i
62b1(phal chen): sgra rgya mtsho byin gyis brlob pa zhes bya'o// sa'i lha me tog gi klong sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa'i rang bzhin dri ma med pa zhes
62b2(phal chen): bya'o// sa'i lha kun nas rdo rje'i rdul gyi rgyun gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i byin gyis brlabs kun nas rgyu zhing 'byung ba zhes bya'o// sa'i lnga
62b3(phal chen): khyim gyi dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi tshul la yang dag par 'jug pa'i chos kyi rgyan sgom pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o// de nas sa'i lha
62b4(phal chen): dpal gyi me tog kun nas shin du rgyas pa'i dri ma med pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ sa'i lha 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par ltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su
62b5(phal chen): bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sngan cad skad cig skad cig bde gshegs kyis// brjod du med pa'i snying rje'i sgo rnams dang // byams pa'i sgo yang mi zad bsgoms pas na/ de phyir
62b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas sku ni mi shigs sra// dus gsum rtogs pa'i sems can bsod nams dang // ji snyed byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dag/ rgyal ba'i sku gcig ji snyed bsod nams
62b7(phal chen): 'od// bsod nams de thob rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'byung ba med cing byon pa gang yang med// ting 'dzin zhi ba rgya mtsho rab du zhugs// sems can rgyan gyis 'di rab tu ston//
62b8(phal chen): 'di ni sna tshogs shing gi ze ba'i sa yin no// sngan chad thub pas spyod pa spyad pa dang // 'gro ba'i sgrib pa rnam par bzlog pa ni// rin chen bkram pa'i 'od kyi sa yin te// rnam thar
63a1(phal chen): pal@'di la dga' ba'i lha lta'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa ni mtha' yas te// 'jig rten kun du skad cig ston// dus chod yang dag ston pas/
63a2(phal chen): yi lha// dga' bar sangs rgyas yul la rnam par lta// sangs rgyas gsung ni mtha' yas bsam mi khyab// sems can kun sgrags nyon mongs zhi bar mdzad// gser 'od mig gi
63a3(phal chen): dpal ni rab dga' bar// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas mnga' la lta// sangs rgyas sprul pas rnam pa kun gzugs su// phyogs kun chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par mdzad//
63a4(phal chen): spu las dri zhim 'od kyi sa yi lha// sangs rgyas sems can 'dul de la lta// phyogs rnams yid 'ong dbyangs kyis gang byas shing // 'gro ba 'di ni phyi mtha'i bskal par brjod//
63a5(phal chen): yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs sa yi lha// rab tu dga' bar sangs rgyas dbyangs la nyan// rgyal ba'i spu las sems can mnyam pa yi// spos kyi 'od bkye 'jig rten kun bkang
63a6(phal chen): zhing // sems can ma lus yongs su smin mdzad pa// me tog gtsug phud 'phyang ba yang dag mthong // de bzhin gshegs sku rdo rje lta bu ste// 'tshams su mi phyed sra ba'i ri bo
63a7(phal chen): 'dra// 'gro ba kun gyis sangs rgyas sgron mi nus// rdo rje rdul gyi lha ni de dga'o// de la grong khyer gyi lha rin chen rtsegs mo'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni// sems can thams
63a8(phal chen): cad la phan pa yang dag sbyar ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba'i dbang po yongs su smin par byed pa'i 'dul
63b1(phal chen): ba zhes bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha rin chen dri med shin tu dga' ba'i rnam par thar pa ni// sems can thams cad bsod nams dang dga' ba myong bar byed pa zhes bya'o// grong khyer wA
63b2(phal chen): smos pa'i mya ngan thams cad spong bas rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ skyob pa dang mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha sgron ma shin du rgyas pa'i mig
63b3(phal chen): gi rnam par thar pa ni/ shes rab kyis kun tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha 'od 'phro ba'i dpal mngon par 'bar ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ thabs kyi sgo kun nas
63b4(phal chen): snyan pa'i mthu ston pa zhes bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha bsod nams kyi shugs snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams 'byung bas snang ba zhes bya'o//
63b5(phal chen): gro khyer gyi lha lus dri ma med par mnyam pa'i 'od kyis/ rnam par thar pa ni sems can rmongs pa thams cad la rmi lam rnam par ston pa'i 'od ces bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha spos kyi
63b6(phal chen): rgyal mtshan gtsug phud kyi rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ nyon mongs pa dang / mi dge ba rnam par sel cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dri yang dag par skyed pa zhes bya'o// grong
63b7(phal chen): khyer gyi lha rin chen dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i ri rnam par 'joms pa'i 'od ces bya'o// de nas grong khyer gyi lha rin po che'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas
63b8(phal chen): kyi mthas// grong khyer gyi lha'i dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par lus nas/ de'i tshetshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// mgon ze'i chos nyid bsam gyis mi khya
64a1(phal chen): @ste// snang ba brnyes shing phyogs su rnam par mdzes// sems can mtha' yas yongs su smin mdzad pa'i// sangs rgyas 'gro ba kun la mngon du snang /
64a2(phal chen): sems can thams cad dbang po sna tshogs te// de dag ma lus rgyal bas 'gro ba mkhyen// rnam thar 'di ni rab tu thob pa'i phyir// sna tshogs 'od 'byung lha yang rab tu dga'/
64a3(phal chen): rgyal bas bskal pa mtha' yas yang dag spyad// sngan chad rgyal bas chos kyang yang dag gzung // dga' ba yang dag rtag te de dag blangs// rnam thar 'di ni dga' ba'i 'od kyi mthong //
64a4(phal chen): 'gro ba 'di ni thugs rje byams skyed cing // de bzhin gshegs pas sngan chad sems can rnams// kun gyi mya ngan mtha' yas rnam pa zlog/ nyon mongs yongs su sbyongs pa 'di la
64a5(phal chen): dga'// rgyal ba'i shes rab rgya chen mtha' yas te// tshad med na mkha' 'dra zhing mtshungs pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes par rnams spyod pas// mar me me tog 'od
64a6(phal chen): kyi lha dga'o// de bzhin gshegs par 'gro mnyam sku gzugs rnams// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa rnams la bstan// de 'dra'i tshul la rab tu bsgoms pa yis// mngon du
64a7(phal chen): 'od 'phro'i lha de rab tu dga'// bsod nams rgya mtsho rgya chen mtha' yas pa// sngan cad de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su sbyangs// de 'dra'i rnam par thar la rnam lta bas// bsod
64a8(phal chen): nams dpal gyi 'od de rab tu dga'// srid pa rab tu rmongs pa'i sems can rnams// 'khor gyur rab rib mdongs la gzigs pas na// de dag phan phyir sangs rgyas mngon du
64b1(phal chen): byung // dri med 'od kyi rnam thar 'di thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs la ltos// 'gro ba sprin 'dra mtha' dang dbus yang med// de dag snyan cing 'gro ba rnam par
64b2(phal chen): 'dul// spos kyi rgyal mtshan 'od kyi 'di mthong ngo // sems can rmongs pa mun pa mdongs gyur cing // rnam pa sna tshogs sgrib pas sgribs gyur pa// sangs rgyas 'od kyi rnam par kun
64b3(phal chen): shes 'gyur// rtse mo'i 'od kyi lha ni 'di la 'jug/ de la snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba dri ma med rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas mang po mchod pa
64b4(phal chen): yang dag par 'byung zhing / sngon gyi smon lam gyi rgyan ston pa zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha ri rab spo'i rin po che'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad dang mngon sum du
64b5(phal chen): byang chub kyi spyod pa yang dag par sgrub cing 'byung ba zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra sgrogs pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi
64b6(phal chen): bsam pa la sangs rgyas ston pa/ rmi lam gyi mthar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'brug sgra sgrogs pa zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha me tog gi char sna tshogs 'bab pa'i mig gi rnam
64b7(phal chen): par thar pa ni/ dka' ba thams cad yongs su gtong zhing / rin po che'i 'char 'bebs pa'i rgyan ces bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha 'od 'phro mang po shin du dri ma med pa'i rnam par
64b8(phal chen): thar pa ni/ 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed cing / snying po byang chub phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston pa zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha me tog gi phreng ba
65a1(phal chen): bal @'od kyi gtsug bud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po bzhin du chos kyi tshul zab mo dran pa ston pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o// snying
65a2(phal chen): po byang chub kyi lha rin po che'i rgyan gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ dga' ba yang dag par myong ba/ mtha' yas pa la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o// snying po
65a3(phal chen): byang chub kyi lha mthu dam pa spos kyi mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang legs pa rab tu brjod pa'i byin brlabs zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha rdo rje sna tshog
65a4(phal chen): sprin gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ snying po byang chub kyi rnam pa mtha' yas par ston pa'i rgyan zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha pad mo'i shing snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ byang
65a5(phal chen): chub kyi lha shing yongs su zhi bas phyogs rgyas par byed pa zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs sna tshog
65a6(phal chen): yang dag par rgyu ba zhes bya'o// de nas snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba dri ma med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ snying po byang chub kyi lha'i 'khor
65a7(phal chen): gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bskal pa mang por mtha' dpung med par// de bzhin gshegs pas ji
65a8(phal chen): ltar sngon cad dran// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsgrubs pas na// de phyir de yi bsod nas na mkha'i tshad// zhing nams mtha' yas tshad med 'dra med par// mi zad
65b1(phal chen): stong pa'i sgo nas sngon btang bas// ri bo'i spo'i 'od kyi lha de ni// bde gshegs dran zhing rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// bde gshegs sprul pa rnam pa mtha' yas pa// de dag zhing rnams/
65b2(phal chen): kun du rab tu rgyu// 'gro bar sangs rgyas rmi lam bzhin ston cing // sprin gyi sgra dbyangs lha de rab tu dga'// mtha' yas bskal par dka' ba rab spyad de// dang ba'i spyan gyis 'gro
65b3(phal chen): la phan pa'i phyir// rgya mtsho'i spyan yang yongs su sngon btang te// de la me tog mig gi lha dga'o// yon tan rin chen 'od 'phro mtha' yas sprin// 'gro ba kun du snying po byang
65b4(phal chen): chub nas// rab tu bkye ba'i sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul gyis// 'od 'phro 'gyed pa'i lus kyi lha yang dga'// sems can rnams ni spyod pa rgya mtsho ste// de la rgyal ba'i chos kyi char
65b5(phal chen): yang 'bebs// ji ltar mos par nem nur rnam par sel// de yis gtsug phud 'chang ba dga' ba thob// rgyan gyi char 'bebs mig bzang lha de ni// sems kyi skad cig gcig gi
65b6(phal chen): tshad med pa'o// chos don byings kyi bye brag mtha' yas pa// rgya mtsho tha dang yang dag shes pas 'jug/ zhing rnams brjod du med pa thams cad du// 'gro ba kun la sangs rgyas legs
65b7(phal chen): brjod pas// de phyir yon tan sangs rgyas zhing kun grags// de ni rjes su spos mig lha yang dran// mtha' yas shing gi rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs// byang chub shing la kun kyang ma lus
65b8(phal chen): bstan// rdo rje sna tshogs sprin gyi lha de ni// sangs rgyas ye shes snying po byang chub la// phyogs rnams kun du mtha' dang mu med de// pad+mo snang zhing gsal ba'i lha de ni// rnam thar rnam
66a1(phal chen): yangs 'di la rab dga'o// sangs rgyas stobs rnams yongs dag bsam mi khyab// snying po byang chub 'dir ni kun kyang grag/ yang dag sgrubs pa
66a2(phal chen): byung ba de dag ni// thams cad sna tshogs snang ba'i 'od nyan to// de la rkang gis 'gro rin chen dpal gyi phyag rgya'i rnam par thar pa ni/ dga' ba yangs pa rin po che'i char gyis kun tu
66a3(phal chen): khyab pa zhes bya'o// rkang gis 'gro pad ma snang ba'i 'od zer gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sku 'od zer gyi kha dog pad mo'i dra ba thams cad du ston pas dga' bar byed pa zhes bya'o//
66a4(phal chen): rkang gi 'gro me tog gtsug phud kyi dpal rnam par thar pa ni/ sems kyi skad cig thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyings dang rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya'o//
66a5(phal chen): rkang gis 'gro shin du mdzes par gnon pa'i rnam par gnon pa ni/ gom pa 'dor ba thams cad du sems can mtha' yas pa 'dul ba'i rgyan ces bya'o// rkang gis 'gro rin chen
66a6(phal chen): dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ skad cig gcig gis pad mo'i dri ba sna tshogs sprul par byed cing / rin po che'i char dang dbyangs dang snang ba kun du 'byed pa zhes bya'o//
66a7(phal chen): rkang gis 'gro dga' ba'i dbyangs snyan pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ dga' ba'i shugs dang nyams bde rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o// rkang gis 'gro shing tsan dan gyi 'od
66a8(phal chen): kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du/ spos kyi ngang sprin tu ldang ba zhes bya'o// rkang gis 'gro pad mo'i yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ lus
66b1(phal chen): kyi 'od zer pang mo'i gseb thams cad nas yid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi dbyings 'byung bas snang ba bskyed pa zhes bya'o// rkang gis 'gro rdul gyi shugs kyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/
66b2(phal chen): lus kyi 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi snang bas dra bar byed pa zhes bya'o// rkang gis 'gro me tog mang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad la
66b3(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtshos yang dag par skul ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o// de nas rkang gis 'gro rin chen dpal gyi phyag rgyas sangs rgyas kyis mthus/ rkang gis 'gro ba'i lha'i 'khor gyi
66b4(phal chen): dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par ltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so// dga' ba rgya mtsho'i tshul gyi shugs bskyed cing // bskal pa mtha' yas sngan
66b5(phal chen): cad spyod pa spyad// zhing rnams kun rdul shin du phra mnyam pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams kyang dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mchod// skad cig sems la pad mo brjod yas pa/ dri zhim sna
66b6(phal chen): tshogs mngon par sprul mdzad nas// zhing rnams kun du rgyal ba gshegs mdzad pa// snang ba'i 'od zer lha des rab tu mthong // 'dren pa rnams kyi chos nyid bsam mi khyab/
66b7(phal chen): 'khor rnams kun du 'byam klas mtha' yas pa'i// rnam par 'phrul pa mi zad rab tu ston// me tog gtsug phud lha des de mthong ngo // phyogs bcu'i zhing gi dbyings rnams ma lus
66b8(phal chen): pa// thams cad kun du gshegs shing bzhud pa yi// sems can mtha' yas yongs su smin par mdzad// shin du mdzes par dga' bar de mthong ngo // sems can snyed kyi sprul pa
67a1(phal chen): @kun 'bros pa// re re'i sku'i chos kyi dbyings kyang 'gengs// rin chen dri med 'od kyang rab tu gtong // rkang 'gro dpal gyi mtshan gyis 'di mthong ngo //
67a2(phal chen): de gshegs pa'i spyod yul mtha' yas te// 'khor du rgyal ba chos kyi char yang 'bebs// de gshegs de'i 'khor na dgar gnas shing // dga' sgra dbyangs kyi rnam thar de mthong ngo //
67a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas dbyangs ni mkha' dang mnyam pa ste// dbyangs kyi yan lag yon tan kun dang ldan// 'jig rten kun dkang sems can rnam par 'dul// tsan ngan shing gi 'od ni de la
67a4(phal chen): nyan// sku rtse kun nas rgyal bas rnam 'phrul dang // dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba'i mtshan gyi rnams// sgra sgrags thos shing dga' ba skyer 'gyur te// de ni rdo rje'i 'od kyi
67a5(phal chen): lhas mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs skra bsam gyis mi khyab ste// gom pa gom par yon tan rgya mtsho ston// de dag thams cad ji ltar mos pas mthong // rdul gyi 'od kyi lhas
67a6(phal chen): ni de mthong ngo // 'jig rten mgon po rnam 'phrul rnam mang gis// phyogs bcur sems can yang dag skal ba mdzad// me tog 'khor mang rkang pas 'gro ba'i lha// mthong zhing
67a7(phal chen): dga' ba yangs pa rab tu thob// de la lus kyi ris su rtogs pa'i lha khrel dang // dge bas rgyas pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam
67a8(phal chen): rjes su dran pas rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su rtogs pa'i lha 'od zer rtogs pa'i lha 'od zer phyogs su snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams su med
67b1(phal chen): par sangs rgyas kyi 'od rnam par ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o// lus kyi ris su rtogs pa'i lha sgras 'dul ba'i rgya mtsho dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung 'dul ba'i
67b2(phal chen): sems can thams cad la/ rjod cing yang dag par bskul bas dga' ba 'byung ba'o// lus kyi ris su rtogs pa'i lha rgyan bzang po// me tog gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de
67b3(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nam mkha'i mtshan nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs/ kun du rab tu gnas par 'byung ba zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su rtogs pa'i lha dpyod yul mtha' yas
67b4(phal chen): dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul 'gro ba rnams la yang dag par ston pa'i mthu zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su rtogs pa'i lha snang ba'i phreng ba 'dzin
67b5(phal chen): pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad gso ba dang 'dres pa'i mdangs kyis dga' ba zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su rtogs pa'i lha spos dri ma med pa'i sprin las
67b6(phal chen): char 'bab pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i dri ma mngon par sel ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su rtogs pa'i lha bsrung 'dzin yongs
67b7(phal chen): su sdud pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bdud kyi las dang / rmongs pa rnam par bzlog pa zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su rtogs pa'i lha sgo kun nas yongs su
67b8(phal chen): gnon pa la/ mngon du gyur pa'i mig gis rnam par thar pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi gnas su rgyal bas// rnam par dmigs par mngon du ston pas rgyan ces bya'o//
68a1(phal chen): bal @#lus kyi ris su rtogs pa'i lha khrel dang dpal mi g.yo ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs thams cad yang
68a2(phal chen): dag par 'dzin cing / yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya'o// de nas lus kyi ris su rtogs pa'i dge ba rgyas par 'od kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ lus kyi ris su rtogs pa'i lha'i 'khor gyi
68a3(phal chen): dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par ltos nas/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ri rab rdal phran shin du phra snyed kyi// bskal pa de dag pha lnga'i bskal pa ni// rdul ces
68a4(phal chen): bya bar 'od mdzes 'od zer rgyal// mchod de smon lam btab pa bdag gis dran// sangs rgyas sku las 'od 'phro rab bkye ba// de yi 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su rgyu// rgyal ba'i chas kyi
68a5(phal chen): dbyangs su rgyu// rgyal ba'i 'od zer 'dra ba'i sems can 'dul// 'od 'phro 'od zer lha yi de mthong ngo // dbyangs kyi yan lag yon tan kun rgyas pa'i// sangs rgyas gsung ni zhing rnams kun
68a6(phal chen): du sgrogs// 'gro ba ma lus thams cad yang dag bskal// dbyangs kyi 'dul ba de dag dga' bas nyan// rgyal ba'i sku ni rab tu zhi la ltos// sku gzugs du mnga' mtshan nyid mi mnga'
68a7(phal chen): ste// 'gro ba kun du'ang bzhugs par rab tu snang // me tog gtsug gi ji bzhin nyid du mthong // 'dren pa'i chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab te// sems can de dag dad pa ci bzhin du/
68a8(phal chen): la la bzhugs dang gzhengs dang gshegs par mthong // de yang spyod lam 'byung ba'i lhas mthong ngo // rgyal ba'i tshems kyi mtshams rnams thams cad nas// dri zhim 'od 'phro
68b1(phal chen): sgron ma'i sprin kye bas// 'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs zhi bar 'gyur// dri med spos kyi sprin gyi de mthong ngo // sangs rgyas mgon po 'gro ba'i skyabs su byung // nyon mongs mongs shing sdug
68b2(phal chen): bsngal gzir ba rnams// mgu par mdzad cing nyon mongs thams cad ci la// sdang ba'i 'phreng ba 'phyangs pas de mthong ngo // 'dren pa bskal pa brgyar yang shin du dkon// rang 'jig
68b3(phal chen): rten don mdzad skyes pa ni// 'jig rten kan gyi dbul ba rnam par sel// khrel yod dpal gyi 'od snang de skad smra// sems can nyon mongs sgribs pas nyon mongs shing // bdud kyi lam gyis
68b4(phal chen): dkrugs te 'byin pa rnams// de dag rgyal bas rnam thar lam ston tshe// bsrung zhing skyong ba'i dpal gyis de mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa ltos// sangs rgyas sprin gyi
68b5(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings gnan cing // 'jig rten dbang po'i gnas su sems can 'dul// kun sgo'i mig gi dpal gyi spyod yul lo// de la lag na rdo rje 'am mthu chen kha dog bzang po'i 'od kyi rnam
68b6(phal chen): bar thar pa ni// yon tan mtha' yas pa dang // gzugs kyi sku rnam par spyod pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje nyi ma'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs
68b7(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyi sku las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin sna tshogs kyi rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje'i ri rab me tog 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen po bstan pas
68b8(phal chen): yon tan mtha' yas pa'i lus su 'phrul zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje rnam dag sprin gyis dpyad kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs mtha' yas pa tshad med pa'i rjes
69a1(phal chen): phal @#su song ba zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje dbang po shin du mang po'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston cing /
69a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis yang dag par skul ba zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje'i 'od yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu phye ba tham
69a3(phal chen): cad ma lus pa la/ yang dag par spyod pa zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje shing gi sgra dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ shing gi lha thams cad 'dren pa'i rgyan yid du 'ong ba'i brgyan pa zhes bya'o//
69a4(phal chen): lag na rdo rje seng ge'i 'od kyi rgyal po'i rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor/ yangs pa'i chog kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'od ces bya'o// lag na rdo rje 'od
69a5(phal chen): 'phro sdug pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa na/ sems can rungs pa'i rgyud las/ lus 'jigs 'jigs ltar rab tu ston cing kun du rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje rin chen gtsug
69a6(phal chen): phud pad mo'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gtsug gi nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi char mngon par 'bebs pa zhes bya'o// lag na
69a7(phal chen): rdo rje mthu chen kha dog bzang po'i 'od kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthus// lag na rdo rje 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par ltas nas/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
69a8(phal chen): chos rgyal chos kyi mdzad pa yi// chos nyid de la rnam par ltos// yon tan mtha' yas sku gzugs kyis// 'jig rten kun du rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas pa spu thams cad nas/
69b1(phal chen): 'od zer dra ba bsam mi khyab// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ste// phyogs bcu kun du rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul de dag gis// chos kyi dbyings su khyab byas shing /
69b2(phal chen): 'gro ba kun la mngon sum du// mi zad skra ni shin du ston// sangs rgyas gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni// zhing rnams kun du rab du sgrogs// gsung gis sems can thams cad kyis/
69b3(phal chen): bsam pa thams cad rab tu 'gengs// 'jig rten dbang po kun gnas na// thub pa rab tu bzhugs par snang // de dag thams cad 'khor rnams la// 'dren pa dag ni chos ston mdzad//
69b4(phal chen): rgya mtsho chos kyi sgo bskal bas// gzhan dang gzhan gyi tshul dag gis// thams cad chos kyi bye brag don// rgyal ba zad med rab tu ston// rgyal chen mtha' med tshul dag
69b5(phal chen): la// rgya mtsho 'khor rnams rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas 'od zer rab 'dres pas// kun gyis 'dren pa mthong bar 'gyur// zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul snyed du// rdzogs pa'i
69b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kun mchod pas// bsod nams rgya chen na mkha' bzhin// kun gyi 'dren pa rab du mthong // sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul ma 'dres pa// thams cad zhing du ston pa mdzad/
69b7(phal chen): 'gro ba sangs rgyas mngon sum du// snying po byang chub rnam par mdzes// 'od zer sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi// 'od 'bro sprin ni kun du snang // chos dbyings kun du khyab byas shing /
69b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas spyod yul rab tu ston// shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba//
70a1(phal chen): pa la bam po lnga pa'o// // de la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rnam par thar pa ni/
70a2(phal chen): tshul rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab par de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / 'gro ba
70a3(phal chen): 'dul ba la mthar thug par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyin pas/ yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad kyi yul
70a4(phal chen): zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sa nas sar smon lam rgya mtsho rab tu gnas pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / sgo thams cad nas
70a5(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings su bdag gi lus kyi sprin rdul snyed mtha' yas pas/ rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / zhing thams cad du rang gi ming bsam gyis mi
70a6(phal chen): khyab pa'i 'khor lo sgrogs pa'i/ byin gyis brlabs shes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba'i thams cad kyi spus bsu/ byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang rnam
70a7(phal chen): par 'phrul pa'i mtha' dang dbus med pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / dus gsum du bskal pa skad cig gcig tu ston pa 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa
70a8(phal chen): rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho'i yul phan tshun tu 'jug pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar
70b1(phal chen): pa dang / gang 'di chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpung med pa rang gi lus kyi sprul pas/ rgyas par rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi brlabs zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / gang
70b2(phal chen): 'di byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad kyi tshul phan tshun tu ston pa zhes bya'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / gang 'di byang chub
70b3(phal chen): sems dpa'i chos thams cad kyi tshul phan tshun du ston pa rgya chen pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
70b4(phal chen): kun du bzang po'i rnam par thar pa'i tshul/ rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug cing sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ 'khor rgya
70b5(phal chen): mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par ltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnam rgyal bas dri med rnam par spangs// mkha' yangs rdul bzhin yon tan
70b6(phal chen): tshad kyang med// sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sras po dri med pa'i// de la bsam yas chos sprin char yang bab// ji ltar rgyal ba gdan la bzhugs snang ba// de bzhin rdul sbubs ma lus
70b7(phal chen): kun snang ste// 'on kyang bde gshegs gshegs dang 'pho ba med// zhing rnams kun tu yul yang rab tu ston// sa yi tshul la 'jug pa tshad med ste// spyod pa thus pas byang
70b8(phal chen): chub sems dpa' ston// bsam gyis mi khyab tshul ni kun gsungs pas// rgyal sras rnams ni chos kyi dbyings la 'jug/ chos dbyings 'jug tshul rnam pa rgya che ste// mtha'
71a1(phal chen): la @#yas phyogs su mtha' dang dpung med so// rdul bran sbubs su rgyal ba 'phrul pa sgo// 'gro ba'i bsam pa kun kyang mkhyen// phyogs rnams
71a2(phal chen): kun tu thams cad zhing rnams kun du yang // 'jig rten gtso mtshan 'gro dang mnyam par byung // thams cad tshul sgor sangs rgyas don yod de// 'dul bas sems can thams
71a3(phal chen): cad rnam par sbyong // rdul sbubs kun tu mtha' dbus med pa'i// rnam 'phrul yangs pa rang byung shin tu ston// sngan chad thub pa'i byang chub spyod pa rnams// ji
71a4(phal chen): bzhin kun kyang snying po byang chub brjod// yangs du bskal pa ji snyed yod pa rnams// skad cig skad cig sangs rgyas ma lus ston// der ni sems can byung zhing 'jig
71a5(phal chen): pa bstan// 'jig rten gtso bo'i ye shes bsam yas ston// 'byam klas mi zad mtha' yas lo bgrangs pas// rgyal sras thams cad sangs rgyas sa ltas te//
71a6(phal chen): thams cad sgor yang sangs rgyas mtha' dbus med// rgyal sras kun gyi shes par sla ba min// sangs rgyas mkha' 'dra rnam par mi rtog ste// chos nyid gnas pa
71a7(phal chen): chos kyi sprin dag gis// sprul pas spyod che kun tu rgyas mdzad cing // shing mchog kun drung byang chub 'tshang rgya bstan// sangs rgyas gsungs de rab tu brjod pas na/
71a8(phal chen): chos gnas thams cad ma lus brjod pa yin// 'gro ba thams cad re re'i sgo dganas// sangs rgyas chos rnams kun la rab tu 'jug/ de la byang chub sems dpa'
71b1(phal chen): dge ba dri ma med pa'i rang bzhin gzi brjid kyi 'od yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni// phyogs kyi dbyings thams cad du mngon par byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
71b2(phal chen): 'khor du 'gro ba'i brgyan byed pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'od mchog kun tu sgron ma'i rnam par thar pa ni// sems skad cig gis mngon par rdzogs
71b3(phal chen): par byang chub pa'i sgo zad mi shes pa ston cing // chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yongs su smin pa dang rnam par 'dul bar byed pa'i 'od ces bya'o// byang chub
71b4(phal chen): sems dpa' kun tu 'bar ba'i seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs dang zhing yang dag par 'byung
71b5(phal chen): ba la rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi 'od zer kun tu 'od 'phro'i rnam par thar pa ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi yul gyis rnam par spyod pa don yod pa
71b6(phal chen): zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho kun tu sgra dbyangs rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan thams cad 'khor gyi dkyil
71b7(phal chen): 'khor du yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul ye shes kun tu snang ba'i 'od kyi/ rnam par thar pa ni de bzhin
71b8(phal chen): gshegs pa'i rjes su kun nas song zhing / chos dbyings la rnam par spyod pa'i sprin chen po'i snying po zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin chen kun du
72a1(phal chen): pal @#rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni// 'gro ba thams cad kyi spyod pa la rab tu zhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pas shin
72a2(phal chen): tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i gsung kun tu/ 'jam dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad snyen bkur zhing mchod par nye
72a3(phal chen): 'gro ba'i snying po zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams mi zad dri med/ kun du gzi brjid kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad
72a4(phal chen): kyi byin gyi brlabs rgya chen po 'byung ba zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyi 'od zer kun du snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa sku med pa las/
72a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas kyi
72a6(phal chen): mthus/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ rgya mtsho'i phyogs thams cad la rnam par ltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ji snyed gang dag
72a7(phal chen): phyogs rnams kun tu zhing // rgyal bas de kun skad cig thugs kyis sbyangs// 'gro bar kun tu zhi ba med pa'i gsungs// sangs rgyu chos ni 'khor lo rgya cher bskur//
72a8(phal chen): skad cig thugs kyi chos dbyings kun bkang ste// mtha' yas spyong yul dbyings rnams rgyal bas ston// 'gro ba kun lam byang chub snying po ru// byang chub 'chang rgya rnas
72b1(phal chen): par 'phrul pa mdzad// bskal pa brgya phrag stong rnams tshad med du// de bzhin gshegs pas sngan chad spyod spyad tshe// nam mkha' 'dra bar byas nas rab bkye zhing /
72b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas zhing 'di sngon tshe rab tu sbyangs// mtha' dang dbus med bskal par la la yi// skyo ba med par rgyal ba'i yul bsams kyang // sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul stobs la
72b3(phal chen): mtha' dbus med// phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa kun tu 'gengs// rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul yul la rnam par ltos// phyogs bcu'i zhing rgyan de dag rnams brgyan pa// rgyal
72b4(phal chen): bas 'dir ni kun kyang rab tu bstan// skad cig skad cig sna tshogs gzugs kyang snang // bskal pa brgya stong tshad med bdag tu// rgyal ba'i ba spu cig mtha' shes
72b5(phal chen): par dka'// tshul rnams kun sgor sangs rgyas chags pa med// 'gro ba 'di tshul rgya chen mtha' yas mdzes// sngon tshe'i skal pas rgyal bas 'gro kun du// sangs
72b6(phal chen): rgyas rgya mtsho rgya chen bsnyen bkur bas// de bas 'jig rten rtsol phyogs dbyings rnams kun// kun nas mchod pa mang po rgya chen 'byung // phyogs rnams bkang
72b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas byung ba dag/ rdul gyi sbubs su tshad med zhing yang ston// de dag yul du mi zad mtha' yas pa'i// bskal pa rgya mtshor byin gyis rlob pa mdzad// sngon
72b8(phal chen): tshe'i bskal par rgyal bas 'gro don spyod// thugs rje rgya mtsho chad med rab skyed cing // 'gro ba rgya mtsho kun nas 'khor ba yi// 'khor rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas
73a1(phal chen): pal @kun kyang sbyangs// sangs rgyas med sku med rdul dang bral// de bzhin nyid gnas chos dbyings snying po ste// 'gro ba kun na mtha' yas gzug
73a2(phal chen): su snang // 'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal kun zhi mdzad// de la byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer rgya mtsho 'od chen dpal gyi zla ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang sa'i
73a3(phal chen): shugs kyis/ sems can gyi khams kyi tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi nga ro rgya mtsho dri
73a4(phal chen): med 'od kyi snying po'i rnam par thar pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad skad cig la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyis khyim sna tshogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o// byang chub
73a5(phal chen): sems dpa' yon tan rin chen 'byung ba/ ye shes dpal gyi gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gro ba rnams la mngon sum du yon tan
73a6(phal chen): dri ma med pas yongs su dag pa sgrub pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen 'od 'bar blo gros dbang phyug gi rnam par thar pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
73a7(phal chen): snying po// byang chub tu thog pa 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi phyogs su yang dag par 'byung ba'i rgyan ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' pad mo rnam par gnon pa'i 'od zer gtsug pud
73a8(phal chen): kyi rnam par thar pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang tha mi dad par 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po dang mos pa rgya mtsho'i 'od ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu ye shes
73b1(phal chen): sprin gyi nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sgrub pas/ bskal pa mtha' yas pa dag tu byin gyis rlob cing rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o// byang
73b2(phal chen): chub sems dpa' mthu stobs brtson 'grus rdo rje yangs pa'i snying po'i rnam par thar pa ni/ chos thams cad phyag rgya mtha' dang dbus med par yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o// byang chub
73b3(phal chen): sems dpa' spos kyi 'od 'phro shin tu 'bar ba'i 'od kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi thog ma'i/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa shes
73b4(phal chen): pa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par sgrub pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad yon tan yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi
73b5(phal chen): smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dbyings la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams yangs pa/ shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od mchog yon tan 'byung ba'i
73b6(phal chen): blo gros kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul zab mo chos kyi dbyings thams cad kun nas rab tu gnas par rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
73b7(phal chen): 'od zer rgya mtsho'i 'od chen dpal gyi zla bas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la rnam par ltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
73b8(phal chen): pa 'di dag smras so// pha rol phyin pa mtha' yas dang // sa'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen kun du yongs su rgyas// tshad med sems can rnam par 'dul ba'i che// sangs rgyas
74a1(phal chen): zhing yang rnams kyang rnam par sbyangs// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing kun rgyas byed te// sangs rgyas sems can khams sbyin 'dul mdzad pa//
74a2(phal chen): skad cig thugs kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ mtha' yas 'gro ba mnyam bsam tshim par mdzad// bskal pa rgya che mi zad mu med par// rgyal ba 'gro ba mngon sum kun nas zhugs/
74a3(phal chen): mgon pos sngan chad ji ltar sbyangs tshul du// rgyal bas spyod yul rnam dag rab tu bstan// chos rgyal de dag ji snyed rnam 'phrul pa// phyogs rnams rgya mtsho ma lus kun na snang
74a4(phal chen): snying po byang chub kun na'ang rgyal ba dag/ 'khor gyis skor cing chos rnams gsung ba snang // 'gro ba'i bsam pa thams cad tshim mdzad cing // 'jig rten dag na sangs
74a5(phal chen): rgyas tshul kun mdzes// dbang po ji bzhin chos kyi char pa 'bebs// sangs rgyas chos sku yangs pa rnam par mdzes// de bzhin nyid ltar mtshan nyid lus med de// rgyal
74a6(phal chen): ba dri med 'od gsal chos kyi sku// ye shes zhi ba'i sku ni tshad med de// phyogs dbyings kun bkang chos kyi char yang 'bebs// chos rje thams cad stobs kyi rnam par dag/
74a7(phal chen): bde gshegs ye shes mkha' 'dra mtha' yas te// rgya chen 'gro ba mtha' dpung med dkang zhing // rgyal ba stobs la 'jug pa rab tu ston// sangs rgyas 'od kyis
74a8(phal chen): chos dbyings kun bkang zhing // sangs rgyas spyod pa thams cad rdzogs par bstan// rgyal bas mngon tshe ji ltar rnam sbyangs pa// de bzhin ye shes sa rnams rgyal bas bstan//
74b1(phal chen): phyogs rnams kun tu rang 'byung rnam par mdzes// smon lam rnam par 'phrul pa sa lus ston// ji ltar sngon tshe rgyal bas yongs sbyangs pa// rgyal ba'i 'od zer dra ba kun nas
74b2(phal chen): sgrogs// sangs rgyas yul ni phyogs su zad pa med// dbus dang mtha' med gzhal med mtha' yas dbyings// phyogs dbyings kun du chags med bsnyes pas na/
74b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun na shin tu mdzes// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge'i khri dang / pad+ma'i ze ba'i dri thams cad dang / nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi ngos dang /
74b4(phal chen): 'khor lo'i lte ba thams cad dang / me tog gi ze ba'i dra ba thams cad dang / stegs bu'i ngos thams cad dang / rta babs kyi sgo thams cad dang / nor bu'i gzugs kyi ngos
74b5(phal chen): thams cad dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sgo thams cad dang / seng ge'i khri rgyan gyi sgo thams cad nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'
74b6(phal chen): mang po 'thon par gyur te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i blo gros rnam par rol pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
74b7(phal chen): sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gtsug pud dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes chen po'i nyi/
74b8(phal chen): mas rab tu gnon pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa ye shes rgya mtsho'i ya dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' mig brgya
75a1(phal chen): bal @#pad+mo sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i tshul pad ma sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud dang / byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi 'od/
75a2(phal chen): 'phro gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun du sgra chos kyi dbyings kyi dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin yid du 'ong ba'i dri ma med pa'i zla ba dang /
75a3(phal chen): de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed mchod pa'i sprin rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu 'gyed cing / 'di ltar nor bu rin po che'i me tog gi sprin
75a4(phal chen): thams cad ni shin tu 'gyed/ rin po che'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin thams cad ni mngon par 'byin/ yul mtha' yas pa'i spos kun tu 'od 'phro ba'i bdug pa'i sprin ni rnam par
75a5(phal chen): 'gyed cing / nor bu nyi ma'i snying po'i 'khor lo'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin ni rab tu gtong / sil snyan gyi sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba'i sprin ni rab tu sgrogs/ rin po che'i 'od 'bru/
75a6(phal chen): ba kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sgron ma'i sprin gyis ni rab tu snang bar byed/ nor bu sna tshogs kyi shing gi yal ga las me tog gi dog pa ni rnam par spyod/ rin po che'i 'od dri ma med pa zad
75a7(phal chen): mi shes pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i char ni rab tu 'bebs/ rgyan mdzes pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyi char ni rab tu 'bebs shing / de lta bu dag
75a8(phal chen): la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi char ni rab tu 'bebs par byed cing / lhags par gyur te/
75b1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad du/ mchod pa'i sprin rgyun mi 'chad pa'i char mngon par phab nas/
75b2(phal chen): gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brtan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon du ltas nas/ seng ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs du ma'i pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ dkyil/
75b3(phal chen): mo dkrung bcas nas 'khod par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / spyod yul rgya mtsho rgya chen po yongs su dag pa rnams so// sgo kun nas chos kyi snang ba
75b4(phal chen): rab tu thob pa rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la chags pa med pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams so// tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa thams cad kyis chos rgya mtsho la
75b5(phal chen): zhugs pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa rnams so// sgo kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i dbyings rab du thob pa rnams so//
75b6(phal chen): gzungs kyi sgo brgya mtsho thams cad kyi chos rgya mtsho rab tu 'dzin pa rnams so// dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi yid kyi sa la rab tu gnas pa rnams so// dga' ba'i shugs rgya
75b7(phal chen): chen po rab tu thob pa rnams so// bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor mu med pa yongs su dag pa rnams te/ chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' la rnam pa rgyu zhing / sangs rgyas tham/
75b8(phal chen): cad mchod pa mngon par sgrub pa la rab tu brtson pa sha stag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i blo gros rnam par rol pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa'i rgyal pos sangs
75'a1(phal chen): rgyas kyi mthus/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par ltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas rnam par
75'a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas mnyam nyid mkhyen// chags med brnyes pas nam mkha' lta bu ste// phyogs rnams zhing kun rab tu snang byed na// 'byam klas 'khor na bzhugs par rnam par mdzes
75'a3(phal chen): bde gshegs rang byung mtha' dang dbus med pa'i thams cad phyogs su chos dbyings kun rgyas pa// dbang phyug chen po kun gyi chos bskor zhing // shing gi rgyal po kun gyi drung na
75'a4(phal chen): bzhugs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs dag gis// skad cig sems la mi zad nam mkha' bzhin// rnam thar gzhan dang gzhan dag thob pas mthong // de bzhin
75'a5(phal chen): gshegs pa'i yul ni mtha' yas so// bskal pa brgya mtshor ldan chad sbyor ba che// de bzhin gshegs pa'i srid pa rgya mtsho 'dir// sna tshogs thabs kyis sems can smin
75'a6(phal chen): byas pa// de dag rgyal ba de yi chos 'dzin to// yongs dag dri med 'khor rnams 'khod pa dag/ sangs rgyas thams cad lta zhing rnam par gnas// pad mo'i gdan bzhag
75'a7(phal chen): pa// tshogs kyi nang na rgyal ba mngon par mdzes// sangs rgyas gang na bzhugs pa seng ge'i khri// rin chen nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro zhing // spos 'gro sprin rnams mtha'
75'a8(phal chen): yas rab tu byung // snying po du ma'i me tog phreng sbyangs pa'o// rin chen 'od 'phro'i sprin ni rtag tu 'gyed// 'od zer sgron ma rgya chen rab tu 'bar// rta babs rnam pa sna tshog
75'b1(phal chen): rnams kyis rgyan// thub pa de bzhugs mngon par rab tu mdzes// sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba rab tu byed// rin chen mtshon du sna tshogs pad ma 'byung // nor bu'i rgyal pos skar
75'b2(phal chen): khung kun nas brgyan// sangs rgyas de bzhugs rnam par shin du mdzes// zla gam rin chen mang po yongs su bzung // rdo rje 'od 'phro snang ba'i snying pos rgyan// gtsug na nor
75'b3(phal chen): bu'i byang chub sems dpa' bzung // sangs rgyas de bzhugs rnam par shin tu mdzes// phyogs bcur sprul pa'i dra ba rab bkye zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam sgra
75'b4(phal chen): yang sgrogs// gzugs brnyan bzhin du zhing rnams kun na snang // thub pa de 'dri'i seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrogs
75'b5(phal chen): pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par ltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'di ni bde gshegs
75'b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas byin brlabs te// byang chub spyod pa sngan chad spyad pa dang // sangs rgyas mchod pa'i mchod pa du ma dag/ rgyan pa'i gdan las de dag thams cad snang /
75'b7(phal chen): spos 'od snang ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po can// me tog snying po'i seng ge'i gdan gyi 'khor// rgyan rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan gyur pa dang // 'khor rnams de dag
75'b8(phal chen): thams cad kun kyang snang // skad cig skad cig rgyan gyi kha dog kun// rnam pa du mar sangs rgyas gdan las snang // sems can ji ltar mos pa de dag kyang //
76a1(phal chen): 'khod cing sangs rgyas tshad med gdan la lta// rin chen pad mo'i lda ldi mang btags pa// phye zhing byang chub sems dpa' mang po rnams//
76a2(phal chen): sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba rab 'byin cing // sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs pa stod par byed// sangs rgyas bsod nams tshad med nam mkha' bzhin// 'di dag rgyan kun
76a3(phal chen): de las rab tu byung // sa rnams re re'i rgyan rnams gang yod pa// 'gro ba de dag kun gyis bsam mi nus// mi phyed 'tshams kyi rdo rje sna tshogs pa// 'khor yangs
76a4(phal chen): rnam dag shin tu mnyam pa te// nor bu'i dra ba sna tshogs kun tu bkram// byang chub shing gi sa'i 'khor kun tu'o// sa phyogs gang na rgyal ba'i bdan yod pa// kha dog
76a5(phal chen): mtha' yas rgya chen sna tshogs ste// me tog mngon stor rin chen rnam par bkram// gser tshon mdzes pas de ni rab tu rgyan// sa yi lha mo de dag rab du dga'// skad
76a6(phal chen): cig sems kyis mi zad sa yang ston// kun kyang rgyal ba'i zhal du mngon lta zhing // kha dog thams cad rgyan gyis sprin gtong // rin chen sgron ma'i mang po gsal bar
76a7(phal chen): 'bar// spos mang dri zhim mang po rtag tu 'byung // dus dang tshod kyi rnam pa mang ston zhing // lha rnams kun kyang sangs rgyas mchod par byed// phyogs rnams btsun zhing
76a8(phal chen): rnams ji snyed pa// de dag sa rgyan phun sum tshogs yod pa// de dag kun kyang sa dkyil 'di na snang // sangs rgyas byin brlabs mnyam pa med pas byung // de nas
76b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi gtsug kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su
76b2(phal chen): bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sngan chad spyad spyod pa'i tshe dag tu// zhing kun phun sum tshogs pa mthong ba rnams// snying po byang chub 'khor gyi sa 'di la// mi zad sa dang
76b3(phal chen): de dag rab tu sdang // rnam thar yangs pa gang na snang ba yi// sa la rin chen mdzes kun rnam par bkram// rin chen mang pos dkyil 'khor kun du gtor// sangs
76b4(phal chen): rgyas 'od kyi sprin kyang rab tu snang // sa rnams kun rgyan shing gi dam pa'i drung // kun nas nor bus rgyal pos rgyan byas nas// bsod nams 'od kyi dbyangs kyi 'brug
76b5(phal chen): sgra 'byung // sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul tshul yang rab tu brjod// rin chen mang po sgron ma'i char phab zhing // rin chen mdzes pa'i bkod pa rnam par mdzes// sgra dbyangs
76b6(phal chen): kun gyi 'brug sgra shin tu sgrogs// sa'i lha rnams sa yang yang ston// rin chen 'od 'phro sgron ma rnam par snang // 'od zer sprin ni sa la rab tu byung // nor bu dra ba sil
76b7(phal chen): ma kun nas bkram// rin chen sna tshogs rigs kyi yan lag brgyan// sa rnams kun nas mdzes pa 'di dag ltos// rin chen mang po tshon bzang rgyan du bkye// 'gro
76b8(phal chen): ba dag la chos kyi rgya mtsho sgrogs// de dag chos nyid rnam par dag pa mthong // ma lus phyogs na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub shing gi phun sum tshogs pa dag/
77a1(phal chen): sa yi dkyil 'khor 'di ni kun snang ste// de dag chos nyid rnam par dag par brjod// sangs rgyas gdan las chos rnams rgya mtsho yi// chos
77a2(phal chen): sgo bde bar gshegs pas gang gsungs pa// sems can kun gyi bsam pa ji bzhin du// sa 'khor rnams kyang kun nas rab tu 'byung // dri zhim 'od rnams rtag tu 'byung
77a3(phal chen): bsam// de dag ji bzhin snod kyi 'gro la 'gyengs// srog chags rnams kyi nyon mongs zhi bar mdzod// sa 'khor de na de 'dra rab tu sgrogs// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul phun
77a4(phal chen): sum gang dag dang // dri med sa ni gang gis mdzes gyur pa'i// phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyan rnams re re zhing // bskal pa bye ba dag tu'ang brjod mi nus// de nas byang chub
77a5(phal chen): sems dpa' ye shes chen po nyi mas rab tu gnon pa'i blo gros kyi mthus// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
77a6(phal chen): dag smras so// 'jig rten kun gyis bsam pa tshim mdzad cing // sangs rgyas chos kyi gzhal med khang na mdzes// 'byam klas phyogs rnams kun na mngon sum du/
77a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas 'gro gcog gzhal med khang na snang // rin chen kun gyi snying po rab tu rgyas// rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes shing rab tu 'bar// sangs rgyas po zang 'dzin
77a8(phal chen): bsam mi khyab// de na bzhugs shing sangs rgyas rab tu mdzes// ka brgyan ni nor bu sna tshogs te// phyogs rnams kun sgor rta babs sprin kyang bres// steg bu'i phreng ba
77b1(phal chen): kun nas rgyan du bkod// gser gyi dril bu'i sprin yang rnam par rgyus// me tog bla re rnam pa sna tshogs ltos// rin chen shing sdong dar gyi bla re bres// nor bu thams cad sgo
77b2(phal chen): nas phreng ba 'brul// de nas ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu mdzes// spos dri rgyal mtshan rin chen dra ba ste// 'od zer sgron ma'i sprin gyis kun tu yog/ rgyan rnams sna tshogs kun nas
77b3(phal chen): shin tu bres// de nas sangs rgyas rab tu 'phags pa bzhugs// phyogs rnams kun sgo sprul pa'i sprin gyi rnams// dbyangs kyi 'jig rten khyab par grags byed cing // 'byam
77b4(phal chen): klas phyogs kyi sems can rnams 'dul ba// sangs rgyas po brang 'di na de dag zag/ me tig shing dang rin chen spungs spel pa// 'phags par phyogs rnams kun tu mngon
77b5(phal chen): par mdzes// de la dus gsum zhing rnams thams cad kyang // gzugs brnyan gyur pa de dag rab tu snang // phyogs rnams kun du rin chen mang bkye ba// de dag sna tshogs
77b6(phal chen): mdzes par rnam par 'bar// phyogs rnams kun tu skar khung mdzes pas brgyan// rta babs mnga' yab sna tshogs mang pos rgyan// de la dri med 'od zer kun snang ba'i//
77b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas po brang rnam pa bsam yas te// gzhal med khang thams cad de na snang // de dag kun na'ang rgyal ba shin tu mdzes// phyogs rnams kun na 'khor rnams ji snyed pa
77b8(phal chen): rgyal ba'i pho brang 'dir ni kun bzhugs pa// mtha' med dbus med mu yang de bzhin med// rang sbyangs rgyas po brang de na bzhugs// de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan
78a1(phal chen): bal @#rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho'i dpal sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par
78a2(phal chen): ltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas zhing rdul shin tu tha snyed kyi// bsod nams rgya mtsho rnam par rab sbyangs te// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul smon
78a3(phal chen): lam yang dag 'byung // snying po byang chub dri med rnam par mdzes// spos zhim thams cad rtsa nas yang dag rgyu// yid bzhin nor mchog rgyal pos kun nas rgyan// rdo rje'i phye ma
78a4(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal pos bris// shing sdong rtsa ba rin chen kun las byas// rdo rje phye ma'i nor bu 'khor lo 'byung // lhun rnams thams cad rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan// yal ga stug po
78a5(phal chen): sprin ltar kun nas 'khyil// snying po byang chub de rgyal mdzes// yal ga dog pa kun nas mngon pa ste// 'khor rnams snum 'jam phyogs rnams kun du 'phags// me tog
78a6(phal chen): 'bras bu'i rgyun rnams kun kyang 'byed// snying po byang chub rgya che bsam mi khyab// 'od rnams bkye ba phyogs su rnam par mdzes// dri ma med pa'i 'od 'bar zad mi shes/
78a7(phal chen): yal ga'i sgo nas sprin kun char yang 'bebs// snying po byang chub smon lam yangs pas byung // me tog nor dang rin chen mi zad nor// mu tig nor dag phyogs rnams kun nas
78a8(phal chen): rgyas// bye ma nor gyi gnas kyis sprin 'byed de// snying po byang chub phyogs rnams kun tu 'byin// bde gshegs snying po byang chub 'di la ltos// pad mi'i dra ba nor bu dri
78b1(phal chen): med yang // rin chen 'od zer dkyil 'khor kun nas 'phro// dril bu'i dra ba sprin gyi sgra dbyangs 'byin// phyogs bcu'i zhing bzangs gzugs gang yod pa// 'byam klas zhing gi
78b2(phal chen): ma lus thams cad dag/ byang chub shing la de dag kun nas snang // de drung sangs rgyas dri med rnam par mdzes// yal ga kun nas rin chen mi zad nor// byang chub sems dpa'
78b3(phal chen): dag kyang rtag 'byung zhing // bsod nams rgya chen dkyil 'khor char phab ste// phyogs bcu rgyas pa mchod cing de dag 'dong // de bzhin gshegs pas sngan chad cir 'gyur dang /
78b4(phal chen): byang chub spyod las byung ba 'di la ltos// yal ga kun las rin chen nor mi zad// sangs rgyas yul kun bsam gyis mi khyab po// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mig brgya pa//
78b5(phal chen): pad mo sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthus// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par ltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
78b6(phal chen): dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul pa// de dag rin chen sgo nas kun kyang grag/ de ni mtha' dang dbus yang med pa ste// snying po byang chub 'di ni kun snang ngo // me
78b7(phal chen): tog mang po'i phreng ba sbyangs bkye zhing // 'od zer sprin gyis phyogs rnams kun bkang ste// byang chub shing la gnas pa'i lha'i rnams// sangs rgyas lta zhing rtag tu mchod pa byed/
78b8(phal chen): spos kyi rgyal mtshan nor bu sna tshogs 'bar// spos kyi 'od 'phro bdug spos rab tu 'byung // 'khor gyi rgya mtsho kun la khyab par zhim// sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs gdun
79a1(phal chen): ba sel// rgyal ba'i 'khor ni tshed med rgya che ste// phyogs rnams kun na snying po byang chub la// gzugs brnyan snang zhing dri med 'od mchog 'gyed//
79a2(phal chen): byang chub shing gi rnam 'phrul 'di dag ltos// smon lam sgra dang dbyangs kyi mar me rnams// rin chen sna tshogs yal ga kun las 'bar// srid pa rgya mtsho kun na sngan chad du/
79a3(phal chen): rgyal ba'i spyod pa ji ltar byung ba ston// byang chub lha rnams zhing gi rdul snyed de// de dag thams cad snying po byang chub gnas// thub pa'i byang chub shing la skad cig cing // rnam
79a4(phal chen): thar gzhan dang gzhan dag de dag ston// rang byung spyad pa thams cad spyod pa'i tshe// sngan chad de bzhin gshegs pa gang mchod pa// de dag mtshan bcas sngon gyi sbyor byas pa/
79a5(phal chen): thams cad rin chen sgo nas rab tu snang // phyogs bcu'i sems can ji snyed snod gyur pa// de dag thams cad 'di la sgra 'byung ste// de dag ci la 'dul rnam dag ci 'dra ba 'ang /
79a6(phal chen): snying po byang chub 'di las kun brjod do// byang chub shing rnams mtha' yas phyogs kun na// bsam gyis mi khyab rgyan gyi sprin can dag/ mtha' yas sna tshogs rgyan ca
79a7(phal chen): thams cad kyang // sngan chad de bzhin gshegs pas yongs sbyangs pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpal gser gyi 'od 'phro gzi brjid dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis/ sangs
79a8(phal chen): rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// srid pa'i rgya mtshor byang chub spyod mdzad tshe// mos pa'i
79b1(phal chen): dkyil 'khor yongs su smon dag cing // gnas dang gnas min stobs rnams thugs chung ba'i// bde gshegs stobs rnams blar dag pa mthong // bskal pa kun tu rgya mtshan
79b2(phal chen): las sbyar te// mnyam nyid chos bsgoms ji ltar bsgrubs pa'i rnams// sangs rgyas 'od las de bzhin phyogs bkang zhing // las rnams rgya mtsho de bzhin rab tu brjod// sna
79b3(phal chen): tshogs thabs kyis 'byam klas stobs spyod tshe// bskal pa snga mar 'gro ba'i dbang po bzhin// yongs su smin byas de dag 'khod kun kyang // sems dag sangs rgyas
79b4(phal chen): dbang po'i stobs la 'jug/ 'jig rten kun gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang // bsam pa ji bzhin sbyor ba rnams spyod pa// de dag ji bzhin rgyal ba chos ston te// rang 'byung
79b5(phal chen): mos pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ston te// phyogs rnams ma lus zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang // 'jam klas sems can khams dang chos kyi khams// na mkha'i khams rnams
79b6(phal chen): mnyam nyid mkhyen mi ston// rang byung spu tse khams mkhyen stobs kyang ston// bde gshegs ye shes rgya chen kun tu 'gro// skad cig gcig gis dug gsum ma lus
79b7(phal chen): 'gengs// phyogs dang zhing dang bskal par 'gro bkang zhing // sems can kun la stobs 'jug mngon par bstan// bsam gtan thams cad stobs dang mtha' dbus
79b8(phal chen): med// ting 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul ni 'gro kun rnyed// thams cad rgyal ba'i sku la bstan pas na// sems can bsam pa'i gnas kyis nyon mongs sal// sangs rgyas
80a1(phal chen): la @ye shes dus gsum sgribs pa med// skad cig kun la dus gsum spu rtse ston// zhing dang sems can sangs rgyas de bzhin chos// de ltar rgyal/
80a2(phal chen): bas rjes su dran stobs bstan// thub pa'i spyan ni nam mkha' mnyam pa ste// de ni chos dbyings ma lus gsal bar gzigs// thams cad tshul gyi chags med gzhal
80a3(phal chen): yas so// brnyes pas ye shes spyan ni rnam mang bstan// 'jig rten kun gyi sbyor mang ji snyed dang // 'gro ba'i bag chags bag nyal ma lus par// thabs sgo kun
80a4(phal chen): nas nyon mongs zhi mdzad cing // rgyal ba 'jig rten gang bar gyur nas byung // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi dbyangs kun nas sgrogs pas sangs rgyas
80a5(phal chen): kyi mthus 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par ltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgya chen sangs rgyas byin brlabs phyogs kun tu// sangs
80a6(phal chen): rgyas ston kyang rtog pa mi mnga' ste// pha rol phyin pa rgya chen yongs bkang ba// byang chub spyod pa rgya chen de dag snang // 'gro ba rnams la thugs rje che bskyed cing // sbyin
80a7(phal chen): pa'i mthar phyin sngan chad spyad pas na// de phyir thub pa'i sku ni mtshan gyis brgyan// 'gro ba kun gyis lta zhing dga' ba skye// bskal pa rgya mtsho mang po mtha' yas sngon/
80a8(phal chen): tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa yongs sbyangs pas// de phyir bskal pa phyogs su dri med cing // shin tu 'phags par 'jig rten sdug bsngal sel// lam log mnyam/
80b1(phal chen): pa nyid dang dang bskyed de// sngan chad bzod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sbyangs// 'gro dang mtshungs mnyam yon tan kun ston te// de bas phyogs su 'ong rnams shin tu/
80b2(phal chen): 'gro// bskal pa rgya mtsho mang por sngon spyod che// 'gro ba rnams kyi sgrib pa thibs po stsal// de'i phyir phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba kun bkang ste// shing rab drung na rgyal
80b3(phal chen): ba mngon par mdzes// bsam gtan yan lag rgya mtsho sbyong ba'i tshe// bskal pa yangs par rgyal bas rab tu spyad// de bas 'gro ba'i gzhal med dga' ba bskyed//
80b4(phal chen): nyon mongs dri ma sgrib pa kun kyang sel// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i drung na spyod tshe// shes rab mthar phyin rgyal bas sngon bkang ste// 'gro ba'i gti mug mun pa
80b5(phal chen): yongs su gsal// de bas rgyal ba kun tu rnam par mdzes// 'gro ba kun mnyam thabs sgo thams cad kyis// yang dag byung zhing 'gro ba rnams sbyangs pa/
80b6(phal chen): phyogs rnams kun na kun la mngon par zhugs// phyi ma'i bskal par 'gro ba mngon du lta// smon lam pha rol phyin pa rab spyod tshe// bskal pa rgya mtsho shin tu rgya che
80b7(phal chen): zhing // phyi ma'i bskal par 'gro ba'i srin mnyam par// spyad pa de phyir 'gro ba kun na mdzes// rgyal bas chos kun stobs kyi mthar phyin pa// bskal pas
80b8(phal chen): gzhal yas mang por yongs su sbyangs// de phyir rang byung stobs kyi pha rol phyin// phyogs kyi zhing rnams kun na de ltar 'phags// thams cad mkhyen nyid nam mkha'
81a1(phal chen): @#mtshungs mnyam pa'i// ye shes kun gyi sgo nas sngon sbyangs pas// de phyir chags med ye shes pha rol phyin// phyogs bcur kun na rgyal/
81a2(phal chen): ba mngon par mdzes// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sprin yid du 'ong ba'i dri ma med pa'i zla bas// sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par ltas
81a3(phal chen): nas// de tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul yul ni phyogs rnams kyi// 'gro ba'i rgyud dbyings na mkha' mnyam par snang // sa rnams
81a4(phal chen): yangs pa ji ltar mngon bskyed pa// de bzhin kun na rin chen sgo nas brjod// dang po'i sa ni dga' ba'i shugs kyi shul// chos dbyings kun gyi bde gshegs rnam mthong
81a5(phal chen): zhing // gzhal med bskal par dri med yongs sbyangs pas// chos dbyings yangs la ye shes rab du byung // thams cad chos la dri med sa gnyis te// bskal pa rgya
81a6(phal chen): mtsho mang por rnams spyad cing // rgyal ba tshad med rgya mtsho mchod byas nas// 'gro ba tshad med dri med sbyangs pas byung // bsod nams dkyil 'khor 'od ni sa gsum te//
81a7(phal chen): snying po'i dkyil 'khor lhag mthong bstan// gang du de skyes rin chen sgo dag nas// chos kyi sprin ni rgya chen rab tu thos// 'od 'gro rgya mtsho ldan pa gzhal med sa// mthu yi
81a8(phal chen): 'khor 'od snying po'i snying rje ste// zhing rnams kun tu sgrib dang mnyam pa'i lus// 'gro ba'i nyon mongs kun nas rnam sbyang ba'o// dka' rgyal snying po mnyam dbyings mnyam
81b1(phal chen): nyid de// zhing rnams kun tu 'gro zhing zhi la gzhol// sangs rgyas chos yul kun nas rab tu skyes// de yang rnam dag ji bzhin rgyal bas bstan// shes rab rgya mtsho yangs pa'i/
81b2(phal chen): sprin la spyod// 'byam klas chos kyi mthar thugs rnam pa kun// zhing rnams kun la mngon sum na mkha' 'dra// de 'byung byang chub shin chen 'di las grag/ chos dbyings mkha'
81b3(phal chen): dang mnyam pa'i lus can te// 'gro ba kun 'gengs 'gro ba kun snang byed// 'byam klas thabs kyi sgo nas rnam par dag/ ring du song 'jog de ni rgyal bas bsnun// thams
81b4(phal chen): cad chos dang smon lam spyod mang dang // zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i dbyings kyang mnyam rtogs pas// bskal pa kun tu 'gro mchog mi g.yo te// gzhal med sa de'i sprin yang rab
81b5(phal chen): du sgrogs// tshad med yul can stobs kyis rab du snang // rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'gro zhing stobs la 'jug/ 'di ni rdul med dge ba'i blo gros la// bskal pa rgya mtshor
81b6(phal chen): byang chub shing las brjod// chos kyi sprin las rgya chen sa bcu ste// dus rnams kun 'gengs na mkha'i rang bzhin 'dra// sangs rgyas yul gyi sgra dang dbyangs kun tu// rgyal
81b7(phal chen): ba'i byin gyis 'di las rab tu 'jug/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gnon pa gti mug med pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan gyi sangs rgyas kyi 'thus// phyogs bcur rnam
81b8(phal chen): par ltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rnam pa du mar 'khor rnams gnas pa ni// dad pa sna tshogs yongs su dag pa'i sems// rgyan dang yul
82a1(phal chen): la @rnams kun la rab tu zhugs// de dag sangs rgyas ye shes 'jug par 'gyur// phan tshun smon lam rnam dag spyod yul te// dag pa mtha'
82a2(phal chen): yas bya ba rab tu byas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam 'phrul thams cad kyang // gzhan gyi sgo nas rab tu mthong // bde gshegs chos kyi sku la zhugs pa dang // la las
82a3(phal chen): rgyal ba'i chos sku de nyid la// kun tu sprin 'dra gzhal med chags med pa'i// mtha' yas chos kyi rang bzhin chos nyid mthong // la las rgyal ba'i sku gzugs de nyid
82a4(phal chen): la// phyogs bcu kun du rnam par 'phrul mdzad cing // yon tan mtha' yas 'od sbyin rab 'bar ba// 'gro ba dang tshul sprin tu gyur par mthong // la la rgyal ba'i ye shes
