82a5(phal chen): chags med 'jug/ dus gsum mnyam nyid mkha' dang 'dra ba'i sku// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa'i tshul 'byung ba'i// sangs rgyas stobs la rab du 'jug par mthong //
82a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas gsung ni thogs pa med 'byung ste// phyogs kun zhing rnams ma lus rgyas 'gyur zhing // 'gro ba gnod bzhin bskul bar byed pa yi// de bzhin gshegs
82a7(phal chen): pa'i gsung ba la la 'jug/ sna tshogs snang bas 'gro ba kun bkang zhing // rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul kun tu snang mdzad pa'i// sangs rgyas 'od ni la las der yang mthong //
82a8(phal chen): baspu'i sgo nas 'od zer rab bkye ba'i// 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin la la la 'jug/ sngan chad rgyal ba'i spyod pa bstan pa la// la la dga' zhing rgyal ba shes par byed/
82b1(phal chen): la las bsod nams sna tshogs mtshan gyi rnams// bde gshegs bsod nams byung ba ji bzhin mthong // pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho sbyong pa'i tshe// ji ltar dag 'gyur mtshan kyang
82b2(phal chen): la las mthong // sgo rnams kun nas rgyal ba tshad med pa// mtha' dang dpung med chos kyi dbyings bkang zhing // sangs rgyas byin brlabs rab tu brjod pa kun// rnam
82b3(phal chen): 'phrul sangs rgyas yul ni la las mthong // de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i gzhi dang // snying po
82b4(phal chen): po rgya mtsho thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// kun tu g.yos so// 'gul to// rab du 'gul to// kun du 'gul to// ldeg go/ rab tu ldeg go/ kun tu ldeg go//
82b5(phal chen): chem che ma rab tu chem chem// kun du chem chem mo// 'ur 'ur rab du 'ur 'ur/ kun du 'ur 'ur ro// shig shig rab du shig shig/ kun tu shig shig go// 'jig rten gyi/
82b6(phal chen): dbang po de dag thams cad re res kyang / mchod pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i char/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mngon par
82b7(phal chen): rab tu phab bo// 'di ltas spos kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi/ sprin gyi char thams cad rab tu phab bo// rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro
82b8(phal chen): ba'i pad mo'i dra ba thams cad kyi sprin dang / nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sprin dang / nor bu rin po che kha dog sna tshogs dang / mu tig
83a1(phal chen): @#gi sprin thams cad dang / spos dang tsan dan dang / rin po che thams cad kyi sprin dang / rin po che'i gdugs thams cad kyi sprin dang / nor bu'i rgyal po
83a2(phal chen): dgra dbyangs zab mo'i yid du 'ong ba'i sprin dang / nor bu nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba mang po'i sprin dang / rin po che'i 'od zer gyi mdzod thams cad kyi sprin dang / rang rang gi lus las
83a3(phal chen): rgyan thams cad 'phyang ba'i sprin dang / de lta bu dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi dbang po re res kyang mchod pa/ mngon par bsgrubs pa'i smin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i char/ de
83a4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du mngon par phab po// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams rab tu dga' bar gyur pa/
83a5(phal chen): de bzhin du bzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po re res kyang mchod pa/ mngon par bsgrub pa'i sprin gyi char de
83a6(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag tu rab tu phab par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na'ang 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams mos pa gzhan dang
83a7(phal chen): gzhan/ dmigs pa gzhan dang gzhan/ ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul sgo gzhan dang gzhan dag/ tshogs gzhan dang gzhan/ yang dag par sgrub pa gzhan dang gzhan/ dga'
83a8(phal chen): ba'i shugs kyi spyod pa gzhan dang gzhan/ phyogs kyi tshul gzhan dang gzhan/ chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa gzhan dang gzhan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul dang byin gyi
83b1(phal chen): brlabs la 'jug pa gzhan gzhan/ yul dang stobs la 'jug pa gzhan dang gzhan/ rnam par thar pa'i tshul sgo rgya mtsho gzhan dang gzhan gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i/
83b2(phal chen): snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa/ khong du chud par byed do// 'di ni ji lta ba bzhin phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i na mkha'i dbyings mtha' klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi kham
83b3(phal chen): rgya mtsho thams cad yang de bzhin no// shin tu rgyas pa chen po sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi rgyan gyis tshul rab du byung ba
83b4(phal chen): zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// / bam po drug pa'o//
83b5(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po de dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ji lta bu
83b6(phal chen): zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi byin brlabs ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas
83b7(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi stobs ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs
83b8(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las sangs rgyas kyi mi snyengs pa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin ni ji lta bu zhig
84a1(phal chen): phal @#mnga'// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
84a2(phal chen): rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mi 'phrog pa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
84a3(phal chen): 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi spyan ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi gnyen ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
84a4(phal chen): rnams la sangs rgyas kyi shangs ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ljags ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
84a5(phal chen): rnams la sangs rgyas kyi sku ni ji lta bu zhag mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi thugs ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
84a6(phal chen): rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'od ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
84a7(phal chen): rnams la sangs rgyas kyi gsung ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi kham
84a8(phal chen): rgya mtsho dag tu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad ni/ ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/
84b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa rgya mtsho thams cad ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la tshogs rgya mtsho thams cad ni/
84b2(phal chen): ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la brgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu
84b3(phal chen): gnas pa rgya mtsho thams cad ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la spyod pa rgya mtsho rnams/ ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems
84b4(phal chen): dpa' thams cad la 'byung ba rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yod
84b5(phal chen): su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad las rgya mtsho rnams
84b6(phal chen): ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la smon lam rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
84b7(phal chen): ye shes rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu rab yongs su ston/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la thugs brtse bas nye bar gzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
84b8(phal chen): kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sems can rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas rgya mtshon ma
85a1(phal chen): @#kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho/
85a2(phal chen): rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa
85a3(phal chen): mdzad grangs/ sangs rgyas shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas
85a4(phal chen): kyi tshe'i tshad rgya mtsho rnams kyang mdzad grang / snyam pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byin gyi brlabs kyi mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin de dag las tshigs
85a5(phal chen): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// mtha' yas rgya chen bskal par rab spyad de// byang chub shing drung rang byung yang dag skyes// phyi ma mtha'i bskal par 'gro ba'i sprin gyur pa/
85a6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni byin gyis brlabs// 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi the tshom gcod// mos pa'i stobs ni yangs pa rab tu bskyed// sems can sdug bsngal/
85a7(phal chen): mtha' yas zhi bar mdzad// sangs rgyas bde la 'gro ba thams cad 'khod// byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas shing rdul snyed// de bzhin gshegs la lta zhing
85a8(phal chen): kun nas gnas// de dag bsam pa spyod yul ji bzhin du// the tshom gsal bar chos rnams rab bstan gsol// rgyal ba kun gyis ni ji lta bu// de bzhin
85b1(phal chen): gshegs pa'i yul gyi rgyang rnams dang // sangs rgyas byin brlabs mtha' dang dpung med pa// de dag tshul ni rnam dag bstan du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod
85b2(phal chen): yul ji yis 'jug/ rgyal ba'i mkhyen la ji ltar 'jug pa dang // rgya chen mtha' yas stobs rnams rnam sbyangs pa// rgyal sras kun la yang dag bstan tu gsol//
85b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin ji ltar mtha' yas pa// mi snyengs chos nyid ji ltar rnam sbyangs dang // rdzu 'phrul mthu yang mtha' dang dbus med pa// 'gro ba'i bsam pa
85b4(phal chen): rnams la skrag tu gsol// ji ltar chos rgyal po brang mnga' mdzad cing // rgyal ba'i spyod yul ji ltar mi 'phrogs dang // sangs rgyas chos gzhan rgya chen de dag dang /
85b5(phal chen): thugs rje'i slad du yang dag stan du gsol// rgyal ba'i spyan ni ji ltar tshad med cing // gnyen dang shangs dang de bzhin ljags dang sku// sangs rgyas thugs kyang ji ltar
85b6(phal chen): mtha' yas pa// 'di dag tshul la 'jug pa bstan du gsol// zhing rnams rgya mtsho ji ltar sems can khams// chos dbyings tshul rnams rgya mtsho de dag dang /
85b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa// 'di dag rgyal ba'i sras la bstan tu gsol// pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas dang // rnam par thar pa tshul 'jug rgya
85b8(phal chen): mtsho dang // chos rnams kun gyi tshul rnams rgya mtsho dag/ byang chub snying por thams cad bstan tu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi/
86a1(phal chen): pal @sems kyi yongs su rnam par rtog pa thugs kyi thugs su chud nas/ zhal gyi sgo'i tshem gyi 'tshams kyi gseb nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin
86a2(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed rab tu kye ba 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i ze ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste chos kyi dbyings su dbyangs sna tshogs kyi byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /
86a3(phal chen): 'di lta ste 'od shin tu phra ba'i sprin kun nas lding ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / snying po byang chub kyi 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer
86a4(phal chen): dang / 'di lta ste 'on po che thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i gdugs kyi sprin ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste rnam par snang bas chos kyi dbyings rab du snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i 'od
86a5(phal chen): zer dang / 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'byung zhing 'khyil pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste rin po che rdo rje dri ma med pa mang po'i rgyal mtshan ces bya
86a6(phal chen): ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du nye bar 'gro ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi
86a7(phal chen): 'khor lo'i sgra rab tu sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'od zer rab tu bkye te/ 'od zer de dag re re zhing yang
86a8(phal chen): 'khor gyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba bskyed do// 'od zer de dag re re zhing rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog shin tu ston pa dag ste/ de dag rab tu 'bros nas phyogs
86b1(phal chen): bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i
86b2(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten khams rgya mtsho nas 'od zer gyi sgo de dag thams cad kyi mthus/ gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
86b3(phal chen): mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar gyur to// 'od zer de dag thams cad kyi sgo nas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis
86b4(phal chen): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung bar gyur to// bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas spyod spyad che// phyogs rnams rgya mtshor sangs rgyas kun kyang mchod// sems can rgya mtsho
86b5(phal chen): rnam par dag byas nas// rnam par snang mdzad byang chub mngon sangs rgyas// phyogs rnams kun tu snang zhing mngon par mdzes// spu rnams kun nas sprul pa'i sprin kyang
86b6(phal chen): 'gyed// des ni sems can snod bzhin bskul byas nas// byang chub sbyor ba chags med rnam par dag/ srid pa'i brgyud na sngan chad 'khor ba'i tshe// rgyal bas
86b7(phal chen): sems can yongs su smin mdzad pa// de dag skad cig gcig gi rab tu bkrol// sangs rgyas rnams 'phrul 'di dag mtha' yas so// rgyan rnams sna tshogs kun
86b8(phal chen): tu 'od kyang snang // byang chub shing gi yal ga rin chen snang // 'od rnams bkye ba kun tu rnam par brgyan// byang chub bsam gyis mi khyab der sangs rgyas// phyogs
87a1(phal chen): pal @#rnams kun tu sgra ni rab tu sgrogs// sems can kun gyi sems bzhin tshim byas te// sna tshogs thabs kyi sgo nas rnam par 'dul// de/
87a2(phal chen): las chos nyid ni sgra rab tu byung // zhing rnams stong gi rdul snyed sngan chad du// spyod tshe pha rol phyin kun rgyas par mdzad// stobs rnams kun na sangs rgyas rab bzhugs kyis/
87a3(phal chen): rgyal ba de yi zhal ltar kun kyang deng // zhing gi rdul sbed phyogs rnams thams cad nas// rgyal sras mang po rab tu dga' te lpags// mchod pa sna tshogs char pa rab 'beb/
87a4(phal chen): shing // thams cad 'khod de rgyal ba mngon gsum lta// gsung dbyangs gcig las mtha' yas mdo yi rnams// rgya mtsho dag kyang sangs rgyas shin tu ston// 'gro kun
87a5(phal chen): yid bzhin chos kyi char 'bebs kyis// rkang gnyis gtso bo de la ltar yang deng // dus gsum rgyal ba'i smon lam gang yod pa// skad gcig thugs la de dag mngon gsum te//
87a6(phal chen): rgyal ba byang chub shing drung ston mdzad kyis// rgyal ba'i drung du myur te 'dong bar bgyi// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ye shes gtso// 'od zer kun gyi sgo nas rab tu snang /
87a7(phal chen): de yi tshod nyid ji lta 'dra de dag ltos// sangs rgyas 'gro kun mngon gsum chos ston to// de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od
87a8(phal chen): zer gyis yang dag par bskul ba rnams// byang chub sems dpa' rang rang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dang lhan cig tu 'phags te// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
87b1(phal chen): rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba der 'ong bar 'gyur te// 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bzhi dang / snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di dag 'dab phyogs su shar phyog/
87b2(phal chen): logs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho pad mo'i dpal dri ma med par snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams par mi'i rgyud de dag las/ 'jig rten gyi khams/
87b3(phal chen): rin po che'i phreng ba rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi chu bo rnam par sangs rgyas pa na/ nam mkha'i mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi
87b4(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal pad mo rnam par lta ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rdul shin du
87b5(phal chen): phra ba snyed dang / lhan cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin
87b6(phal chen): bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / rin po che'i char gyi 'od zer pad mo'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlab pa dang / rin po che'i ri
87b7(phal chen): bo'i zom gyi sprin na mkha' kun nas yog pa dang / byin gyis rlob pa dang nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcu na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa
87b8(phal chen): dang / bye ma'i shing gi mdzad kyi sprin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / spos dang / bdug spos gzugs thams cad yongs su ston pa'i
88a1(phal chen): pal @#sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog bar bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / spos thams cad kyi shing gi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin/
88a2(phal chen): gyis brlob pa dang / de dag la sogs pa mchod pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlob par byed cing / bcom
88a3(phal chen): ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs su bstan te/ me tog snang ba sna tshogs kyi snying po can seng ge'i khri la mngon par sprul
88a4(phal chen): nas/ dkyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dag mdab chags su/ lho phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
88a5(phal chen): rin po che thams cad snang bas/ rnam par brgyan pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams 'od mtha' yas
88a6(phal chen): pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas mkhyen pa'i 'od dpal gyi ri'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa'
88a7(phal chen): chos rgya mtsho snang bri bro gros zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rdul shin du phra ba sed dang / lhan cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nas 'phags te/
88a8(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan gyi yul thams cad kyi rnam par gsal bar byas pa'i snying po'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par
88b1(phal chen): byin gyis rlob cing / nor bu'i rgyal po'i kun nas snang ba rin po che'i rgyan gyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / nor bu'i rgyal po'i rin po che 'od 'phro ba/
88b2(phal chen): rab tu 'bar zhing / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan shin du sgrogs pa'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po kun nas sgra 'byin cing sangs rgyas
88b3(phal chen): kyi chos thams cad sgrog pa'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po shing gi yal ga sna tshogs kyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan byed pa'i sprin bcus
88b4(phal chen): nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis rlob pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal pos kun nas sgra 'byin 'od zer dang / sangs rgyas kyi sprul pas snang bar byed pa'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun
88b5(phal chen): nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nor bu'i 'od 'phro shin tu sdug pa'i sgron mas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlab pa dang /
88b6(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che sna tshogs kyi dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan rnam par snang ba'i
88b7(phal chen): sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / de dag la sogs pa nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra mo snyed kyis/ nam
88b8(phal chen): mkha' kun gyis yog par byin gyis rlob par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ lho phyogasu bstan te in dra
89a1(phal chen): ni la dang / dzam bu na da dang / pad ma rag sna tshogs kyi snying po can seng ge'i khri mngon par bcas nas dkyil mo bkrung bcas te 'khod par/
89a2(phal chen): gyur to// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang mdab chags su nub phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'od yid du 'ong bar snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/
89a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams gos kyi stan yongs su byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa spos sngon du snang ba'i yon tan rin po ches brgyan pa'i/
89a4(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' spos 'od 'phro ba'i rgyan pa'i 'od ces bya ba la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed
89a5(phal chen): dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ rin po che dang / spos dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis/ nam mkha'
89a6(phal chen): kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / nor bu'i rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlab pa
89a7(phal chen): dang / spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlab pa dang / mu tig thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog
89a8(phal chen): par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi ze ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po
89b1(phal chen): che'i phreng bas yongs su brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'od zer gyi snang ba phyogs kun tu 'breng ba'i snying po dang
89b2(phal chen): ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgyan thams cad 'byung ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che'i tshon thams cad kyis rab du rgyan cing /
89b3(phal chen): rgyan thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / phyogs thams cad rgyan gyis rab du brgyan par
89b4(phal chen): 'gengs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sgo kun du me tog gi rta babs dril bu'i dra ba bres pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i
89b5(phal chen): sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / de dag la sogs pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
89b6(phal chen): kyis/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ nub phyog
89b7(phal chen): su bstan te/ seng ge'i khri rin po che'i pad mo chen po lo ma sna tshogs kyi gser las byas pa'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod par
89b8(phal chen): gyur te// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su/ byang phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya pad mo'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
90a1(phal chen): bal @#gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten khams rgyud de dag las/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ud pa la'i rgyan na/ de bzhin gshegs
90a2(phal chen): pa ye shes kyi dpal/ kun tu dbyangs kyi rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i 'od zer snang bas mthu 'byin
90a3(phal chen): ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / lhan cig tu 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong
90a4(phal chen): bar gyur te/ spos dang nor bu sna tshogs thams cad kyi shing gi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlab cing sgo kun nas lo ma'i dog pa'i sprin 'byung ba'i spos
90a5(phal chen): kyi shing gi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / shing gi gzugs thams cad las rgyan mtha' yas pa yongs su ston pa'i shing gi sprin bcus/
90a6(phal chen): nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / me tog thams cad kyi sprin rab tu nar ba'i me tog shing gi sprin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis
90a7(phal chen): brlab pa dang / rin po che'i 'od 'gro ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i shing gi sprin bcus/ namakha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
90a8(phal chen): tsan dan gyi bye mas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus byed yang dag par ston pa'i shing gi sprin bcus/ namakha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
90b1(phal chen): sngon gyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ rab tu ston pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa'i
90b2(phal chen): gos kyi mdzod nyi mas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i shing gi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sgra dbyangs thams cad rab tu sgrogs shing yid du
90b3(phal chen): 'ong ba'i sgra kun gtong ba'i shing gi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / de dag la sogs pa shing gi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin
90b4(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyi na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlob par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang phyogs su bstan
90b5(phal chen): te/ seng ge'i khri nor bu'i sgron ma'i rtsapad me snying po can mngon par sprul nas dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod par gyur to// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di
90b6(phal chen): dang 'dab chags su byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'dzam bu chu klung dang shel gyi kha dog chen gyi rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi
90b7(phal chen): khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyi snying po na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad la mi 'jig pa'i sgron ma bzhags
90b8(phal chen): pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi yon tan gyi mdzod mi zad pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid mar me zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'
92a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/
92a2(phal chen): seng ge'i khri rin po che'i kha dog mtha' yas pad mo'i snying po can gyis sprin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlob cing / seng ge'i khri nor bu'i rgyal po kun du
92a3(phal chen): mngon par rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / seng ge'i khri rgyan mang po thams cad kyis rab tu
92a4(phal chen): brgyan pa'i snying po can gyis sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i snying po
92a5(phal chen): can gyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / seng ge'i khri phyogs kun nas phreng ba rin po che'i char 'bebs pa'i snying po can gyi sprin
92a6(phal chen): bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / seng ge'i khri spos kyi me tog pad mo'i phreng ba rin po che thams cad kyi snying po can gyi sprin bcus/
92a7(phal chen): namakha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab po dang / seng ge'i khri sangs rgyas kyi gdan thams cad kyi rgyan yang dag par ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus/
92a8(phal chen): na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / seng ge'i khri rgyan dang phreng ba thams cad 'phyang zhing rta babs dang / steg bu'i rab tu rgyan pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus/
92b1(phal chen): na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / seng ge'i khri shing thams cad kyi yal ga las nor bu dang / rin po che dang bye ma can 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus/
92b2(phal chen): nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / seng ge'i spos dang rin po che'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis kun nas brgyan pa'i nyi mas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can
92b3(phal chen): gyi sprin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa de dag la sogs pa seng ge'i khri sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis/ na mkha'
92b4(phal chen): kun nas yog par byin gyis rlab par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams su rten te/
92b5(phal chen): seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi pad+mo sna tshogs kyi snying po can mngon par sprul nas/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod par gyur to// de nas yang 'jig
92b6(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'dab chags su shar lho'i 'tshams na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya'i 'od zer kun tu snang ba gser gyi rgyan zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams
92b7(phal chen): rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi dpal dri ma med par snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun dga' bo'i dpal gyi rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya
92b8(phal chen): mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi 'od zer shes rab kun nas sgron ma'i blo gros zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan
93a1(phal chen): pal @#cig tu 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar 'gyur te/ nor bu yid bzhin gyi rgyal po thams cad kyi bla re'i sprin
93a2(phal chen): bcus/ na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che in dra ni le'i ze ba can gyis me tog thams cad kyi/ rgyan gyi bla re'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas
93a3(phal chen): yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / spos rin po che'i bla re thams cad kyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba sgron ma'i
93a4(phal chen): gzug bla ro'i sprin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / 'od dang sgra dbyangs rab tu ston pa'i bla re/
93a5(phal chen): sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nor bu dang gos dang rgyan thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan yang dag par ston pa'i bla re'i sprin bcus/ nam
93a6(phal chen): mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / me tog thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu rin po che'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / dril
93a7(phal chen): bu sna tshogs kun du smras khyab par byin gyis brlab pa dang / gser gyi ze ba 'od 'phro zhing snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi bla re'i sprin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis
93a8(phal chen): brlab pa dang / rgyan thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzugs brnyan rab tu ston pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis rgyan pa'i sprin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab
93b1(phal chen): pa dang / de la sogs pa bla re'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab brlab par byed cing / bcom ldan
93b2(phal chen): 'das grang na ba der phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams su ston to// seng ge'i khri pad mo sna tshogs rin po che rab tu rgyan pa'i snying
93b3(phal chen): po can mngon par sprul nas dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang / 'dab chags su lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams su 'jig
93b4(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nyi ma'i 'od rab tu 'bar bas kun du snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma dang seng
93b5(phal chen): ga ltar snang ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa sgo kun nas ye shes rnam par snang ba'i dbang bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' me tog
93b6(phal chen): kun nas 'od 'phro gtsug phud rab tu 'phyang ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags te/ bcom ldan
93b7(phal chen): 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ sna tshogs thams cad kyis rgyan pa'i rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlob cing / 'od
93b8(phal chen): zer snang ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i me tog gi gdugs kyi sprin bcus/ namakha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / mu tig mang po'o kha dog mtha' yas pa thams
94a1(phal chen): la @#cad kyi gdugs kyi sprin bcus/ namakha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying
94a2(phal chen): rje'i sgra rab tu sgrogs pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus/
94a3(phal chen): namamakha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che'i shing gi yal ga thams cad kyis rgyan pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis
94a4(phal chen): brlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po'i nyi ma rnam par snang ba'i lte ba'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / spos dang gdug pa thams
94a5(phal chen): cad kyi gdugs kyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma mang pos kun nas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus/
94a6(phal chen): nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen por rnam par bstan pa'i kun du rgyan gyis khyab par byed pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha'
94a7(phal chen): kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / de dag la sogs pa gdugs kyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis
94a8(phal chen): brlab par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lho nub phyogs 'tshams su rten te/ seng ge'i khri in+d+ra ni la yid du 'ong bar
94b1(phal chen): 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su nub byang gi
94b2(phal chen): phyogs 'tshams log na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i skar mnga' 'od kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams par ma'i rgyud de las
94b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi rgyan yid du 'ong ba'i snying po na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'od bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang
94b4(phal chen): chub sems dpa' 'od zer dang / gzi brjid mi zad pa'i rgyal po'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /
94b5(phal chen): lhan cig tu 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ rin po che thams cad du snang ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas yog
94b6(phal chen): par byin gyis rlab cing / rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i gzugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / me tog gi
94b7(phal chen): sprin gyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'od zer gyi sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i
94b8(phal chen): bcus/ na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzugs brnyan gyi khongs su chud pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus/
95a1(phal chen): namakha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che yal ga'i sgo kun nas sangs rgyas kyi yul rab tu sgrogs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil
95a2(phal chen): 'khor gyi sprin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas yog
95a3(phal chen): bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sems skad cig gi sems can mtha' yas pa'i gzugs yongs su ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas yog par
95a4(phal chen): byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam 'byung ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba'i rab tu gtong ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas yog
95a5(phal chen): par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can 'dul ba'i sgra sgrogs pa nor bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas yog
95a6(phal chen): par byin gyis brlab pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyes kyis/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par
95a7(phal chen): byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der byin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams su rten te/ seng ge'i khri 'od zer 'bar ba mi zad pa'i
95a8(phal chen): gzi brjid kyi snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su 'og gi phyogs na 'dzin
95b1(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho pad mo'i dri nim dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams par ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i seng ge'i khri snang zhing 'bar/
95b2(phal chen): ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings snang bar mdzad pa'i 'od zer bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su 'od 'phro ba
95b3(phal chen): rnam par snang ba 'byung ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan gcig tu 'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang
95b4(phal chen): na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab cing spos thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus/ nam
95b5(phal chen): mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
95b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad brjod pas khyab par byed pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
95b7(phal chen): cad kyi rgyan gyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi
95b8(phal chen): 'od zer gyi sprin bcus/ namakha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / bskal pa thams cad cig nas gcig tu rgyud par/ sangs rgyas yang dag par 'byung
96a1(phal chen): pal @#zhing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba brjod pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po/
96a2(phal chen): che zad mi shes pa thams cad dang me tog thams cad kyi ze ba'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'od zer
96a3(phal chen): gyi sprin bcus 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlob par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der byin nas btso/
96a4(phal chen): ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ 'og gi phyogs su rten nas seng ge'i khri rin po che'i sgron ma rab tu 'bar ba 'byung ba'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ dkyil mo dkrung
96a5(phal chen): bcas te 'khod do// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bzhi dang / snying po me tog gi rgyan gyi brgyan pa 'di dang 'dab chags su steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams
96a6(phal chen): rgya mtsho nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od rgya mtsho'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan yid du 'ong ba rnam par snang
96a7(phal chen): ba zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan grags pa thog pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa rab tu snang ba'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub
96a8(phal chen): sems dpa' stobs dang brtson 'grus chags pa med pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phag nas/
96b1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ rin po che'i kha dog mtha' yas par 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlob cing / nor bu rin po che
96b2(phal chen): kun nas 'od kyi dra ba 'phro ba'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan rgya chen pos rnam par snang bar 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus/
96b3(phal chen): nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / spos thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rgyan thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i
96b4(phal chen): sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab
96b5(phal chen): pa dang / shing gi ze ba rnam pa sna tshogs su 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rdo rje sna tshogs 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus/
96b6(phal chen): nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas par brjod pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun
96b7(phal chen): nas yog par byin gyis brlob pa dang / mu tig gi sgron ma 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'od
96b8(phal chen): 'phro ba'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der phyin
97a1(phal chen): @#nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas steng gi phyogs su brtan te/ seng ge'i khri sangs rgyas kyi gsung sgrogs pa'i 'od zer
97a2(phal chen): 'byung ba pad+mo'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do// de la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i
97a3(phal chen): rdul shin du phra ba snyed nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing / byang chub sems
97a4(phal chen): dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis skor cing mdun du byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa'i sprin 'jig
97a5(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlob cing 'ong bar gyur te/ phyin nas 'ongs pa'i phyogasu byon te/ seng ge'i khri rin
97a6(phal chen): be che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi snying po can dag mngon par sprul cing / dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod par gyur to// 'khod pa'i rjes la/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi ba spu'i
97a7(phal chen): khrung bu thams cad re re nas/ 'od zer gyi sprin rin po che thams cad ltar kha dog sna tshogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed rab tu byung bar gyur to//
97a8(phal chen): rin po che re re'i sgo nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can la 'khod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed rab tu byung bar
97b1(phal chen): gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho rnams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad kyi sbubs gang bar byas nas/ rdul shin tu pra ba re re la
97b2(phal chen): yang 'byam klas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed du rab du 'jug par gyur to// zhing re re yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
97b3(phal chen): thams cad mthong zhing shes par 'gyur ro// sems kyi skad cig re re la rmi lam lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan pa'i sgo dag nas/ yang dag par
97b4(phal chen): bskul bar byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed re re lha'i gnas thams cad du skye ba dang shi 'pho ba dang /
97b5(phal chen): yang dag par bstan pa'i sgo dag nas/ yang dag par bskul bar byed par 'gyur ro// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems
97b6(phal chen): pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad shin tu bstan pa'i sgo dag nas/ yang dag par skul bar byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i
97b7(phal chen): rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad rab tu skyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rab tu brjod cing / rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul bar byed par
97b8(phal chen): gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / smon lam rgya mtsho tham
98a1(phal chen): @#cad yongs su skrag pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul bar byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du pra
98a2(phal chen): bsnyed kyi/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su chos kyi dbyings snang bas rgyas par rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul bar byed par gyur to// sems kyi
98a3(phal chen): skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi skus chos kyi dbyings gang bar byas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa dang / 'od /
98a4(phal chen): thams cad kyi sgo dag nas yang dag par skul bar byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad na byang
98a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rab du gnas pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul bar byed par gyur to// de lta bu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bkang te/ sems can rnams kyi bsam
98a6(phal chen): pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par skul bar byed cing / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dag tu rab du brdal te/ zhing re rer yang sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can ri rab kyi rdul
98a7(phal chen): shin du phra ba snyed kyi ngan song gi rgyud du rdzogs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni rab tu zhi bar byed do// sems can phyin ci log la nges pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni yang dag par nges pa'i
98a8(phal chen): phung po la rab tu dgod do// sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni dge ba dang yid du 'ong ba dang / mtho ras dang skye ba la rab du dgod do// sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin du brangab/
98b1(phal chen): snyed ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la rab tu 'god do// sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen bkur ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs la rab tu 'god do//
98b2(phal chen): zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni sngan chad ma skyed pa'i byang chub kyi sems skye bar byed do// zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba
98b3(phal chen): snyed ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i phyir mi ldog pa yang dag par thob pa la yang dag par bskul lo// zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/ de bzhin
98b4(phal chen): gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi chos thams cad kun nas snang zhing gzigs pa la yongs su sbyangs te rab tu 'khod do// zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed stob
98b5(phal chen): thams cad kyi rab du gnas pa dang / ye shes kyi tshogs zad mi shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu 'god do// zhing de dag re rer yang
98b6(phal chen): sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi gdung dang rgyud yang dag par 'byung ba'i gnas/ rgya mtsho rnam par spyod pa la rab tu 'god
98b7(phal chen): do// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 'od zer gyi sgo thams cad nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung bar gyur to// 'od zer thams cad sgo nas sgra 'byung ste// ji snyed byang chub
98b8(phal chen): spyod la 'jug pa dang // rgyal sras yon tan phun sum gang yod pa'i// dbyangs kyis phyogs rnams kun du bkang zhig sgrog/ bskal pa rgya mtsho skye med spyad pa spyod// sdug
99a1(phal chen): bsngal kun las 'gro ba kun 'grel kyang // yid la skyo med zhum pa gang yang med// 'di ni tshul la rgyal sras rab tu bzhugs/
99a2(phal chen): chos kyi sgo rnams kun la rab spyod cing // tshul 'dir bskal pa rgya mtsho zad par byed// mtha' med dbus med lhag ma gang yang med// de dag chos nyid zhi ba rab du sgrogs// dus
99a3(phal chen): gsum rgyal ba'i smon lam gang yod pa// rgyal sras de dag 'gro la phan don du// de dag thams cad ma lus yongs su spyod// de dag spyod pa'i rgyan ni 'di 'dra'o// rgyal ba
99a4(phal chen): kun gyi 'khor du nyer byin te// phyogs rnams kun gzugs bsnan lus 'chang zhing // rgyal sras ye shes rgya mtsho blo gros can// de dag chos nyid zhir 'jug 'di 'dra'o// 'od
99a5(phal chen): zer sgo nas re re mtha' yas pa'i// bsam yas zhing rnams de dag rab tu 'jug/ spyod pas mig ni kun nas yongs dag ste// rgyal sras de dag spyod yul 'di yin no//
99a6(phal chen): skra rtse gcig tu de dag rab gnas shing // zhing rnams dbyings kun kun nas skyong byas kyang // sems can rnams la 'jig par mi byed de/ sa 'di rnams dag tshul 'chang
99a7(phal chen): ngag gi'o// tshul rnams kun la bsam gyis mi khyab las// de dag kun tu zhing rnams sna tshogs kun// skad cig la sems la 'chi 'pho skye ba bstan// rgyan 'di sems
99a8(phal chen): la chags med kyi'o// dus gsum bskal pa gang yod ma lus par// skad cig gcig gis thams cad rab tu ston// sgyu ma lta bu lus med dngos kyang med// de 'dra'i chos
99b1(phal chen): nyid chags med blos rtogs so// bzang po'i spyod pa mchog la zhugs pa rnams// 'gro ba kun la yid du 'ong ba'i lus// rgyal sras de dag chos nyid 'di yin te// 'od zer kun
99b2(phal chen): gyis sgo nas dbyangs kyang sgrog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dang dbus med pa de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul rnam par spyod pa thob par
99b3(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir/ smin 'tshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer chen po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ye shes kyi snang bar phyogs rnam par ston pa'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu bkye'o//
99b4(phal chen): 'od zer rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog sprin ma'i sprin tu gdal ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rab du snang ba de byung nas tshul thams cad kyi phyogs/ 'jam klas pa rab tu
99b5(phal chen): snang bar byas te/ phyogs thams cad kyi dbyings rgya mtsho rnam rab du snang bar byas nas/ sems can rgya mtsho rnams rab du snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
99b6(phal chen): thams cad du bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po thams cad du skyed pa'i rgyan gyi tshul thams cad kyis rab tu spyod pa sangs rgyas kyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul
99b7(phal chen): shin du phra ba snyed rdal shin du phra ba thams cad dang mnyam pa dag tu rab du spros nas/ sems can thams cad kyang bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba rgya mtsho dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams
99b8(phal chen): cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin gyi char dus gsum gyi rdul shin du phra ba dang mnyam pa phab ste// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rab tu bstan nas/
100a1(phal chen): @sems can thams sa ma smras par 'thor ba bams cad las rab tu gdon par bya ba byar mos pa'i zla ba pazhini 'byung ba dang / 'thun pa rgyan gyi
100a2(phal chen): rab du 'bab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam ma lus pa'i sprin gyi char rab du 'bab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' kun
100a3(phal chen): du bzang po'i 'khor dag tu dga' bar 'phrang pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pad mo chen po chu bo rin po che
100a4(phal chen): thams cad las sgrub pa/ nang nor bu'i rgyal po'i mdzod sna tshogs las byas pa lo ma rin po che thams cad kyi char 'bebs pa/ ze ba'i 'phreng ba'i rgyan spos rin po che thams cad
100a5(phal chen): las byas pa/ snying po 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi tshon gyis rab tu mdzes par bris pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag cing / 'od zer gyi dra bas rnam par snang bar
100a6(phal chen): byas pa'i sprin dang ldan pa/ rgyan thams cad rab tu 'byung ba sems kyi skad cig la/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa ston pa'i sgra rab tu 'byung ba/ nor bu'i
100a7(phal chen): rgyal po mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi sprin gyis thams cad du gang bar byed pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / smon lam thams cad rab du ston
100a8(phal chen): pa'i dbyangs 'byin par gyur te byung ngo // pad mo chen po de byung ba'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la pham pa med pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems
100b1(phal chen): dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu de nyis nas byung te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan du mar g.yas phyogs
100b2(phal chen): su bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ pad mo chen po de'i snying po la 'jug go/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du pra
100b3(phal chen): ba snyed de dag kyang ze ba'i phreng ba de dag la 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la pham pa med pa'i dbyangs/ chos kyi dbyings rgya che zhing tshad med pas rab
100b4(phal chen): du dga' ba'i shugs shin du skyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi rjes su song ba'i ye shes can/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab
100b5(phal chen): pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i mthu dang ldan pa/ zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad kyi spyod yul gshegs pa rnams kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyin pa/ ba spu thams cad las sprul pa'i sprin zad mi
100b6(phal chen): shes pas kun du khyab par byed pa/ sems kyi skad cig thams cad la dmigs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings kun du sbyar ba/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad de dus gsum khyab
100b7(phal chen): par byed pa'i spyod yul gyi rnam par spyod pa/ phyogs thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'chang ba/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad rab du 'jig cing / phyi ma'i
100b8(phal chen): mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug pa ting nge 'dzin dang rnam par thar pa la rnam par spyod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi lus dang
101a1(phal chen): ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcang pa 'di dag smras so//
101a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi ni chos kyi dbyings kyis gsal// 'gro ba kun la rgyal bas mngon sum te// ji ltar mos pa'i sems can rgyas bkang nas// snying po byang chub de la rgyal bas bzhug/
101a3(phal chen): zhing rnams kun gyi rdul bran mchog snyed kyi// rgyal ba spu re kun la rab bzhugs te// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor// kun kyang bzang po'i spyod pa mtshan
101a4(phal chen): ston to// spu cig rtsel zhing mang rgya mtsho ste// byang chub snying por pad mo'i gdan la bzhugs// chos dbyings rgya chen thams cad kun bkang te// sku rnams kun la rnam
101a5(phal chen): bar 'phrul pa ston// zhing rnams re re dag na rab bzhugs shing // zhing rnams 'byam klas kun tu rgyas par// phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i sprin gyi rnams// kun
101a6(phal chen): kyang snying po byang chub drung du 'dong // zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran mchog snyed kyi// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'od// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du nye bar
101a7(phal chen): 'dod // chos dbyings 'byam klas rtag tu rgyas par 'gengs// zhing rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan rab tu ston// chos dbyings rdul rnams ye shes spyod yul can/
101a8(phal chen): kun kyang bzang po'i spyod la rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du yang dag 'byung // byang chub sems dpa' ye shes mchog yul can// chos sprin nyan cing rab tu
101b1(phal chen): mkhas pa rnams// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor rnams kun la gnas// zhing rnams kun du bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod// rgya mtsho'i chos la rnam par snang bar spyod// de dag
101b2(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sa rnams rgya mtshor zhugs// sangs rgyas chos rnams gzhan dang gzhan byung ba// de dag smon lam rgya mtshor rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa rgya mtsho
101b3(phal chen): dang // kun du bzang po'i spyod pa de dag gis// sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings rnams kun bkang zhing // de dag rnam 'phrul rgya cher kun la zhugs// zhing rnams kun gyi rdul
101b4(phal chen): phran mang snyed kyi// lus kyi sprin ni rtag par rab tu ston// sems can kun dkang 'od kyis kun la skyob// bsam pa yad bzhin chos kyi char yang 'bebs// de nas byang
101b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal pad mo rnam par lta ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis// phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
101b6(phal chen): dag smras so// sangs rgyas ye shes shin tu zab// dus rnams kun du de 'byung ste// chos dbyings thugs su chud pas na// 'jig rten mgon zhes rab tu brjod// yang
101b7(phal chen): dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// 'dres pa med cing gnas pa med// sems can thams cad yid bzhin du// gzugs kyi skur yang rab tu mthong // chos rnams thams cad
101b8(phal chen): mngon sangs rgyas// chos rnams kun la rab tu zhugs// thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs// zhing rnams kun na rnam par mdzes// kha dog bsam gyis mi khyag
102a1(phal chen): bal @par// sems can thams cad yid bzhin du// sems can mchog gi 'od rnams dang // de bzhin sku yi sprin kyang mthong // de bzhin gshes
102a2(phal chen): pa'i skra dag las// mi zad sangs rgyas sprul pa rnams// zhing rnams kun du rab sgrogs cing // chos kyi rgya mtsho shin du ston// spu rnams re re kun nas kyang // phyogs bcur
102a3(phal chen): 'od zer dra ba dang // sangs rgyas gsung ni rab 'byin cing // gdul dka' thams cad rab du 'dul// sangs rgyas 'od zer sgo rnams nas// sgra dbyangs zab mo rtag tu 'byung /
102a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho ni// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul lo// sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ mtha' dang dpung med rab du bskor// ye shes zab mos
102a5(phal chen): shes bya ba// rgya chen phyogs su rab tu ston// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// rnam par 'phrul pa gzhan dang gzhan// chos kyi dbyings rnams kun bkang zhing /
102a6(phal chen): yang dag sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad// sku rnams re re kun las kyang // zhing rnams kun gyi rdul mnyam par// sangs rgyas sems can mnam phyung zhing // rnam par 'phrul
102a7(phal chen): pa rab du ston// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos rgya mtsho rnam par snang ba'i rnagrus kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthus// phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshetshigs su bcad pa
102a8(phal chen): 'di dag smras so// chos kyi dbyings rnams kun khyab par// sangs rgyas sku ni rnam par mdzes// rgya chen gsung ni rab byung ba// zhing rnams rgya mtsho shin du sgrogs/
102b1(phal chen): 'jig rten thams cad kun 'jug par// 'jig rten mgon po shin tu mdzes// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam mkhyen cing // byin gyis brlab ni rab tu ston// sangs rgyas 'jig rten
102b2(phal chen): kun la mngon// sems can thams cad bsam pa bzhin// thams cad gzigs pa sangs rgyas kyi// rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad mthong // mtha' yas 'od lnga sangs rgyas
102b3(phal chen): sprin// chos rnams rgya mtsho'i 'brug kyang sgrogs// ye shes rnam rgyu'i tshul bzhin du// rgyal ba'i sras rnams de la 'jug/ 'jug pa rnams la 'byung ba med// 'byung ba
102b4(phal chen): yod par rnam par bstan// gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yi// chos rnams 'byung ba na mkha' bzhin// 'phro dang gnas pa mi mnga' ste// 'on kyang rgyal ba'i kun na
102b5(phal chen): gnas// sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings las byung // de phyir sangs rgyas rab du brjod// yul na bzhags med rang bzhin med// de la 'byung ba mi mnga' ste// sku dang
102b6(phal chen): mtshan kyang de bzhin med// rgyal ba gzugs brnyan 'dra ba'o// 'gro ba kun tu chos kyi sprin// bsam pa kun la rab du byung // yang dag sangs rgyas rnam kun du// sems
102b7(phal chen): can rgya mtsho 'dul ba mdzad// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad kyi// snying po byang chub kun na gnas// 'khor gyi rgya mtsho thams cad na// zhing rnams kun nas rnam par
102b8(phal chen): mdzes// sangs rgyas kun na sku dag la// yon tan rgya mtsho zad mi shes// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te// de dag yon tan zad pa med// de nas byang chub sems
103a1(phal chen): dpa' spos 'od 'phro ba'i rgyan zla ba'i 'od kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su
103a2(phal chen): bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas par// byang chub sems dpa' gang bzhugs pa// de dang de dag sangs rgyas kyis// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul thams
103a3(phal chen): cad mthong // ye shes lus kyis bzhugs pa rnams// zhing kun rdul gyi sbubs su yang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // bdag nyid lus kyang der mthong ngo //
103a4(phal chen): gzugs brnyan zhing rnams thams cad dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan sngar byung // kun tu byin gyi brlab rnams dang // rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston// kun du blo'i smon
103a5(phal chen): lam dang // spyod pa gang gis rnam sbyangs pa// de dag zhing rnams thams cad du// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam 'phrul mthong // kun tu mnyam pa nyid gyur pa// kun
103a6(phal chen): gyi las kyi rab gnas te// ye shes kun gyi rjes song na// sangs rgyas spyod yul zhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas ye shes bzhugs pa rnams// chos kyi dbyings la rnam par
103a7(phal chen): mdzes// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku dag tu// rgya mtsho'i zhing la 'jug/ sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing dag tu// byin gyis brlabs rnams rab bstan pas// gzhan dang
103a8(phal chen): gzhan gyi lus dag nas// ming gis kun nas rab du gnas// byang chub snying por rnam 'phrul dang // byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dag/
103b1(phal chen): skad cig sems kyis ston pa mdzad// zhing rnams 'byam klas thams cad dang // bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas su// byang chub sems dpa' mnyam bzhags rnams// skad cig
103b2(phal chen): sems kyi rnam par ston// sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad na// byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa rnams// sangs rgyas sku la rnam spyod kyang // mtha' ma rnyed par mi rung ngo //
103b3(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i 'od 'ad zer snang bas mthu 'byin pa'i blo gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis// phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te// de'i tshe
103b4(phal chen): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor// chos dbyings tshul rnams thams cad kyis// sangs
103b5(phal chen): rgyas sprin gyis mngon par yog/ 'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho dag/ phyogs bcu kun na gang yod pa// thams cad kun du chos 'khor bskor// de ni smon lam rnam 'phrul
103b6(phal chen): lo// 'khor rnams rgya mtsho rgya che ba// gzhan dang gzhan gyi ming dag gis// zhing rnams gnas pa kun du yang // chos kyi 'khor lo kun du bskor// rnam par snang mdzad
103b7(phal chen): byin gyis brlabs// zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun du yang // kun du bzang po'i smon lam dag/ brjod cing zhing rnams kun du 'byung // zhing kun rdul la sku yi rnams// thams
103b8(phal chen): cad chos char rab tu 'bebs// 'dres pa med cing 'byung ba med// 'jig rten dag na rnam par mdzes// bskal pa bye ba grangs med par// zhing kun rdul phran sbubs dag tu//
104a1(phal chen): bal @#rnam par snang ba mdzad pa'i gsung // sngon gyi spyod pa rab tu sgrogs// zhing rnams thams cad rdul snyed kyi// 'od zer dra ba phyogs bcun/
104a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas 'od zer kun sgo nas// sems can mchog phyir sems can 'dul// kun tu ma 'dres sku dag gi/ chos dbyings yongs su rab gsal te// 'gro rnams 'dul ba ji
104a3(phal chen): bzhin du// gzugs kyi skur yang rab tu mthong // dus gsum zhing rnams thams cad kyi// mgon po ji skad bzhugs pa rnams// de dag kun gyi mtshan yang sgrogs// sangs
104a4(phal chen): rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos// da ltar byung dang 'das pa dang // sangs rgyas gang rnams ma byon pa// de dag kun gyi bsam yas pa// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrogs/ de nas
104a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi yon tan gyi mdzod// mi zad pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid mar mes sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis// phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te// de'i tshe tshig
104a6(phal chen): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang gis byang chub sems dpa' yi// ye shes tshogs ni kun non cing // ye shes rtogs pa brnyes pa rnams// de dag 'di yi tshul la bzhugs/
104a7(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyings// zhing rnams kun du rab du 'byung // sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul te// byang chub sems dpa'i ched du brjod// skad cig re re'i sems kun
104a8(phal chen): la// chos kyi dbyings su rnam par rgyu// de bzhin nyid la gnas shing rten// chos rnams rgya mtsho kun la zhugs// rgyan gyi pha rol phyin pa rnams// bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas su//
104b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad sku dag du/ zhing rnams kun na gnas shing spyod// rdul rnams re re'i steng nas kyang // chos rnams kun du rab du 'byung // shing rnams kun kyang khyab par
104b2(phal chen): byed// ye shes chags med spyod yul lo// sangs rgyas thams cad spyod yul du// las pa med par kun bkang zhing // rnam par 'phrul pa'i rnam spyod pas// sangs rgyas spyod
104b3(phal chen): yul rnams la zhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes snyegs dbyangs// chos kyi dbyings ni rab sgrogs pa// chos dbyings rjes su shes pa'i rnams// dbyangs kyi rgya mtsho rnams la spyod//
104b4(phal chen): bskal pa rgya mtshor ma 'dres par// sgra dang dbyangs rnams shin du sgrogs// dus rnams thams cad shes pas gsal// dbyings kyi de dag sa la bzhugs// skra'i shes la
104b5(phal chen): rmongs pa med// sems can sgra yang spyod yul te// thams cad mkhyen pa kun gyi yang // rnam par 'phrul pa'i dbyangs shes so// sa nas sar yang phyin gyur cing // stobs
104b6(phal chen): kyi sa la rab gnas te// bskal pa bye bar spyad pas na// chos nyid 'di la rab tu 'jug/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi 'od zer shes rab kun nas sgron ma'i blo gros/
104b7(phal chen): kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ldas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yi// chos rnam de
104b8(phal chen): dag mtshan nyid med// ye shes sa ni thob pa rnams// 'jig rten gtso bo rab du mthong // shes rab snang ba'i kun 'od can// byang chub sems dpa' mnyam bzhag rnams/
105a1(phal chen): phal @/ sangs rgyas thams cad kun gyi yang // sku yi rnam par 'phrul la zhugs// chos kyi dbyings la rnam spyad cing // lus kyi dngos la rab 'jug te/
105a2(phal chen): zab mo'i chos rnams rtogs su gyur nas// smon lam dag gis yang dag 'byung // bsod nams rgya mtsho byung gyur cing // ye shes sa la rnam par gnas// chos la rnam spyod khong du
105a3(phal chen): chud// spyod pa'i mchog la rab tu spyod// sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi drung dag tu// chos kyi dbyings la spyad pas na// rang bzhin lus ni rab tu
105a4(phal chen): mthong // zhing rnams 'byam klas thams cad du// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// thams cad gzigs pa'i chos kyi rnams// rgya mtsho kun la rab du spyod// bdag mthong bas
105a5(phal chen): ni lus dang rdul// gcig tu 'dres par mngon par byas// ma skyes mtshan nyid med pa ste// zhing rnams kun du'ang rnam par mdzes// 'jig rten kun gyi bsam mthun par/
105a6(phal chen): sems can kun la mngon sum du// lus kyi sprin ni bstan byas shing // byang chub don du sems can 'dul// sangs rgyas thams cad mthu yis ni// byang chub sems dpa' brjod pa ste/
105a7(phal chen): gang gis mgon po mthong ba yis// rgyal ba'i zhing rnams shin du zab/ mgos pa'i sring gang bzhugs pa'i// byin parlabs mtha' dang dbus med de// chos dbyings rab dug pa
105a8(phal chen): byas nas// byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'chang rgya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog kun nas 'ong 'phro gtsug pung rab tu 'byung bas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/
105b1(phal chen): phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams kun du sangs rgyas kyi// gsung gi dkyil 'khor sgra 'byin te// chos kyi dbyings rnams gang
105b2(phal chen): byas nas// yon tan sprin ni rab du brjod// yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// rnam dag na mkha' 'dra ba ste// gzugs kyi sku yang rab snyan cing // chos nyid 'di la shin du 'jug
105b3(phal chen): dga' dang mos pa'i shugs rnams dang // sangs rgyas stobs rnams thams cad la// rab tu gnas shing de dag ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug/ shes rab chung
105b4(phal chen): dus chos 'di dag/ kun du shes par mi nus te// ye shes mig gis rnam sbyangs shing // 'di yi tshul la 'jug par 'gyur// rab du gnas dang byin brlabs dang // chos kun
105b5(phal chen): rnam par spyad pa dang // rab tu 'jug dang ldang ba yi// mnyam nyid la rab tu zhugs// chos rnams mtha' yas rlong gi rnams// chos kun mtshan nyid rnams la ste// kun
105b6(phal chen): mkhyen nyid la rab zhugs shing // chos kyi rgya mtsho kun la spyod// sangs rgyas zhing na kun 'khod cing // thams cad kun nas rnam par mdzes// 'ongs pa med cing 'phos pa
105b7(phal chen): med// sangs rgyas nyid de de 'dra'o// gzugs brnyan 'dra ba'i sku rnams ni// sems can rgya mtsho'i nang na snang // mos pa ci 'dra yod pa rnams// de bzhin mgon po
105b8(phal chen): kun gyi mthong // kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang // bkod pa mang po sus sbyangs pa// de dag thams cad bsdu la'ang // rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag mthong // lus kyi
106a1(phal chen): @#rnams kyi re res kyang // chos kyi dbyings rnams kun tu khyab// 'khor lo kun na 'khor ba ste// chos kyi 'khor lo bsam mi khyab// de nas
106a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer gzi brjid mi zad pa'i rgyal po'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su
106a3(phal chen): bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas sku ni thams cad nas// 'od zer sprin mang phyogs rnams bcur// kha dog mtha' yas 'bar ba'i 'od// sems can kun la bsam pa
106a4(phal chen): 'phro// sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad kyi// snying po byang chub kun na bzhugs// bdud rnams thams cad rab btul te// 'khor gyi nang na rnam par mdzes// thams cad rdul
106a5(phal chen): na'ang ma 'dres pa// 'od zer dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'gengs// phyogs lam gzhan dang gzhan lam du// zhing gi rgyud rnams rab tu ston// zhing gi rnams ni rgya mtsho'i klong //
106a6(phal chen): phyogs kyi rnams kyang kun tu gnon// zhing rnams thang chen mnyam nyid dag/ in dra ni lar kun nas gnas// spyi'u tshugs dag snrel bzhi dang // pad+mo'i dbyibs dang khyad
106a7(phal chen): khyung dang // dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i khyad par du// gzugs rnams kun gyi rab tu gnas// chos kyi dbyings rnams gar byin par// thub pa med par 'gram rdal ba/
106a8(phal chen): de dag kun gyi 'khor rnams su// shin tu bstan pa'i chos 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dbyings na// 'khor pa'i zhing rnams bsam mi khyab// de dag kun du chos nyid 'di/
106b1(phal chen): 'jig rten mgon po rnams kyang ston// tha dad med pa'i chos kyi dbyings// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor// gcig gis tshul gyis rnam pa yis// chos bstan pa ni kun du 'byung /
106b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni// tshul rnams thams cad rab du brjod// dad pa rgya mtsho'i tshul dag gis// mi zad tshul rnams rab tu bstan// sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun
106b3(phal chen): na yang // rgyal ba rnams ni mig yor 'dra// snying po byang chub rnams na snang // 'byung ba dag kyang yod pa min// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su 'od 'phro ba/
106b4(phal chen): rnam par snang ba 'byung ba'i blo gros kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthus// byin gyi brlab kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// lta zhing lta zhing
106b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnams// sku gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab ste// dga' ba rgya mtsho kun kyang 'byung // chos kyi shags ni rab tu 'phel// mtshan rab kun nas sangs rgyas rnams//
106b6(phal chen): phyogs bcu kun du rab du 'byung // rdul rnams kun du 'jug pa yi// sangs rgyas sprin kyang de bzhin bstan// skad cig skad cig sems kun la// sangs rgyas 'od ni dpal
106b7(phal chen): gyi 'bar// rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag gis// zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang // byang chub sems dpa' shes rab che// rgya mtsho'i chos las byung ba rnams// sangs
106b8(phal chen): rgyas kun gyi byin brlabs pa// 'di yi yul la rnam par spyod// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam la// gang rnams shin tu gnas gyur pa// de dang de rnams zhing dag tu// sangs rgyas
107a1(phal chen): @#rnam 'phrul kun la lta// ye shes zab mo rnam gnon cing // chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba ni// mos pa rgya mtsho shes pa te// smon lam
107a2(phal chen): kun gyis byung ba'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku dang gsung // chags pa med la rab du zhugs// spyod pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gi/ spyod yul kun kyang khong du chud// ye shes spyod
107a3(phal chen): yul gyur pa'i rnams// chos kyi dbyings la rab brtson pa// rgyal ba rnams kyis gnon to// skad cig sems kyi zhing gi rnams// sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul mnyam par// de dag
107a4(phal chen): chos nyid ji bzhin du// rdul gcig steng du rnam par sbyong // zhing rnams ji snyed thams cad na// zhing gi rnam 'phrul gang yod pa// chos nyid 'di la bzhugs pa rnams// zhing
107a5(phal chen): gcig tu ni sdud par byed// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang brtson 'grus chags pa med pa'i blo gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis// phyogs
107a6(phal chen): bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad du// de dag gsung ni zab mo yi// dbyangs kyi yan lag kun rgyas pa/
107a7(phal chen): chos kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs so// brjod pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyi// sems can kun gyi skad dag du// sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun du yang // chos rnams bstan pa rab tu
107a8(phal chen): 'byung // zhing rnams kun tu ma lus par// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul mthong zhing // sangs rgyas gsung rnams thos pa dang // byang chub mchog phyir kun kyang 'jug
107b1(phal chen): rdul rnams re re'i steng nas kyang // chos kyi dbyings kyi chags tshul gyi// sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun gakang zhing // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ston par byed// chos kyi sku ni
107b2(phal chen): dad min// nam mkha' bzhin te chags pa med// gzugs kyi skur ni rnams dmigs pa// mig yor snang ba'i mtshan nyid do// mig yor yul la mi gnas ste// nam mkha'
107b3(phal chen): bzhin du dngos po med// mnyam pa nyid 'di rtogs gyur nas// ye shes rgya mtsho thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas sku ni ma skyes te// bzung ba med cing 'byung ba med/ nam
107b4(phal chen): mkha' mnyam pa nyid dang mtshungs// bzung du med las 'di bstan to// zhing rnams kun gyi sangs rgyas rnams// de dag spu gcig rtse la tshogs// ye shes ming dang
107b5(phal chen): ldan pa yi// spu rnams kun du rnam 'phrul mthong // rnam par snang mdzad smon lam ste// chos kyi dbyings ni kun bkang zhing // bla med chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ zhing rnam
107b6(phal chen): kun na rtag tu 'khor// ji ste bskal pa bsam yas par// spu rtse gcig tu rnam sprul pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi bshad mdzad kyang // de yi mtha' ni rnyed par dka'/
107b7(phal chen): ltar gling 'dir de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par 'phrul pa'i snying po byang chub tu phyogs bcu nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dus par gyur pa de bzhin tu/ 'jig
107b8(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gling bzhi pa thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa re rer yang / de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa'i snying po byang chub dag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' phyogs
108a1(phal chen): la @#bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bye ba'i rdul shin du phra ba sbed kun nas 'dus par gyur to// 'di na ji lta ba bzhin tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams/
108a2(phal chen): cad kyi// snying po byang chub de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa dag tu/ kun nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang / chos nyid 'di kho na rab tu ston//
108a3(phal chen): shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// /
108a4(phal chen): bam po bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
108a5(phal chen): po kun du bzang po seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can de nyid la 'dug te/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang
108a6(phal chen): mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba'i rang bzhin/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par rtogs pa'i cho gas/
108a7(phal chen): nam mkha' dbyings chags pa med cing rgya che ba khyab par byed pa'i rang bzhin/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i klong mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song zhing / shin du brdal ba'i tshogs
108a8(phal chen): chos thams cad kyi sgo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par 'byung bas rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyogs thams cad du yang dag par bzhugs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi/
108b1(phal chen): lus kyis kun nas yog par byas pa'i rang bzhin gyi snying po can/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i ye shes snang ba rgya mtsho'i klong phyogs thams cad sgo kun nas/ tshul
108b2(phal chen): rgya mtsho rnam par rig par bya bas// mngon du yang dag par ston pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs dang rnam par thar pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus rgyas
108b3(phal chen): par 'gengs pa'i snying po can// zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad ma lus par chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pas/ rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon
108b4(phal chen): tan rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su grub par byed pa/ bskal pa rgya mtsho thams cad du smon lam rgya mtshos/ rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
108b5(phal chen): kyi chos kyi 'khor lo ston cing brjod pa'i byin gyis brlabs la/ mnyam par bzhag par gyur to// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
108b6(phal chen): zhabs drung du/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi skra'i snying po zhes bya ba/ 'di la mnyam par bzhag pa
108b7(phal chen): de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams/ 'byam klas pa chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa/ dus gsum thams cad na
108b8(phal chen): yod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byung ba'i khams chos kyi dbyings rgya chen pos non pa'i rigs su rtogs te/ shin du phra zhing sgribs pa med pa phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad snang ba/ 'jig
109a1(phal chen): ba@#rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i ris su rtogs pas rnam par gnon pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi rnam par gzigs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs
109a2(phal chen): thogs pa med pas chud pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang sangs rgyas kyi sku thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul ma lus pa kun tu stogs pa/ chos kyi
109a3(phal chen): dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du rgyas par gang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra ba dang / mnyam pa dag tu rdul phra mo re re la'ang / zhing 'jig rten gyi khams
109a4(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du za ba snyed la rab tu bzhugs nas/ zhing re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu bzhugs te/
109a5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa re re'i zhabs drung du yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang
109a6(phal chen): mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba/ 'di la mnyam par bzhag go/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin
109a7(phal chen): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba/ de la mnyam par bzhag pa'i rjes la/ de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad nas/
109a8(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhal bstan to// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal te/ rigs kyi bu khyod
109b1(phal chen): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po 'di la/ mnyam par gzhog pa legs so
109b2(phal chen): legs so// kye rgyal ba'i bu khyod la phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'di'i sngon gyi
109b3(phal chen): smon lam gyi byin gyi brlabs dang / khyod kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam dang / spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i yang 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor
109b4(phal chen): lo rab tu bskor ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dbye ba dang / chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi phyogs rgya mtsho ma lus pa snang bar bya ba dang /
109b5(phal chen): sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba rnam par dag par bya ba dang / chags pa med par 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa
109b6(phal chen): thams cad yongasu mnan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad la chags pa med par 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor thams cad sgo kun nas rab tu brjod pa
109b7(phal chen): dang / chos kyi tshul gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la zhugs pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bzung ba dang / chos kyi snang ba thams cad kyi tshul rnam par lta ba dang /
109b8(phal chen): sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi dmigs pa'i gsung gi yan lag rgya mtsho'i dbyangs yongs su bzung
110a1(phal chen): @ba'i phyir byin gyis rlob pa mdzad do// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun
