110a2(phal chen): tu bzang po la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stobs la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar sgrub so// chos kyi dbyings mthas dbus med pa la rab du 'jug pa'i ye shes
110a3(phal chen): kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
110a4(phal chen): thams cad 'jig pa dang / 'du ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// chos kyi dbyings 'byam klas pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs
110a5(phal chen): so// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa zab mo tha mi dad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam par gnas pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// byang chub sems
110a6(phal chen): dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la rab du 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// sems can thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho dang chos kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'i tshigs
110a7(phal chen): gis ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// 'jig rten gyi khams mang po thams cad kyi rjes su song zhing chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus thams cad kyi lus yang dag par
110a8(phal chen): gnol ba'i ye shes kyang ni bar bsgrubs so// sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi yan lag dang sgra dbyangs kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bcom ldan
110b1(phal chen): 'das kyi zhabs drung na 'dug pa la nye bar sgrub pa de bzhin tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag dang rdul shin tu
110b2(phal chen): phra ba'i khongs su lus 'khod pa thams cad la yang nye bar bsgrubs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom
110b3(phal chen): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi/ phyag g.yas pa mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par brgyan pa/ 'od zer gyi dra ba'i
110b4(phal chen): me tog sna tshogs shin du rgyas pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i sprin 'gyed pa/ rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin thams cad kyi sprin gyis rnam par gsal bar
110b5(phal chen): gyur pa/ phyogs thams cad du spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyis rnam par snang ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi yan lag gi dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su sgra 'byin pa/
110b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba/ yang dag par ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar
110b7(phal chen): byung ba rnams kyi kun du bzang po'i smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba rnam par smon pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i snang ba/ yang dag par
110b8(phal chen): ston pa/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan byung ba rnams brkyang te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i spyi bor bzhag go// 'di'i/
111a1(phal chen): pal @/ pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rdal shin du phra ba'i khongs na yod pa thams cad du yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung
111a2(phal chen): dag tu byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyi bo la phyag rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams rab du bzhag go// byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
111a3(phal chen): gi reg ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la ting nge 'dzin las sdang ba'i sgo rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rdul shin du phra ba snyed dus gsum thams cad du/ sems kyi
111a4(phal chen): skad cig re re la ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i ye shes ma 'dres pa la mkhas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyi sgo chos kyi dbyings dang / dus gsum
111a5(phal chen): du mnyam pa'i rdul thams cad kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sgo thams cad dang // sems can ma lus pa'i gnas
111a6(phal chen): thams cad dang / mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i sgo dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus dang ming gi 'khor lo ldang ba'i sgo dang / byog
111a7(phal chen): dang phyogs mtshams thams cad du chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'byed pa'i sgo dang / rdul shin du phra ba thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku'i sprin mtha' dang dbus med par 'byam klas
111a8(phal chen): pa'i sgo dang / chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad rab du bstan pa'i sgo dag nas langs par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i kun du bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin de las langs ma thag
111b1(phal chen): tu// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re zhing / ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed la rab tu zhugs par gyur to// gzungs
111b2(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba sbed la rab tu zhugs par gyur to// chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba
111b3(phal chen): snyed la yang rab du zhugs par gyur to// tha dad pa yang dag pa shes pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdal shin du phra ba snyed la yang dag par rab tu zhugs
111b4(phal chen): par gyur to// chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du zhugs par gyur to// spyod pa rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul
111b5(phal chen): shin du phra ba snyed la rab du zhugs par gyur to// chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs su rnam par mal sred la yang dag par ras snang zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes snang ba
111b6(phal chen): yon tan gyi snying po can rgya mtsho'i sprin/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed la yang dag par rab du zhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /
111b7(phal chen): ye shes ma 'dres pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin shin du phra ba ste la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba spu'i rtse mo thams cad na/ zhing gzhan
111b8(phal chen): dang gzhan rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba sbed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing dga' ldan gyi gnas
112a1(phal chen): @#nas/ 'pho ba dang 'byung ba dang byang chub du rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i
112a2(phal chen): rdul shin du phra ba snyed la yang rab du zhags par gyur to// 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
112a3(phal chen): 'khor rgya mtsho rnams dang rdul shin du phra ba thams cad kyi khongs nas yod pa kun du yang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho rnams rab du zhugs par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi
112a4(phal chen): mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid rab tu thob pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad ma lus par bag la langs
112a5(phal chen): tsam du g.yos te/ rin po che thams cad kyis rab du brgyan par gnas shing / chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs shin du skrag par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
112a6(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du yang nor bu'i rgyal po chen po bcu'i sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab par gyur to// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po mtshan
112a7(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i gser dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal gyi sprin gyi char mngon par phab po// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po 'od kyis rnam par gsal bar byed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon
112a8(phal chen): par phab po// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur rin po che'i 'khor lo rab tu 'grems pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po// 'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub
112b1(phal chen): sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan rin po che'i snying po'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo rab du sgrogs pa'i sprin
112b2(phal chen): gyi char mngon par bab po// 'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po zhing rnam par snang bar byed pa'i snying po byang chub tu dpal rab tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste
112b3(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur snang ba'i sprul pa 'gyed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par phab bo// 'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan gyi 'khor
112b4(phal chen): lo dang / mthu rab tu grags par byed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par phab po// 'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma'i dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi sprin gyi char mngon par phab po// 'di lta
112b5(phal chen): ste nor bu'i rgyal po rol mo'i sgra yid du 'ong bas phyogs thams cad khyab par byed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyi char bcu po 'di dag mngon par bab
112b6(phal chen): par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang 'od zer gyi sgo thams cad nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung bar gyur to// zhing rnams 'byam klas
112b7(phal chen): kun na kun tu bzang po de// pad mo yid du 'ong ba rab tu 'dug pa mthong // kun du rnam 'phrul rnam pa 'di 'dra ston pa byed// ting 'dzin yul la 'jug pa mtha' dang dbus med
112b8(phal chen): de// sus rnams thams ca nas kyang kun du babang po// sprul pa rab tu bying cing chos dkyi dag par 'thong// deng dzin dul la 'jun bcu gyi tshul nga me dang
113a1(phal chen): pal @#rnam 'phrul// thams cad dbyangs kyi chags pa rgya cher sgrogs// ting 'dzin thams cad gzhan dang gzhan gyi rnam 'phrul gyi// de bzhin
113a2(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung dag tu// rgyal ba kun gyi spyod yul yang ba gang byes te// zhing rnams kun du rnam par 'phrul pa mang po ston// zhing kun rgyal ba kun gyi
113a3(phal chen): zhabs drung ji bzhin du// de ltar zhing kun shin du phra ba'i rdul phran la// ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ma lus ston// rnam par snang mdzad smon lam dbyings la
113a4(phal chen): rab tu zhugs// kun du bzang po'i lus ni na mkha'i mtshan nyid de// thams cad zhing la mi gnas de bzhin nyid la gnas// lus kyi sprin ni 'gro ba kun dang mnyam par kun bkye
113a5(phal chen): zhing // sems can kun la bsam pa bzhin du de dag ston// sangs rgyas sku rnams kun la zhing rnams gang yod pa// mtha' dang dpung rnams kun la rab tu zhugs pa rnams/
113a6(phal chen): kun du bzang po'i smon lam gnas pa dag la bstan// rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra dam pa tshad kyang med// 'khor ba rgya mtsho rdul phran mtha' dang dbus med pa// tshad med
113a7(phal chen): pa thams cad lus kyi nang du kun chud cing // dbyangs la zhing mang dra bar rnam tshang rgyab ston// skad cig sems la bskul pa mang po de bzhin ston// ning rnams thams
113a8(phal chen): cad 'byam klas pa na rnams gnas shing // rnam par 'phrul pa dam paston par rab du snang // phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing gi dbyings rnams ma lus spyad// kun du bzang po
113b1(phal chen): de la rnam lta kun kyang mthong // rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan ye shes stobs la bzhugs// ting 'dzin sa ni tshul rnams kun gyi rab tu gnan// chos rnams 'byam
113b2(phal chen): klas gzhan dang gzhan la bzhugs// rang gi byang chub spyod pa sngan chad spyad pa ston// de ltar zhing rnams kun du bsam las rnam 'phrul pa// phyogs rnams rgya che kun du bkang
113b3(phal chen): ste rab tu bstan// ting 'dzin rnams la 'jug pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyir// rgyal ba'i 'od zer sprin las yon tan legs sgra 'byung // de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
113b4(phal chen): yod pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyis mthus thal mo sbyar te// byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po lta zhing // dbyangs kyi nga ro cig tu de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
113b5(phal chen): smras so// rgyal ba thams cad chos las skyes pa ste// smon lam kun gyis sangs rgyas rab tu byung // de bzhin nyid mnyam na mkha'i snying po ste// chos kyi sku yis rnam
113b6(phal chen): par tu mdzes// zhing rnams 'byam klas kun la zhugs med kun// kun du bzang po'i 'khor rnams kun na snang // phyogs bcu kun du yon tan grags pa khyab// ye
113b7(phal chen): shes rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba mnga'// rgyal ba thams cad sku thob phyir spyod pa// phyogs bcu'i yon tan rgya mtsho yod pa rnams// rdul sbubs kun du de dag chung byas shing //
113b8(phal chen): zhing rnams kun du rnam par rab tu mdzes// zhing rnams kun gyi rgyal ba'i zhabs drung na// rgyal sras ting nge 'dzin dang spyod pa dang // chos rnams kun la spyod cing gnas pa
114a1(phal chen): rnams// rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par kun kyang // chos kyi dbyings rnams ma lus khyab byas shing // zhing rnams 'byam klas
114a2(phal chen): kun na shin du bzhugs// sems can rgya mtsho'i don du de spyod cing // rdul phran kun na chos kyi dbyings na bzhugs// chos kyi dbyings la de ltar zhugs nas kyang // rdul
114a3(phal chen): phran kun la mi zad tha mi dad// nam mkha'i dbyings ni lus kyi gang byas shing // rgyal ba'i chos rnams yangs pa rab tu ston// yon tan rgya mtsho yod kun gzhal du med//
114a4(phal chen): rnams yangs stobs chen 'od zer yon tan sprin// 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i don du spyod byed cing // rgyal ba'i spyod lam gzhal du med pa ston// gang gi don du bskal pa rgya
114a5(phal chen): mtsho dag/ mtha' yas par ni bzang po'i spyod spyad pa// de dag chos kyi dbyings rnams gang byas nas// thams cad chos kyi sprin las rab tu brjod// zhing rnams
114a6(phal chen): ji ltar byung bar 'gyur ba dang // stobs bcu rnams dang ji ltar byung gyur dang // sems can rgya mtsho ji ltar byung gyur pa// sems can rnams la sgra dbyangs gto/
114a7(phal chen): zhing ston// 'khor rnams yangs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang // kun du bzang po'i khyod la mngon gsum gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyis gnang bar gyur pa yi//
114a8(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo di ring khyod kyi bskor// // shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las kun du bzang
114b1(phal chen): po'i ting nge 'dzin dang // rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu byung ba zhes bya ste le'u gsum pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa'
114b2(phal chen): kun du bzang pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rnam par ltas// sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho la rnam par ltas// chos kyi
114b3(phal chen): dbyings rgya mtsho la rnam par ltas// sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho la rnam par ltas// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po rgya mtsho la rnam par ltas/
114b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos rgya mtsho la rnam par ltas// dus rgya mtsho la rnam par ltas// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par 'byung ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rnam
114b5(phal chen): ltas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la rnam par ltas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la smras pa/
114b6(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'du zhing 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa 'byung ba'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi
114b7(phal chen): khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can thams cad kyi las 'byung ba rgya mtsho mkhyen pa ni bsam gyi mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam
114b8(phal chen): kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par gnas pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pargya
115a1(phal chen): @#mtsho thams cad mtha' dang dbus med par snyan pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems
115a2(phal chen): can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsam pa dang dad pa dang / dbang po rgya mtsho
115a3(phal chen): la 'jug pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi skad cig cig la dus thams cad kyis mnyam pa nyid/ thugs su
115a4(phal chen): chud pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho yang dag par bstan pa'i
115a5(phal chen): ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom
115a6(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par dgod pa/ rab tu bstan pa'i rgya mtsho ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu bstan pa
115a7(phal chen): yongs su dag pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pas rnam par snang ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo//
115a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su dag pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa mtha'
115b1(phal chen): yas pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od zer mtha' yas kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin rab tu 'gyed par mdzad pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po//
115b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi dpal rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho rnam par rgyu ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs
115b3(phal chen): rgyas kyi gsungs dang dbyangs rgya mtsho rab tu 'grub pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi cho 'phrul rnams gsum yongs su bstan pas/ sems
115b4(phal chen): can rgya mtsho yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / 'dul ba mdzad pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'dul ba rgya mtsho thams cad la brtson pa
115b5(phal chen): yod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sa la rab tu zhugs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
115b6(phal chen): 'das rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi 'bru ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam par rgyu ba ni bsam gyis
115b7(phal chen): mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs la thug pa med pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mi rnangs pa zil gyis kyi/
115b8(phal chen): nor pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la pa mi dad pa la spyod pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas tsha/
116a1(phal chen): @ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
116a2(phal chen): rnams kyi mnga' chen po'i ye shes rnam par dag pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'phrogs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/
116a3(phal chen): de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyis mthu de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ byin gyi brlabs pas sems can thams cad kyi sangs rgyas ye shes rgya mtsho la
116a4(phal chen): gzud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la rab tu 'god pa dang / 'jig rten gyis khams rgya mtsho thams cad sangs
116a5(phal chen): rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ni thams cad kyi rnam par brgyan pa dang / bskal pa rgya mtsho thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rjes su brtsam pa dang / 'jig rten
116a6(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du chos kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu brjed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dang pa rgya mtsho ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa dang / sems
116a7(phal chen): can thams cad kyis dbang po rgya mtsho la sangs rgyas kyi tshul kun du snang ba yang dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rgya mtsho'i sgrib pa thams cad
116a8(phal chen): gzhom pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa rgya mtsho la 'byung ba'i lam rnam par sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad byang chub
116b1(phal chen): sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu 'god pa'i phyir yang dag par bstan par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho rnams
116b2(phal chen): de bas kyang shin du dga' bar bya ba dang / chos la dga' ba'i shugs thams cad rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / mos pa'i tshul yangs pa rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung bar bya/
116b3(phal chen): ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang snying po sgo kun dang ldan pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / kun du bzang po'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu 'god par bya ba dang / ye
116b4(phal chen): shes kyi mig dus gsum gyi rjes su song ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kun nas snang bar byed pa'i snying po shes rab rgya chen po'i rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar
116b5(phal chen): bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad yongs su bzung ba'i bzungs kyi stobs yang dag par bskyed pa dang / snying po thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rab tu
116b6(phal chen): brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi snang ba'ang chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dga' ba'i shugs rgya mtsho la rnam par 'phel bar bya
116b7(phal chen): ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// yon tan rgya mtsho rnams kyis ye shes zab// mtha' dang dbus med des ni zhing rnams khyab// sems can
116b8(phal chen): bsam pa sbyor ba ji bzhin snang // rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi 'khor lo'o// bsam gyis mi khyab rgya mtsho'i zhing yod pa// bskal pa rgya mtsho rgyal bas rnam sbyangs pa'i/
117a1(phal chen): @#sems can rgya mtsho yongs su smin bya'i phyir// sems can don da rgyal ba rnam par mdzes// sems can rgya mtsho 'byung ba sam mi khyab// sangs/
117a2(phal chen): rgyas yul la 'jug pa shin du zab// srid pa'i gnas can dad pa chung ba yis// sangs rgyas byang chub shes par mi nus so// gzhan du gang rnams shin du sems rten
117a3(phal chen): cing // dge ba'i gshes kyis yongs su bzung ba dang // sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs pa dag/ sangs rgyas ye shes 'di la rab tu 'jug/ nga rnams sems
117a4(phal chen): dag g.yo med rgyu med cing // snying rje'i sems kyis khongs nas byams dga' dang // dad pa che zhing rlabs chen de dag ni// 'di dag thos shing dga' ba thob par 'gyur/
117a5(phal chen): kun du bzang po'i smon lams dag dang // chos dbyings na mkha'i dbyings su khyab pa la// gnas shing spyod pa rab tu sungs spyod pa// de dag rgyal ba'i spyod yul 'di shes
117a6(phal chen): so// gang gis rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul 'di mthong ba'i// byang chub sems dpas thob bya legs par thob// gzhan gyi yul gyis shes par mi nus te// 'di ni kun du
117a7(phal chen): bzang po'i dgongs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis byin brlabs shing // 'gro ba mtha' dang dbus med 'di dag na// kun du chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/
117a8(phal chen): rnam par snang mdzad yul dang mthu yin no// bdag gi lus su zhing rnams thams cad kyang // rab tu zhugs shing de zhugs zhing rnams kun// de dag spu rtse kun du lta bar/
117b1(phal chen): gyis// rgyal po'i spyod yul shin du bshad par bya// kun du bzang po'i smon lam spyod pa rnams// mtha' dbus med mngon par sgrub pa dang // kun du mig gi yul dang lus
117b2(phal chen): ldan pa// de dag mgon po'i spyod yul 'di nyan to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po 'di dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin du bstan pa ste// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
117b3(phal chen): 'das dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo gsung bar 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams
117b4(phal chen): yongs su 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rgyu rkyen shin du bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gnas pa shin du bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i
117b5(phal chen): dbyings dang rnam par shin du bstan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i lhan shin du bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin du bstan pa dang /
117b6(phal chen): 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul shin du bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas 'byung ba shin du
117b7(phal chen): bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa'i byin gyis rlabs shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i rgyud rgya mtsho shin du bstan pa
117b8(phal chen): dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tha mi dad pa shin du bstan pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa/ 'jig
118a1(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin du bstan pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang /
118a2(phal chen): da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo gsung bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad ni/ rgyu dang rkyen la dmigs pa'i sgo
118a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rdul shin du phra ba snyed phrag bcus byung ngo // 'byung ngo 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang chos nyid
118a4(phal chen): rab tu thob pa dang / sems can rnams kyi las kyi tshogs dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par sgrub pa'i chos nyid dang /
118a5(phal chen): sems can rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' dag dang bsod nams kyi rtsa ba bskal pa 'thun pa bstsags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhing yongs su dag
118a6(phal chen): pa'i smon lam gyi khyab par dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pas/ rnam par bsgrubs pa'i smon lam gyis mngon par sgrubs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
118a7(phal chen): rnams kyi mos pa'i dbang rnams par dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / rgyu 'thun pas mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing /
118a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa khyu mchog gi mthu dbyung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po rnams kyis smon lam gyis rnam par 'phrul ba'i sgo'o// kye rgyal
118b1(phal chen): ba'i sras dag de ltar rgyu dang rkyen la dmigs pa'i sgo bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa/ rgyu rkyen la dmigs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
118b2(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho thams cad byung ngo // 'byung ngo 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos/ 'jig rten gyis khams rgya mtsho 'byung ba shin du
118b3(phal chen): bstan pa 'di nyid gsal bar brjod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas ye shes yul ni bsam yas pa/
118b4(phal chen): byin brlabs rnam 'phrul de dag 'di lta bu// zhing rnams rgya mtsho bstan pa mtha' dbus med// rnam par snang mdzad chos kyis yongs su sbyangs// byang chub sems dpa'
118b5(phal chen): kun gyis bsam pa bzhin// smon lam rgya mtsho mtha' yas rnams sbyangs shing // sems can las rnams rgya mtsho bsam yas pas// phyogs kun zhing rnams rgya mtsho
118b6(phal chen): thams cad 'byung // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam 'phrul dang // thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa'i sgos// smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon sgrub
118b7(phal chen): shing // rnam pa'i dbyings la 'jas klas zhing 'byung ngo // stong pa rgya mtshomatha' dang dbus med rnams// spyod cing tshad med pade bshegs yul la 'jug/ phyogs kyi
118b8(phal chen): ning rnams rgya mtsho kun skyong zhing // bskal pa mtha' yas zhing rnams re rer spyod// sems can bsam dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// lus kyis ning rnams rgya mtsho
119a1(phal chen): la@thams cad 'byung // nyon mongs las kyis de dag nyon mongs bcas// mos dang bsam pas sna tshogs gzugs// zhing rnams rgyas
119a2(phal chen): rnam dag rgya chen rnams// rin chen rgyus 'byung sna tshogs dri med pa// dad pa rgya mtsho rnam par spel ba'i phyir// rgyal sras rnams ni phyogs bcur zhing rnams sbyong // chos
119a3(phal chen): dbyings rdul gyi khong du rgyal sras rnams// kun du bzang po'i spyad pa spyod pa dag/ rdul gyi khongs su mtha' yas zhing ston ste// rnam dag mkha' bzhin mtha' dang dbus
119a4(phal chen): kyang med// na mkha'i dbyings 'dra'i rnams 'phrul 'di 'dra ste// snying po byang chub rgyal ba'i zhabs drung na// pad mo'i stan 'khod kha dog mtha' yas kun// de dag
119a5(phal chen): zhing bcas lus kyi nang na 'khod// skad cig sems kyis dus gsum 'byung ba yi// zhing 'byung tshul dang 'jug kun kyang ston// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dus gsum zhing
119a6(phal chen): bstan pa// rnam par snang mdzad rgya mtsho'i zhing mi zad// tshul gyi khyad par mtha' yas sna tshogs pas// rdul rnams kun la mtha' yas brgyan gyi rnams// sangs rgyas
119a7(phal chen): skad cig cig la byin gyis brlob// rgyan gyis rnam pa tshul kun rab tu mkhyen// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la gnas pa shin du bstan pa ni 'jig rten khams rgya mtsho re re
119a8(phal chen): zhing yang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba sbed de/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rgyan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho kun la rab tu gnas so//
119b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni// na mkha'i dbyings kyi gnas la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che'i thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgya mtsho
119b2(phal chen): la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
119b3(phal chen): la la ni/ rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog gi mdog la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor la rab tu gnaso//
119b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sgyu ma lta bu'i las kyi byung ba lnga ma yin dang 'thu bo che lta bu'i lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyis khams rgya mtsho
119b5(phal chen): la la ni 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams
119b6(phal chen): cad kyi lus rgya mtshal rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshal la ni byang chub sems kun du babang ba'i smon lam gyis byung ba'i can rnam thathams cad dang ldan par
119b7(phal chen): mas / des pa lags pa 'ag mas gas pa/ na ni lag rnam nas
119b8(phal chen): rgya du ma yin dum bzed // las byang chub sas dang 'thun du yang thos par 'jig dkyi la sa rgyam chos tugs bzhin du gan ma
120a1(phal chen): su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i tshe tshigs su gcad pa 'di dag smras so// kun kyang zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rin chen
120a2(phal chen): rang bzhin dri med pa// rnam dag sna tshogs nor bu kun 'bar 'od zer rgya mtsho'i 'od ldan ltos// 'di dag rgyal ba'i byin rlabs rgyu yis dbyings legs 'khor bar snang /
120a3(phal chen): de dag gi ni phyogs bcu'i na mkha'i dbyings rnams zhing rnams kun du rab tu khyab// zhing rnams rgya mtsho la la dri med 'od can na mkha'i dbyings la gnas// snang ba'i snying po 'od
120a4(phal chen): can nor bu'i rgya mtsho dag la legs par gnas// 'gro ba de dbus rgyal ba 'khor la chos kyi 'khor lo bzang po bskor// 'di ni sangs rgyas yul yin sems can rgya chen
120a5(phal chen): shin du 'gu byed pa'o// la la me tog sgron ma kun du rgyas pa'i mu tig nor bus brgyan// 'od zer dra ba'i kun nas sprin 'bar spos 'phro sprin gyis 'od can te// zhing mang
120a6(phal chen): mtha' dang dbus med rgya chen pad mo'i rgya mtsho dag la gnas// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab rgyan zhing rnams 'byam klas kun kyang rab tu mdzes// zhing rnams rgya mtsho dkyil
120a7(phal chen): 'khor dbyings rnams la la sangs rgyas byin la gnas// yangs shing rin chen mang ldan rgya chen de dag byang chub sems dpa' glang // lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho mang chags
120a8(phal chen): dpung lus la de bzhin gnas// de na bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ nor bu'i shing dang spos kyis 'od 'gro'i smin rnams mnam pa'i bying
120b1(phal chen): la gnas// chu'i phung po dag dang rdo rje rgya mtsho rten la'ang de bzhin// la la gos dang brag dang rgyal mtshan me tog rgya mtsho dag la gnas// kun nang rnam 'phrul 'di dag rgya
120b2(phal chen): chen rnam par snang mdzad ston pa mdzad// zhing rnams ring dang thung dang glog gi gzugs dang rnam pa sna tshogs te// sna tshogs rgya chen snying po dri ma bral ba yongs dag dri med snang /
120b3(phal chen): rnam pa sna tshogs de dag smon lam rgya mtsho'i dbyings la rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun nas yogs par rtag tu na mkha'i dbyings gnas// zhing rnams rgya mtsho
120b4(phal chen): 'byam klas la la spyi'u tshugs yod dang med la gnas// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni rin chen 'khor los bzung bas dag par gnas// de nas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgya
120b5(phal chen): chen thams cad kun nas rab tu snang // rin chen sangs rgyas gsung rnams kun du gtong ldan de dag las kyis sprul// chos kyi dbyings mnyam zhing rnams 'byam klas mig
120b6(phal chen): yor sgyu ma dang yang 'dra// mig 'phrul rna phye rnam dag dri med sems kyis shin du skyed pa ste// na mkha'i dbyings rnams sna tshogs rgyan gyi snying po gnas 'gyur 'di la snang /
120b7(phal chen): las kyis yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab 'di dag bde bar gshegs pas bstan// skad cig sems kyis zhing rnams 'jam klas 'gro ba kun du mnyam pa rnams// ning
120b8(phal chen): rdul kun la kun du bzang por rtag par rab tu sgrub byed cing // de na bskal pa rgya mtshor 'gro ba smin par bya phyir spyad pa spyod// chos dbyings rgyas par bkang ste de dag kun du 'ang
121a1(phal chen): por rtag par rab tu sgrub byed cing // de na bskal pa rgya mtshor 'gro ba smin par bya phyir spyad pa spyod// chos dbyings rgyas par bkang ste de dag kun
121a2(phal chen): du rnam 'phrul rgya chen ston// rdul rnams kun na chos dbyings yangs pa'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun kyang gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyi rlabs pas kun kyang yog cing
121a3(phal chen): yongs su rgyas// ji ltar rdul phran cig la rnam 'phrul de bzhin 'gro ba kun na'o// rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgya chen rab tu ston pa mdzad// zhing rnams 'jam
121a4(phal chen): klas thams cad mig yor lta bu sgyu ma smig sgyu 'dra// snang ba med cing 'byung med phyogs bcu dag na 'gro dang 'ong ba med// mkha' la gnas de dag rtag par 'byung zhing 'jig
121a5(phal chen): par de bzhin 'gyur// shin du yangs pa de dag smon lam rnams sbyangs las kyis yongs su bzang // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnam pa sna
121a6(phal chen): tshogs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jam klas pa la la ni kun nas zlum po'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jam klas pa la la ni kun nas grub bzhi'o// 'jig
121a7(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jam klas pa la la ni namakha'i rnam pa du mar rnam par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jam klas pa lal ni kun nas 'khyil ba'i dbyibs su
121a8(phal chen): 'dug go// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jam klas pa la la ni 'od 'phro ba'i ri'i dbyibs su 'dug go// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jam klas pa la la ni shing sna tshogs
121b1(phal chen): kyi lhun gyi dbyibs su 'dug go// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jam klas pa la la ni me tog sna tshogs kyi dbyibs su 'dug go// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jam klas pa
121b2(phal chen): la la ni khyim sna tshogs kyi dbyibs su 'dug go// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jam klas pa la la ni sems can sna tshogs kyi dbyibs su 'dug go/ 'jig rten gyi khams
121b3(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'jam klas pa la la ni 'chan sna tshogs kyi dbyibs su 'dug ste/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbyibs shin du bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi kham
121b4(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/
121b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smos so// rnam pa sna tshogs rgyal ba'i zhing la stos// rnam
121b6(phal chen): phye sna tshogs mtha' yas dbyibs su gnas// dbyibs kyis rnam par phye ba sna tshogs ste// phyogs rnams kun nas rgya mtsho snang // la la zlum po la la bzung gsum ste/
121b7(phal chen): de dag la la phyogs na gru bzhir gnas// nor bu pad mo 'khor lo yan lag brgyad// kun kyang las rnams rgya mtsho rnam par bris// rdul med 'od kyi dbyibs kyang tshul
121b8(phal chen): 'dzin cing // gser las grub phye rnam pa sna tshogs ste// sgo mang mtha' yas pa nas rgyu zhing 'jug/ las rnams rgya mtsho bsam pa dag pas gnas// ning rnams rgya mtsho
122a1(phal chen): sna tshogs snying po can// na mkha' 'di la ji ltar sprin gnas bzhin// de dag rin mang bani rnam par phye// de dag kun na sangs rgyas rnam par
122a2(phal chen): mdzes// zhing rnams 'di kun sems kyis rnam par rtag/ sna tshogs rgyan dang snang bas kun na gnas// rnam par 'phrul pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gi/ zhing rnams rgya mtsho
122a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad// bde dang sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa ni// rnam par dag dang nyon mongs tshul bzhin te// chos nyid 'di ni rtag tu yod pa ste// de ltar las rnams mtsho
122a4(phal chen): bsam mi khyab// skra cig rtse las bsam gyis mi khyab cing // thams cad rdul snyed sna tshogs dbyibs su gnas// kun na sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs// 'khor rnams
122a5(phal chen): rgya mtshor chos rnams rab tu ston// rdul cig rtse la phra dang yangs pa rnams// thams cad rdul snyed kha dog kun dang ldan// kha dog dbyibs rnams kun kyang rnam par rtags/
122a6(phal chen): de dag kun na rgyal ba'i 'khor lo 'khor// rdul rnams kun la rab tu zhing bstan pa// de dag smon lam rnam par sprul pa yin// na mkha'i dbyings su las kyis sprul pa
122a7(phal chen): yis// sna tshogs sems dang bsam pas rnam par dgas// sems can kun mnyam rdul rnams thams cad la// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa sprul pa dge/ rnam
122a8(phal chen): par snang mdzad chos nyid de yin te// rdul zan kun la zhing rnams shin du gnas// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i lhun de dag ni gzhan du shes par
122b1(phal chen): bya ste// 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che cig las rnam pa sna tshog
122b2(phal chen): su bkod pa'i rgyan gyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad ni 'od zer gyi lhun no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni 'od kha dog sna
122b3(phal chen): tshogs kyi lhan no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rgyan thams cad kyi mdog gi lhun po can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rdo rje'i gzhi mi shig pa'i ldan
122b4(phal chen): can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyis rlabs kyi lhan can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che'i mtshan nyid
122b5(phal chen): kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nyi ma'i nor bu dkyil 'khor gyis
122b6(phal chen): lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che za ba 'dzin pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni snang ba'i lhun can no// 'jig
122b7(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog 'od 'phro ba'i rnam pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni dri dang kha dog sna tshogs kyi
122b8(phal chen): lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi me tog cad pan gyi lhan can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad
123a1(phal chen): kyi 'od kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rgyan thams cad shin du bstan pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsha
123a2(phal chen): la la ni sems kyi rnam par rtog pa skad cig gi dmigs pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi
123a3(phal chen): rin po che'i dbyibs kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi ze ba'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs
123a4(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyis gsung dbyangs rnam par dmigs pa'i lhun can no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i lhun shin du bstan
123a5(phal chen): pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid la rab tu gzung bar bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing gi rgya
123a6(phal chen): mtsho la la ni rin po che rang bzhin kun na gnas// rdo rje bzhin du mi shigs sra ba rin chen pad+mo rnams la gnas// la la 'od zer rang bzhin dag cing gzung med 'od zer 'byung //
123a7(phal chen): rkyen rnams kun gyi 'od zer gyi// sna tshogs mkha' bzhin dri ma med// la la 'od kyi rang bzhin te// dag cing 'od zer gsal la gnas// 'od kyi sprin chen sna tshogasa'o// byang
123a8(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas// zhing rnams rgya mtshol la ni dmig yor lta bur gnas pa ste// brjod du med cing gzung du med// smon lam dbang gis rab tu byung // la la/
123b1(phal chen): nor bu mu tig rgya// snying po thams cad rnam par 'bar// mu tig 'khor lo'i bzhi dag pa// byang chub sems dpas yongs su gang // rin chen 'od 'phro'i sprin gyis mngon 'bebs shing /
123b2(phal chen): rin chen thams cad sna tshogs ldan// thams cad las kyi sprul pa yin// la las mtshan las byung ba ste// gzhi kun mtshan gyis kun du bris// cod pan rnam pa sna tshogs bkod//
123b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kun gyis mngon par sprul// rgya mtsho'i sems las byung ba ste// zhing rnams mos pa yid la gnas// yul na mi gnas sgyu ma bzhin// yongs su rtogs pas yang
123b4(phal chen): dag bskyed// sangs rgyas sku'i 'od zer gyi// nor bu'i sna tshogs kun du gnas// sangs rgyas sprin rnams rnam par snang // sangs rgyas kun gyi rab tu sprul// la la kun du bzang
123b5(phal chen): po yis// zhing rnams rgya mtsho shin du sprul// namakha'i rnams thams cad dang // smon lam rnams kyis rnam par bris// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol
123b6(phal chen): rgyan shin du bstan pa ni// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste// 'di ltar dmigs pa rnams pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'phros pa'i
123b7(phal chen): rgyan dang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan gyi 'khor lo rjes su brjod cing rab tu byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rtog
123b8(phal chen): pa'i sems can rnams kyis/ las kyi rnam par smin pa rgya mtsho las rab tu byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho'i glong yongs su
124a1(phal chen): la @ston pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan sna tshogs rnam par dmigs pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste
124a2(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig la bskal pa mtha' yas par rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul yongs su ston pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste rin po che dang spos thams cad kyi sprin rab tu byung ba'i rgyan dang /
124a3(phal chen): 'di lta ste snying po byang chub kyi rgyan dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par ston pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i smon lam dang spyod pa yongs su/
124a4(phal chen): ston pa'i rgyan dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin du bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba rnyed do//
124a5(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i brgyan shin du bstan pa 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs
124a6(phal chen): kyis phyogs bcur rnam par lta ste/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams rgya mtsho rgya chen mtha' yas te/ rnam dag las kyis rnam pa sna tshogs gnas/
124a7(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnams kun kyang // sna tshogs rgyan can langs pas kun nas gnas// kha dog sna tshogs yangs pa'i zhing gi rnams// rgya mtsho rtag par phyogs
124a8(phal chen): rnams kun du 'byung // rgyan dang rin chen 'od 'phro sna tshogs sbyin// sgra 'byin zhing gi dbyangs rnams khyabs par byed// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho rnams// de dag
124b1(phal chen): kun kyang rgya mtsho'i zhing na grag/ sna tshogs rgyan dang smon lam smin gyi rnams// de dag zhing mang rgya mtshor sgra yang 'byin// 'gro ba'i las rnams rgya mtsho yangs pa dag/ rgyan gyi sprin
124b2(phal chen): rnams kun nas sgrar 'byin te// sems can de dag rnam smin ji 'dra ba/ sangs rgyas byin gyis kun nas sgra yang sgrogs// dus gsum byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa yis// rnam
124b3(phal chen): 'phrul zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang // dmigs pa re re la yang sangs rgyas kun// de 'dra'i zhing mang rgya mtsho'i rgyan la ltos// 'das pa'i bskal pa de bzhin ma 'ongs dang // byod
124b4(phal chen): bcu'i da ltar byung ba ji snyed pa'i// bskal pa de dag rgyan mang yangs pa yang // zhing rnams rgya mtsho re re dag na snang // dmigs pa kun la sangs rgyas sprin gyi rnams// 'gro dang
124b5(phal chen): mnyam pas 'jig rten kun du 'gengs// rnam par 'phrul zhing sems can rnam par 'dul// 'di ni zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rnam thar to// spos 'od dang de bzhin me tog rlung // rgyan
124b6(phal chen): rnams sna tshogs thams cad kun nas kyang // rtag par kun du khyab pa rab tu 'byung // 'di ni zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rnam thar to// phyogs bcu kun gyi snying po byang chub rnams// sna
124b7(phal chen): chags brgyan can kun kyang ma lus par// thams cad rgya mtsho'i zhing 'di dbyibs dag na// na mkha'i sprin bzhin rnam par ston pa snang // rgyal mas kun du bzang po thams cad kyis/
124b8(phal chen): zhing rnams mtha' yas 'jam klas rgyan gyi rnams// 'gro ba'i grangs rnyed bskal pa rgya mtshor rnams sbyangs pa// zhing rnams rgya mtshor kun du rab tu snang // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
125a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed du shes par byas te/ 'di/
125a2(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gasnyen rnams la bstan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bar bskal pa mnyam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub sems
125a3(phal chen): dpa' thams cad rab tu bstan pa'i yul la rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang yongs su spyad
125a4(phal chen): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad kyi dbyings la rab tu dgod cing gzud pa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
125a5(phal chen): spyod pa dang / 'byung ba rgya mtsho la rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam rgya mtsho la thams cad mngon par sgrub pa rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems
125a6(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi rgyan rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par sgrub pa rnam par dag pa la rab tu 'jug pa dang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi tshul yang dag par sgrubs
125a7(phal chen): pa rnam par dag pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o//
125a8(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongasu dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid rnam par bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs
125b1(phal chen): kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad sna tshogs brgyan// smod lam tshul rnams rgya mtsho kun gyis byung /
125b2(phal chen): kha dog mtha' yas las kyi rgya mtsho dag/ zhing rnams rgya mtsho dag tu 'od mang 'gyed// sngan chad dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur zhing // bskal pa mnyam pa'i las dge yongs
125b3(phal chen): sbyangs te// snying rje byams pas 'gro yangs kun bkang zhing // zhing rnams rgya mtsho yangs pa 'di kun sbyangs// chos sgo kun du ting 'dzin sa kun gyis// sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho
125b4(phal chen): yongs sbyangs te// bsam gtan tshul dang rnam thar sa sbyangs shing // zhing rnams rgya mtsho sna tshogs yangs pa byung // mos pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas stobs skyed cing //
125b5(phal chen): rgyal ba'i mnyam nyid ma nor rtogs byas nas// bzod pa rgya mtsho'i tshul rnams yongs sbyangs shing // rnam dag kha dog mtha' yas zhing rnams byung // bsod nams sprin ni nam
125b6(phal chen): mkha' mnyam byed cing // 'gro ba kun pan ba de don skyong spyad de// bsod nams rgya mtsho sems can kun bstan pas// 'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho kun kyang 'byung /
125b7(phal chen): ning rnams rgya mtsho dul sbed tshang med pa'i// pha rol byin pa ma lus kun sbyangs te// smon lam mthar byin mi zad gos byas pas// dri med rgya mtsho'i ning rnams yangs pa 'jug
125b8(phal chen): 'byung ba'i spyod pa gang yod mang med dang // chos rnams thams cad yangs pa yongs sbyangs te// sna tshogs brtson 'grus sems can sbyangs pas na// 'di 'dra yod 'o
126a1(phal chen): @#mtsho'i zhing rnams 'byung // rgyan rnams kun gyi tshul dang sa sbyangs shing // stobs rnams rgya mtsho gzhal med yongs spyad shing // rgyal ba'i
126a2(phal chen): yon tan rgya mtsho kun zhugs nas// 'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal mtsho skams pas// zhing gi mtsho yangs 'di kun dag par 'gyur// stobs rnams rgya mtsho gzhal med longs sbyangs
126a3(phal chen): shing // 'gro ba 'di 'dra tshad med rnams sbyangs shing // sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yangs kun bsnyen bkur bas// zhing mang rgya mtsho rnam mang rnam par dag/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
126a4(phal chen): dag de la 'jig rten gyis khams rgya mtsho re rer sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas
126a5(phal chen): 'byung ba la la ni sku chung ngur kun du ston to// 'di lta ste sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni chos kyi dbyings thams cad gzugs kyi skus gang bar ston to// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la
126a6(phal chen): ni sku tshe tshad mi ring ngo // sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sku tshe'i tshad ring ngo // sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing cig yongs su dag par byin gyis brlob po
126a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su dag par byin gyi brlob po// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni tshul cig gis bstan pa'i chos kyis
126a8(phal chen): 'khor lor byin gyis brlob bo// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sems can gyi khams nyung ngu rnams 'dul ba byin gyis brlob po// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sems can gyi
126b1(phal chen): rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa rnam par gdul byin gyis rlob ste/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re rer sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul
126b2(phal chen): shin du phra ba rnyed du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i phyogs 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas
126b3(phal chen): kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas ste/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal ba 'byung ba thabs rnams sna tshogs kyis// sgo nas zhing rnams rgya
126b4(phal chen): mtsho rab tu 'byung // de dag sems can bsam pa ji bzhin mkhyen// sangs rgyas thabs kyi sgo mang rgya mtsho'o// sangs rgyas chos sku bsam gyi mi khyab ste// mig yor ma yin
126b5(phal chen): mtshan nyid med pa'i gzugs// gzugs kyi khyad par 'gro ba 'di dag tu// sems can bsam pa'i phyogs bzhin ston la ltos// sku tshe thung bar la la rnam par ston// la la
126b6(phal chen): bskal pa bsam yas byin gyis brlob// chos kyi sgo ni phyogs rnams kun gyi sgo// rab tu mdzes pa 'gro ba 'di na bzhugs// la la zhing rnams rgya mtsho bsam yas dag/ sbyong
126b7(phal chen): zhing 'jam klas phyogs bcu kun na yang // la la zhing cig rnam par sbyong ba mdzad// smon lam ma lus kun kyang tshul cig go// la la bsam gyis mi khyab theg pa'i rgyan//
126b8(phal chen): sems can yid bzhin sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad// la la theg pa cig kyang rab ston te// rgyal ba'i thabs na gcig kyang mtha' yas so// rang byung la la byang chub sangs rgyas nas/
126b9(phal chen): sems can ma mang lam la bzhog pa mdzad// la la skad cig cig gis sems can rnams// rgya mtsho mtha' yas byang chub don du 'dul// la la spu'i spos nas mtha' yas pa'i sangs
127a1(phal chen): rgyas sprul pa'i sprin rnams rab tu 'gyed// 'gro ba kun du de dag mngon bkang zhing // thabs kyi sgo nas sems can 'dul ba mdzad// la la sangs
127a2(phal chen): rgyas gsung gis kun bkang zhing // zhing du sems can yid bzhin rab tu sgrogs// mtha' yas bskal par de dag gsung sgrogs cing // sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas rnam par 'dul/
127a3(phal chen): la la zhing rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab ste// 'khor rnams yongs dag kun nas 'khor bcas pas// zhing mang rgya mtsho'i phyogs su gang byas shing // sangs rgyas mkha' la sprin ltar
127a4(phal chen): khyab par bzhugs// de ltar sangs rgyas thabs ni bsam mi khyab// zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun du rgyas bkang zhing // 'gro ba kun la sangs rgyas mngon gsum ste// sna tshogs rgya mang
127a5(phal chen): du ma'i tshul dang ldan// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bskal pa byin gyis rlabs kyis// tshul shin du bstan pa ni 'jig rten gyis khams rgya mtsho'i rdul
127a6(phal chen): shin du phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste// 'di ltar zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa grangs med par byin gyis brlab pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa tshad med par byin gyis brlab so//
127a7(phal chen): zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa dpag tu med par byin gyis brlabs so// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis brlab so// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal
127a8(phal chen): ba 'tshungs pa med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa kun nas mtha' yas par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtshol la ni bskal pa kun nas mu
127b1(phal chen): med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// ning rgya mtshol la ni bskal ba gzhal du med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni brjod du med par byin gyis brlabs
127b2(phal chen): ba ste// de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bskal pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi tshul shin du bstan pa rgya mtshon 'jig rten gyis khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba
127b3(phal chen): snyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi tshul shin du bstan pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su
127b4(phal chen): bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'jig rten rgya mtsho bskal pa
127b5(phal chen): tha dad te// sna tshogs tshul 'jug rgyan rnams gzhan dang gzhan// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang // bskal pa tshul ni rgya mtsho grangs kyang med// bskal/
127b6(phal chen): pa mi mthun 'gro ba kun dang mnyam// phyogs dbyings 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams na gnas// bskal pa mtha' yas la la ring dang 'thung // bskal pa sna tshogs
127b7(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sgras kyang sgrags// rgya mtsho zhing rnams 'di dag phyogs dbyings rnams// byin rlabs bskal pa zhing rdul sbed dang ldan// la la gzhan rnams bskal pa cig
127b8(phal chen): gis 'jug/ la la grangs dang smon lam du mas byung // bskal pa la la dri med la la nyon mongs can// la la rnam dag la la nyon mongs rnam par dag/ bskal pa'i
128a1(phal chen): @#ming ni smon lam rgya mtshos tshul gyis byung // sems can 'du shes rnam pas tha dad tshul la 'jug/ bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed sngan chad spyod spyad pas//
128a2(phal chen): 'dzin rten khams rnams rgya mtsho shin du yangs shing dag/ de dag kun nas sangs rgyas yul rgyan tshad kyang med// 'di dag rgya chen bskal pa'i 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams// bskal
128a3(phal chen): pa'i 'od dang 'od zer rin chen ming sna tshogs// bcom ldan dbyangs dang 'od mnyam 'od 'phro'i mig sdang ba// snang dang dri med bzang po bskal pa'i ming la 'jug/ bskal pa 'di dag
128a4(phal chen): rnam dag bskal pa kun nas byung // dri med bskal pa la la sangs rgyas cig skye'o// bskal pa la lar ming gi gtso bo mtha' yas 'byung // bskal pa'i tshul thams cad sa tshul
128a5(phal chen): zad mi shes// smon lam stobs 'thus bskal pa sna tshogs 'jug par 'gyur// bskal pa la la mtha' yas rnams kyang bskal pa cig tu 'dus// bskal pa la la gcig kyang
128a6(phal chen): bskal pa bye ba'i mthu// bskal pa rgya mtsho kun kyang sna tshogs sgo nas 'jug/ phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nang nas sgra yang 'byin// bskal pa la lar bskal pa kun gyi rgyan
128a7(phal chen): kyang 'byung // ming gi brgyan rnams rnam par dag pa'ang de la yod// bskal pa la la sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul mthu yis 'byung // bskal pa'i tshul rnams kun gyi 'di'i rgyan yangs yin//
128a8(phal chen): zhing dang bskal ba rgya mtsho tshul ni cig gis dag/ ning gi dul rnams kun kyang tshad med gzhal du med// skad cig lung tsam ni ma'i grangs kyis bskal bar 'gyur// 'di dag thams
128b1(phal chen): cad sems can 'du shes rnam par byung // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pas mtha' yas pa'i rgyud kyi tshul rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i
128b2(phal chen): tshul shin du phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar chos nyid rab tu thob pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag bskal pas 'jig cing 'dul ba la rab tu 'jug pa/ rab tu gnas
128b3(phal chen): pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor rtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pas bskal pa mtha' yas pa kun nas gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
128b4(phal chen): rtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho chen po bsags pa rnam par dag pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho kun nas nyon mongs pa la rnam par dag par gnas pa dang /
128b5(phal chen): 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' mos pa sna tshogs kyis spyod pa rnams skye bas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa la kun nas nyon mongs par gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste sems
128b6(phal chen): can rgya chen po byang chub kyi sems la gnas pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin du dag par gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
128b7(phal chen): gzhan du 'dod pas bskal pa mtha' yas pargyan tha dad pa'i tshul du gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor
128b8(phal chen): 'dus pas bskal pa mtha' yas pa shin du mang por kun nas gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
129a1(phal chen): ngag gi rgyan nub par 'gyur ba dang // 'di lta ste sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams rgyan gyis brgyan par kun nas gnas/
129a2(phal chen): ba dang / 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa yongs su dag par gnas pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'jig
129a3(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i rgyud kyi tshul rgya mtsho dang / kun nas gnas pa'i tshul ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub
129a4(phal chen): sems dpa' kun du bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi/
129a5(phal chen): phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i chos nyid 'di la ltos// chos kyi byung ste ji ltar gnas pa ltar// de dag 'byung
129a6(phal chen): zhing 'jig par 'gyur ba yang // zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu snang // sems can nyon mongs mi zad ldan pa dang // las dang nyon mongs ngan pas sgrib pa rnams// de dag
129a7(phal chen): bsal zhing gi rgya mtsho rnams// kun nas nyon mongs ldan par gyur pa yin// sems can rnams dag bsam pa ldan rnams dang // bsod nam brtan dang rnam dag spyod yul can/
129a8(phal chen): rnam dag yul la nyon mongs ldan gyur rnams// de dag mos pa sna tshogs spyod yul gyi// byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i dus dag na// bskal pa de ni rnam par dag par snang /
129b1(phal chen): sems can nyon mongs ldan par gyur pa yang // de'i chos nyid bsam yas yangs pa yi// byang chub bsam pa ji ltar bskyed pa dang // de dag bsam par 'phel bas// de bzhin bskal
129b2(phal chen): pa bskal rgya mtsho mang po dag/ bsam gyi mi khyab zhing rgyan yongs su sbyong // bye ba mang po bsam yas mi zad pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu kun rgyu yang // rgyan la
129b3(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad yod pa yin// bskal pa tha dang tshul gyis bye brag snang // rdal rnams re re sbubs su dus kun du// sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa yi// rgyal sras ci tshul
129b4(phal chen): 'dod pa de bzhin du// zhing rnams rgya mtsho de tshul dag par 'gyur// gal te rgyal ba rnams ni skyer 'gyur na// zhing rnams rgyan gyi shin du rgyan par 'gyur// bsam pa yongs
129b5(phal chen): dag de bzhin rgyas 'gyur te// 'di ni zhing brgyan phun sum tshogs pa'o// gal te rgyal ba mya ngan 'das gyur na// de'i tshe zhing gi rgyan rnams 'grib par 'gyur// sems can rnams
129b6(phal chen): kyang snod du rung ba yin// zhing gi rgya mtsho de yang nyon mongs ldan// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul rnam 'phrul yangs pa dag/ bsam gyis mi khyab gang tshe ston pa na// de tshe zhing rnams rgya
129b7(phal chen): mtsho mang po dag/ kun kyang rgyan gyi rnam par rgyan par 'gyur// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa'i tshul ni// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul
129b8(phal chen): shin du shes par bya ste/ de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ gsung so gsung ngo gsung bar
130a1(phal chen): @#'gyur ro// de ni 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i mu shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tha mi dad pa
130a2(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas skye zhi 'byung ba tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi snying po byang chub thams cad nas chos kyi
130a3(phal chen): dbyings rgyas par 'gyengs pa tha mi dad pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi
130a4(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho dag gis sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tha mi dad pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
130a5(phal chen): sprul pa'i sprin dang / mtshan gyi 'khor lo tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyings kyi 'khor bskal pa mtha' yas
130a6(phal chen): par brjod cing / rgyas par bya ba'i byin gyi rlabs tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul tha mi dad pa 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi
130a7(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho dag tu rdul shin du phra ba cig la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su 'dul ba tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu rdul
130a8(phal chen): 'byam klas pa thams cad la/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po ston cing / brjod pa the mi dad pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams
130b1(phal chen): rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa'i tshul/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
130b2(phal chen): mtsho tha mi dad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho shin du bstan pa 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
130b3(phal chen): dag smras so// rdul cig steng ni zhing mang rgya mtsho ste// kun na rgyan mang rnam dag kun yod kyang // gnod pa med cing 'dre ba gang yang med// 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab 'di la
130b4(phal chen): ltos// rdul rnams kun la bsam yas sangs rgyas bzhugs// sems can kun gyi bsam pa yid du// zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad khyab byas kyang // de dag rnams la
130b5(phal chen): tha dad gang yang med// rdul rnams kun la shing dbang mtha' yas pa// sna tshogs rgyan byung kun nas bres sbyangs te// phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing du mngon bkang yang //
130b6(phal chen): de dag tha dad 'gyur ba rnams yang med// rgyal phran rgya mtsho rdul bren re re la// mi'i gtso bo 'khor gyi snyun skor zhing // 'jig rten kun du bkang ste 'phags bzhugs kyang /
130b7(phal chen): gnod pa dag dang 'dra ba'i nyes pa med// rdul cig la ni mtha' yas 'od kyi sprin// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun bkang zhing // bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub spyod
130b8(phal chen): stan kyang // rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams tha dad gang med// rdul rnams kun la kha dog bsam mi khyab// sprul pa'i sprin gyis kun du gang byas te// sangs rgyas sprul pas sems can
131a1(phal chen): @#rnams 'dul yang // 'byam klas phyogs na tha dad gang yang med// rdul rnams kun la rgya mtsho'i chos brjod de// de dag 'khor lo tshul bzhin 'khor
131a2(phal chen): mdzad cing // thabs dang mthu'i sgo mo sna tshogs kyis// thams cad brjod kyang de la tha dad med// rdul cig la ni rgyal ba kun gyi gsung // 'gro ba snod du gyur la de dag brjod bya ste/
131a3(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i zhing du bskal par byin brlabs kyang // de dag gsung gi yan lag tha mi dad // zhing rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas rgyan gyis rnams// thams cad rdul sbubs cig tu rab tu 'dzud
131a4(phal chen): rgyal ba rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul mthu la ltos// las kyi dngos la de dag skyes pa min// rdul cig la ni dus gsum rgyal ba dag/ ji ltar byung ba de dag thams cad snang // de dag gshegs
131a5(phal chen): dang byon pa gang yang med// 'gro ba kun na sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul// shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin du
131a6(phal chen): bstan pa'i phyogs gsal bar bya ba yang dag par sgrub pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi pa'o//
131a7(phal chen): bam po brgyad pa'o// / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bzhi dang / snying po me tog gi rgyan gyi brgyan pa'i
131a8(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ bskal pa rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed
131b1(phal chen): kyis yongs su dag par byas te// bskal pa re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi zhabs drung na/ smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi
131b2(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis yongs su dag par byas so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bzhi dang / snying po me tog gis rgyan pa'i brgyan pa de ni/
131b3(phal chen): rlung gi dkyil 'khor ri rab kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis shin du bzung ba ste/ de la rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'og na ni/ bzhi kun nas ston pa zhes bya ba ste/ rin po che thams
131b4(phal chen): cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar bas rgyan pa'i bzhis rton to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che sna tshogs kyi brgyan 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ nor bu'i rgyal po 'od rnam par dag pa'i
131b5(phal chen): rgyal mtshan gyi bzhis rton to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che'i mthu zhes bya ba yod de/ rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu bzhis rton to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'od
131b6(phal chen): 'phro mnyam par rton pa zhes bya ba yod de/ nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i bzhis ston to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor brgyan kun nas rnam par bris pa zhes
131b7(phal chen): bya ba yod de/ 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor me tog gi bzhis ston to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhis kun nas dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba yod de/ me tog thams
131b8(phal chen): cad 'od 'phro ba'i seng ges khris bzhi ston to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor phyogs kun du sgra sgrogs cing / kun du rgyu ba zhes bya ba yod de/ mu tig dang man shel gyi rgyal mtshan sna
132a1(phal chen): tshogs kyis bzhis ston to// de'i steng na zung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che bams cad 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po shing dang me togs
132a2(phal chen): tshogs kyi grong gi bzhis ston to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun nas 'dzin pa'i shugs zhes bya ba yod do// spos kyi nor bu thams cad kyi ri rab kyi sprin gyi bzhis ston to//
132a3(phal chen): de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi khyim du rgyu ba zhes bya ba yod de/ rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang spos kyi khang rtsegs pa'i sprin gyis bzhis ston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rlung
132a4(phal chen): gi dkyil 'khor ri rab kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed de dag thams cad kyi steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid bzang po'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba ste/ nor bu kun nas snang ba'i rgyan dang
132a5(phal chen): ldan pa'i spos kyi chu rgya mtsho'i bzhis ston to// spos kyi chu rgya mtsho nor bu kun nas snang ba'i bzhis rgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba de las pad mo chen po// sprin gyi rgyal mtshan khyer ba'i 'od
132a6(phal chen): zer dang ze ba sna tshogs zhes bya ba mngon par byung ste/ pad mo chen po de las 'jig rten gyis khams rgya mtsho'i bzhi dang / snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa kun nas gru bzhir 'dug
132a7(phal chen): pa/ rnam par dag pa shin du bstan pa/ rdo rje dang nor bu dang thams cad kyi khor yug gis bskor ba/ rim gyis gzhol bar gnas pa/ shing gi rgyud rgya mtsho la rab tu 'jug pa 'di 'dag
132a8(phal chen): go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mcho ga zhi dang snying po me tog gi brgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di nyid kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa'i phyogs
132b1(phal chen): 'di nyid brjod pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// shing rgyan me tog 'jig rten kham gyi rgya
132b2(phal chen): mcho de// rin chen kun gyi snying po kha dog sna tshogs ste// rdul rnams kun dang mnyam pa'i sngan chad sangs rgyas kyis// drung du sngon che rgya mtshor sbyangs pas dri ma med// rgya chen snying
132b3(phal chen): rje'i sprin gyi khams rnams kun bkang zhing // zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa'i las kyang kun bkang nas// sngon gyi bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod pa spyad pas na// 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i kham
132b4(phal chen): de yangs shing rnam par dag/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang bas smon lam che mdzad de// 'od snang steng bas na mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa ni// rlung gi dbang pos btab kyang mi skyod mi
132b5(phal chen): g.yo ste// nor bu kun rgyan sangs rgyas gzugs brnyen snying po'o// me tog mdzod kye gtor ba rin chen yid 'ong bzhin// sngon gyis smon lam dbang gis na mkha'i dbyings la gnas/
132b6(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i rgyan rnams thams cad sna tshogs bstan par gnas// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun gyis 'od kyi sprin kyang gtong // nor bu thams cad sgo nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam/
132b7(phal chen): byung zhing 'od zer sprin 'bar phyogs rnams kun du 'dong // 'od zer me tog mtshon dang 'od zer 'khor lo'i tshogs// phyogs rnams ma lus kun gyis chos dbyings khyab par
132b8(phal chen): byed// rin chen kun gyi 'od zer sprin rnams kye ba ni// phyogs rnams phyogs mtshams kun gyi zhing rnams khyab par byed// sbrul bsngal thams cad bcil zhing byang chub mchog la
133a1(phal chen): 'god// 'jig rten thams cad 'od 'phro rab tu 'bar// 'gro ba kun dang mnyam pa'i sprul pa sna tshogs rnams// rin chen kun dang spu rnams kun nas
133a2(phal chen): rgyal ba 'gyed// brgya byin dag dang tshangs pa'ang 'khor lo sgyur 'dra dang // 'gro ba kun gyi lus rnams kyang gnas// sprul pas 'od kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi tshad mnyam pa// 'od zer sgo
133a3(phal chen): nas sangs rgyas thams cad mtshan kyang sgrogs// 'gro ba ma lus kun gyis bsam pa tshim byas nas// tshul rnams sna tshogs sgo nas sems can rnam par 'dul// 'jig rten rgya mtsho
133a4(phal chen): me tog snying po de nang na// rdul phran kun gyi khongs na chos dbyings thams cad kyis// rin chen 'od kyi sangs rgyas sprin rnams 'bar bar snang // rnam par snang mdzad rnam 'phrul zhing la
133a5(phal chen): ltos// bskal pa rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal stsal byas te// smon lam yangs pa'i sprin ni chos kyi dbyings mnyam dang // bzang po'i spyod pa rnyes shing ye shes ldan pa yi// dgod
133a6(phal chen): pa las ni rgyan mdzes de dag byung ba yin// shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas pabal po che zhes bya ba las 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis rgyan pa'i
133a7(phal chen): yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su dag pas snang ba zhes bya ba ste le'u lnga pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig
133a8(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mcho ga ni dang // snying po me tog gis brgyan gyi brgyan pa'i 'khor yug chen po ni/ nor bu'i rgyal po pad mo nyi ma'i gzhil rtan pa ste/ nor bu'i rigs rgya mtsho spos kyi tsan
133b1(phal chen): dan thams cad las grub pa// nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan gyis yul thams cad kyi lhan shin du 'phags shing zil gyis gnon pa dang / nor bu spos zhim po'i gzi brjid kyi 'khor lo rnam
133b2(phal chen): par snang ba'i snying po can// nor bu'i rgyal po rdo rje sra shing mi shigs pa ltar shin du 'khregs shing sra ba/ rin po che'i chu thams cad kun nas 'byung ba rin po che'i shing gi nags tshal gyi
133b3(phal chen): rgyan thams cad me tog shin du rgyas pa/ spos kyi rtsi mchog bzang po thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ spos kyi me tog dpal can shin du bzang bas rnam par brgyan pa/ nor
133b4(phal chen): bu'i rgyal po 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dbyibs lta bu'i dra bas kun nas bris pa ste/ de dag la sogs pa rgyan bzang po'i rnam pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du
133b5(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyis rab tu rgyan pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos yang khor yug gi rgyan dang / yon tan yongs su dag pa 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi
133b6(phal chen): byin gyis rlabs kyi phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho gang yod pa// mtha' dang dbus med sna tshogs
133b7(phal chen): rnam pa can// nor bu mang pos rnam dag mtha' yas mdo// de dag sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pas 'byung // dri med khor yug rgyan gyis brgyan pa ni// nor bu mang po de bzhin spos
133b8(phal chen): mang dang // mu tig gsal ba'i tshogs la rab tu gnas// kha dog mtha' yas rin chen rnams kyi brtan// snying po nor bu'i sprin can sna tshogs sra// 'dzam bu chu klung 'od 'phro snying
134a1(phal chen): @po'i chogs// 'od 'phro dam pa phyogs su sdang zhing 'tsher// 'khor yug dri ma med par rnam par mdzes// nor bu rdo rjes 'dus byas shin dus shing bstan/
134a2(phal chen): mtshams rnams mi byed nor bu sna tshogs 'phrul// mtshan ldan nor bu rin chen rnams bkod pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis yongs su dag par snang // spos chus sprin gyis kha dog mtha' yas te/
134a3(phal chen): rin chen tsan dan me tog kun du bkram// pad mo sna tshogs gos kyi kun nas yog/ rin chen rtsi mchog dri zhim rnams dang ldan// sna tshogs shing gi sprin gyis kun nas rgyan// nor bzang
134a4(phal chen): kun nas gzi brjid 'bar// 'od zer sprin gyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can// gos kyi mtshon gyis shin du 'bar bar gnas// spos kyi 'od 'phro gdug pa gdug 'chang ba'i// byang chub
134a5(phal chen): sems dpa' mang pos chos dbyings gang // sgra dbyangs mang po rgya mtsho thams cad 'byin// 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad chos 'khor lo// rin chen mdzes pa de dag thams cad dang /
134a6(phal chen): nor bu dag dang kun nas 'od 'gro shing // kun la rnam par snang mdzad spun gsal ba// gzugs brnyan tshul du nang na yod pasnang // thams cad gzugs su sku rnams mtha' yas te/
134a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas sprul mang kha dog su med pas// thams cad phyogs dang cas kyis dbyis bkang ning // sems can mang po chad me rnam par 'dug// bams cing rgyal bas sgra byangs ku
134a8(phal chen): 'byung ste// rnam par snang mdzad smon lam 'khor lo yis// zhing rnams rgya mtsho yongs su dag byas pa// de kun de las rnam par 'phrul zhing grag/ shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/
134b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las 'jig rten gyi khor yug gi rgyad rgya mtsho shin du bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u drug pa'o// /
134b2(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'khor yug chen po de'i nang gi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i/ sa chen po bzhi nor bu mang po'i rgyan thams cad kyi rgyan pa/ rdo rje ltar 'khregs shing sra la bstan
134b3(phal chen): pa/ rin po che'i rigs thams cad las/ grub pa rgya mtshos rnam par phye ba mi shigs pa'i snying po can/ mi mtho mi dma' ba'i thang mnyam shing rnam par dag pa/ nor bu rin po che tham
134b4(phal chen): cad kyi kha dog dang 'od thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs lta bus nor bu'i gzugs sna tshogs kyis rab tu bsgrubs pa/ rin po che'i tshon
134b5(phal chen): thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i yid du 'ong ba'i pad mo thams cad kyis gzhi byas pa/ dmigs pa thams cad du sna tshogs su gyur pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/
134b6(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po mdzod thams cad gzhi mnyam par gdal ba/ nor bu'i rgyal po dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing gi rgyan gyi sprin gyi dra ba rnam par bris pa/ de bzhin
134b7(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi 'od dang / nor bu'i dra ba mig 'phrul gyis lta bus rnam par phye ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor de'i rgyan
134b8(phal chen): shin du bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba sbed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzhi'i rgyan/ rgya
135a1(phal chen): mtsho 'di nyid yongs su brjod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
135a2(phal chen): smras so// sa'i dkyil 'khor gzhi ni rnam dag mnyam// 'khor lo'i dra bas sgrubs pa mi shigs sra// rin chen sna tshogs mnyam pa'i gzhir gnas shing // rin chen sna tshogs kun gyi
135a3(phal chen): kun du yang // yid 'ongs ni rdo rje gser gyi gzhi// rin chen chu bo ri bo'i 'khor lo'i sgrubs// pad mo'i dkyil 'khor bzhi yin me tog sa// tsan dan bye ma rin chen kun du bkram// 'od
135a4(phal chen): zer sna tshogs rin chen me tog rnams// 'od 'phro 'gyed pas phyogs su sprin kyang 'bar// sangs rgyas 'od snang nor bu rnam par bkram// sa kun me tog yid du 'ong bas log/ thams
135a5(phal chen): cad smin ni phyogs na sdug lding bas// mi zad yangs pa kun nas khyabs par 'dug/ zhing rnams thams cad phyogs rnams kun bzang zhing // sangs rgyas chos ni snyen par rab tu sgrogs//
135a6(phal chen): rin chen nang snang sangs rgyas smon lam kun// shin du dus rang rtag tu kun du ston// sngan chad spyod pa ci 'dra spyod pa dang // kun kyang nor bu'i 'bru las gsal bar snang // de'i rgya mtsho
135a7(phal chen): nor bu sna tshogs ting // de'i nang na sangs rgyas spyod yul snang // sangs rgyas spyad pa de dag zhing gi rnams// rgya mtsho kun gyi rdul phran re rer snang // me tog snying po chen gyi 'khor los
135a8(phal chen): sgrubs// der ni byang chub sems dpa' dag 'dong zhing // byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam kun kyang sgrogs// snying po byang chub 'khor du rnam 'phrul lo// rin chen 'od zer 'od dang
135b1(phal chen): ldan pa dag/ sa'i nor bu'i rgyan las rab tu byung // sangs rgyas chos nyid 'di yang dag tu ston// chos dbyings na mkha' lta bu kun du 'gengs// sangs rgyas kun yul ye shes rgya chen dag/
135b2(phal chen): kun du bzang po'i smon lasus shes pa// de dag phyogs rnams rgya mtsho kun du yang // zhing rnams rgya mtsho dbyings kyi 'phrul pa 'byung // shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas pal po
135b3(phal chen): che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sa bzhi'i rgyan shin du brtan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bdun pa'o//
135b4(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzhi dkyil 'khor de la spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi brjod du med pa'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed yod do// de dag kun kyang gni rin
135b5(phal chen): po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po dang spos thams cad kyis rlung rab tu bsgrub pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po bzang zhing yid du 'ong ba 'od rnam par snang ba'i dra bas kun
135b6(phal chen): nas bris pa'o// rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang / mdog tu snang ba'i spos chus yongs su rgyas pa'o// rin po che thams cad kyi me tog sna tshogs glong du 'khyil ba'o// can dan
135b7(phal chen): gyi bye ma dang 'dres pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang smon lam rgya mtsho'i sgra 'byin pa'o// rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin rnam par
135b8(phal chen): snang ba'o// byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin me tog sna tshogs kyi/ kha dog dang dbyibs mtha' yas pa'i gdugs kyi khebs par rnam par 'phrul pas brgyan pa'o// dmigs pa
136a1(phal chen): @#thams cad la 'jig rten gyis khams rgya chen po thams cad snang ba'o// phyogs kun nas ni rin po che'i sems skas kyi phreng ba bcu rab tu bkye ba'o//
136a2(phal chen): mu tig rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i mu khyud kyis kun nas bskor ba'o// rin po che shel gyi rgyal mtshan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa bcus kun nas brgyan pa'o//
136a3(phal chen): 'di lta ste nor bu dang / me tog gi khang partsegs pa/ chu klung gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kha dog mtha' yas pa bcus kun nas bskor ba'o// 'di lta ste nor bu thams cad kyi pad mo
136a4(phal chen): yid du 'ong ba'i grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor ba'o// 'di lta ste nor bu rdo rje shin du sra ba gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis
