136a5(phal chen): rab tu bsgrubs pa'o// rin po che'i thams cad kyi me tog pun d+ha ri ka dang / spos kyi chus yongs su rgyas par kun nas bskor ba'o// 'di lta ste rin po che'i shing gi phreng ba rin po che
136a6(phal chen): 'bar shing kun nas 'phyang ba'i nor bu'i dra ba can gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyis khams kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor ba'o// tsan dan dang spos dang nor bu mang po sgra thams
136a7(phal chen): cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgyas rnam par snang bar byas pa/ chu klung gang gi'i klung gis bye ma snyed kyis 'gram shin du rgyan pa'o// 'di lta ste rin po che
136a8(phal chen): dang / gos dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu meng po thams cad kyi sgra byung bas/ rgyan shin du rgyas pa'o// rin po che yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu thams cad kyis/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
136b1(phal chen): brjod du med pas yongs su bskor ba'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos yang / spos chus rgya mtsho nor bu'i rgyan 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin
136b2(phal chen): gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sa ltengs de na spos kyi chu bo yi// rgya mtsho nor bu'i rgyan pa rnams brjod de// zhing rnams
136b3(phal chen): rin chen gos kyi lhun ting pa// mi shig rdo rje lta bu sra shing mdzes// spos dang nor bu'i rgyal po mang po dang // nyi ma'i nor bu 'od 'phro stag sprin dang // pad mo rin chen 'phreng ba'ang kun
136b4(phal chen): nas bres// zhing rnams dri med yid du 'ong ba'o// spos kyi chu yis yongs su rgyas pa ste// rin chen 'od zer sna tshogs me tog glong // sgra dbyangs rab tu stod pa'i dbyangs kyis kyang //
136b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu sgrogs// them skas phreng ba yid du 'od dang ldan// gzhi ni rin chen nor bu mang pos brgyan// stegs bu kun bkod rin chen pad mo yi// sprin
136b6(phal chen): sdug 'dra ba rnam par bres pa ste// rin chen nor bu'i shing gi phreng ba dag/ rin chen gser gyi kha dog yid 'ong 'bar// 'od kyi tshogs dang rol mo'i sgra dag kyang // rnam par 'phrul
136b7(phal chen): mang dbyangs su rab tu sgrogs// spos chus yongs gang rin chen sgrubs pa ste// me tog pun da ri kas kun nas skor// spos dang 'od dang gdug spos rab tu 'gyed// de dag 'od
136b8(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par yangs// rin chen rgyal mtshan mu tig 'bar ba can// gos dang nor bu sna tshogs kun 'phyang zhing // rin chen nor bu dril bu 'dri ba dag/ thams cad
137a1(phal chen): mkhyen par 'jug pa'i sgra yang sgrogs// pad mo'i grong khyer rnams kyi kun nas bskor// kha dog mtha' yas nor bus rnam par brgyan// phyogs nas
137a2(phal chen): kun nas mu tig sprin kye ba'i// grong khyer rgya mtshos de dag rab tu brgyan// dra ba bzang pos kun nas bskor ba ste// rin chen byas pa'i gzugs bzang khyim gyis rnams// rnam pa
137a3(phal chen): du mar 'bar zhing yid 'ong ba'i// rgya mtshos mdzes par rab tu brgyan// sngan chad rnam par snang mdzad kyis// sna tshogs rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams yongs sbyangs pa// shin du rgya chen
137a4(phal chen): mtha' dang dpung med pa// de dag kun na rnam par 'phrul pa byed// spos chu rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang spos chu'i chu klung g.yas// phyogs su 'khor zhing 'bab pa gling bzhi'i 'jig
137a5(phal chen): rten gyi khams rdul shin du phra ba bsnyed kyi 'khor byas pa ste// spos chu'i chu klung de dag thams cad kyang 'khor kun nas rdo rje pad mo'i kha dog dang / dri mtha' yas pas sgrubs pa'o//
137a6(phal chen): nor bu'i 'khor lo dang nor bu'i 'od rnam par dag pa sna tshogs kyi mtha' nas dkrigs pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bus rnam par
137a7(phal chen): byas pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin dang ldan pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs su sgrogs pa'i dril bu'i dra ba rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pas kun nas khebs pa'o// spyod
137a8(phal chen): pa'i 'od kyi klong sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi dbyibs lta bu 'byung ba'o// nong bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad nang na sdang shing 'od shin du 'bar ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyam tsho
137b1(phal chen): lta bur snang ba thams cad kyis shin du yogs par byas pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rnam par sdang ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul
137b2(phal chen): ba'i snying po me tog shin du rgyas pas kun nas khebs pa'o// dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan gyi 'khor lo dbyangs su sgrogs pa'o// spos kyi
137b3(phal chen): chu dang rin po che'i 'od 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'od dang / 'od zer gyi sprin rab tu snang ba ste/ chu klung de dag re re zhing yang rgyan shin du brtan pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du
137b4(phal chen): pra ba snyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos yang spos chu'i chu klung gi rgyan dang / yon tan rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis
137b5(phal chen): brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// chu klung dri ma med pa'i chu rgyas shing // gzhi ni nor bu rdo rje pad mos byas// rin chen mang
137b6(phal chen): sil bus bzhi bkram zhing // kun nas rgyan pa sna tshogs yid du 'ong // them skas phreng bas de dag kun nas skor// pad mo 'phyang ba'i mu khyud 'khor can de// me tog rgyan pa'i mu
137b7(phal chen): tig phreng ba dang // me tog lnga lding sna tshogs kun nas bres// nor bu'i chu bo spos chu 'byung ba ni// rin chen kun gyi kha dog mdog ltar 'bab// rin chen nor bu'i me tog mdzes par
137b8(phal chen): bkod// sil snyan sgra ni sangs rgyas gsung skad brjod// de dag rnyog pa nor bu zla ba ste// rin chen sna tshogs thams cad maspong ngo // phyogs rnams bcu po kun na rtag par yang // spos
138a1(phal chen): dang gdug pa 'od 'phro'i rgyad 'byung ngo // chu bo rnams las rin chen thams cad kyi// 'od zer 'phro ba kun du rab tu 'byung // me tog nor bu'i phung po'i/
138a2(phal chen): gdugs rnams kyang // rin chen kun gyi ze bu rab tu 'bar// phyogs bcu'i zhing gi gzugs brnyan mang po dang // sangs rgyas gzugs brnyad rin chen rnams las snang // rin chen
138a3(phal chen): 'khor lo'i gzhi rten yid 'ong nas// spos chus rgyas pa'i chu klung rnams kyang 'bab// rin chen gser gyi dril bu'i dra ba yis// yog cing sangs rgyas gsung du sgra sgrogs 'bab// rgyal
138a4(phal chen): ba kun gyi byang chub spyod pa dang // kun du bzang po'i spyod mchog rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas smon lam sgra dbyangs rnam pa dang // sangs rgyas thams cad sngon gyi sbyor ba dag/ rnam
138a5(phal chen): dag nor bu'i ngos dang ngogs kun nas// sgra rnams sgrogs pa kun nas rab tu snang // chu bo thams cad dbang klong dag las kyang // byang chub sems dpa'i sprin chen 'bar ba dag/
138a6(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings rnams rab tu rgyas byed pa// 'byam klas phyogs rnams kun nas rab tu snang // chu klung de dag dri med cing // nor bu'i rgyal po sprin gyis kun khyab pa// mdzod bu'i
138a7(phal chen): dpal dang sangs rgyas gzi brjid 'bar// nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas bstan na snang // spos chu'i chu klung de dag gi bar dag kyang sa sna tshogs la rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu
138a8(phal chen): brgyan pa ste// chu klung gi bar de dag re re zhing rin po che'i me tog pun da ri ka'i phreng ba/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul shin du phra ba sred kyi kun nas bskor ba'o// chu klung /
138b1(phal chen): gi bar de dag re re zhing yang rin po che shing gi phreng ba gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi bar du phye ba'o// shing gi gseb thams cad nas kyang brgyan thams cad kyi
138b2(phal chen): sprin rtag par rab tu 'byung ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i dpal 'byung ba'i sprin dang 'od rnams kyang rab tu 'byung ngo // shing gi bar de dag thams cad kyang shin du 'bar ba
138b3(phal chen): ste/ spos dang me tog sna tshogs kyis rab tu gang ba'o// nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam bskal pa thams cad du byin gyis rlobs pa'i sgra sgrogs pa'i sprin gyi yongs su
138b4(phal chen): gang ba'o// spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyis rnam par snang bar byed pa'i sprin gyis mngon par khyab par byed pa// spos kyi rgyal po yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par rgyas pa'o// nor bu'i
138b5(phal chen): rgyal po rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i kha dog yang dag par ston pas/ mnyam pa nyid du mngon par gang ba'o// gos kyi tshogs sna tshogs kyi sprin lta bus mngon par yog pa'o// nor
138b6(phal chen): bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin gyis yog par byed pas rnam par rgyan pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od kyis mngon par
138b7(phal chen): gang ba'o// nor bu'i rgyal po sems can thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa rgya mtsho'i gzugs brnyan shin du ston pas rgyas pa de// de dag la sogs pa chu klung gi bar de dag re re
138b8(phal chen): zhing shin du bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos yang spos chu'i chu klung gi bar gyi rgyan yongs su dag brgya
139a1(phal chen): b.lang @#mtsho 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// chu
139a2(phal chen): klung bar dag shin du rnam par dag/ rin chen rgyan can gser gyi rnam par bris// yal ga me tog sprin rnams phyang lding ba'i/ shing gi phreng bas kun nas mngon par khyab// shing gi yal
139a3(phal chen): ga'i dkyil 'khor sgo dag nas// rin chen mang po'i sprin rnams kun kyang 'byung // me tog 'od mang rin chen snying po can// phyogs rnams kun sgor 'gro ba khyab par byed// gzhi rnams
139a4(phal chen): nor bu mngon par bkram pa ste// me tog rnams bris rin chen 'bru dang ldan// kun nas rin chen sprin gyi khyab pa ste// rgyan dang sems can thams cad gzugs brnyan snang // sangs
139a5(phal chen): rgyas 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po yis// sa rnams thams cad kun nas rnam par dag/ phyogs rnams thams cad 'bar shing snang ba'i sprin// rdul phran kun la gzugs brnyan gyur par
139a6(phal chen): snang // nor bu'i rgyan gyis shin tu rnam par rgyas// mu tig gsal ba'i dra bas rnam par phye// nor bu'i 'khor lo kun nas rab tu bkod// kun nas rgyal ba rnam 'phrul bar snang /
139a7(phal chen): 'byas klas 'od zer ldan pa'i rin chen gyis// sangs rgyas sprul pa bgyi ba kun na snang // sangs rgyas mang pos phyogs rnams kun khyab cing // stobs bcu mnga' ba'i chos nyid rab tu
139a8(phal chen): sgrogs// rin chen sna tshogs pun d+ha ri ka yis// chu rnams kun rgyas snying po nor bu spos// de las mi zad 'od zer rgya mtsho rnams// rab tu byung ba'i pad mo sna tshogs byung // dus rnams gsu
139b1(phal chen): de'i rgyan rnams thams cad kyang // nor bu de dag 'bru'i nang na ste// 'byung ba med cing bzung ba'ang yod pa ma yin// de ni sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu// rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad
139b2(phal chen): thams cad du// rgyan dang sprul pa thams cad rab tu 'gyed// sngan chad sangs rgyas smon lam mthu dag gis// de dag 'gro zhing 'ong bar snang ba med// rdul rnams rgya mtsho thams cad
139b3(phal chen): dag la yang // rgyal sras thams cad spyad pa rab spyod de// rang gi zhing dang lung bstan sa'i rnams// bsam pa rnam dag tshul bzhin mthong // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sangs rgyas bcom
139b4(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin du bstan pa ni bsam gyi sa mi khyab ste// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang
139b5(phal chen): snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i dmigs pa dag la yang dmigs pa re re zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan dang / rgyan shin du bstan pa rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshon
139b6(phal chen): rdul shin du phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag cing yon tan mtha' dang dbus med pas/
139b7(phal chen): yon tan rnam par dag pa'i rgyan shin du bstan pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongasu bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa
139b8(phal chen): 'di dag smras so// zhing gi rgya mtsho 'di rnams thams cad kyang // rin chen rgyan chen 'od zer gnas pa ste// sdug cing gsal ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog/ rin chen thams cad 'od kyang rnam
140a1(phal chen): @par 'bar// mu tig nor bu'i sprin mang zad mi shes// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan phyogs su rnam par snang // zhing na yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams/
140a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rtag tu ston pa byed// sangs rgyas gsung gi sprin ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste// nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad snyan par sgrogs// rnam par snang mdzad sngon gyi
140a3(phal chen): spyod pa rnams// rin chen rnams las rtag par snang zhing grag/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dri med 'od// rgyan rnams thams cad nang na rnam par snang // 'khor rnams gzugs
140a4(phal chen): bstan mtshan nyid 'chang ba dang // sprul pa rnams kyis zhing gis rgya mtsho gang // sangs rgyas sprul pa rnams ni sgyu ma 'dra// de dag la ni byon pa gang yang med// sangs rgyas yul rnams byin
140a5(phal chen): gyis rlabs pa yi// zhing rnams kun nas sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul// zhing rnams 'byam klas par ni rnam 'phral zhing // ci snyed zhing du de dag kun rgyu ba// de dag nor bu kun la rab tu snang //
140a6(phal chen): de ltar zhing gi rgya mtsho rnam par sbyangs// sprul pa rnams ni mig yor 'dra ba ste// thams cad dag na chos nyid 'di yang snang // 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad spyod yul te// smon lam rnam/
140a7(phal chen): par 'phrul las byung ba'o// bzang po'i spyod pas gang rnams byung gyur pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' shes mchog rgya mtsho can// de dag rdul phran kun la rang rang gi// rang gi ning rnams
140a8(phal chen): rgya mtsho dag par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi na 'bring du// bskal pa bye ba rgya chen bsam las su// de dag spyod yul thams cad mthong bas na// skad cig sems pa de dag pas/
140b1(phal chen): cad ston// zhing rnams mnyam med 'byung ba med pa ste// de dag mkha' 'dra mnyam nyid mtshan nyid med// smon lam stobs kyis kun tu gnas pa ste// sems can rnams la phan phyir rab
140b2(phal chen): tu sbyangs// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dgod pa shin du bstan pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag 'jig rten gyi khams kyi spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs
140b3(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed pa de dag la 'jig rten gyis khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed pa rab tu gnas te/
140b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing du brjod du med pa'i phra snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba'o// 'jig rten gyi kham
140b5(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa de dag thams cad kyang gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/ dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan du 'dug pa// phyogs gzhan dang gzhan la lta ba// rnam pa gzhan dang
140b6(phal chen): gzhan gyis 'dug pa// rgyan gzhan dang gzhan yod pa// gzhan dang gzhan gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa// gzhan dang gzhan du 'dug pa// rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du ma 'dres
140b7(phal chen): pa// rnam par 'phrul pa dang byin gyis rlabs// gzhan dang gzhan yod pa dag ste// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni pad chen
140b8(phal chen): rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni rin po che'i kha dog mtha' yas pa'i me tog rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi
141a1(phal chen): la @#khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni rin po che'i phreng ba mu tig gi 'bru'i snying po can gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams
141a2(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni spos chu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni me tog thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so//
141a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che'i dra ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni 'od zer gyi rgya mtsho klong du gyur pa'i
141a4(phal chen): tshul la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i nor bu'i cod pan sna tshogs kyi rgyan la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi
141a5(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni sems can gyi lus sna tshogs rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
141a6(phal chen): gsung nor bu'i rgyal po la rab tu gnas so// de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa'i gnas shin du bstan pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du/
141a7(phal chen): za ba rnyed do// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyang dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan du 'dug pa sha stag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni ri bar gyi
141a8(phal chen): dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni chu klung gi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni kun du 'khor ba'i dbyibs lnga
141b1(phal chen): bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni kun nas 'khyil ba'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni 'khor lo'i dbyibs lta bu'o//
141b2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni mig mangs ris kyis dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni shing gi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten
141b3(phal chen): gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten
141b4(phal chen): gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni phyogs 'byam klas pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni khang pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi kham
141b5(phal chen): 'byam klas pa la la ni pad mo dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni rta babs kyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni
141b6(phal chen): sems can gyi lus kyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni sprin gyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni sangs rgyas
141b7(phal chen): kyi mtshan gyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni dri sna
141b8(phal chen): tshogs skye ba'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni sgo kun na yod pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni dmigs pa
142a1(phal chen): la@cad kyi dbyibs lta bu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa'i dbyibs rnam par phye ba shin du bstan
142a2(phal chen): pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tshul de dag ni lhun gzhan dang gzhan du bstan pa ste/ 'jig
142a3(phal chen): rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni phyogs thams cad kyi nor bu'i sprin gyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la ni 'od kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la
142a4(phal chen): ni rin po che dang spos 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi me tog kha dog pa las bsgrubs pa'i lhun can no//
142a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi lhan can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi lhun can no//
142a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni rin po che'i 'od kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas kyi kha dog gi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khas
142a7(phal chen): kyi tshul la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog gi 'od lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sems can thams cad kyis bsod nams rgya mtsho yang dag par
142a8(phal chen): 'byung ba'i sgra'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sems can thams cad las rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung ba'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
142b1(phal chen): tshul la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad las rgya mtsho yong dag pa'i sgra'i lhun no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni byang chub
142b2(phal chen): sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho sgra'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas kyi tshul thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i sgra'i lhun can no// 'jig
142b3(phal chen): rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni zhing gi rgyan thams cad 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i sgra'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung dang dbyangs mtha'
142b4(phal chen): dang dpung med pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i sgra'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni seMs
142b5(phal chen): can thams cad kyi dge ba 'byung ba'i sgra'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la lnga ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan yongs su dag pa'i sgra'i lhun can no// kye rgyal ba'i
142b6(phal chen): sras dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi rgyud 'byam klas pa'i tshul lus 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du
142b7(phal chen): bzang po'i yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'byam klas pa'i tshul gyi lus rnam par dgod pa shin du brtan pa 'di nyid gsal bar brjod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi phyon
142b8(phal chen): bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing gi rgyud rgyan shin du brtan par grub// dri med dri bral 'od 'byed snying po can// nor bu pad mo rgya mtsho kun la/
143a1(phal chen): @#gnas// la la gang ga'i rgya mtsho dag la gnas// rnam pa sna tshogs tshul gyis gzhi gnas shing // dbyibs dang sna tshogs kha dog gzugs kyang /
143a2(phal chen): mang // ri rab grong khyer shing gi dkyil 'khor dang // zhing rgyud thams cad la la phyogs su lta// la la 'od lus me tog snying po can// nor bus byas pa kun nas sprin dang chu// la
143a3(phal chen): la'i rgyud gsal mu tig 'od zer lus// nor bu'i gzhi gnas kun kyang mi shig sra// 'byam klas la la kha dog sna tshogs gsal// 'od 'dra 'od 'phro me mar sprin gyi mdog/ la le'i
143a4(phal chen): rgyud ni sgra dang skad kyi lus// de dag sangs rgyas gsung dbyangs mtha' yas 'byung // la la'i rgyud ni smon lam sgra'i lus// spyod pa rnam 'phrul sprin gyi sgra'i lus// la la bsod nams
143a5(phal chen): yangs dang las kyi sgra// la lI lus ni rgyal ba'i yon tan sgra// zhing gi rgyud rnams rgya mtsho bsam yas par// kun nas mi zad du ma'i sgo nas 'jug/ rnam 'phrul yang pa mi zad rgyan
143a6(phal chen): gyi rnams// tshad med kun gyi phyogs su rgyas par 'gyengs// phyogs rnams kun du zhing rnams 'du 'gyur te// yangs pa'i tshul gyi zhing gi rgyud zhugs pa// phyogs bcu kun du 'du
143a7(phal chen): bar snang ba yangs// 'gro ba med pa cing 'jug pa yod pa min// chul cig gis ni rgyud rnams kun kyang 'gengs// thams cad ma lus re rer rab tu 'du// de la ba dang gang yang mi
143a8(phal chen): dmigs te// gni med kun 'gengs mtha' dang dbus yang med// ning rnams chul gyi rgyud la nas 'phrul ba// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kun nas snang // smon las sma ni rtswa ni
143b1(phal chen): rab brjod cing // zhing gi dbyings ni sems can kun kyang 'dul// zhing rnams sangs rgyas sku'i kun khyab snang // bsam gyi mi khyab byang chub sems dpa' gang // sangs rgyas rnam
143b2(phal chen): 'phrul mi mnyam ston cing // sems can mang po tshad med rnam par 'dul// / shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las zhing gi rgyud kyi gnas
143b3(phal chen): shin du bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u brgyad pa// / bam po dgu pa'o// /
143b4(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho'i dbyibs de na/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho mig 'phrul gyi rnam pas rnam par phye ba/ gzhi kun la rab tu gnas pa ni sangs
143b5(phal chen): kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la gangs chen mtsho'i dbyings kyi spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi
143b6(phal chen): nang na/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho dbus man ze ba yid du 'ong zhing 'od zer mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba ste/ de'i nang nas nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus rnam par dmig
143b7(phal chen): ba'i gzugs brnyan gyi rgyal mtshan gyi pad mo chen po gzhi spos dang / nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rgya can zhes bya ba mngon par byung ste/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams
143b8(phal chen): kyi rgyud phyogs kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ dmigs
144a1(phal chen): @#pa thams cad kyi rgyan gyis rgyan pa'i lhun can rab tu gnas pa/ de dag las thams cad kyi 'og sa ni dpal 'byung ba'i 'od zer rnam par snang ba'i zhes/
144a2(phal chen): bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams te/ de ni rdo rje thams cad kyi rgyan dang 'od kyi 'khor lo'i mtshams/ nor bu rin po che'i ze ba mang po rab tu gnas pa/ nor bu'i 'khor thams cad dang rin po
144a3(phal chen): che'i me tog gi 'khor thams cad kyi rab tu yog par gyur pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi bskor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang gzhan dang
144a4(phal chen): gzhan la gnas pa rgyan gzhan dang gzhan can dag ste/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshul rnam par dag cing dri ma med pa'i mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi kham
144a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos sna tshogs kyis/ pad mo dpal gyi rgyan ces bya ba rgyan thams cad kyis mtshams can rin po che'i pad mos tu
144a6(phal chen): / shin du gnas pa/ seng ge'i khri'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ mu tig gi 'bru rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i bla re'i sprin kun nas yog pa/ kun nas nyon mongs zhing rnam par
144a7(phal chen): dag pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi zhing gnyis kyis rdul shin du za bsnyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'od zer mchog gi 'od ces bya ba
144a8(phal chen): bzhugs so// de'i steng sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan du snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/
144b1(phal chen): spos kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis mtshams rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba sna tshogs la rab tu gnas pa/ nor bu'i 'khor lo'i gzi brjid bzang po'i nyi ma'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/
144b2(phal chen): yan lag brgyad du dma' ba'i dbyibs can/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum gyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs
144b3(phal chen): pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dri ma med pa'i ye shes kyi dpal gyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra ba snyed
144b4(phal chen): shin du 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi mtshams can/ kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i rdo rje drag
144b5(phal chen): rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rin po che'i pad mo rab tu gnas pa/ rdo rje'i 'od zer dang rin po che 'bar ba mtha' yas pas/ snang ba'i 'od kyi nor bu'i rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis kun nas
144b6(phal chen): yog par gcig du dag pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bzhi'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis 'khor gyis skor ba yod de/ de na de gshegs pa rdo rje'i 'od zer stobs
144b7(phal chen): dang brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra ba rnyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten
144b8(phal chen): gyi khams 'od shin du bkye ba'i me tog sil ma'i 'khor lo// zhes bya ba rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu'i dra ba'i rgyan gyis 'tshams can shing dang nags tshal gyis rgyan thams cad
145a1(phal chen): 2@#'byung ba'i rin po che'i 'khor lo mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas/ phyogs thams cad nas gra du ma'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po tshangs
145a2(phal chen): pa'i dbyangs su sgrogs pas kun nas yog pa/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing lha'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis 'khor gyi skor ba
145a3(phal chen): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi 'od zer dga' ba'i stobs rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed
145a4(phal chen): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba sna tshogs kyi rnam pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing
145a5(phal chen): kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che shi la'i rgyal mtshan gyis 'tshams can/ rdo rje'i khyim gzhal med khang rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ kun nas gru bzhi pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/
145a6(phal chen): 'khor lo nor bu gtsug gi bla res sprin gyis kun du yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun du snang ba'i 'od kyi dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig
145a7(phal chen): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan gyi 'od zer me tog shin du rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba/ 'jig rten
145a8(phal chen): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ning bdun gyi dul shin du ma bskyed kyi 'khor gyi bskor ba/ gcig tu dag gakhang brtsegs pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ me tog pad mo sna tshogs kyi rgyan
145b1(phal chen): gyis 'tshams can// rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer dang rin po che kha dog rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ kha dog thams cad kyi gos dang / mu tig dang stegs bus kun nas yog pa yod de/
145b2(phal chen): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i rgya mtsho'i shugs dang / yon tan grags pa'i dbang phyug 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
145b3(phal chen): gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag par 'byung ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi
145b4(phal chen): 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po sgra thams cad stong pa'i rgyan gyis 'tshams can/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i pad mo
145b5(phal chen): la 'dug cing na mkha'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa mig 'phrul gyi dbyibs lta bur 'dug pa/ 'od kyi me tog gi dra ba'i sprin kha dog mtha' yas pa'i kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de
145b6(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa grags brgya chen po'i ye shes rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das
145b7(phal chen): pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgra dbyangs rab tu sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi bskor ba/ rnam par dag
145b8(phal chen): cing kun nas nyon mongs pa rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i 'khor lo'i shing gi rgyan gyis 'tshams can/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad kyi sprin 'bar ba'i sgra'i rgya mtsho bzhi la rab tu/
146a1(phal chen): gnas pa/ tshangs pa'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ seng ge'i khri'i sprin rin po che yid du 'ong ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyan can gyis kun nas yog
146a2(phal chen): pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi gzi brjid thub pa med pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed
146a3(phal chen): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi skor ba gcig tu dag ba rgyan
146a4(phal chen): mtha' yas pa dang / mu tig gi 'bru rab tu 'phyang ba dang / rin po che phreng ba'i rgyan gyis 'tshams can/ rin po che'i seng ge'i rgyan dang mu tig gi rgyan thams cad kyis/ rgyan pa'i
146a5(phal chen): nor bu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ kun du zum pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ spos dang nor bu dang me tog sna tshogs kyi sprin bcus/ rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi kun nas yog
146a6(phal chen): pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyis shin du 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng gi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyis
146a7(phal chen): zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mdog rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu cig gi rdul shin du phra ba
146a8(phal chen): snyed kyi 'khor gyi bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ rdo rje ltar mi shig shing sra ba'i sa 'tshams can/ me tog sna tshogs rnam pa mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu
146b1(phal chen): gnas pa/ zla ba khams pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i bla res kun na yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i yon tan chos nyid tshad med pa
146b2(phal chen): zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba'i mdog ces bya ba/ 'jig rten
146b3(phal chen): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gnyis kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ 'od zer gyi rgyan kun nas snang ba'i sa
146b4(phal chen): 'tshams can/ spos kyi chu'i mtshe me tog gi glong can gyi gang chen mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ me tog 'khyil ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ gos sna tshogs kyis kun nas
146b5(phal chen): yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbang po dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba 'das
146b6(phal chen): pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gsum gyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs
146b7(phal chen): ba rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i sa 'tshams can rlung gi dkyil 'khor kha dog sna tshogs can gyis shin du gzung ba/ pad mo'i dra ba la rab tu gnas pa/ kun nas zlum po'i dbyibs
146b8(phal chen): su gnas pa/ na mkha'i lha'i khang pa can gyis rgyan pa 'di yod de/ de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'di bzhags so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i steng 'jin
147a1(phal chen): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du za ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mnyam la rdul med pa'i 'od ces bya bas/ 'jig
147a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bzhi'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis skor ba rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyis 'tshams can/
147a3(phal chen): rin po che'i gos sna tshogs kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa rdo rje'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rdo rje'i sprin kha dog mtha' yas pas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
147a4(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings shin du 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od
147a5(phal chen): sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i mar me zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcwo lnga'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba cig tu dag pa/ rgyan mang po thams
147a6(phal chen): cad kyi bla re'i sa 'tshams can/ me tog gi dra ba'i rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs dpal gyi be'u ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i shing dang spos chu'i sprin rgya mtshos
147a7(phal chen): kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs la thub pa med pas kun nas snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
147a8(phal chen): gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'gro ba snang ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyis khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu drug gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed
147b1(phal chen): kyi 'khor gyis skor ba nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che mi zad pa 'byed pa'i sa 'tshams can/ spos dang 'od 'phro ba'i sna tshogs can gyi pad mo'i rgya mtsho
147b2(phal chen): la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs rus thal gyi mgo bo ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang ba'i 'khor lo'i tsan dan gyis sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/
147b3(phal chen): de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi nyi ma dri ma med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na//
147b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyis rab tu rgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bdun gyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi
147b5(phal chen): bskor ba rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ dbyibs sems can thams cad kyi lus ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan gyis sa 'tshams can/ nor bu'i rgyal po
147b6(phal chen): 'od kyi snying po 'byung ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs yan lag brgyad du 'dug pa/ khor yug thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyan dang shing gi dra bas kun nas yog pa
147b7(phal chen): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa med pa'i ye shes phyogs kun du rnam par snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi
147b8(phal chen): zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcwo brgyad kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi
148a1(phal chen): 'khor gyis bskor ba cig du dag ga rgyan gyi rnam par thams cad kyis sa 'tshams can/ me tog gi seng ge'i khri'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/
148a2(phal chen): dbyibs mu tig gi phreng ba skyil ba ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad kyi spos kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
148a3(phal chen): ba dpal tshad med pa'i tshul dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig
148a4(phal chen): rten gyi khams phyogs yongs su dag cing snang ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu dgu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas
148a5(phal chen): nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i sprin mi zad pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i sa 'tshams can/ spos dang 'od 'phro ba'i kha dog mtha' yas pa ri rab
148a6(phal chen): kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa dbyibs nor bu'i ze ba 'khyil ba ltar 'dag pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po dbang po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'bar ba kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu 'bar ba'i
148a7(phal chen): sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings dang na mkha' kun du snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
148a8(phal chen): kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che 'od 'phro ba 'khyil ba'i dpal yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
148b1(phal chen): kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ cig tu rnam par dag pa rin po che'i nyi zla rnam par snang ba'i sa 'tshams can/ dbyibs lha'i dbang po thams cad ltar 'dug
148b2(phal chen): pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rgyan gyi rnam pa du ma dang rin po che sna tshogs thams cad dang / rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ nor bu'i sgron
148b3(phal chen): ma'i 'bru'i dra bas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan bsod nams kyi sprin gyis kun nas shin du 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so// 'jig
148b4(phal chen): rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs kun nas rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba de ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa gzhan dang gzhan la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyib
148b5(phal chen): gzhan dang gzhan du 'dug pa/ lhun gzhan dang gzhan can/ phyogs 'byam klas pa gzhan dang gzhan la lta ba/ rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis 'jug pa/ rgyan gzhan dang
148b6(phal chen): gzhan can gyis rgyas par 'gyengs pa/ gzhan dang gzhan du yongs su 'du ba/ gzhan dang gzhan gyis rnam par ma 'dres pa/ rnam par 'phrul pa dang byin gyis bslabs gzhan
148b7(phal chen): ngang gzhan can te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba ste/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas bskor ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing
148b8(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba sbed kyi kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chu klung sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o//
149a1(phal chen): @#'jig rten gyi khams kun nas bskor ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas 'khyil pa sangs rgyas kyi
149a2(phal chen): zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor lo sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed
149a3(phal chen): dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phung pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed
149a4(phal chen): dang / 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs 'byam klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khang pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed
149a5(phal chen): dang / 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdal shin du phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khyad khyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang / 'jig
149a6(phal chen): rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sems can sna tshogs kyi gzugs dang / lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
149a7(phal chen): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
149a8(phal chen): dra ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pas la mon par lta ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du
149b1(phal chen): phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dmigs pa thams cad kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kun nas yongs su bskor/
149b2(phal chen): ba ste/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam klas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su
149b3(phal chen): bskor ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis/
149b4(phal chen): kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed pa de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi kham
149b5(phal chen): 'byam klas pa'i rnam par gdags pa shin du bstan pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed do// spos chu'i rgya mtsho ze ba mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer yid du 'ong ba
149b6(phal chen): zhes bya ba chu klung gi 'khor dang bcas pa/ chu klung gi klong dang bcas pa'i khongs na 'dug go// spos chu'i rgya mtsho ze ba mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer yid du 'ong ba de dag 'dab
149b7(phal chen): chags su shar phyogs logs na/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho gangs chen mtshe dri ma med pa'i 'od zer gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi zhing kun nas
149b8(phal chen): 'khyil ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba thos dang rin pa tshe'i rgyal po thams cad la rab tu gnas pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i pad mo la rab tu gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'am
150a1(phal chen): @#mtsho mngon par sgrub pa'i nga ro'i lhun can yod do// de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi kham khyim gyis rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i mtshan ces bya ba
150a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams kyis 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyis gangs tsho la rab tu gnas pa/
150a3(phal chen): 'khor kun nas gru bzhir 'dug pa/ pad mo 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal rnam par snang ba'i mdzod spu'i 'od ces bya ba
150a4(phal chen): bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ze ba'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten
150a5(phal chen): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnyis kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi ze ba rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs kun nas
150a6(phal chen): dkyil 'khor du 'dug pa/ mu tig gi grong khyer dpal gyi seng ge'i khri'i sprin gyi kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i
150a7(phal chen): blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sprul pa'i spos zhim po dpal gyi
150a8(phal chen): dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum gyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che
150b1(phal chen): thams cad kyi rgyan dang dril bu'i dra ba rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa rdo rje'i dbyib ltar 'dug pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de nas de bzhin
150b2(phal chen): gshegs pa chos kyi mtshan nyid sprul pa med par kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/
150b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams bzhi'i kha dog dang 'od yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhi'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis skor ba cig tu dag pa/
150b4(phal chen): spos chu kha dog mtha' yas pa rin po che'i tshon dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs nor bu'i 'khor lo ltar 'dug pa/ mu tig gnyi ma'i tshul kun du snang ba'i 'od kyi khang
150b5(phal chen): pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor legs par 'byung ba rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams
150b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba'i las kyis khyab pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul shin du phra
150b7(phal chen): ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ spos dang rdo rje'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ pad mo'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ 'od zer rdul
150b8(phal chen): dang bral ba dang / spos kyi chu'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs chos kyi shugs kyis rgyas pa mi zad pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng
151a1(phal chen): bal@#'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor ces bya/
151a2(phal chen): kha 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi rten
151a3(phal chen): par sgrubs pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ zur gsum pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i nor bu'i cod pan gyis 'od dang 'od zer gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/
151a4(phal chen): de na la rab tu gnas pa/ mkhar gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa snying po byang chub kyi me tog rin po che shin du rgyas pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
151a5(phal chen): ba rin po che'i sgron ma kun du snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhags so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdal shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
151a6(phal chen): rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer 'khor la zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gsum gyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa/ rin po
151a7(phal chen): che'i gos klong gi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa me tog gi ze ba 'khyil ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi gsungs dang / dbyangs sgrogs pa'i sprin gyis
151a8(phal chen): kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'bar ba'i pad mo nom par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi dul
151b1(phal chen): shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i snying pos sgrub pa dam pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bzhi'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi
151b2(phal chen): 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ rin po che'i phreng ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ gling bzhi'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rin po che'i 'od 'phro
151b3(phal chen): ba rab tu stug po 'byung po'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams mi zad pa'i me tog shin du rgyas pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so// /
151b4(phal chen): de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me long mdog ltar rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams
151b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco lnga'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rdo rje'i pad mo rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ lha ma yin
151b6(phal chen): gyi lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi mig yor gyi sprin rin po che'i cod pan rab tu 'bar ba'i lus can gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de
151b7(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa'i stobs bdud ci'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du za ba snyed 'das pa na
151b8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan mchog ltar yid du 'ong bzla bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu drug gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyis bskor
152a1(phal chen): ba gcig tu dag pa/ rdo rje' ltar 'khregs pa'i tsan dan rin po che'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ yan lag brgyad du rnam par dkod pa'i dbyibs ltar
152a2(phal chen): 'dug pa/ mu tig gi me tog mang po shin du rgyas pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos dam pa thugs su chud pas shin du 'phags
152a3(phal chen): ba'i dpal gyis gzi brjid yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
152a4(phal chen): khams gzhi dri ma med cing kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bdun gyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis 'khor gyi bskor ba kun nas nyon mongs shing
152a5(phal chen): rnam par dag pa/ rin po che'i 'od kha dog mtha' yas pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ spos chu'i glong gi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ dri zhim po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis sprin gyis
152a6(phal chen): kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kun du gsal ba'i dbyangs na mkha' rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
152a7(phal chen): kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi mdog bzang pos rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcwo brgyad
152a8(phal chen): kyi rdul shin du za bsnyed kyi latshar kyis bskor ga rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ me tog sa tshogs kyi rgya mtshal rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas dran pa'i grong gi kyi
152b1(phal chen): su 'dug pa/ sil snyen gyi sgra dbyangs thams cad 'byung ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun du zhal ston pas/ shin du 'phag
152b2(phal chen): pa'i cod ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i
152b3(phal chen): dpal gyi dbyangs zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu dgu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis 'khor gyis bskor ba rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ gser
152b4(phal chen): gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa seng ge'i khri'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ seng ge'i khri' pad mo kha dog sna tshogs kyi snying po can sprin gyis kan nas yog pa yod de/
152b5(phal chen): de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mu med par snang bas grags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed
152b6(phal chen): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dpal gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba
152b7(phal chen): gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che 'gos dang spos kyi rgyal mtshan rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi phyag gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma'i
152b8(phal chen): 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par snang ba'i khang partsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi sgron ma na mkha' kun du snang ba
153a1(phal chen): bzhugs so// de dang 'dab chags su lho phyogs logs na/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho'i 'og kyi dkyil 'khor mi zad par 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de/
153a2(phal chen): la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi rgyal mtshan gyi gtsug rnam par bres pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i lhun can rab tu gnas so// de dag
153a3(phal chen): thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog yid du 'ong ba snang ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i lus su sprul pa'i sprin gyis kun
153a4(phal chen): nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zhal mthong na dga' ba pad mo snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul
153a5(phal chen): shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan 'thun par bres par rgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri rab sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhug so// /
153a6(phal chen): de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan gyi 'od rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu snang ba zhes bya ba
153a7(phal chen): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings shin du sprul pa'i dbyangs kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul
153a8(phal chen): shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi snying po rdo rje'i rgyan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer rdo rje rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs kyi yan
153b1(phal chen): lag sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so// gzhung de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba dri ma med pa kun du snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi kham
153b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i pad mos rgyan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun
153b3(phal chen): gyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa pad ma'i rgyan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ zla ba kam pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/
153b4(phal chen): rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan rnam par dag pa'i me tog gi dpal zhes bya ba
153b5(phal chen): bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro ba'i dbyangs dri ma med pas
153b6(phal chen): yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam
153b7(phal chen): par dag pa/ rin po che'i 'od mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rin po che rims kyi gzhol ba'i 'od 'phro ba snang ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rtag tu spos kyi char
153b8(phal chen): 'bebs pa'i lus sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs la thub pa med pa'i blo gros shin du 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
154a1(phal chen): de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du za ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i 'od bzang po zhes bya/
154a2(phal chen): ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ning dgu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa rin po che'i gos kyi rgyal mtshan
154a3(phal chen): gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dga' ba 'khyil ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ me tog thams cad kyi rgyan gyi bla re'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
154a4(phal chen): pa na mkha' yangs pa'i spyan zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
154a5(phal chen): dbyangs rdul dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi
154a6(phal chen): chu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ mig 'phrul gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ sil snyan thams cad kyi sgra dang nor bu'i rgyal po'i gdugs kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod
154a7(phal chen): de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser shin du 'bar ba'i ri rab mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed
154a8(phal chen): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i kha dog gis rgyan pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gcig gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis
154b1(phal chen): bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ brgya byin gyi khams kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ nyi mi'i sprul pa'i me
154b2(phal chen): tog rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyis kun na yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal shin du 'phags pas chos kyi dbyings su rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhug
154b3(phal chen): so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po gser gyi kha dog ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi
154b4(phal chen): khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gnyis kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho/
154b5(phal chen): de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams rnyog pa med pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus kyi stobs la thub pa med pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// /
154b6(phal chen): de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i pad mos rab tu brgyan pas/ shin du dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi grong khyer gyi blo gros rab tu
154b7(phal chen): sgrogs pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba skyed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcur snyen pa rnam par
154b8(phal chen): grags pa'i ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi dri ma dang bral ba'i dra ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'od zer
155a1(phal chen): yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nags tshal gyi rgyal mtshan rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba
155a2(phal chen): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi me tog pad mo kun du rgyas pa'i snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan du mas rgyan pa zhes bya ba
155a3(phal chen): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan gyis kun du khyab pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che las sgrubs
155a4(phal chen): pa'i rgyan kun du snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros dam pa bzang po'i ded dpon zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
155a5(phal chen): gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ze ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad pa zla ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhags so// de'i steng
155a6(phal chen): na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mdzod dri ma med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs/
155a7(phal chen): ba rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so// gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od kyi lhun can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
155a8(phal chen): shegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stobs na mkha'i sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i glog gi phreng ba rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/
155b1(phal chen): de na de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad du bsod nams rgya mtsho'i mtshan nyid gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'khor lo'i mtshon
155b2(phal chen): gyis kun du khyab pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa thams cad rnam par 'dul bas dga' ba mdzad pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi
155b3(phal chen): khams rin po che'i ze ba yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa chen po dang yon tan yangs pa'i dbyangs rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhag so// /
155b4(phal chen): de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis kun du/ brgyan pas mdzes pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes pa ye shes ma 'dres pa'i 'od
155b5(phal chen): zer yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdal shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zad pa'i rgyal
155b6(phal chen): mtshan ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi/ 'khor gyis bskor ba cig tu dag pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi chu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu
155b7(phal chen): gnas pa/ pad mo'i rgyan gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po pad mo snang ba'i bla re'i dra bas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa/
155b8(phal chen): dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhagaso// de'i lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rdo rje dpal gyis rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi
156a1(phal chen): khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtshan gyi 'khor lo rjes su sgrogs pa'i lus
156a2(phal chen): can du rab tu gnas te/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba/ pad mo rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du
156a3(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi bskor ba gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i chu'i klong rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rin po che'i go cha dang mdzod spu'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/
156a4(phal chen): rgyan gyi dmigs pa dang khang partsegs pa thams cad kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rnam par dag pa'i 'od bya ba bzhug so// de'i steng na
156a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid 'od 'phro ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
156a6(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa la chags pa'i 'od kyi blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so// gzhung de bzhin du steng gi na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'khor lo bzhi mnyam pa'i rgyan ces
156a7(phal chen): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 'od zer kun du 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan gyi shing gi ze ba'i rgyal mtshan ces
156a8(phal chen): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa thams cad rnam par dag pas gti mug med pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
156b1(phal chen): kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par shin du phye ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zhal mthong na dga' ba yangs pa skye ba/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs thugs su/
156b2(phal chen): chud pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od srab pa'i rgyan rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings la rnam par rol
156b3(phal chen): ba'i ye shes shin du yangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog dbyibs mu med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye
156b4(phal chen): shes thogs pa med pa yang dag par 'byung ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro ba'i sprin stug po'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de/
156b5(phal chen): de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrogs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs yongs su
156b6(phal chen): dag pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs yongs su sbyangs pa'i mtshan gyi me tog shin du rgyas pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so//
156b7(phal chen): de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba shin du 'byam klas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i spyan chags pa med pa ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng
156b8(phal chen): na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rngan brtan pa bsgrub pas/ dpal rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/
157a1(phal chen): @de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings la ye shes kyi sku shin du 'phags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs
157a2(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs shin du rgyan pa rmongs pa med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu mkhas pa'i sgron ma
157a3(phal chen): rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo'i nags tshal zab mo'i sgra zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyis
157a4(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa zab mo rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog dang 'od tha dad pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gsheg
157a5(phal chen): pa kun du snang ba'i me tog gi sprin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhug so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i sgo sna tshogs kyi rgyan mtshan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
157a6(phal chen): gshegs pa yon tan kun nas mchog tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i mdzod spu'i sgrubs pa'i ze ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na
157a7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs rab tu sgrogs pa'i gsung zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shugs zab mo'i gang chen mtsho zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
157a8(phal chen): bzhi gshegs pa ra bar phyogs su gas pa pas semam sa kyi rkyen kyi rgyam pa ldang ba nas bya bathus so// na lagi gyi mas ri mtshan mo
157b1(phal chen): 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa'i ye shes mchog gis chos kyi dbyings la mngon par 'phags pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'dzin
157b2(phal chen): rten gyi khams gser gyi pad mo dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dri ma med pa'i mdzod kun nas snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i sted
157b3(phal chen): na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i sgrubs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi
157b4(phal chen): zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa/ rgyan dang spos dang nor bu dang / shing thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa dbyibs dpal gyi be'u
157b5(phal chen): ltar 'dug pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kun du 'byung bas sprul pa'i tshe'i dra ba rnam par snang ba'i
157b6(phal chen): dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de nas lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che in tra ni las rab tu rgyan pa'i brgyan zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
157b7(phal chen): snang bas phyogs rnam par snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba spos thams cad kyis rab tu rgyan pa'i brgyan gyis pad mo'i sprin la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang gsung mtha'
157b8(phal chen): dbus med pa'i lhun can mngon par 'byung ba yod de/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan gyi mdzod phyogs su mi zad pa'i mdzod 'khor zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi
158a1(phal chen): khas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa rin po che thams cad kyi mdzod kha dog mtha' yas pa'i
158a2(phal chen): rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ zur du ma'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ rgyan mig 'phrul lta bu thams cad kyi kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad par
158a3(phal chen): mo'o spyan rnam par snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba'i
158a4(phal chen): tshogs kyi rab tu grol ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i seng ge'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs
158a5(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo'i bdan yongs su byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings su dpal gyi
158a6(phal chen): 'od zer 'jam klas pas rnam par snang ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sgra mnyam par sgrogs pa
158a7(phal chen): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan shin du rgya che ba'i grags pas kun du khyab pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu rdo rje ltar ban
158a8(phal chen): ba'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma ltar shin du 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu
158b1(phal chen): rdo rje ltar brtan pa'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug ye shes kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhug so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mtshon
158b2(phal chen): gyi 'khor lo'i gzhi dang snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba yangs pa'i dri ma med pa'i 'od tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na
158b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams sgra sna tshogs kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs chen po'i dpal bzang po'i de dpon zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na
158b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams lta na don yod pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyis stobs ri rab kyi zi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig
158b5(phal chen): rten gyi khams tshad med pa'i rgyan dang dbyibs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i zla smon lam gyi tshul gyi 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs so// /
158b6(phal chen): / bam po bcu pa'o// // gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi
158b7(phal chen): khams me tog sna tshogs rab tu kye ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho smon lam rab tu sgrogs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
158b8(phal chen): de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyi klong gi rgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rin po che'i mtshan gyi yang dag par rgyan
159a1(phal chen): @pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sra ba shing mi shigs pa'i gzhi yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na
159a2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa sgra dbyangs kyi gsung snyan pa dam pa'i lha zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi thams cad nas 'od kyi sprul pa bzang po zhes bya
159a3(phal chen): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus zhi ba mchog gi blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugaso// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams brgyan shin du srung bas spyod pa zhes pa
159a4(phal chen): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba mngon sum du dga' bar lta ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams in tra ni la dang tsan dan gyi snying po zhes
159a5(phal chen): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi skal bar zab pa'i 'od zer snang ba/ bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhags so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kha
159a6(phal chen): dog rgya mtsho sna tshogs ston pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun du 'od rab tu 'gyed pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don mngon par mdzes pa zhes bya ba bzhug
159a7(phal chen): so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur sprul pa shin du 'bar ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi gzi brjid ngam pa mnyam pa med
159a8(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi sprin gyi rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shugs kyi 'od tshangs pa'i spyan zhes bya ba
159b1(phal chen): bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi kham/
159b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa spos dang nor bu'i char kha dog mtha' yas pa 'bebs pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/
159b3(phal chen): kun nas zlum pa rgyan dang thems pa mang pos kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba brtson 'grus nyi ma'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so// de nas
159b4(phal chen): lho phyogs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rdo rje rten pas sgrub pas bzhi'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud/ mig 'phrul rnam par phye ba'i dra ba zhes bya ba/
159b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i ye shes thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i dbyangs kyi lhan can yod de/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams/ pad ma'i dra
159b6(phal chen): ba 'khor lo'i sprin zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi bskor ba gcig tu dag pa/ man shel gyi me tog sna tshogs kyi rgya mtsho
159b7(phal chen): la brten pa/ ri rab kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad yul mig 'phrul lta bu'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
159b8(phal chen): ba chos kyi sku kun nas rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so// gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer phra mo'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na
160a1(phal chen): @#de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dang chos kyi dbyings mu med pa'i gsung zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shing dang me tog
160a2(phal chen): bar gyur pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dang chos kyi dbyings mu med pa'i gsung zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mu
160a3(phal chen): tig gi yog pa'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i pha rol tu phyin pas/ rnam par sgyings pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams
160a4(phal chen): mtha' yas pa'i 'khor lo dbyangs rab tu gtong ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus shin du thugs su chud pa'i blo
160a5(phal chen): gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shing mdzes pa'i phung po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs par 'gro ba
160a6(phal chen): mngon du ston pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams seng ge'i dpal gyi 'od dra ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od dri ma med pa nyi
160a7(phal chen): ma'i 'di 'phro ba'i sprin zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi dul shin du phra ba skyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che rnam
160a8(phal chen): bar bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po dam pa'i blo gros kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gni sdang zhing dri ma med
160b1(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po dam pa'i bla gras mthu stobs dri ma med pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
160b2(phal chen): kyi yon tan dang sngags pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha' lta bur mtshan nyid kun du rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba
160b3(phal chen): bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro ba mthon po'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i sprul pa rgya chen po'i sprin gyi rgyal
160b4(phal chen): mtshan ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams snying po rgyan pa'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa med par mkhas pas
160b5(phal chen): spyod pa rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po
160b6(phal chen): tshe thams cad kyi rgyan gyi rlong rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la/ thugs rtse ba'i rnam par thar pa mngon par
160b7(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams khyim dga' bas rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
160b8(phal chen): gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa'i ri rab ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rdul shin du phra ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gsheg
161a1(phal chen): la @#pa mnyam pa dang / rnam par rig pa dang mthong na don song ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog dang nor bu mang
161a2(phal chen): po'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul
161a3(phal chen): shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgo kun nas lta ba'i sprin gyi snying po zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi
161a4(phal chen): 'khor gyis bskor ba cig tu dag pa/ lus dang khyim sna tshogs kyi spos kyi chu bo la rab tu gnas pa/ rnam par rgyal ba rab tu phye ba'i khang pa rtsegs pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/
161a5(phal chen): rin po che thams cad kyi sgron ma'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rang 'byung dam pa'i sa dang mngon par shes pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
161a6(phal chen): de'i phyogs logs na/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho pad mo'i dra ba'i dbang po shin du rgyas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs kun du yongs su gzhol
161a7(phal chen): ba'i 'od ces bya ba spos dang / rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ pang mo la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul gyi 'od dang dbyibs
161a8(phal chen): kyi lhun can mngon par byung ste/ de thams cad kyi 'od na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgya mtsho/ sems can gangs chen mtsho'i 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs
161b1(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba bsnyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba cig tu dag pa/ mu tig gi sbubs su dbyibs lta bur 'dug pa/ nor bu thams cad kyi phreng ba skyil ba'i rgya mtsho la/
161b2(phal chen): rab tu gnas pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs kyi sprin rab tu snang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni sprin gyis kun yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa
161b3(phal chen): rnam par snang ba dam pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi
161b4(phal chen): dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs tshad med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mdzes par
161b5(phal chen): snang ba'i mtshon gyis 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i dbyangs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten
161b6(phal chen): gyi khams dbyangs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i 'od zang po rab tu kyang pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams
