187a4(phal chen): rigs kyi bu dag sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi pha rol de bas kyang pha snga'i dus de'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tshul dri ma med par
187a5(phal chen): phyogs kun du snang ba zhes bya ba'i dbus su// 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba de na rin po che'i pad mo mang po'i rgya mtsho
187a6(phal chen): la rab tu gnas pa/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas zlum pa'i dbyibs su 'dug
187a7(phal chen): pa gzhi rgyan mtha' yas pas brgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis shing gis khor yug rgya phrag gsum gyi kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi kun nas yog pa/
187a8(phal chen): ri rab dang grong khyer dang / khang khyim dri ma med pas 'od rnam par dag pas snang bas brgyan pa/ zas dang skom dang gos kyi longs spyod yid kyi bsam pas 'byung ba/ rgyan gyis rnam
187b1(phal chen): par brjod pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa zhig ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba de'i dbus na/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'od rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de las me tog ri
187b2(phal chen): rab me tog 'od 'phro ba'i rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan ces bya ba rin po che'i khri 'phangs bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor cing rgyan pa zhig byung ste/ ri rab de'i steng na nags tshal chen po yal ga'i
187b3(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba/ spos kyi rgyal mtshan stong phrag dpag tu med pa shin du sgreng ba'i rgyan can/ tog gi khang brtsegs pa dpag tu med pa'i phreng
187b4(phal chen): ba rnam par bres pa/ nor bu'i khang pa rtsegs rnam par bkod pa// rin po che'i rdo'i rgyal mtshan dpag tu med pas kun nas rgyan pa/ rin po'i che'i me tog pun da ri ka dpag
187b5(phal chen): tu med pa'i 'phreng bas kun nas bskor ba spos dang / rin po che pad mo mang po dpag tu med pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ rol mo'i sna tshogs kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba'i sprin dpag tu
187b6(phal chen): med pas kun du rgyas pa/ spos dang gdug pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i dpal du med pas kun du gang bar byas pa/ grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag bcu/ sems can sna tshogs snang bas
187b7(phal chen): kun nas skor ba te/ 'di lta ste nag tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de'i shar phyogs logs na/ grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro snang ba zhes bya ba'i
187b8(phal chen): ma'i rgyal po'i gnas/ grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rin po che 'ba' zhig las byas pa/ chu dang zheng du dpag tshad stong phrag bdun yod pa/
188a1(phal chen): @rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing thags dang 'bru sa'i rab bdun gyis brgyan cing kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i 'obs spos kyi chus gang ba/ rin po che'i
188a2(phal chen): me tog ud pa la dang / pad mo dang ku mu ta dang / me tog pun da ri ka rnam par brgyan pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ shing ta la'i phreng ba rgyan sna tshogs kyis tshogs mang po 'byin pa
188a3(phal chen): bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i rgyan dang khang pa rtsegs pas rab tu brgyan pa/ steng nas gser gyi dra ba dril bu'i dra ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba'i dra ba dang / in dra ni la'i dra ba dang /
188a4(phal chen): rdo rje pad mo'i dra bas kun nas yog pa/ rin po che'i shing drung me tog gi dra ba dang / rol mo'i sgra mang po thams cad kyi sprin yid du 'ong bas kun du khyab pa/ spos dang phreng ba'i rgyan sna
188a5(phal chen): tshogs kyis brgyan pa yod de/ de'i khor yug na sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu yod de/ sgo de dag thams cad kyi byas pa ste/ sgo de dag re re'i bdun na yang rin po che rdo'i
188a6(phal chen): rgyal mtshan rgyan thams cad kyis rgyan pa bdun bdun gyis brgyan pa'o// bza' shing gi ra ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kyang kun nas skor ba ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba de
188a7(phal chen): dag thams cad kyang / spos dang rin po che'i shing sna tshogs kun nas spos kyi dri kun du 'byung ba/ bya sna tshogs thams cad yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa'o// grong khyer 'od 'gro
188a8(phal chen): sprin ces bya ba der mir skyes pa thams cad kyang las kyi rnam par smin pas rdzu 'phrul thob pa dag ste/ na mkha' las rgyu ba mi dang lha mnyam du spyod pa/ yid bzhin gyi yul la
188b1(phal chen): longs spyod pa sha stag go/ de nas lho'i phyogs logs na grong khyer shing gi me tog sna tshogs pa shes bya ba yod de/ de nas lho phyogs na klu'i grong khyer kun du rdzogs pa zhes bya ba
188b2(phal chen): yod de/ de nas lho phyogs logs na/ gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer rdo rje'i dpal sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod do/ de nas lho phyogs logs na dri zi'i grong khyer gzhal med
188b3(phal chen): khang bzang po zhes bya ba yod do// de dang 'dab chags su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer 'khor lo'i mtshon ces bya ba yod do// de 'dab chags su 'dab ma bzang po'i grong khyer rin po che sna
188b4(phal chen): chogs bzang po'i lte ba zhes bya ba yod do// de dang 'dab chags su bram ze'i grong khyer rgyan bzang po sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod do// de dag la sogs pa grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya
188b5(phal chen): stong phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'o// grong khyer de dag re re zhing yang rgyan mang po du mas rgyan pa nas/ grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong gis 'khor gyis bskor ba'i bA da ste/
188b6(phal chen): nags tshal chen po yul ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa de'i dbus na/ snying po byang chub rin po che'i me tog rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing gi
188b7(phal chen): lal gsug cing rgya che ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rgyas pas kun nas bskor ba/ rin ma che'i me tog gzugs dang dbyings rnam pa pa dad pa mang ba shin du rgyas pa/ zlos dang mang mer
188b8(phal chen): po che thams cad kyis kha dog lta bur 'dug pa'i phreng ba mang po rgya chen po'i sprin kun du bkram pa rin po che'i 'od thur du 'phros pas zhing kun du khyab pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par
189a1(phal chen): dag pa'i sprin gyis rgyan pa/ phyogs bcu 'od zer mang pos rnam par snang bar byas pa/ rgyan thams cad rin po che sna tshogs mang pos sbas pa/ rol mo
189a2(phal chen): thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs kun du 'byung ba/ nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad las byang chub sems dpa'i lus byung ba/ phyogs bcur me tog sna tshogs mang po rab tu byung ba yod de/ de'i
189a3(phal chen): mdun dpad mo chen po me tog gi ze ba 'od 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba/ rgyar dpag tshad bye ba phrag rgya yod pa/ rtsa ba spos dang rin po che dang / rdo rje'i rgya mtsho la zugs pa/ chu ba
189a4(phal chen): rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshon gyi rnam par sna tshogs su gyur pa/ rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa/ tshad med pa'i 'dab ma can/ rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba dang / spos kyi ze ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis rgyan
189a5(phal chen): pa/ snying po la rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i mtshon kye ba/ pad mo 'di dkyil 'khor brjod du med pa/ bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis skor ba/ phyogs bcur
189a6(phal chen): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po rab tu 'gyed pa/ ze ba thams cad las yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba mngon par 'byung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba der/ de bzhin gshegs
189a7(phal chen): pa ri rab bcu'i rdul shin du phra bsnyed ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab bcu'i rdul shin du za ba snyed de dag las bskal pa'i thog mar thams cad kyi thog mar/ bla na med pa yang dag par
189a8(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ni yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo'i ri rab kyi dbyangs zhes bya ba ste/ nges 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tshul dri ma med par
189b1(phal chen): phyogs kya snang ba zhes bya ba di yos su rgyas s+ho// rgyal pa'i mas dga' garte kyigyi khams dpas kyi nas bya ba dang rgyan de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba/ nas bya
189b2(phal chen): nags tshal chen po'i mal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de yang rgyan thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan par gyur te/ 'di ltar rin po che'i 'od 'gro ba'i smin bsam
189b3(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa rab tu stong pa'i snying po can du gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra yang rab tu 'byin/ phyogs bcu dag kyang 'od zer gyi dra bas rnam par byed/
189b4(phal chen): gzhal med khang dang kham khyim gyi rdal thams cad kyang rab tu snang bar byed/ rin po che'i me tog dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin kyang rab tu 'gyed/ sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi
189b5(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs pa'i sgra dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo rab tu gtong ba'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon
189b6(phal chen): lam dang spyod pa dang / 'byung ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'i tshigs sna tshogs rab tu spags pa'i sgra dag rab tu 'byin te//
189b7(phal chen): de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba'i lngas te/ rkyen de dag byung bas 'jig rten gyi khams derang de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams kyis khong du chud do//
189b8(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa las snyan pa'i dge pa'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa dang / sangs rgyas lta bar mos pa dang / snying po byang chub du mngon par gnol ba de dag thams cad kyang kas sngon
190a1(phal chen): @#du byung bas yang dag par skul lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ba'i ri rab kyi dpal zhes bya ba mnyam pa nyid kyis
190a2(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kun du khyab pa'i sku can sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yongs su skye ba rab tu 'bros pa/ sku snying po byang chub thams cad la bzhugs pa/ gzugs kyi sku mtha' dang
190a3(phal chen): dbus med pa rnam par dag pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'phags shing zil gyis mnon pa/ mtshan rin po che'i me tog thams cad shin du rgyas pa/ sems can
190a4(phal chen): thams cad kyi gnas su gzugs bstan rab tu 'byung ba 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du ston pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sprin gyi dra bas rab tu 'gyed pa/ 'jig
190a5(phal chen): rten gyi khams thams cad 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis khyab par mdzad pa/ 'od zer gyi dra ba kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu stong pa de pad mo la mngon par byung bar gyur to//
190a6(phal chen): ltar spos chu'i rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa'i 'od la rab tu gnas pa'i ri rab me tog gi 'od 'gro bas brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan gser shin du 'bar ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i rtse mo la nags tshal
190a7(phal chen): chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog shin du rgyas par sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par de bzhin du 'jig rten gyis khams/ dpal gyi sgra kun yang ri rab bye ba stong
190a8(phal chen): zag drug bcu rtsa brgyad kyis rtse mo la bzhugs par kun du snang ngo // 'jig rten gyi rgyamatsho kun du chul rgya che ba kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du ma/
190b1(phal chen): bsnyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dag gi gling bzhi pa thams cad na'ang snying po byang chub la bzhugs par snang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan
190b2(phal chen): thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi snying po sprin gyis smin 'tshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bskyed pa zhes bya ba 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin
190b3(phal chen): da pra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba rab tu skye ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par mdzad nas 'dul ba thams cad yang dag pa bskal to// bcom ldan 'das de
190b4(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi sprin gyi sprin gyi 'od zer de dag rab tu kye ma thag tu/ de'i mod la sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang rab tu
190b5(phal chen): zhi bar 'gyur/ sgribs pa'i dra ba thams cad shin du brtsal/ sangs rgyas blta ba la sgribs pa'i ri thams cad kyang rnam par bcom/ sems can thams cad kyi rnyog pa yang rnam par
190b6(phal chen): dag/ dge ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyang rab tu byung / mos pa yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor yang yongs su dag/ mi khoms pa dang ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i yangs dang 'jig pa thams
190b7(phal chen): cad kyang rnam par brtsal/ lus dang sems kyi gnod pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhi/ sangs rgyas mthong bas dga' ba'i shugs kyang rnam par dag/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dga'
190b8(phal chen): ba'i shugs kyang shin du thob par gyur te/ de dag 'od zer des yang dag par bskul ba dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad 'khor rgya stong du ma dag gis bskor cing / bcom ldan
191a1(phal chen): @#'das gang na ba der dong bar gyur to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro ba'i 'od ces bya ba 'dir/ rgyal po ldan dga' ba shin du cang
191a2(phal chen): ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bcu'i bdag po byung ste/ de la bud med bsod nams kyi dpal la sogs pa stong phrag sum bcu rtsa bdun yod do// de la bu
191a3(phal chen): gzi brjid chen po la sogs lnga brgya yod do// rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen po la yang bud med lta na bzang ba la sogs pa stong phrag bcu yod do// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid
191a4(phal chen): chen pos sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rgyus chos bcu khong du chud par gyur to// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi dkyil
191a5(phal chen): 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin khong du chud do// 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings la sgo nas rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin khong du chud do// 'di lta ste tshul yangs
191a6(phal chen): pa'i sprin gyi snying po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khong du chud do// 'di lta ste 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i byams pa khong du chud do// 'di lta ste smra'i
191a7(phal chen): gyis kun nas rgyas pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i snying po chen po khong du chud do// 'di lta ste yon tan mtha' dang dbus med par yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i dga' ba chen po khong du
191a8(phal chen): chung do// 'di lta ste chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i btang snyoms chen po khong du chud do// 'di lta ste tshul gyi gzhi chen po rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mngon
191b1(phal chen): par shes pa chen po khong du chud do// 'di la sde mos pa rgya mtsho'i stobs shugs dang ldan pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i smon lam gyi sgo chen po khong du chud do// 'di lta
191b2(phal chen): ste thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi 'od yang dag par gzhol ba'i shugs zhes bya ba'i tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i ye shes chen po'i sgo khong du chud do// de nas rgyal du
191b3(phal chen): gzhon nu gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba de chos kyi snang ba chen po thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis/ 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
191b4(phal chen): nyi ma mang po stong gi rnams// mkha' la mngon par 'phags pa bzhin// snying po byang chub dri med la// sangs rgyas 'od ni shin du snang // bskal bye ba stong dag gi/ mgon po
191b5(phal chen): 'jig rten byung ba ni// sangs rgyas yang dag skyes pa rnams// rgyal ba kun na rab tu snang // sngos shig sangs rgyas gsung ni bsam mi khyab// gnas rnams kun na kun kyang
191b6(phal chen): snang // de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam par bzhag/ 'od 'phro sprin rnams rab bye ba// 'od zer sprin la zad mi shes// 'jig rten 'di dag snang bar byed// sangs rgyas rnam
191b7(phal chen): par 'phrul la ltos// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku dag las// 'od zer rnams ni dri med pa// sems can kun dang mnyam pa'i lus// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rgyas
191b8(phal chen): 'gengs ltos// sangs rgyas gsung ni yid 'ong ba// 'gro ba kun du rab tu sgrogs// 'gro kun dbyangs kyi yan lag tu// sangs rgyas yon tan rnam par brjod// sangs
192a1(phal chen): bal rgyas 'od kyis phog pa yis// sems can kun kyang bde bar 'gyur// sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi// 'gro ba kun kyang dga' ba skyes//
192a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sprin gyi rnams// rin chen sprin rnams rab 'byed cing // stong pa'i sprin gyi rgyal ba'i drung // phyogs bcu kun nas mngon par 'ong // snying po byang chub
192a3(phal chen): 'ang la yang // sgra'i rgya mtsho zab mo grag/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal zhi// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos// kun kyang sri zhu ldan gyur te// dga' shing shin
192a4(phal chen): du mos byas te// chos kyi rgyal po lta ba'i phyir// 'jig rten mgon pa'i drung du 'dong // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di
192a5(phal chen): brjod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra thams cad kyi sems can gyi gnas kun du shin du grags par gyur to// de nas rgyal
192a6(phal chen): po lta na dga' ba shin du gtsang ba'i blo gros kyis/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas dga' ba chen po skyes te/ rang gi 'khor de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ nang blon
192a7(phal chen): rnams dang gzhon nu dang // rgyal po'i mi dang blon po dang // tshong pa rnams dang de bzhin du// yul mi rnams kyang kun 'dus shig/ grong khyer rnams ni kun du yang // rnga sgra dag
192a8(phal chen): gis myur du sgrogs// kun kyang 'thun par lhan cig tu// rgyal ba lta ba phyir deng shig/ srang rnams thams cad kun du yang // dge ba'i cong gis sgras khang shig/ bu dang chung ma
192b1(phal chen): 'khor bcas pa// rgyal ba lta ba'i phyir yang 'deng // grong khyer rnams kyang brgyan par gyis// rgyan rnams kun kyang kun du res// rgyal mtshan dam pa bzang po rnams// nor bu sna tshogs
192b2(phal chen): rgyan pas sgreng // rin chen dra ba'i bla re rnams// nam mkha'i dkyil du bre bar gyis// nam mkha' 'di las thams cad du// sil sran sprin gyi sgra dag 'byung // lam gyi srang yang rgyan par
192b3(phal chen): gyis// rin chen char yang kun du po ba// gzhon pa rin chen sten par gyis// rgyal ba lta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo // rang rang so so'i 'khor rnams kyi// sna tshogs sprin gyi char phob shig
192b4(phal chen): rgyan gyi sprin rnams thams cad kyis// na mkha'i dbyings kyang dag par gyis// spos dang pad mo'i 'od kyi sprin// me tog gdugs bsam yas dang // sen mo do dang phreng phrin dang /
192b5(phal chen): gos kyi sprin gyi char phob shig/ ri rab rnams dang spos kyi ri// nor bu 'khor los rgyan par gyis// dri med tsan dan phye ma rnams// nam mkha'i dkyil na rab tu bston// nor bu'i phreng
192b6(phal chen): dang me tog dang // rin chen phreng dang dri med dang // rin chen sgron ma'i sprin gyi rnams// nam mkha'i dbyings las sgrub par gyis// thams cad sangs rgyas mngon gyis la// dga'
192b7(phal chen): zhing spro ba'i sems skyed la/ bu dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams// rgyal ba lta phyir kun deng ngo // de nas rgyal po lhan dga' ba shin du rtsang ba'i bdag po bsod nams dpal la sog
192b8(phal chen): pa bud med stong phrag sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / gzi brjid chen po la sogs pa gzhon nu lnga brgya dang / blo gros kyi stobs la sogs pa blon po stong phrag drug bcu dang / de dag la sog
193a1(phal chen): pa 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bdun gyi skor cing mdun du gdar te/ grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro snang ba nas byung nas/ de'i 'khor dang bcas pa nas/
193a2(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings su mngon par 'phags te/ rgyal po'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen pos na mkha'i rgyan gyi sprin thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan te/ bcom ldan 'das gang
193a3(phal chen): na ba der dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// lha'i grong khyer shing gi me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba nas kyang / lha'i dbang
193a4(phal chen): po rab 'tshe ma'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba lnga bye ba khrag khrag brgya stong dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas
193a5(phal chen): phyogs cig tu 'khod do// klu'i grong khyer kun du rdzogs pa nas kyang / klu'i rgyal po bcu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba kla bye ba nyi shu rtsa lnga dang lhan cig/ gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer rdo rje'i
193a6(phal chen): dpal ces bya ba nas kyang / gnod sbyin gyi bdag po dpal bas rgyal ba zhes bya ba gnod sbyin bye ba bdun bcu rtsa bdun dang lhan cig dri za'i grong khyer gzhal med bzang po nas kyang dri za'i
193a7(phal chen): rgyal po ldan dga' ba zhes bya ba/ dri za bye ba dgu bcu rtsa bdun dang lhan cig/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer 'khor lo'i mtshon nas kyang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzugs rnam par dag
193a8(phal chen): ba las sems pa zhes bya ba/ lha ma yin bye ba stong phrag lnga brgya'i 'khor gyis bskor ba/ namakha' lding gi grong khyer rin po che sna tshogs bzang po'i lte ba nas kyang nam mkha' lding gi
193b1(phal chen): bdag po stobs bcu spyod pa zhes bya ba na mkha' lding gi 'khor dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang lhan cig/ mi 'am ci'i grong khyer rtse ba'i dga' ba dang ldan pa nas kyang mi 'am ci'i rdo rje'i dpal zhes
193b2(phal chen): bya ba mi 'am ci bye ba phrag bcwo brgyad dang lhan cig/ lto 'phye chen po'i grong khyer rin po rdo rje sra ba'i rgyal mtshan nas kyang / lho phye chen po'i dbang po'i rin po che grags pa'i rgyal mtshan ces
193b3(phal chen): ces bya ba/ lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gsum dang lhan cig tshangs pa'i grong khyer brgyan bzang po sna tshogs nas kyang / tshangs pa'i dbang po gzhan gyi pham pa med pa
193b4(phal chen): zhes bya ba phrag bcwo brgyad kyis 'khor gyis bskor cing mdun du byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi ri/ ri rab kyi dpal de bzhin gshegs pa gang na ba der dong
193b5(phal chen): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de dag la sogs pa grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grong khyer gyis 'khor dang
193b6(phal chen): bcas pa dag nas sems can ris tha dad pa na gnas pa'i rgyal po mang po 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas phyog
193b7(phal chen): gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri rab dpal gyis/ sems can de dag 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste/ 'khor gyi
193b8(phal chen): dkyil 'khor gyi rgya mtsho der dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i/ cho 'phrul zhes bya ba mdo'i 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul/ shin du phra ba snyed dang bcas
194a1(phal chen): pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ sems can rnams la yongs su bstan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos chos kyi gzhung 'di
194a2(phal chen): bstan pa thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri rab kyi dpal gyis/ sngon yang dag par sgrub pa'i chos rgya mtsho la chos kyis snang ba rab tu thob bo// /
194a3(phal chen): 'di lta ste chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob po// 'di lta ste thogs chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang chub
194a4(phal chen): kyi sems la gnas pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob po// 'di lta ste chos kyi dbyings rnam par snang ba'i snying po'i mig rnam par dag pa la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob po// 'di lta ste
194a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu snang zhing rnam par dbye ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob po// 'di lta ste yon tan chen po rgya mtsho mtha'
194a6(phal chen): dang dbus med pa rnam par dag pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob po// 'di lta ste sgo yangs pa nas snang ba zab mo yang dag par 'byung ba rgya
194a7(phal chen): mtshol ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di sas phyir mi ldog pa'i stobs chen po'i shugs kyi snying po dang / mthu chen po'i rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste chos
194a8(phal chen): kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med par sprul pas/ brgyan cing 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho tshad med par rab
194b1(phal chen): tu 'jug pa la mngon par sgrub pa rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par dmigs shing / mos pa rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rgyan yang dag par
194b2(phal chen): sgrub pa rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa dang mnyam par de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba dang / 'gro
194b3(phal chen): ba thams cad mngon sum du bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang mi 'jig pa thams
194b4(phal chen): cad la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob po// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri/ ri rab kyi dpal gyi sngon
194b5(phal chen): gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal ba'i chos nyid 'di thos nas/
194b6(phal chen): bdag gis ye shes snang ba skyes// des ni sangs rgyas sngon spyod pa// rgya mtsho rnams kyang rab tu mthong // sku tshe kun du ji lta bar// phun sum tshogs gyur kun kyang mthong //
194b7(phal chen): mtshan gyi rnam pa rnams dmigs dang // gang gis sangs rgyas mchod pa'ang shes// sngan chad sangs rgyas drung dag tu// bskal pa rgya mtsho spyod spyad de// sangs rgyas rgya man
194b8(phal chen): mang mchod nas// zhing ga rgya mtsho yongs su sbyangs// sku'i rgya mtsho mang po dag/ rgya chen yongs su kun bkang zhing // spyod pa'i dam pa rab spyad de// rgya mtsho'i zhing yang shin
195a1(phal chen): @#du sbyangs// sman dang shangs med rgya mtsho dang // phyag zhabs dbu yang de bzhin de// rgyal srid btsun mo'i 'khor gtang zhing // zhing gi rgya mtsho yongs
195a2(phal chen): su sbyangs// zhing rnams so so'i re re la// bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas su// byang chub spyod pa rab spyad de// zhing gi rgya mtsho yongs su sbyangs// kun du bzang po'i smon lam gyi// spyod
195a3(phal chen): ba rgya mtsho kun spyad nas// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho kun drung du// zhing gi rgya mtsho rab tu sbyangs// ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od snang bas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba bzhin// sangs rgyas
195a4(phal chen): ye shes 'od snang bas// sngon gyi spyod pa rnams kyang mthong // byang chub 'tshang rgya zhi ba yis// chos kyi dbyings ni kun gang ba'i// zhing gi rgya mtsho dag pa rnams// dri med 'od
195a5(phal chen): can kun kyang mthong // byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// zhing gi rgya mtsho yangs pa rnams// de ltar bdag gis spyad par bya// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de'i tshe byang chub sems
195a6(phal chen): dpa' gzi brjid chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri/ ri rab kyi dpal gyi sprin de mthong ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang mchod pas de
195a7(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa las mngon par khong du chud de// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ni sdang bar byed// sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho ni rab tu brjod/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya
195a8(phal chen): mchu'i rdul ni rab tu zlog/ sangs rgyas thams cad ni yon tan rgya mche'i tshul ni shin du brjod// chos kyi dbying sa thams cad yang dag par gnas pa'i ye shes kyi sgo yongs su myam
195b1(phal chen): pa ni shin du ston// snying po byang chub thams cad la mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni rab tu brjod// sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang mi snyed pa dang // ye shes tha mi dad pa ni shin
195b2(phal chen): du brjod// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs shing mthong ba ni rab tu brjod// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa ni shin du ston/ sangs
195b3(phal chen): rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa mtha' dbus med pa'i rgyan ni rab tu ston// byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam ni/ sngon par bsgrub par byed cing / sems can
195b4(phal chen): ri rab kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed/ byang chub sems skyed de// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa 'am yongs su 'dzin du btsud do//
195b5(phal chen): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri rab kyi dpal gyi sprin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs/ sems can kun la
195b6(phal chen): phan pa'i phyir// byang chub don du khyod zhugs pa// gzi brjid chen leg so legs// bsod nams snying po grags pa che// snang ba khyod kyi rab tu non// chos kyi dbyings ni
195b7(phal chen): khyab byas shing // bsod nams chen po'i sprin ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas ye shes rgya mtshor 'gyur// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du// zhing cig na yang spyod spyad cing // de'i ye
195b8(phal chen): shes ji lta bur// khyod kyis mthong ba da ltar 'gyur// tshul 'di kun nas shes par ni// brtson 'grus chung ngus mi nus ste// brtson 'grus stobs chen ldan pa rnams// rgya mtsho
196a1(phal chen): @zhing rnams dag par byed// thams cad 'dul la 'dug tshul du// bskal pa rgya mtshor su spyod pa// rgya mtsho'i zhing gi rgyan gyi rnams// de la 'di
196a2(phal chen): 'dra rab tu 'gyur// sems can rnams ni re re'i phyir// bskal pa rgya mtshor spyad spyod cing // 'khor kyang skyo ba med pa rnams// de dag 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur// bskal pa phyi
196a3(phal chen): ma'i mthar thugs pas// rgyal ba re rer mchod byed cing // gang gis sems la skyo med pa// de dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'gyur// dus gsum gshegs pa'i mgon po kun/
196a4(phal chen): khyod kyis smon lam dbang gis gsal// sangs rgyas kun gyis 'khor rnams na// khyod kyis lus kyang rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi smon lam dag/ mtha' dang dpung
196a5(phal chen): med rgya mtsho la// blo chen gang rnams 'jug pa ni// de dag 'di tshul gnas par 'gyur// nga la mchod pa byas pas kyang // gzi brjid chen po stobs chen gyis// sems can
196a6(phal chen): ri rab rdul mnyam pa// byang chub yongs su smin par byas// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen dag/ kun du bzang po dpa' ba'i rnams// chos kyi dbyings ni kun bkang zhing /
196a7(phal chen): zhing gi rgya mcha dag par byed// kye rgyal ba sras dag de la bskal pa rgya chen po'i rig pa zhes bya ba de la bskal pa bar ma chu klung gang ga'i bye ma snyed cig byung ste/ de'i dus nami
196a8(phal chen): rnams kyi cha yang bskal pa par ma gnyis thub par gyur te/ rgyal ba mas dag de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri rab pal gyi smin da sku tshe'i tshad na lo bye ba phrag lnga
196b1(phal chen): bcur gyur to// de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas// de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten du nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor
196b2(phal chen): rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa de nyid la byung ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po'i rgyal mtshan rgyal po de/ mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i rnam par 'phrul/
196b3(phal chen): pa rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos mthong / mthong nas kyang sgo rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu thob po// ye shes rgya mtsho chen po'i byin gyis rlab dang /
196b4(phal chen): chos kyi rlong gi gzungs kyang rab tu thob bo// kun gyi rjes su song bar 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i byams pa chen po yang rab tu thob po// dmigs pa'i sgo'i
196b5(phal chen): sprin thams cad kyi rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba'i snying po yang rab tu thob po// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho dang / byin gyis rlabs kyi mdzad ces dga' ba chen po yang
196b6(phal chen): rab tu thob bo// chos kyi rang bzhin na mkha'i dbyings rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i btang snyoms chen po yang rab tu thob po// rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings yongs su
196b7(phal chen): dag pa'i lus zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rab tu thob bo// chags pa med pa'i dbyings rnam par snang ba'i rjes su song ba'i zhes bya ba'i mngon par shes pa
196b8(phal chen): yang rab tu thob bo// rab tu khong du chud pas dri ma med pa'i glong yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa yang dag rab tu thob po// sangs rgyas
197a1(phal chen): @#thams cad kyi chos kyis dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par byed pa res bya ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo// de la sogs pa chos kyis sgo stong phrag bcu
197a2(phal chen): kun nas non par gyur te/ de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor gyis tshogs thams cad la tshigasu bcad de smras pa// bskal pa bye ba
197a3(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab tu// 'jig rten gtso bo'i dam pa shin du dkon// sangs rgyas zhing 'di sems can thob pa rab thob// de dag sangs rgyas gnyis pa 'di yang mthong // sangs rgyas
197a4(phal chen): sku las 'od rnams rab bkye ba// kha dog mtha' yas rgya chen rnam par dag/ 'od zer sprin gyi 'jig rten kun du khyab// kun du rgyal ba'i yon tan grags par byed// 'od kyis reg
197a5(phal chen): pa rmad kyi dga' ba skyed// 'gro ba de dag kun gyi sdug bsngal zhi// phan tshun sri zhu byams pa'i sems gyur cing // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di dag kun kyang mthong // sprul pa'i dra ba
197a6(phal chen): sprin rnams bsam mi khyab// rnam pa du ma'i 'od kyi dra ba 'gyed// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams kun kyang gang byas shing // sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston// rgyal ba rnams kyi
197a7(phal chen): spu re re re nas// dbyangs smin bkye bas na mkha' kun bkang zhing // mun nag chen po kun nas snang bar byed// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal kun kyang rnam par sel// sangs rgyas dbyangs ni
197a8(phal chen): phyogs rnams bcu po na// sems rnams kyi sngon dge rgya mtsho rnams// thams cad dbyangs kyis kun du sgra yang sgrogs// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul par de dag ltos// sangs rgyas 'khor
197b1(phal chen): rnams rgya mtsho rgya che ba// mtha' dang dbus med yang dag rab tu byung // de na rgyal ba chos kyi 'khor lo skor// sems can rgya mtsho mi zad rnams kyang 'dul// tshad med rnam par 'phrul
197b2(phal chen): pa dag la ltos// zhing rnams kun na rgyal mngon par bzhugs// de ltar bde gshegs ye shes chags pa med// sems can don du rnam par mngon sangs rgyas// dga' zhing mos
197b3(phal chen): pas kun kyang mdong bar gyis// bde ba'i yid dang sri zhu spros pa yis// bde gshegs de ni lta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo // de mthong sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// byang chub sem
197b4(phal chen): ni yang dag skyed byas shing // 'gro ba kun la byas pa'i sems gyur te// kun du bzang po'i smon lam kun btang zhing // chos rgyal ji bzhin bdag cag 'gyur bar bya// sangs rgyas
197b5(phal chen): kyi byin gyis de'i sgra la thogs pa med pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par gyur te/ des thos pa'i sems can tshad med pa rnams kyang byang chub tu smon lam btab par
197b6(phal chen): gyur to// de yang pha ma dang lhan cig tu 'khor thams cad dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag gis skor cing mdun du byas te/ rin po che'i gzugs kyi sprin lngas nam
197b7(phal chen): mkha' thams cad kun du yog par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo // 'ongs pa de dag la bcom ldan 'das pha rol du phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po// de
197b8(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i mdo// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi mdo 'khor can yang dag par ston to// des de thos
198a1(phal chen): la@nas tshul thams cad rnam par dag pa la 'jug par 'byung ba rab tu skyes so// ye shes kyi rim pa rnam par dag cing // dri ma med pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba'ang
198a2(phal chen): non par gyur to// pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar lta ba'i rgyan ces bya ba la yang zhugs par gyur to// zhing thams cad du yang dag par 'jug pa dang snang ba
198a3(phal chen): mtha' yas pa mthong bas rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang dag par rab tu zhugaso// spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsod nams kyi sprin dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yang
198a4(phal chen): rab tu zhugs par gyur to// rjes su rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor chos rgya mtsho// 'byam klas pa thams cad snang ba zhes bya ba yang / rjes su rtogs par gyur to// 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor
198a5(phal chen): ye shes chen po'i shugs kyi rgyan ces bya ba yang rab tu zhugs so// rang byung du gyur pa shin du mthong ba'i shugs kyis dbang skur ba'i ye shes rgya mtsho yang zhugs par gyur to// de bzhin
198a6(phal chen): gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od rnam par snang ba'i snang ba chen pos kyang / shin du snang ba gyur to// smon lam gyi stobs tshad med pa la mos pa'i/ rgya mtsho'i snying po'i
198a7(phal chen): smon lam mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi stobs la yang dag par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po'i rgyan gyi rgyal po'i/ byang chub sems dpa' ga na
198a8(phal chen): brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ legs so yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho can// sangs rgyas byang chub smon lam yang dag gnas// sems can kun gyis mgon dang gnas
198b1(phal chen): gyur pa'i// rgyal ba dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab 'byung // ye shes rgya mtsho chen por mngon par byung // chos kyi dbyings su thams cad rgyas byas te// sangs rgyas spyod yul rgya chen mi zad pa'i/
198b2(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab tshul la 'jug par gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad yon tan sprin mthong ba'i// ye shes sa dang mi zad non par 'gyur// pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho kun gyi tshul// grags
198b3(phal chen): ba chen po yongs su rgyas par byed// gzungs kyi tshul rnams rgya mtsho mang po dang // tha dad yang dag shes tshul mi zang dang // spyod pa smon lam khyod kyi mngon sgrubs pas// gzhal med ye
198b4(phal chen): shes ldan par khyod 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal mtshor 'jug par 'gyur// smon lam rgya mtsho'i nang du khyod skyes te// rnam 'phrul 'di la'ang shin du 'byung bar 'gyur// 'di ni
198b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas chos nyid bsam mi khyab// chos dbyings dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// bsam pa rgya chen rnam par sbyangs byas te// sangs rgyas sprin la rnam par lta bar gyis// rgya
198b6(phal chen): mtsho'i zhing rnams dri med rnam par sbyongs// de'i byang chub spyod pa 'jug par gyis// sngon gyi spyod tshul rgya mtsho mang po yis// spyod pa ngas ni ji ltar rnam sbyangs pa// de 'dri'i tshul
198b7(phal chen): yang khyod kyis shes par gyis// zhing rnams re rer sangs rgyas mang po ngas// rgya mtsho rgya mang shin du mchod pa byas// sngon sbyangs de'i 'bras bu 'di yin te/ 'di 'dra dri ma med pa'i
198b8(phal chen): rgyan la ltos// las kyis rgya mtsho mi zad rgya chen dang // zhing rnams rgya mtsho dag bya'i spyod pa dang // smon lam bsam yas go cha dgos pas na// 'di rnams 'di 'dri'i rnam par 'brug
199a1(phal chen): la @#bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho ma lus mchod byas shing // zhing rnams rgya mtsho sbyang byas nas// bskal pa 'byam klas kun du spyad byas shing // rgyal ba yon
199a2(phal chen): tan 'od chen mnga' bar 'gyur// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das na/ lha na dga' ba shin du gtsang
199a3(phal chen): ba'i bdag po de yang dus byas par gyur te/ rgyal bu gzi brjid chen pos 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob par gyur to// nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog
199a4(phal chen): rgyas pa zhes bya ba der/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin du 'phags shing zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba gsum pa 'byung bar gyur te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa de
199a5(phal chen): mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa de mthong nas/ 'khor thams cad dang dpung gi yan lag bzhi'i tshogs thams cad dang / rin po che bdun dang grong mi dang yul mir bcas te/
199a6(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin du 'phags shing zil gyis mi non pa gang na bzhugs pa der dong nas/ des bcom ldan 'das de la rin po che'i khang brtsegs pa/
199a7(phal chen): spos dang nor bu thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba phul lo// der de bzhin gshegs pa des kun du lta ba'i spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i mdo// 'jig rten gyi kham
199a8(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du za ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor dang bcas pa yang / yang dag par shed par gyur to// de thos nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos/ bsod nams chen po rnam par snang
199b1(phal chen): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob bo// ting nge 'dzin de thob pas kyang dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho mngon du gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
199b2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho shin du 'phags shing zil gyis mi non pas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par gzigs te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po la
199b3(phal chen): tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa// yon tan bsod nams kun gyi gzi brjid can// byang chub mchog gi smon lam yid ldan pa// 'gro ba kun la snying rje rgya mtsho yi// de'i drung du khyod 'ongs
199b4(phal chen): legs so legs// snying rje chen po khyod ni sems can rnams// sdug bsngal gyur pa kun grol don bzhugs pa// 'gro ba kun gyi mgon dang skyabs su 'gyur// byang chub spyod pa'i tshul
199b5(phal chen): yang de yin no// byang chub sems dpa' shin du rten pa rnams// skyon med yid kyi spyad pa spyod pa dag/ mchog tu gyur cing dam pa chags med pa'i// ye shes 'di 'dra shin du thob par 'gyur//
199b6(phal chen): de ltar khyod ni kun du bzang po yi// mthu chen smon lam spyod par zhugs pas na// bsod nams 'od dang bsod nams dpal yin te/ bsod nams 'byung nas bsod nams mchog kyang
199b7(phal chen): yin// bsam gyis mi khyab rgyal ba rgya mtsho dag/ mtha' dang dbus med mang po khyod kyis shes// mtha' dang mu med dag mthong gyur nas// de dag bsod nams rgya mtsho rtogs par 'gyur//
199b8(phal chen): khyod kyi phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad kyi// rgyal ba'i sprin rnams kun kyang shin du mthong // de dag spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang // sngan spyad ji ltar spyad pa bzhin du mthong // 'di
200a1(phal chen): tshul rgya mtsho 'di la su zhugs shing // ye shes sa la su dag gnas gyur pa// de dag sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes slob cing // thams cad gzigs par gdon mi
200a2(phal chen): za ba 'gyur// khyod ni zhing kun rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed kyi// bskal pa rgya mtsho spyod pa spyad byas nas// rgyal ba kun gyi sngon spyad rgya mtsho rnams// bslabs nas rang 'byung nyid du 'gyur ba 'ong //
200a3(phal chen): zhing rnams rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa rnams// phyogs bcu dag tu ji ltar mthong bzhin// khyod kyi zhing yang rnam par dag gyur te// smon lam kun kyang shin du sgrogs par 'gyur/
200a4(phal chen): 'khor gyi mtsho 'di dag thams cad kyang // khyod kyi smon lam thos gyur rab tu dga'// kun du bzang po spyod pa'i lam dag gis// byang chub mchog la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur/
200a5(phal chen): mtha' dang dpung med zhing rnams 'byam klas par// bskal pa brgya mtsho dag tu spyad pa spyod// kun du bzang po'i spyod pa thams cad dang // smon lam rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyis//
200a6(phal chen): nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa de nyid du// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rnam par grags pa'i spyan pad mo'i dpal zhes bya ba byung bar
200a7(phal chen): gyur to// rgyal po gzi brjid chen po de yangs shi 'phos nas rgya mtsho'i steng na/ lha'i grong khyer rin po che zhi ba'i gnas zhes bya ba der byin te/ der bsod nams dri ma med pa'i dpal
200a8(phal chen): zhes bya ba'i lha'i rgyal po chen por gyur to// de nas lha'i 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas te/ rin po che'i me tog gi sprin gyi char 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
200b1(phal chen): bar grags pa'i spyan// pad mo'i dpal gang na bzhugs pa der dong ngo // der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i spyan pad mo'i dpal gyis/ tshul yangs pa'i sgo kun du rnam
200b2(phal chen): par snang ba zhes bya ba'i mdo// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi mdo'i/ 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par snyan to// des de dag thos nas dge ba'i snying po kun nas
200b3(phal chen): sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob bo// chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho la dbyings su 'ang zhugs par gyur to// / shin du rgyas pa chen po'i sangs rgyas bal po che zhes bya ba las
200b4(phal chen): rnam par snang mdzad kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o// / bam po bcu gsum pa'o//
200b5(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag gi 'thil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i
200b6(phal chen): dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab ni kun du bzang po tshangs pa'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni yongs
200b7(phal chen): su 'dzin pa/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lhan cig spyod pa/ 'phrul dga'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/
200b8(phal chen): stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams ni kun du spyod pa dga' ldan gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni/ gnas kyi dam pa mtshe ma'i lha'i lus kyi dbyig
201a1(phal chen): bal @#ltar 'dug pa/ gling ni byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ gling rdal gyi mdzod mtha' yas pa khang brtsegs pa'i
201a2(phal chen): dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ gza' shing gir ba mya ngan dang bral ba'i snying po byang chub mya ngan med pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ khang brtsegs pa ni kun nas smad du med pa 'jig rten gyi khams
201a3(phal chen): kyi rang bzhin/ chos nyid kyi gnas pa'i dbyibs 'dug pa na bzhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tshad med pas kun nas bskor ba ste/ 'di ltar
201a4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi 'thil gyi snying po la gnas pa ming 'thun par/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin da pra ba snyed kun kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i dbyibs
201a5(phal chen): su 'dag pa sha stag dang / gzhung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos kyi lags 'thil gyi snying po la gnas par ming 'thun pa thams cad kyang nyan
201a6(phal chen): thos kyi lus kyi sha stag dang / gzhung de bzhin du lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin
201a7(phal chen): ba'i lag gi 'thil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas par ming 'thun par/ thams cad kyang mi ma yin pa'i lus kyi dbying su 'dug pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor ba ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams
201a8(phal chen): rgya mtsho de ni sangs rgyas de ni sangs rgyas kyi rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du za ba snyed kyi mgo dang ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi gnas 'phos pa rgya mtsho// 'jig
201b1(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'gul dang ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi tshogs rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi zag pa'i lhun dang /
201b2(phal chen): ldan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi lag pa dang ldan pa'o// snying rje chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
201b3(phal chen): bcu'i rdal shin du phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol pa chen po rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi lto dang
201b4(phal chen): ldan pa'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi ba spu bu ga dang ldan pa'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi
201b5(phal chen): sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi lta zur dang ldan pa'o// nyan thos dang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul shin
201b6(phal chen): du pra ba snyed kyi rwa dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten pa'i rnam par thar pa'i rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi byin pa dang ldan pa'o// sems can gyi khas
201b7(phal chen): kyi smon lam rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi rkang pa dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya
201b8(phal chen): mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o// chos kyi dbyibs na mkha'i 'jig rten gyi khams
202a1(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du za ba snyed kyi dpral ba dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams/
202a2(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi mdzod spu dang ldan pa'o// byang chub kyi lam rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du za ba snyed kyi smin tsug dang ldan pa'o// de
202a3(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i stan gyi gangs chen mtsho// rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi mig dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin
202a4(phal chen): gshegs pa'i snyan gyi khams gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi rna ba dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin
202a5(phal chen): gshegs pa'i shangs kyi khams gangs chen mtshe rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi sna dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin
202a6(phal chen): gshegs pa'i ljags kyi khams gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi lce dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin
202a7(phal chen): gshegs pa'i sku'i khams gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi lus dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin
202a8(phal chen): gshegs pa'i thugs kyi khams gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi yid dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin
202b1(phal chen): gshegs pa zhi pa rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku sprul pa rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khyams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi sgra dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
202b2(phal chen): bdud 'dul ba dang // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skur sprul pa'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho'i bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi ba spu dang ldan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i
202b3(phal chen): dad pa'i dbang po rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi mdog dang ldan pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi
202b4(phal chen): kha dang ldan pa'o// chos kyi rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi skom pa dang ldan pa'o// sems can yongs su smin pa rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi
202b5(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi zas dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni khams rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste// 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
202b6(phal chen): mtsho'i sprin/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi kun nas yog par khyebs pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi sprin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
202b7(phal chen): rdul shin du phra ba sbed kyi char mngon par bab bo// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dril bu'i dra ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kun du bres pa'o// 'jig rten
202b8(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho bla re 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed par bkram pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan 'jig rten gyi khams
203a1(phal chen): @#rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba rnyed kyi kun du khyebs par bkang ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni kha dog gi rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
203a2(phal chen): rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin du gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg bya dang chos la sogs pa tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du
203a3(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// mig sna tshogs kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang lce dang
203a4(phal chen): lus dang yid kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams/ rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho re re nas yid kyi chu rgya mtsho'i bar re re las kyang me
203a5(phal chen): tog ud pa la dang / pad mo dang ku mu ta dang / pun d+ha ri ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rnal shin du phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon te/ me tog ud pa la de dag re re dang / me tog
203a6(phal chen): pun d+ha ri ka de dag re re la yang me tog ud pa la'i 'khor dang / me tog pun d+ha ri ka'i 'khor gyi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang ldan pa ste/ me tog
203a7(phal chen): ud pa la dang / me tog bun d+ha ri ka'i bar de dag re re las kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab rnam par phye ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed mngon par
203a8(phal chen): byung ba dag te/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri'i rgyan dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi pad mo'i tshal dang / 'jig rten gyi khams smig ma'i tshal mngon par mthon sha stag go/ ci'i phyir kha
203b1(phal chen): dog gi chu rgyas tshe rnams la kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya zhe na/ de dag tu sems can gang yang rung ste 'thung ngam khrus byed pa de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di'i gzugs
203b2(phal chen): su snang ba 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba 'am nang gi 'am/ phyi 'am/ che ba 'am/ chung ba 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ rgyang ring po 'am/ thag nye ba yang rung ste/ gang
203b3(phal chen): ji snyed yod pa dag thams cad khongs na snang bas/ so so'i mig gi mngon par mthong bas/ de'i phyir kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la kha dog gi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba te/ de bzhin gzugs
203b4(phal chen): dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi rgya mtsho dag kyang shes par bya'o// ci'i phyir mig chu rgya mtsho la mig gi rgya mtsho zhes bya zhe na/ de dag tu sems can gang yang rung ste/
203b5(phal chen): chu 'thung ngam khrus byed pa de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dag na/ gzugs su snang ba 'das pa
203b6(phal chen): 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang ngam phyi 'am/ che ba 'am/ chung ba 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ rgyang ring po 'am/ zag nye ba'ang rung ste/ gang ci snyed cig de
203b7(phal chen): dag thams cad nang na snang na rang rang gi mig dang gzhan gyis mngon par mthong bas/ de'i phyir mig gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la mig gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya ste/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang /
203b8(phal chen): lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi chu rgya mtsho dag kyang shes par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams de ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzugs brnyan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya bcu'i rdul
204a1(phal chen): shin du phra ba snyed kyi lhun shin du rgyan pa ste/ sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba'i dpe byed bzang po 'jig rten gyi khams/ rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra
204a2(phal chen): ba snyed kyi rnam par gsal bar byas pa'i lus can no// chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho zab mo'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi mtshan dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten
204a3(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mang po// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed re re la yang gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba 'byung ba'o//
204a4(phal chen): ci'i phyir na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhes de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa de la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi 'thil gyi snying po la rab tu
204a5(phal chen): gnas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhes na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes chen po rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de'i/ phyag gi 'thil na rdul shin du phra ba snying
204a6(phal chen): po zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i nang na rnam par shes pa'i khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed pa yod do// de dag gi steng na chos kyi rgya mtsho mtha' yas
204a7(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so// de dag gi steng na na mkha'i dbyings rgya mtshos 'tshams yongs su tshad med pa zhes bya ba 'jig
204a8(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so// de dag gi steng na me'i khams rgya mtsho drag shul can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba
204b1(phal chen): snyed rab tu gnas so// de dag gi steng na chu'i khams kyi rgya mtsho sbrang rtsi can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so// de dag gi steng na sa'i kham
204b2(phal chen): rgya mtsho rin po che'i snying po can zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdal shin du phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so// de dag gi steng nas me tog mtshan ma med pa las skyes pa zhes pa
204b3(phal chen): zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed rab tu 'thon cing / me tog de dag so so nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'jig
204b4(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tsam gyi thag gru dang ldan pa dag ste/ de dag gi steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di gnas pas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i
204b5(phal chen): phyag gi 'thil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi 'thil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag
204b6(phal chen): la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba
204b7(phal chen): dag na/ yon tan ci snyed yod pa'i yon tan de snyed ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de na yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun du bzang po'i zhes bya ba tshangs pa'i lha'i lus kyis
204b8(phal chen): dbyibs su 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun du bzang
205a1(phal chen): @po de ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sngon par 'phags pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gyi/
205a2(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho'i bang rims chen po khri 'phangs du 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i ngos 'jig rten
205a3(phal chen): gyi khams bcu'i rdal shin du phra ba snyed dang ldan po// ci'i phyir na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun du bzang po zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun du bzang po de na yongs su
205a4(phal chen): ma dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang yang med/ der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad chos gang dang gang la yongs su dmigs par byed pa'i dmigs pa de dang des/
205a5(phal chen): kun du bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun du bzang po de la kun du bzang zhes bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab de ni 'di
205a6(phal chen): ltar de dag la sogs pa yon tan tshad med pa dag dang ldan pa te/ mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de na yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab
205a7(phal chen): kun du bzang po de na yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun du bzang po de na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi
205a8(phal chen): lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin da pra ba snyed kyis 'khor gyis
205b1(phal chen): bskor ba yod de/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de ni lha'i rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdal shin du phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o//
205b2(phal chen): de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i rnam par dgod pa/ 'jig rten gyi kham
205b3(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas so// de bzhin du byang
205b4(phal chen): chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos kyi rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
205b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba der/ sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang 'du shes tha dad pa ma rtog par lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa med pa'o// skye gnas tha dad
205b6(phal chen): pa med do// theg pa tha dad pa med do// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba de la ni/ ci'i phyir yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya na/ stong gsum gyi stong
205b7(phal chen): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad ngan song gi 'jig pa'ang med// theg pa dma' bar ltung ba'i 'jig pa'ang med/ ser
205b8(phal chen): snar ltung ba'i 'jig pa'ang med/ tshul khrims ngan par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ mi bzod par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ le lor ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ rnam par
206a1(phal chen): @'phrul par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ shes rab 'chal par 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ de'i phyir yongs su 'dzin pa'i stong gsu
206a2(phal chen): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya'o// de dag la sogs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de ni yon tan
206a3(phal chen): tshad med pa mang po dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na 'jig rten gyis khams ri rab kun du bzang po na yon tan ci snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
206a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa na yod do// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de na/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig
206a5(phal chen): spyod pa zhes bya ba 'phrul dga'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor
206a6(phal chen): ba yod de/ stong gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba de na/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs
206a7(phal chen): pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rgya mtsho
206a8(phal chen): dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par 'tshang rgyab rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor brgya
206b1(phal chen): mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu mu rtogs kyi gnas thams cad pu dud du bya ba rgya mtsho
206b2(phal chen): dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu bdud kyi las thams cad yongs su bcod pa rgya mtsho dang mi 'bra'o// stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba der sems can
206b3(phal chen): gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag ge/ gzungs
206b4(phal chen): sgo rgya mtsho la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu
206b5(phal chen): gnas pa sha stag go/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba de na/ ci'i phyir na lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po
206b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams dang lhan cig 'grogs shing / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho
206b7(phal chen): snyed yod pa de dag thams cad du rnam par spyod pas lhan cig spyod pa de la lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig
206b8(phal chen): spyod pa de ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa de snyed
207a1(phal chen): kyi yon tan na stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa de na yod do// stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba de
207a2(phal chen): ni 'jig rten gyi khams kun du spyod pa zhes bya ba de na/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyings su 'dug pa/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
207a3(phal chen): rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ stong gis 'jig rten gyi khams kun du spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni/ bde ba yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyan rgya mtsho
207a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra snyed kyis mngon par brlan pa ste/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun du spyod pa zhes bya ba der/ sems can gang ji snyed skyes
207a5(phal chen): pa de dag thams cad kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed rab tu gnas pa sha stag ste/ de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /
207a6(phal chen): bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa
207a7(phal chen): nas/ ye shes kyi pha rol du phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi bar la rab tu gnas pa/ mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
207a8(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ sems can rab tu yongs su smin par bya ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/
207b1(phal chen): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go// ci'i phyir na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun du spyod zhes bya ba de
207b2(phal chen): la kun du spyod pa zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dag na/ chos kyi khams rgya mtsho dang 'jig rten gyi khams
207b3(phal chen): rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi khams rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho la/ sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kun nas rnam par spyod pas/
207b4(phal chen): kun du spyod pa de la kun du spyod pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun du spyod pa de ni/ yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan ste/ mdor na stong
207b5(phal chen): gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod bde na/ yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de dag ni/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa na yod do// stong gi
207b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kun du spyod pa zhes bya ba de na/ gling bzhi pa gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba mtshe ma'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
207b7(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi ngas pa zhes bya ba de ni snying po byang chub rgya mtsho'i rgyan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
207b8(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis rnam par brgyan pa ste/ snying po byang chub kyi rgyan de dag re re la yang / seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho'i rgyan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du
208a1(phal chen): @#pra snyed rab tu gnas pa seng ge'i khri rgyan de dag re re la yang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu za ba snyed mang
208a2(phal chen): bo 'khod pa ste/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i
208a3(phal chen): lus dang spyod lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sgo mtha' yas pa nas mngon par sgrub pa'i mdo// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
208a4(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed yongs su 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go
208a5(phal chen): ci'i phyir zhe na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de la gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'jig
208a6(phal chen): rten gyi sems can rnams kyi 'byung gnas dang / gnas su bya ba'i gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'jig rten gyi yod pa de dag gi nang na 'di mchog tu bya bas na/
208a7(phal chen): phyir gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de la gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas pa
208a8(phal chen): dam pa zhes bya ba de ni/ yon tan gzhal du med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun du spyod pa na/ yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de dag
208b1(phal chen): gis gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas pa'i dam pa zhes de na yod do// gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de na/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan
208b2(phal chen): zhes bya ba sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed gyis 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/
208b3(phal chen): gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de ni/ rin po che'i ro'i khang brtsegs pa ltar 'dug pa/ rgya mtsho mang ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi
208b4(phal chen): kun nas bskor ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi zer gyi dra ba rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du pra ba snyed kyi kun du khyab pa/ chos kyi rgya mtsha
208b5(phal chen): 'jig rten khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis mngon par brlan pa ste/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba der sems can gang ji snyed skyes par gyur pa de dag
208b6(phal chen): thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtsho// zing po byang chub kyi rgyan dam par gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra bskyed la rab tu gnas pa/ zag pa
208b7(phal chen): tha dad pa'i byung bas rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed la mkhas pa/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho tha mi dang po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
208b8(phal chen): shin du phra ba snyed la rnam par spyod pa sha stag go// ci'i phyir na gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba zhe na/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de na byang chub kyi shing nam
209a1(phal chen): mkha'i rten ces bya ba byang chub kyi shing 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ der skad cig skad cig tu de bzhin
209a2(phal chen): gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed mngon par 'tshang rgya bas/ de'i phyir gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de la byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan ces bya'o// de'i
209a3(phal chen): phyir gling byang chub rgyal mtshan de la byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan ces bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa gling byang chub mtshan de na/ yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na
209a4(phal chen): gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa de na yon tan gang ci snyed yod pa'i yon tan de dag ni/ gling byang chub kyi mtshan de na yod do// gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de grong
209a5(phal chen): rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba khang partsegs pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ grong rdal 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ grong
209a6(phal chen): brdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir/ rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin
209a7(phal chen): gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir/ rgya mtsho re re zhing yang ting nge 'dzin gyi 'obs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba'o// ting nge 'dzin gyis 'obs rgya mtshor
209a8(phal chen): zhing yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ni gnas kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du za ba snyed kyis yongs su gang ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi gnas kyi chu rgya
209b1(phal chen): mtsho de dag re re zhing yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang yon tan gyi me tog ud pa la dang pad+mo dang ku mu ta dang / pun d+ha ri ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdal shin tu phra ba snyed
209b2(phal chen): kyis yongs su gang ba'o// grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de ni byang chub kyi sems rin po che'i rdul shin du rnam par dag pa'i pha gu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba
209b3(phal chen): snyed las rtsigs pa sa bcu'i khang pa rtsegs pa dang / gzhal med khang gi phreng ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis rnam par phye ba ste/ grong rdal mdzod
209b4(phal chen): mtha' yas pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi sku dang / ngang tshul rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa skad cig skad cig cing /
209b5(phal chen): sems can gyi khams sna tshogs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
209b6(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po rgya mtsho'i khur 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bkur ba la/ yongs su skyo ba med pa sha stag go/ ci'i phyir grong rdal mdzod
209b7(phal chen): mtha' yas zhes bya ba de la mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba zhe na/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas de'i sa'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ chu'i khams kyi rdul shin du 'phra ba 'am/ me'i khams
209b8(phal chen): kyi rdul shin du phra ba 'am rlung gi khams kyi rdul shin du phra ba 'am/ na mkha'i khams kyi rdal shin du phra ba yang rung te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de dag la chos kyi mdzod rgya mtsho 'jig
210a1(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ma bzhag pa de lta bu gang yang med pas de'i phyir/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de la mdzod mtha' yas pa
210a2(phal chen): zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de ni yon tan chad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan na yon tan gang ji snyed cig yod pa'i
210a3(phal chen): yon tan de snyed ni grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de na yod de/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de na gza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba snying po byang chub mya ngan med pa'i dbyibs su
210a4(phal chen): 'dug pa/ gza' shing gi ra ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ gza' shing gir ba mya ngan dang bral ba de na/ nags tshal chen po 'jig
210a5(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed yod de/ nags tshal de dag kyang so so nas stong pa nyid gser rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyu
210a6(phal chen): las grub pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi 'od rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi me tog dang ldan pa'o// rnam par rtogs pa'i snyen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi kham
210a7(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'bras bu dang ldan pa'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad sdig pa las yongs su skyob pa rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi lo ma dang ldan pa'o//
210a8(phal chen): sems can gyi khams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi sgrib ma gsal ba dang ldan pa'o// sems can gyi khams thams
210b1(phal chen): cad kyi bsam pa'i sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed la snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba la rab tu gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes
210b2(phal chen): gangs chen mtsho'i sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'o// rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i dar gyi lnga lding dang chun po
210b3(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi kun bres pa'o// dri ma med yongs su dag pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
210b4(phal chen): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed shin du sgreng ba'o// gza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de ni rdzing rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi yongs su rgyan pa
210b5(phal chen): ste/ rdzing de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi gnas rgya mtsho'i chu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi yongs su gang ba'o// rdzing de dag re re zhing yang de
210b6(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / yon tan gyi me tog ud pa la dang / pad mo dang pun da ri ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab par gang ba'o//
210b7(phal chen): gza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba der sems can gang ji snyed 'dod pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes gangs chen mtsho'i sku
210b8(phal chen): dang / thugs dang 'phrin las mnyam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi rab tu thob par 'gyur ba sha stag ste/ dus gsum thams cad du thogs pa med
211a1(phal chen): pa'i ye shes la rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag go// ci'i phyir na gza' shing gi rab mya ngan dang
211a2(phal chen): bral ba zhes bya zhe na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de dang 'thun pa'i rgyus grub pas/
211a3(phal chen): de'i phyir na gza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya'o// de dag la sogs pa gza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba bya'o// de dag la sogs pa gza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de
211a4(phal chen): ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na grong brdal mdzod mtha' yas pa na yon tan ni bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de na yod do// gza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba
211a5(phal chen): de'i nang na khang pa rtsegs pa kun nas smad pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rang bzhin chos nyid kyi gnas pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ khang partsegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
211a6(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod do// khang pa rtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin rgya
211a7(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du za ba snyed las byung ba'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
211a8(phal chen): shin du phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs dam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed rjes su 'dong ba'o// khang pa rtsegs pa
211b1(phal chen): kun nas slad du med pa der sems can gang ci snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes sgyu ma rgya mtsho//
211b2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi sprul pa/ ye shes sgyu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdal shin du phra ba snyed kyis rnam par sgrub pa/ ye shes sgyu ma
211b3(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi pha rol du phyin pa dam pa thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi
211b4(phal chen): tshogs yongs su sgrub pa gang de dag thams cad kyis sems can de dag gi ba spu'i bu ga re re nas mngon par grub pa sha stag go/ ci'i phyir na khang pa rtsegs pa kun nas slad du med pa zhes bya
211b5(phal chen): zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir khang pa rtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de
211b6(phal chen): dag la sogs pa khang pa rtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de'i yon tan tshad med pa ste/ mdor na bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba na/ yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi yon
