211b7(phal chen): tan gyi bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas slad du med pa de na yod do// de lta bu'i pho brang khang pa rtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'i lhun dang
211b8(phal chen): ldan pa'i seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad 'das pa
212a1(phal chen): dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor cing /
212a2(phal chen): 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi kun nas bskor te/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos
212a3(phal chen): kyi 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang / de bzhin du lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang /
212a4(phal chen): mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba
212a5(phal chen): snyed kyis kun nas bskor cing bzhugs so// rnam par spyod do// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar 'das
212a6(phal chen): pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba de dag las kyang byang chub sems de dag re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam tha dad pa rgya
212a7(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi skor ba/ rang sangs rgyas 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho bcu'i
212a8(phal chen): rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyan thos dang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du tha
212b1(phal chen): bskyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ de bzhin du lga dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lham yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang khro 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa 'das pa
212b2(phal chen): dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul shin du tha ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan shing / de ltar 'khor dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
212b3(phal chen): cig nas gcig tu rgyud pa yang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag nas mi dang mi ma yin par rgya
212b4(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed po de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa' re re dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar re re dag kyang lus rnam pa tha dad pa 'jig
212b5(phal chen): rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ lus rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du za ba sbed po de dag las re re yang man
212b6(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed yod do// mgo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed
212b7(phal chen): do// de dag las mgo re re la yang / mig gi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba sbed yod do// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang
212b8(phal chen): lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar du yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du snyed do// mig gi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig
213a1(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed nas/ yid kyi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du pra ga
213a2(phal chen): snying po de dag la yang dbang po ci snyed cig yod pa de dag las dbang po re re las yang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du
213a3(phal chen): phreng ngo // de bzhin durna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rgya mtsho'i bar du/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bcu'i dul shin du za ba snyed de/
213a4(phal chen): mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtogs pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du tha
213a5(phal chen): ba snyid po de dag la rnam par shes pa ci snyed cig yod pa de dag las rnam par shes pa re re la yang ye shes rnam par tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba
213a6(phal chen): snyed do// ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed po de dag las ye shes re res kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po'i sangs rgyas
213a7(phal chen): tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i rdul du chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed rab tu bskor ba byed do//
213a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ji lta ba de bzhin du/ rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin du nyan thos dang / de bzhin du lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang /
213b1(phal chen): mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams la 'du shes par bya ste/ ye shes la ji lta ba de bzhin du chos thams cad la yang shes par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag
213b2(phal chen): dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag gi gnas kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ci snyed cig yod pa dang / stan gyi yon tan rnam par phye ba ci snyed cig yod pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byed bzang po'i
213b3(phal chen): yon tan rnam par phye ba ci snyed cig yod pa dang / rgyan gyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / gos kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub
213b4(phal chen): sems dpa' nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag gi mig gi rdul shin du pra ba re re nas lus kyi rdul shin du phra ba re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gyengs pa de dag
213b5(phal chen): ni/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdal shin du phra ba snyed du bsten cing brjod kyang
213b6(phal chen): zad par mi nus so// / bram po bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i ba spu'i bu ga
213b7(phal chen): re re nas kyang 'od zer rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rdul shin du phra ba snyed bkye'o// 'od zer rgya mtsho de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho pad mo rgya mtsho la bzhugs pa
213b8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed mngon par byung ste/ sangs rgyas re re'i sku'i ba spu'i sgo re re nas/ yang dag par skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten
214a1(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed mngon par mthon to// de dag las yang dag par bskul ba'i tshigasu bcad pa re re zhing yang / shar phyogs kyi 'jig/
214a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams ci snyed pa dang / rdul shin du phra ba ji snyed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang rdul shin tu pra ba re re la byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho dang
214a3(phal chen): ci snyed yod pa dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mI ma yin pa rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams
214a4(phal chen): cad las yongs su bskul bar byed do// shar phyogs dang 'dra bar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho thams cad du yang de bzhin te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ji snyed cig dang / mi dang mi ma yin
214a5(phal chen): pa rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs chen rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od zer gyis yang dag par bskal nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho
214a6(phal chen): dag na/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang ci bzhugs pa de dag la zhus te gnad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho re re dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar de dag re re zhing yang / byang
214a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya mtsho nas mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar dang ldan par 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi 'thil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa gang na ba de
214a8(phal chen): dong bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar de dag la byang chub sems dpa' ci snyed cig yod pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa ci snyed cig yod
214b1(phal chen): pa de dag las byang chub sems dpa' re re dang mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag re re zhing yang / lus rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag ste/
214b2(phal chen): lus re re le yang lag pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed yod pa/ lus re re la yang mgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed pa mgo re
214b3(phal chen): re la yang khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed yod pa/ kha'i sgo re re la yang lce'i rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed yod pa
214b4(phal chen): sha stag go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang mi ma yin pa'i bar rgya mtsho dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs chen mtshe rnam par snang mdzad la lus
214b5(phal chen): re res kyang / g.yas phyogs su bskor ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdal shin du phra ba snyed kyis bskor ba byas te/ lag pa re re nas kyang me tog rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
214b6(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis mchod nas/ de bzhin mar me dang spos dang / bdug pa dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
214b7(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis mchod de/ lce re re zhing yang bstod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis mngon par bstod nas/ rang rang gi stobs
214b8(phal chen): dang rdzu 'phrul gyi sprul pa'i stan rgya mtsho dag la 'khod par gyur to// 'khod nas kyang lde re re zhing zhu ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed yongs su zhu ba byed do//
215a1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad des zhus pa de dag la yang shin du bstan pa rgya 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
215a2(phal chen): rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis shin du bstan pa mdzad de/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar rnam pa de ltar 'das de dag thams cad la/ chos rgya mtsho mang
215a3(phal chen): bau rnam grangs du mar rnam par bya'o// rnam par grol lo// gsal bar mdzad do// yang dag par bstan to// de nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba
215a4(phal chen): snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gnas kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces bya
215a5(phal chen): ba bzhugs shin 'tsho skyong ste/ thog mar dge bar du yang dag dge/ tha mar yang dge ba'i chos/ don bzang po yi ge bzang po dag/ yongs su gsal ba yongs su byang ba tshangs par spyod
215a6(phal chen): pa yang dag par ston cing byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed la rab tu ston pa mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don
215a7(phal chen): rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad/ de'i gnas kyi yon tan rnam par bye ba rgya mtsho ci snyed cig mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho cig mnga' ba dang / sku che'i
215a8(phal chen): yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ci snyed cig mnga' ba dang / sems can yongasu smin par mdzad pa'i/ yon tan rgya mtsho ci snyed cig mnga' ba dang / sku yongs su bstan pa'i yon tan
215b1(phal chen): rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ci snyed cig mnga' ba dang / chos bstan pa'i rnam par phye ba ci rgya mtsho/ ji snyed cig mnga' ba de dag ni sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du
215b2(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyis/ dus gsum rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed du gsungs te/ bstan kyang zad par mi rung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten
215b3(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba de na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che mang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'jig
215b4(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bdag po lha dang mi'i dbang po yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten
215b5(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho 'khor dang ldan pa sha stag go// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che mang po de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re na yang / rin po che rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi
215b6(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du pra bi snyed yod de// 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi spyan rin po che rgya mtsho dang / de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi snyan dang shangs dang
215b7(phal chen): ljags dang sku dang / thugs rin po che rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rin po che rgya mtsho dang / thams cad kyis blta na
215b8(phal chen): yid du 'ong ba'i bud med ring po che rgya mtsho dang / don thams cad grub pa'i khyim bdag rin po che'i rgya mtsho dang / kun du rnam par phye ba'i blon po rin po che dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas
216a1(phal chen): glo ba'i rta rin po che rgya mtsho dang / yid bzhin du 'gro ba'i glang po rin po che rgya mtsho dang / chos kyi dbyings rdo rje'i lta ba can gyi 'khor lo rin po che rgya mtsho dang /
216a2(phal chen): kun du snang bar byed pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho dang / na mkha' rgyan gyis 'gyengs pa'i gdugs rin po che rgya mtsho dang / rang bzhin gyi dri ma med pa'i gos rin po che rgya mtsho
216a3(phal chen): dang / zla ba'i zer lta bu rdul yab rin po che'i rgya mtsho dang / shes rab kyi ral gri rin po che rgya mtsho dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi ltar mi mthong ba'i spyi gtsug sgribs pa med
216a4(phal chen): pa rgya mtsho dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lham rin po che rgya mtsho dang / ting nge 'dzin dang mnyam par gzhag pa thams cad kyi mdzod du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che rgya mtsho dang / chos
216a5(phal chen): gangs chen mtsho thams cad kyi glo dang ldan pa'i gzungs rin po che rgya mtsho dang / de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re na yang / rin po che rgya mtsho 'jig rten
216a6(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed yod de// rin po che rgya mtsho de dag la rin po che ci snyed cig yod pa de dag las rin po che re re zhing yang las 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
216a7(phal chen): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed byed pa sha stag go/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che mang po de la bu rgya mtsho kun kyang / mi chen po'i mtshan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
216a8(phal chen): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang ldan pa 'od chen po'i rgyan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du za ba snyed dang ldan pa/ lus dpe byad bzang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten
216b1(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis/ rab tu gsal bar brgyan pa pas kyi rgol sde/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed rab tu 'joms pa/
216b2(phal chen): sa bcu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba
216b3(phal chen): snyed rab tu thob pa/ snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i/ ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed yongs su gnon pa la mkhas pa/ 'jig
216b4(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdal shin du phra ba snyed yod do// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che mang po de la bu mo rgya mtsho kun du kyang / byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po
216b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis sbrul po'i bud med rin po che dang 'dra ba yid kyi lus/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdal shin du phra ba snyed dang
216b6(phal chen): ldan pa/ srid pa'i las kyi rgyud dkyil 'khor lo sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang ldan pa byang chub kyi sems bla na med pa rgya mtsho 'jig
216b7(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi mgo dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings na mkha' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyis khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis/ 'phral ba dang
216b8(phal chen): ldan pa bsam pa lhag pa'i bsam pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi smin tsug dang ldan pa/ shes rab ye shes yangs pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
217a1(phal chen): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi mig dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thos pa 'dzin pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
217a2(phal chen): du pra ba snyed kyi rna ba yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ sdom pa chen po yang dag par blang ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi sna legs pa dang ldan pa/ chos
217a3(phal chen): kyi rgya mtsho rab tu sgrogs pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi lce dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' gnyis yongs su spangs pas 'dzum par dgod
217a4(phal chen): pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi lag pa
217a5(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don yongs su sgrub pas mi ngoms pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang
217a6(phal chen): ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi nu ma legs pa dang ldan pa/ chos zab mo sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
217a7(phal chen): rdal shin du phra ba snyed kyi lte ba dang ldan pa/ dmigs pa thams cad yongs su gsal ba'i mthar thug pa/ rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi shin du
217a8(phal chen): rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ rdo rje'i lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin yangs shing mi shigs pa bstan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du za ba snyed kyi spu zur dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten pa
217b1(phal chen): dang 'jig rten pa las 'das pa thams cad rim gyis legs par brel ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi rkang pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag
217b2(phal chen): gi me tog sna tshogs kyi dra ba dang / phreng ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba sbed mdzes par thogs pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan
217b3(phal chen): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i gos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du bzang ba gyon pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos rgyan rgya mtsho 'jig rten
217b4(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdal shin du phra ba snyed kyi legs par brgyan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dri zhim po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed
217b5(phal chen): kyi lus shin du byug pa'i dga' ba'i rgyan dang / thabs mkhas pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa 'jig
217b6(phal chen): rter gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed yod de// de dag gi kha nas ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i chos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed
217b7(phal chen): 'byung ngo // de dag gi lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga thams cad kyang / snying rje'i rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan dan gyi spos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'byung ngo //
217b8(phal chen): spos rgya mtsho de dag gi dri zhim pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po yongs su rgyas par 'gengs te/ de dag gi dga' ba'i
218a1(phal chen): @rgyan dang thabs mkhas pa rgya mtsho sa 'dul ba'i sems can rgya mtsho gang ji snyed yod pas/ dri zhim po rgya mtsho de dag tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang de
218a2(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dri zhim por rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed rab tu thob po// sems can gang dga' ba'i rgyan dang thabs mkhas pa rgya mtsha
218a3(phal chen): sa 'dul ba de dag gis gzugs kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho de dag mthong ba/ de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab dang ye shes kyi sku rnam par dag pa yongs su
218a4(phal chen): ston pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo// gang gi dbyangs rgya mtsho thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
218a5(phal chen): las thos pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo// gang gis lag nas bzung bar de dag thams cad kyang byams pa chen po
218a6(phal chen): dang snying rje chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed rab tu thob po// gang gis mthong la reg pa de dag thams cad kyang bsod nams ye shes kyi tsho gas rgya mtsho
218a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo// gang stan cig tu khod pa de dag thams cad kyang snying po byang chub kyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
218a8(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// gang gis kha dang khar zad par byas de dag thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
218b1(phal chen): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed rab tu thob po// gang gis bar du 'khyud pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku mnyam pa nyid rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
218b2(phal chen): rdul shin du phra ba snyed rab tu thob po// dang chos kyi dbyings su bstan par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
218b3(phal chen): shin du phra ba snyed na/ sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su dag pa rgya mtsho la de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs 'jig rten
218b4(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba sbed rab tu thob pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar sa bon rgya mtsho rab tu 'debs so// de nas 'khor los sgyur
218b5(phal chen): pa'i rgyal po rin po che mang po des yang dag par bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed pa thams cad du khyab pa'i rna ba rgya mtsho/
218b6(phal chen): mthos nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs rgya mtsho chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi don gangs chen tshe rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba der
218b7(phal chen): dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la mgo rgya mtsho'i spyi bos btung te/ phyag 'tshal nas chos kyi dbyings rab tu sgrogs pa'i lce'i dbang po rgya mtshos zhu ba yongs su
218b8(phal chen): zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar yang dag par bskul ba'i tshig su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed byung ba de/ su'i mthu las byung
219a1(phal chen): ba de/ su'i mthu las byung ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis
219a2(phal chen): rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po 'di nas nub phyogs 'ang nas nab pags logs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed
219a3(phal chen): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi 'thil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs chen mtsho
219a4(phal chen): rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // chos ston to yang dag par bskal pa'i tshig su bcad pa rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed byung ba 'di yang de'i mthus
219a5(phal chen): byung ngo // de nas rgyal po rin po che mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyang
219a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi 'thil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa/ der de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal lta ba
219a7(phal chen): dang / de la phyag bgyi ba dang mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur ba dang chos nyan pa'i slad du mchi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams
219a8(phal chen): cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyal po rin po che mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po de'i dus la bab par shes na 'gro la rag ste/ rgyal po chen
219b1(phal chen): po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi zil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der ni 'gro bar bka' ste der 'gro ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal lta ba dang /
219b2(phal chen): de la phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyam par ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs ma rtogs par/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin snying po byang chub kyi
219b3(phal chen): rgyan rnams par phye ba'i snying po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pas kyang / bde klag tu bya ba bla ba ma yin gyis/ rgyal po chen po de lta
219b4(phal chen): ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sa 'tshams bzang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba zhig yod na/ de khyod kyi sngan chad mthong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs ni gang na 'dug/
219b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya rtsa mtsho de 'di nye 'am ring / de na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang zhig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa mdzad pa shes sam/ rgyal po rin chen mang
219b6(phal chen): bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de mthong ba 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na mchis pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
219b7(phal chen): rgya mtsho de 'di nas ni he'am ring zhig na mchis pa dang / da ltar de na de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs pa dang mtsho skyong zhing / chos ston pa ni spos su yang ma mchis te/ 'jig rten gyi
219b8(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho de ni sngan chad bdag gis ma thos so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don/ gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di
220a1(phal chen): @skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na yod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ci srid pa dang /
220a2(phal chen): de na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa legs par soms shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po rin chen mang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams
220a3(phal chen): cad du yongs su gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed la mnyam par bzhag kyang / 'jig rten gyi
220a4(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na yod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas nye ba 'am/ ring ba dang de na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gang na bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos
220a5(phal chen): ston pa yang ma shes te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de'i mtshan ma tsam yang ma mthong ngo // de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho de las langs te/ de bzhin gshegs
220a6(phal chen): pa sems can thams cad kyi don gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de mthong 'am/
220a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na 'chis pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas nye 'am/ ring ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gang zhig de ltar de na bzhugs shing
220a8(phal chen): 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de'i mtshan ma tsam yang ma mthong ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams
220b1(phal chen): cad kyi don gang chen mtshe rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de lta bas na rgyal po chen po rnam grangs des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de
220b2(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi 'thil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlab ma gtogs par ting 'dzin gyi snying po byang chub kyi rnam par phye ba'i snying po rgya mtsho
220b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos kyang 'gro bar bya ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i blta ba de la phyag bya ba 'am
220b4(phal chen): de las chos mnyan pa bde blag ma yin par shes par gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad
220b5(phal chen): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni phyogs gang na mchis/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ni thag ci srid
220b6(phal chen): cig na mchis/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang zhig da ltar de na bzhags shing / mtsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa bstan du gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi
220b7(phal chen): gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po khyod kyi khams 'di'i nub phyogs logs kyis 'tshams kyi mtha'
220b8(phal chen): 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams glog gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshos mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yod de/
220b9(phal chen): de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yang dag par bsgrub pa'i gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston to//
221a1(phal chen): de nas de skad ces bka' stsal kyang / rgyal po rin chen mang pos/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ma shes ma mthong nas 'di snyam du sam so// cig 'jig rten gyi
221a2(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho de de ltar nye na'ang / bdag la mthu'i khyad par med na/ de bas ring ba lta ci smos snyam nas/ de ltar rjes su bsam te de'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs
221a3(phal chen): pa legs par len pa'i ting nge 'dzin kun du bsgrubs med pa la sogs/ ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed la mnyam par gzhag go/ de ltar
221a4(phal chen): mnyam par gzhag pa'i mod la rgyal po rin chen mang po la de'i tshe 'jig rten mang po la rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho
221a5(phal chen): sbed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad do//
221a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de ltar rgyal po rin chen mang po la byin gyis brlabs mdzad ma thag tu de'i mod la/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshos 'tshams bzang po'i dpyang
221a7(phal chen): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa thams cad mi mthun pa'i phyogs yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi kham
221a8(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi stobs dam pa rgya mtsho la
221b1(phal chen): sogs pa ye shes rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis rab tu shes so// dus gsum kun du lta ba rnam par rgyu ba rgya mtsho la sogs pa mig rgya mtsho 'jig/
221b2(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdal shin du pra ba snyed kyis rab tu mthong ste/ 'di ltar dper na lag 'thil du skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu bzhag pa 'am/ me long shin du gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor la
221b3(phal chen): ngo snang bzhin no// de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho de dag las langs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang
221b4(phal chen): mdzad la yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi zil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes
221b5(phal chen): gangs chen mtshe rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi ba dang mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sem
221b6(phal chen): can thams cad kyi don gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po de'i dus la dbab par shes na song la byang chub
221b7(phal chen): sems dpa' 'dul ba'i skyes bu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das ye shes gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad
221b8(phal chen): de la phul cig/ de nas rgyal po chen po rin chen mang po byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed po de
222a1(phal chen): ngag dang / bu rgyal rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed po de dag dang lhan cig ste/ bu re re zhing ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor
222a2(phal chen): 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dag dang lhan cig 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni 'jig rten gyi
222a3(phal chen): khams ri rab kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan cig 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/
222a4(phal chen): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
222a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdal shin du phra ba
222a6(phal chen): snyed dang lhan cig/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
222a7(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du za ba snyed dang lhan cig/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor las sbyar ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya
222a8(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho babu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rter gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ gling cig gi 'ang gi rgan gyi
222b1(phal chen): 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ gling gcig gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ khams kyi rgyal po 'jig rten
222b2(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang / khams kyi rgyal po rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'dong bar chas pa
222b3(phal chen): dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin mang po de'i chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho dang bu mo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed po de dag gis 'di skad ces smraso//
222b4(phal chen): lha'i zhal snga nas gsan du gsol// bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi 'thil snying po la rab tu gnas pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa
222b5(phal chen): ye shes gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de'i zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi ba dang mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos nyan pa'i slad du 'chi bar gsol lo// de skad ces
222b6(phal chen): smras pa dang / rgyal po rin chen mang po snga ma'i 'khor dag dang / bu mo rgya mtsho de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// ji ste khyod sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i zhal blta ba ni don du mi gnyer/ chos rgya
222b7(phal chen): mtshonyan pa ni tshol bar mi byed/ dge 'dun rgya mtsho bsnyen bkur ba ni don du mi gnyer/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba ni/ tshol bar mi byed sangs
222b8(phal chen): rgyas kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba don du mi gnyer/ nyan thos kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyab ba ni don du mi gnyer/ yul rgya mtsho
223a1(phal chen): bal @#'di nas ni 'gro bar 'dod pa med/ yul rgya mtsho gzhan du ni 'grod par 'dod pa med la/ gal te khyod sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang rang sa da
223a2(phal chen): rgyas thams cad dang chos kyi dbyings la gnas par gyur te/ 'dod chags dang bralas pa 'am/ 'dod chags dang bral yang mi gnas/ sems can thams cad gsod pod kyang / zhe sdang ba
223a3(phal chen): 'am byams pa la mi gnas/ mu stegs can thams cad kyi lta ba rgya mtsho la 'jug cing spyod kyang log par ye shes sam yang dag pa'i ye shes la mi gnas/ chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu
223a4(phal chen): dbye ba bstan pa yang ston la/ chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo zhe na deng la rag go// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po des/ bstan pa 'di shin du bstan pa'i tshe/ chung ma'i
223a5(phal chen): 'khor rgya mtsho de dag dang bu mo rgya mtsho de dag las/ chung ma re re bu mo re res kyang mig gi khams re res chos kyi dbyings thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho la sogs pa sangs
223a6(phal chen): rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur to// rna ba'i khams re res kyang na mkha' khong du chud pa'i sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa byang chub
223a7(phal chen): sems dpa'i sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed rab tu bab par gyur to// sna'i khams re res kyang gcig la gcig rten pa'i sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa rangs sa/
223a8(phal chen): rgyas kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur to// lce'i khams re res kyang sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ nyan thos kyis
223b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba sbed rab du thob po// lus kyi khams re res kyang pha rol tu phyin pa dri ma med pa'i rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du/
223b2(phal chen): phra ba snyed rab tu thob po// yid kyi khams re res kyang sa'i dbang po'i stobs rgya mtsho la sogs pa stobs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed rab tu thob po//
223b3(phal chen): de nas rgyal po rin chen mang po'i chung ma rgya mtsho de dag dang / bu mo rgya mtsho de dag gis theg pa chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi gting snyed
223b4(phal chen): nas/ spyod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed la/ gzhan gyi drin mi 'jog par byas te/ rgyal po rin chen mang po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
223b5(phal chen): bdag cag kun gyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong // yongs su mchod de bsnyen bkur zhu ba bgyis/ 'on kyang 'di 'dra rgya mtsho'i chos ma thos// sa mang rgya mtsho 'di dag thos ma gyur// de ni
223b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas phrin las bsgrub pa yi// sa mang rgya mtsho'i mig kyang mthong bar gyur// byang chub don du phyogs rnams kun dbyings su// rna bas spyod pa dam pa spyad par gyis// snga'i kham
223b7(phal chen): gyis rang rgyal sa thob te// rten 'brel 'byung ba'i chos rnams rtogs par gyur// lces kyang nyan thos sa mang rgya mtsho thob// des ni zhi ba'i bde ba mtshor bar gyur// lus kyi sa mang rgya mtsho
223b8(phal chen): thob pas na// bsgrub pa sna tshogs rab tu bsgrub par bgyis// yid kyi dus gsum chos mang rgya mtsho rnams// 'tshal bar gyur pas gzhan la rten par gyis//
223b9(phal chen): shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa phal po che'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // bam po bcwo lnga pa'o// /
224a1(phal chen): bal @#bcom ldan 'das thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas pa ma ga da'i chos kyi dgon pa'i snying po byang chub la bzhags te blo shin du rnam par dag pa mi gnyis pa yang dag
224a2(phal chen): par spyod pa chos mtshan nyid med pa la shin du gzhol ba/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid bsnyes pa bsgrub pa med par rtogs pa khong du chud
224a3(phal chen): pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can spyod yul 'phrogs pa med par rnam par dgod pa/ bsam gyi mi khyab pa dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la shin du byung ba/ pho brang kun du 'od seng ge'i khri
224a4(phal chen): pad mo'i snying po can la bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan nas
224a5(phal chen): 'dus pa sems can gyi khams la dpyod pa/ chos kyi dbyings la spyod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams la spyod pa/ mya ngan 'das las 'das pa'i dbyings la spyod pa/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la
224a6(phal chen): spyod pa/ bsam pa'i rgyud la spyod pa/ don dang yi ge la spyod pa/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa la spyod pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa spyod pa/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa
224a7(phal chen): dang / da ltar byung ba la spyod pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag cag la thugs rtse bar dgongs te/
224a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su brtad kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi chos bshad pa yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
224b1(phal chen): gi rang bzhin yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi mthu yongs su bstar kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su bstan
224b2(phal chen): kyang rung / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa bcu'i ji ltar rnam par bgod pa de dag yongs su
224b3(phal chen): bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i tshad med pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i gter rnam
224b4(phal chen): yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i
224b5(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par sprul pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i mgo bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung /
224b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung mi bcad pa dang / sems can thams cad yongasu bskyab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi kham
224b7(phal chen): thams cad nye bar nyon mongs par bya ba dang / 'du byed thams cad yongs su shes pa thams cad yongs su shes pa dang / chos thams cad yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang / kun
224b8(phal chen): nas nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba dang / the tshom thams cad yongasu gcad pa dang / nem nur thams cad shin du gsal ba dang / gnas thams cad rab tu gzhom par
225a1(phal chen): phal @bya ba'i phyir/ gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis
225a2(phal chen): brlabs pa bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yul bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi bsnyed pa
225a3(phal chen): bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan kyang rung / gong de de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' chen po
225a4(phal chen): bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'phrogs pa bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs spyan bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyan bstan kyang rung / gong
225a5(phal chen): du de bzhin gshegs pa'i shangs bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ljag bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs
225a6(phal chen): pa'i thugs bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu
225a7(phal chen): mchog gi mthu bstan kyang rung snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rnam par rtogs pa thugs kyis thug su chud nas/ de
225a8(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do// rdzu 'phrul rnam par de dag mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ shar phyogs log su 'jig rten gyi khams zhing
225b1(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed mi g.yo ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems
225b2(phal chen): dpa' 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la
225b3(phal chen): phyag 'tshal te/ shar phyogasu bstan nas/ seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas 'khod do// lho phyogs logasu 'jig rten gyi khams
225b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing / bcu'i rdul shin du za ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog yod du 'ong ba zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed mi skyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
225b5(phal chen): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste
225b6(phal chen): phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ lho phyogasu rten nas seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas 'khod do// nub
225b7(phal chen): phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol tu 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo'i mdog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa
225b8(phal chen): rig byed bcings med kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom
226a1(phal chen): @#ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ nub phyogasu brten nas seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ dkyil
226a2(phal chen): mo dkrung bcas nas 'khod do// byang phyogs log su 'di rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam pa ka'i mdog ces bya de bzhin
226a3(phal chen): gshegs pa rig byed kun spyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/
226a4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste byin nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ byang phyogs rten nas seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can mngon par sprul te/ dkyil mo bkrung bcas
226a5(phal chen): nas 'khod do// byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams ud pa
226a6(phal chen): la'i mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig byed nyi ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i
226a7(phal chen): rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ byang shar gyi phyogs 'tsham su brten nas/ seng ge'i
226a8(phal chen): khri pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas 'khod do// shar lho'i phyogs 'tsham su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phrab
226b1(phal chen): snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed mtha' rgal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mig gi
226b2(phal chen): dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal
226b3(phal chen): te/ shar lho'i phyogs mtsham su brten nas/ seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can dag sprul te/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas 'khod do// lho nub kyi phyogs logasu 'jig rten gyi khams
226b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i mdog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed dam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub
226b5(phal chen): sems dpa' brtson 'grus dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan
226b6(phal chen): 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ lho nub kyi phyogs 'tsham su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad ma'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas 'khod do// nub byang gi phyog
226b7(phal chen): 'tsham su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas rdo rje'i mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig
226b8(phal chen): byed dbang phyug gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/
227a1(phal chen): @#bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ nub byang gi phyogs 'tsham su brten nas/ seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can dag
227a2(phal chen): mngon par sprul te/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas 'khod do// 'og gi phyogs log su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol 'jig rten gyi
227a3(phal chen): khams shel gyi mdog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed tshangs pa'i dbang po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
227a4(phal chen): kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ 'og gi phyogs su brtan nas seng ge'i khri pad mo
227a5(phal chen): snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ dkyil mo dkrungs bcas te 'khod do// steng gi phyogs logasu 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing / bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig
227a6(phal chen): rten gyi khams 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig byed sna tshogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
227a7(phal chen): kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du za ba sbeng dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ steng gi phyogs su brten nas/ seng ge'i
227a8(phal chen): khri pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis byang chub
227b1(phal chen): sems dpa'i dge 'dun thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ 'di skad ces smras so// byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'di dag ngo mtshar thob pa dag ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
227b2(phal chen): rnams kyi zhing ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
227b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
227b4(phal chen): rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas bco ldan 'das nas spro ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
227b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zhing kun du rgyu ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med
227b6(phal chen): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bsam gyis mi khyab te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag te/
227b7(phal chen): sems can 'dul ba rnams kyi bsam pa thugasu chud cing / na mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa dag tu chos ston te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal
227b8(phal chen): ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'di nyid dang / de ma yin pa'i gling bzhi pa dag na'ang / sku gzhan dang gzhan/ mtshan gzhan dang gzhan/ kha dog dang / dbyibs gzhan dang
228a1(phal chen): @#gzhan/ chu zheng gzhan dang gzhan/ sku tshe'i tshad gzhan dang gzhan/ skye mched brnyes pa gzhan dang gzhan/ dbang po brnyes pa gzhan dang gzhan/ 'byung ba'i skye mched
228a2(phal chen): gzhan dang gzhan/ sku gzugs gzhan dang gzhan/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyi rab tu shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams gling
228a3(phal chen): bzhi pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid na'ang / de bzhin gshegs pa la don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba rab tu shes so// zla bu'i dkyil 'khor ces bya bar rab tu shes so// seng
228a4(phal chen): ge'i nga ro can zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// drang srong dam pa'i mchog ces bya bar rab tu shes so// rnam par snang mdzad ces bya bar rab tu
228a5(phal chen): shes so// ge'u ta ma'i rigs shes bya bar rab tu shes so// dge sbyong chen po shes bya bar rab tu shes so// rgyal ba dam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mu stegs byed ces
228a6(phal chen): bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams gling bzhi pa'i bcom pa dang ldan pa na mtshan stong phrag bcur/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems
228a7(phal chen): can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gling bzhi pa 'di dag 'dab chagasu shar phyogs logs na gling bzhi pa'i shin du bsrung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
228a8(phal chen): gshegs pa la rdo rje zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dbang phyug ces bya bar rab tu shes so// blo gros mnga' ba zhes bya bar rab du shes so// thub par dka' ba zhes bya ba rab tu sheso//
228b1(phal chen): sprin gyi rgyal po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// skyabs mdzad pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// thugs dges pa zhes bya bar rab tu
228b2(phal chen): shes so// mtshungs pa med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// tshig spyod pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa shin du bsrungs pa
228b3(phal chen): zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mtshan stong phrag bcur sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'dab chag su lho phyogs logs
228b4(phal chen): na/ gling bzhi pa bzod par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la dbang po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// nor grags shes bya bar rab tu shes so// dri ma med pa
228b5(phal chen): zhes bya ba rab du shes so// yang dag par gsungs pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dges pa mnga' ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rnam par grags pa shes bya bar rab tu sheso//
228b6(phal chen): don mdzad pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mtha' yas pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dpal dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa
228b7(phal chen): gling bzhi pa bzod par bka' ba na mtshan stong phrag bcur/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyi rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'dab chagasu nub
228b8(phal chen): phyogs logs na/ gling bzhi pa gnyen dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la chu'i lha zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// lha na dga' ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rgyal
229a1(phal chen): po dam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// seng ge 'dul ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// bden pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mtha' las 'das par
229a2(phal chen): gshegs pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dges pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// chos kyi blo gros zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// phrin las grub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mkhas

229a4(phal chen): rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'dabs su byang phyogs logs na gling bzhi pa seng ge yod pa zhes bya ba yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa
229a5(phal chen): la thub pa chen po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dka' thub kyis bsgrub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// zhing la dpa' ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// thams cad thugs su chud pa
229a6(phal chen): zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// yid bzang po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// shugs 'dzin pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// lnga lding
229a7(phal chen): bzang po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// brtul shugs brnyes pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa seng ge yod pa na mtshan stong phrag

229b1(phal chen): brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la bdud rnam par 'jom pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// zhi ba zhes bya bar
229b2(phal chen): rab tu shes so// bzang po'i lha zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// blo gros mchog ces bya bar rab tu shes so// thugs mnyam

230a2(phal chen): po dam pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la mi g.yo ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mkhas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya bar rab tu

230a7(phal chen): gtsug ces bya bar rab tu shes so// dran par bya ba rab tu shes so// don gyi mchog ces bya bar rab tu shes so// shin du bshad pa zhes bya bar rab du shes so// rigs gtsang ma zhes bya

230b2(phal chen): dang 'dab chags su 'og logs na/ gling bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la shin du grub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// seng ge'i mdog

230b7(phal chen): pa la blo gros dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// zhal dag pa zhes bya bar rab du shes so// bshes gnyen dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab du shes so// thog mar gshegs pa zhes bya

231a2(phal chen): sogs pa gling bzhi pa nor 'dzin mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyi rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mi
231a3(phal chen): mjed 'di na/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya yod de/ de dag na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa la mtshan gzhan dang gzhan gyis brjod do// mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag
