232a7(phal chen): tu sheso// grol zhing mkhas pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 'das pa'i gter ces bya bar rab tu shes so// rin po che'i 'od ces bya bar rab tu shes so// 'jig rten ston pa zhes
232a8(phal chen): bya bar rab tu shes so// gnas med pa'i sa thug su chung ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dang ba'i snying po zhes bya bar rab du shes so// thugs mi skul ba zhes bya bar rab tu sheso//
232b1(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'pho bar byed pa na mtshan bye ba rgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal
232b2(phal chen): ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'di dang 'dab chagasu shar lho'i phyogs mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams phan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu
232b3(phal chen): 'joms pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// byang ba thug su chud pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// gsung snyan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rtsa ba khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya bar
232b4(phal chen): rab tu shes so// rgyur gyi gdugs shes bya bar rab tu shes so// rgyu shin du sbyangs pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rnam par phye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//
232b5(phal chen): dam pa'i bsam gtan mnga' ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// ran par gsungs pa zhes bya bar rab tu sheso// blo rgya mtsho zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de
232b6(phal chen): ngag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams phan pa dang / mtshan bye ba rgya stong phrag bcur sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi
232b7(phal chen): mdzad 'di da 'dag chags su/ sngon kyi phyogs 'arnam san 'ag kyi sas kun du ma sa bya ba me gagags pa 'dzum
232b8(phal chen): ga tunas so// mngon par sel ba zhes bya ba rag tu shes so// dus las grol ba zhes bya ba rab tu shes so// nga ma nyid yongs su mkhyen pa zhes bya bar rab du shes so//
233a1(phal chen): @#nyams pa med pa'i zhes bya bar rab du shes so// skal ba mnyam pa med par gzigs pa zhes bya bar rab du shes so// dbang phyug gi dam pa zhes bya bar rab tu sheso//
233a2(phal chen): drang srong dam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// phrin las brtsams pa zhes bya bar rab du shes so// rdo rje'i seng ge zhes bya bar rab tu shes ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa
233a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kun du song ba na/ mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams
233a4(phal chen): mi mjed 'di dang 'dab chagasu nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la me tog yang dag par bstsag
233a5(phal chen): pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// tsan dan gyi gdags shes bya bar rab tu shes so// pad mo'i snying po zhes bya bar rab ta shes so// shin du 'das pa'i chos zhes bya bar rab ta shes so// /
233a6(phal chen): chos kyi lham bu zhes bya bar rab du shes so// shin du 'phags pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// shin du sbyangs pa'i gdugs shes bya bar rab du shes so// spyan shin du yangs pa zhes
233a7(phal chen): bya bar rab tu shes so// tshul bzang po dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab du shes so// chos rtse gcig ces bya bar rab tu shes so// dra ba'i snying po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// kye rgyal
233a8(phal chen): ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi
233b1(phal chen): mjed 'di dang 'dab chagasu 'og gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba zhes bya bar yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la 'od 'phro 'gyed pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// shin tu
233b2(phal chen): 'dul ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dbang po'i mtshon cha zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mi rtag pa zhes bya bar rab du shes so// rtsa ba thug su chud pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//
233b3(phal chen): 'gro ba med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rlung dang mnyam pa zhes bya bar rab du shes so// snang ba la mos pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// lam shin du brtags pa zhes bya bar rab
233b4(phal chen): du shes so// 'joms pa'i rgyal mtshan ces bya bar rab du shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mi mche ba na mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de
233b5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang / 'dab chags steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams dbyang
233b6(phal chen): sgrogs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la dpa'i rgyal mtshan ces bya bar rab tu shes so// rin po che tshad med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mchod sbyin la brtson
233b7(phal chen): ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// lha'i 'od ces bya bar rab tu shes so// dpal 'byung ba zhes bya bar rab du shes so// 'khor las 'phags pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// thams cad
233b8(phal chen): kyi bdag po zhes bya bar rab du shes so// 'khor lo mi ldog pa zhes bya bar rab du shes so// bya ba dang gzhungs pa med pa'i zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// thams cad mkhyen pas
234a1(phal chen): @#shin du grol ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrogs pa ni/ mtshan bye ba rgya stong phrag bcur
234a2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu
234a3(phal chen): shes pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba rgya stong phrag tshad med pa grangs med dpag tu med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa kun du mtha' yas pa/
234a4(phal chen): mu med pa sa 'tshams med pa brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' rtags pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa
234a5(phal chen): sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// gzhung de ltar lho phyogs dang de bzhin tu nu pa phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams
234a6(phal chen): dang / de bzhin du sher lho'i phyogs 'tshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang /
234a7(phal chen): de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba rgya stong / tshad med pa grangs med pa dpag tu med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa
234a8(phal chen): mu med pas mtshams med pa/ brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings klas pa/ mamakha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang / de bzhin gshegs
234b1(phal chen): pa sems can rnams kyi rab tu shes te/ sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe/ sems can yongasu smin par tha dad pa dang gsung gi rnam pa tha dad pa dang / nga re/
234b2(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa dang / 'phrin las rnam pa tha dad pa dang / rnam par smin pa tha dad pa dang / skye mched rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sbyor ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang / dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
234b3(phal chen): mos pa rnams pa tha dad pa dang / skye mched rab tu thob pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis/ sems can rnams la chos yongasu bstan pa yang rab tu shes so// shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo
234b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan shin du bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // bam po bcu drug pa'o//
234b5(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di nas sdug bsngal 'phags
234b6(phal chen): pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na'ang 'byung ba zhes bya'o// gnod pa zhes bya'o// bskal pa mi mnyam pa zhes bya'o// dmigs pa zhes bya'o//
234b7(phal chen): kun 'byung ba zhes bya'o// gsal zhing gi rang bzhin zhes bya'o// gnas kyi rtsa ba zhes bya'o// gdon mi za ba zhes bya'o// shu ba'i gzabs zhes bya'o// byis pa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o//
234b8(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'di na 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na'ang / yongasu 'brel pa zhes bya'o// chud za ba zhes bya'o//
235a1(phal chen): @#tshor bar 'chen po zhes bya'o// myong bar byed pa zhes bya'o// sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya'o// nges pa zhes bya'o// dran pa can zhes bya'o// rjod pa zhes bya'o//
235a2(phal chen): sems kyi byi bzhin sgrogs pa zhes bya'o// phyin ci log gi rtsa ba zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gogs pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba yang 'jig
235a3(phal chen): rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na yang / 'dzud pa zhes bya'o// rdul dang bral ba zhes bya'o// zhi ba zhes bya'o// mtshan nyid med pa zhes bya'o// mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o// rang
235a4(phal chen): bzhin med pa zhes bya'o// so sor ldan pa zhes bya'o// nub par 'gro ba zhes bya'o// rang bzhin grub pa zhes bya'o// rang bzhin la gnas pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang
235a5(phal chen): yang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'di nyid na yang / theg pa cig ces bya'o// zhi bar 'gro ba zhes
235a6(phal chen): bya'o// sgra dang bral ba zhes bya'o// yongs su rtog pa bzang ba zhes bya'o// shin du mnyam par bzhag pa zhes bya'o// khur 'dor ba zhes bya'o// 'gro ba med par 'gro ba zhes bya'o//
235a7(phal chen): 'phags pa'i rjes su 'greng ba zhes bya'o// drang srong gi spyod pa zhes bya'o// gtar bcu zhes bya ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzod
235a8(phal chen): 'di nyid na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la/ ming dbye ba brgya stong pa bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
235b1(phal chen): gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba la/ de 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa na/ tshol ba'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o// mi 'byung ba zhes
235b2(phal chen): bya'o// rtsa ba mi brten pa zhes bya'o// bya ba ma byas pa zhes bya'o// rtsod pa thams cad ces bya'o// rnam par bye ba nyams chung ba zhes bya'o// kun gzhi dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// gsod
235b3(phal chen): pa'i mchog ces bya'o// 'gul zhing g.yo ba zhes bya'o// dngos po'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba
235b4(phal chen): de yang 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa yongs su sa rung ba zhes bya'o// ldan pa zhes bya'o// sreg pa zhes bya'o// 'jigs pa zhes bya'o// 'jig pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o// mtshams
235b5(phal chen): dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// sdig pa la spyod pa zhes bya'o// 'dod pa zhes bya'o// klad pa na zhes bya'o// skal pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i
235b6(phal chen): bden pa zhes bya de yang 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa yod pa na/ don ces bya'o// 'jigs pa sel ba zhes bya'o// yon tan thob pa zhes bya'o// dbugs 'byin pa zhes bya'o//
235b7(phal chen): tshul bzang po zhes bya'o// 'dul ba zhes bya'o// yan lag gcig pu zhes bya'o// sdig pa med pa zhes bya'o// 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya'o// rtogs pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i
235b8(phal chen): sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i/ 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams khebs dang ldan pa na/ sde'i dbang po zhes bya'o// gyen du 'gro ba zhes
236a1(phal chen): bya'o// 'byung ba zhes bya'o// sbyor ba dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// blta ba mnyam pa zhes bya'o// mtha' yas grol ba zhes bya'o// rtogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rjes brtul
236a2(phal chen): ba zhes bya'o// mig dam pa zhes bya'o// phyogs su snang ba zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa dang ldan pa na/ 'phags pa'i
236a3(phal chen): bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi yod de/ de dag gi sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'du'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di
236a4(phal chen): na/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang / 'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa na 'jig pa zhes bya'o// skal pa gcod pa zhes bya'o// smad pa'i gnas zhes bya'o// nye bar
236a5(phal chen): bsrel ba zhes bya'o// rnam par bsreg pa zhes bya'o// 'khon du 'gyur ba zhes bya'o// nang ma dang bral ba zhes bya'o// rgyud 'khrugs pa zhes bya'o// dka' bar bsgrub pa zhes bya'o// rab
236a6(phal chen): tu btags pa zhes bya'o// mos pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang / 'jig rten gyi khams lhag
236a7(phal chen): ba na rab tu 'jigs pa zhes bya'o// gti mug gi rtsa ba zhes bya'o// dgra dam pa zhes bya'o// bkres pa'i yan lag ces bya'o// ro med pa zhes bya'o// kun skyed pa zhes bya'o// rang bzhin
236a8(phal chen): ma yin pa zhes bya'o// bkur bar bya ba zhes bya'o// mun pa khyer ba zhes bya'o// blo gros bcom pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa
236b1(phal chen): zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams lhags pa na/ don chen po zhes bya'o// phan pa'i yan lag zhes bya'o// don gyi don ces bya'o// tshad med pa zhes bya'o// mthong ba zhes bya'o// rtogs
236b2(phal chen): pa med pa zhes bya'o// mchog tu dul ba zhes bya'o// rtags te mnyam pa zhes bya'o// gnas par byed pa zhes bya'o// yan lag byas pa med pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug
236b3(phal chen): bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i/ lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes der yang / 'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa dang / me'i tsha ba zhes bya'o// yan lag dang po zhes bya'o// rnam par gdon mi za
236b4(phal chen): ba zhes bya'o// mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya'o// tshul zab mo zhes bya'o// 'byung ba zhes bya'o// mi dma' ba zhes bya'o// rtogs par khong du chud pa zhes bya'o// grol ba'i rang bzhin zhes bya'o//
236b5(phal chen): rab tu 'grel pa zhes bya ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dreg la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams lhags pa na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de
236b6(phal chen): de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin tu 'dul lo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes
236b7(phal chen): bya ba de la/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul bstsal na/ 'gyod pa zhes bya'o// kun spyod pa zhes bya'o// gcig la gcig ces bya'o// kun du 'gro ba zhes bya'o// ro gcig pa zhes bya'o//
236b8(phal chen): chos ma yin pa zhes bya'o// kun gzhi dang mngon sum zhes bya'o// lag pa gzhol ba zhes bya'o// log par lta ba zhes bya'o// grangs med pa zhes bya'o// dgra'i dpung zhes bya'o// kye rgyal
237a1(phal chen): @#ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la 'ang / 'jig rten gyi khams rdul bstsal ba na 'dod chags pa zhes bya'o// smra ba
237a2(phal chen): zhes bya'o// mi dkar ba zhes bya'o// gzhi las skyes pa zhes bzung ba zhes bya'o// sdig gi ka pa zhes bya'o// lhag pa zhes bya'o// khur zhes bya'o// skyed pa zhes bya'o// sra ba zhes bya'o//
237a3(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams rdul ba med na mi mnyam pa zhes bya'o// bral ba zhes bya'o// dri ma med
237a4(phal chen): pa zhes bya'o// rtsa dang bral ba zhes bya'o// ldan pa zhes bya'o// sgrib pa med pa zhes bya'o// bag la nyal med pa zhes bya'o// 'phags pa zhes bya'o// phyi ma zhes bya'o// dgra bcom pa
237a5(phal chen): zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang / 'jig rten gyi khams rdul bsal ba na/ dngos po'i
237a6(phal chen): snying po zhes bya'o// skal pa sbyor ba zhes bya'o// grol ba'i don gyi rtsa ba zhes bya'o// rang bzhin du gyur pa zhes bya'o// mi smad pa zhes bya'o// mchog tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o// srid
237a7(phal chen): pa'i snying po tha ma zhes bya'o// sba ba'i snying po zhes bya'o// mthar thug pa zhes bya'o// yongs su rtogs pa dag pa zhes bya ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la sogs pa/
237a8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rdul gsal ba na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du
237b1(phal chen): 'dul lo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par byung ba na/ 'dod/
237b2(phal chen): chags kyis rgyas pa zhes bya'o// rnam pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o// rgya mtsho'i yan lag ces bya'o// yang dag pa las 'das pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o// skal ba med pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o//
237b3(phal chen): 'phro ba zhes bya'o// skye shing 'jig pa zhes bya'o// sgrib pa zhes bya'o// ral gi dong zhes bya'o// tshul stag po zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba
237b4(phal chen): 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par byung ba na/ nor bu sbyin pa zhes bya'o// 'dud par byed pa zhes bya'o// mi zad pa zhes bya'o// skal pa
237b5(phal chen): zhes bya'o// chags pa med pa zhes bya'o// seng ge zhes bya'o// dngos po len pa zhes bya'o// 'brel pa zhes bya'o// snod ces bya'o// g.yo ba zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
237b6(phal chen): ngag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par 'byung ba na/ 'tshams bral ba zhes bya'o// bye ba zhes bya'o// yi ge med pa
237b7(phal chen): zhes bya'o// sbyor ba med pa zhes bya'o// mthong ba med pa zhes bya'o// bya ba med pa zhes bya'o// nye bar bsgrubs pa zhes bya'o// sreg pa zhes bya'o// gzhol ba zhes bya'o// skyed pa zhes
237b8(phal chen): bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes pa zhes bya ba de la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par byung ba na/ zhi bar byed pa
238a1(phal chen): la @#brtson pa zhes bya'o// khyab par 'gro ba zhes bya'o// mngon tu bya ba la sbyor ba zhes bya'o// bde bar 'gro ba zhes bya'o// tshe tshad med pa zhes bya'o// shin tu bsgoms
238a2(phal chen): bas mthar phyin pa zhes bya'o// lam gyi rnam pa zhes bya'o// thob par dka' ba'i yan lag ces bya'o// pha rol gyi 'tshams shes bya'o// rgal dka' ba zhes bya ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
238a3(phal chen): dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par byung ba na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod na/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam
238a4(phal chen): pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang / 'jig rten gyi khams
238a5(phal chen): 'phro bar byed pa na 'phro bar byed pa zhes bya'o// smon pa'i bshes gnyen zhes bya'o// mi brtan zhing 'jig pa zhes bya'o// brjod pa zhes bya'o// nyams nga bas 'tshe ba zhes bya'o// don 'dul
238a6(phal chen): ba zhes bya'o// khur 'dod pa zhes bya'o// rtsa ba zab pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin sems dpa' zhes bya'o// nam mkha' rtsa ba zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung
238a7(phal chen): ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'phro bar byed pa na/ sred par byed pa zhes bya'o// shin tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o// zhes pas skyon can du gyur pa zhes bya'o//
238a8(phal chen): rlabs shes bya'o// 'dzin pa zhes bya'o// 'du shes can zhes bya'o// 'bras bu la gnas pa zhes bya'o// brjod du mi rung ba zhes bya'o// tha dad pa med pa zhes bya'o// rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya'o//
238b1(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'phro bar byed pa na bzlog pa zhes bya'o// smra ba dang bral ba zhes bya'o//
238b2(phal chen): sgrub pa zhes bya'o// dga' ba zhes bya'o// 'jig pa bskul ba zhes bya'o// shin tu byung ba zhes bya'o// gti mug med pa zhes bya'o// 'phags pa zhes bya'o// sel ba zhes bya'o// kye
238b3(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'phro bar byed pa na/ nus pa med pa zhes bya'o// brjod du med pa zhes
238b4(phal chen): bya'o// tshul mnyam par med pa zhes bya'o// rnam par rig pa'i lam zhes bya'o// bsngo ba dge ba zhes bya'o// rgya chen po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// rnam par phye ba'i tshul zhes bya'o// nam
238b5(phal chen): mkha' rang bzhin zhes bya'o// zil bar gyur pa zhes bya'o// ye shes kyi bdag po zhes bya'o// don yongs su shes pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig
238b6(phal chen): rten gyi khams 'phro bar bar byed pa na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul
238b7(phal chen): lo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams phan pa na/ khur tsa ba'i
238b8(phal chen): khur ces bya'o// snying po med pa zhes bya'o// rkun po lta bu zhes bya'o// rga shi zhes bya'o// chags pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya'o// shin du 'chang ba zhes bya'o// ngal bar byed pa zhes bya'o//
239a1(phal chen): la @#ngom zum gnag pa zhes bya'o// kun du 'bal ba zhes bya'o// ral gyi dang 'dra ba zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba/ 'phags
239a2(phal chen): ba'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams phan pa na/ 'jig pa zhes zhes bya'o// 'khrugs pa zhes bya'o// bskyed pa zhes bya'o// nyams chung ba zhes bya'o// 'phrogs pa
239a3(phal chen): zhes bya'o// bral ba zhes bya'o// mi ldan pa zhes bya'o// thab mor 'gyur ba zhes bya'o// rtsod par 'gyur ba zhes bya'o// gnas gyur pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug
239a4(phal chen): bsngal 'gog par 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang / 'jig rten gyi khams phan pa na kun du spyod pa zhes bya'o// yang dag pa zhes bya'o// zhum pa med pa zhes bya'o// yan
239a5(phal chen): lag g.yogs pa zhes bya'o// smad pa spangs pa zhes bya'o// rjes su 'thun pa zhes bya'o// gzhir 'gro ba zhes bya'o// yan lag spangs pa zhes bya'o// tha dad pa med pa zhes bya'o// glag/
239a6(phal chen): med pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang / 'jig rten gyi khams phan pa sdang ba brjod pa zhes
239a7(phal chen): bya'o// thams cad kyi rgya zhes bya'o// bsam gtan gyi gter ces bya'o// snang ba yod pa zhes bya'o// phyir mi ldog pi zhes bya'o// dngos po zad pa zhes bya'o// lam yangs pa zhes bya'o//
239a8(phal chen): dul ba'i rang bzhin zhes bya'o// dge ba yod pa zhes bya'o// rtsa ba rgyu ba med pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams phan pa na/ 'phags pa'i
239b1(phal chen): bden pa rnaMs kyis ming bye ba rgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
239b2(phal chen): 'di na/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams kun du 'gro ba na/ bsam pa thibs po zhes bya'o// gnas sna tshogs su bkram pa zhes bya'o//
239b3(phal chen): skye gnas su bskyed pa zhes bya'o// rim pas 'dug pa zhes bya'o// ngo tsha ba med pa zhes bya'o// shes par bya ba'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o// 'ga' 'ga' ro zhes bya'o// rtag tu 'jig pa zhes
239b4(phal chen): bya'o// 'gal me'i rang bzhin zhes bya'o// rtsa ba'i sgo zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams
239b5(phal chen): kun tu 'gro ba ni shin du g.yo ba zhes bya'o// rig pa med pa zhes bya'o// blo gros thag ring ba zhes bya'o// phongs par 'gyur ba zhes bya'o// 'jig pa zhes bya'o// kun du 'dren pa zhes bya'o//
239b6(phal chen): nye bar bsgrubs pa zhes bya'o// rten du gyur pa zhes bya'o// dngos po'i bdag po zhes bya'o// mtshams sbyor ba zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i
239b7(phal chen): bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun du 'gro ba na ngoms pa zhes bya'o// bdud rtsi zhes bya'o// rgya ba med pa zhes bya'o// rang gi med pa zhes bya'o// rtog pa byang ba zhes
239b8(phal chen): bya'o// yang dag par gzhog pa zhes bya'o// rgyu ba dang bral ba zhes bya'o// mched pa med pa zhes bya'o// lam med pa zhes bya'o// mi gnyis pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang
240a1(phal chen): @#sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams/ kun tu 'gro ba na snang bar byed pa zhes bya'o// bstan pa
240a2(phal chen): rgya mtsho zhes bya'o// don dam par gdon mi za ba zhes bya'o// chos dang zad pa zhes bya'o// 'khor ba med pa zhes bya'o// 'brel ba med pa zhes bya'o// lam rgya chen po zhes bya'o// yang
240a3(phal chen): dag par phyin par 'gro ba zhes bya'o// sbyor ba dag pa zhes bya'o// mthong ba'i bdag po zhes bya ste// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kun du 'gro ba na/
240a4(phal chen): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gi sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi

240b1(phal chen): red pa zhes bya'o// chos kyi gzhi zhes bya'o// lta ba chung ba zhes bya'o// mthong ba chung ba zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes

240b5(phal chen): sel ba dang 'gog pa zhes bya'o// skal pa mi mnyam pa'i don can zhes bya'o// rang bzhin yangs pa zhes bya'o// yongs su rtogs pa zad pa zhes bya'o// byin gyi brlabs kyi lam
240b6(phal chen): zhes bya'o// tshogs kyi tshul zhes bya'o// dran pa dang bral ba zhes bya'o// rtag pa'i lam zhes bya'o// grol ba bsgrub pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag de ltar de dag la sogs pa
240b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dga' ba na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gi sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin

241b7(phal chen): yin pa zhes bya'o// rnal 'byor dang mi 'thun pa zhes bya'o// rtag par bya ba zhes bya'o// sgom zhes bya'o// rtogs par bya ba zhes bya'o// bsgribs pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/

242a1(phal chen): pa zhes bya'o// mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya'o// kun tu song ba zhes bya'o// chen po zhes bya'o// du ma med pa zhes bya'o// mi zad pa zhes bya'o// yangs pa zhes

242a5(phal chen): de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su bstan pa yod pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye
242a6(phal chen): ba phrag brgya stong tshad med dpag tu med pa grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa sa 'tshams med pa/ brjod du med pa/
242a7(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas rtags pa dag na yang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su bstan pa yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams re ren yang 'phag
242a8(phal chen): pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin tu 'du'o// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na
242b1(phal chen): ji lta ba bzhin du lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams dang /
242b2(phal chen): de bzhin tu lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye
242b3(phal chen): ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa kun du mtha' yas mu med pas mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa/
242b4(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyis klas na/ na mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas rtags pa dag na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su brtan pa yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re na yang 'phags pa'i
242b5(phal chen): bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gi sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo// 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na ji ltar ba bzhin du
242b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na shar phyogs nas/ steng gi phyogs zhes bya ba na/ phyogs bcu ma lus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dag na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam
242b7(phal chen): yongs su bstan pa yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams re re na yang sdug bsngal gyi ming dbye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du
242b8(phal chen): 'dul lo// kun 'byung ba'i bden pa'i ming dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa'i ming dang / lam gyi bden pa'i ming dag kyang de bzhin no// shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo las sangs rgyas pa la
243a1(phal chen): po che zhes bya ba las/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das

243a3(phal chen): shar phyogs lus 'phags gling bye ba phrag rgya dang / nub kyi ban lang spyod bye ba phrag brgya dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan bye ba phrag rgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba khrag rgya bstan to// 'khor yug
243a4(phal chen): rdo rje'i ri bye ba rgya bstan to// byang chub sems dpa' skye ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// mngon par 'byung ba bye ba phrag rgya bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'chang rgya ba bye ba phrag
243a5(phal chen): rgya bstan to// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bye ba phrag bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa bye ba phrag rgya bstan to// ri rab ri'i rgyal po bye ba phrag rgya
243a6(phal chen): bstan to// rgyal po chen po bzhi rigs kyi lha'i khams bye ba phrag rgya bstan to// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i rigs bye ba phrag rgya bstan to// mtshe ma'i lha'i rigs bye ba phrag rgya bstan
243a7(phal chen): to// dga' ldan gyi lha'i rigs bye ba phrag rgya bstan to// dga' ldan gyi lha'i rigs bye ba phrag rgya bstan to// 'phrul dga'i lha'i rigs bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// gnan 'phrul dbang
243a8(phal chen): byed kyi lha'i rigs bye ba phrag rgya bstan to// tshangs pa'i 'a'ajig rten bye ba phrag rgya bstan to// gya nom snang ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// dge rgyas bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// 'bras bu
243b1(phal chen): chen po bye ba phrag rgya bstan to// 'og min bye ba phrag brgya bstan no// 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i khongs su tshangs/ gang ci yang rung ste/ rtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril
243b2(phal chen): gyis bstan to// ci ltar 'di na bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang thabs cig tu bzhugs
243b3(phal chen): te/ bskor cing mdun du byas par snang ba de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba zag brgya kun kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya bzhugs par snang ngo // de dag thams cad du'ang
243b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis phyogs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bcu 'ongs par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ ji ltar
243b5(phal chen): 'jam dpal dang sangs rgyas dpal dang / nor dpal dang / rin chen dpal dang / yon tan dpal dang / mig gi dpal dang / brtson 'grus dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / ye shes
243b6(phal chen): dpal dang / bzang po dpal zhes bya ba dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser
243b7(phal chen): gyi mdog dang / yid du 'ongs pa'i mdog dang / tsam pa ka'i mdog dang / ud pa la'i mdog dang / sa le sbram gyi mdog dang / rin po che'i mdog dang / rdo rje'i mdog dang / shel gyi
243b8(phal chen): mdog dang / 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba dag nas 'ong ba dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham rin na tshangs
244a1(phal chen): phal pa'i spyad pa spyod de/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba dang / rig byed mi skyod pa dang / rig byed bcings pa med pa dang / rig byed kun spyod pa med pa dang / rig byed
244a2(phal chen): bsgribs pa med pa dang / rig byed mthar rgal ba dang / rig byed dam pa dang / rig byed dbang phyug dang / rig byed sna tshogs shes bye ba dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad
244a3(phal chen): kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed lhan cig tu phyin te/ gcig ci lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na
244a4(phal chen): yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang ste/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag so so nas smras par gyur
244a5(phal chen): to// 'jig rten kun dang mi ldan zhing // bral bar gyur te dngos med pa'i// yang dag sangs rgyas sus shes pa// de dag mig gi lam mi gnas// shes rab chen po sus mthong zhing // dngos
244a6(phal chen): po'i 'du shes mi 'jug la// rnam par bsgoms shing shes gyur pa// de dag de bzhin gshegs par gyur// 'jig rten khams 'di mthong gyur te// sangs rgyas che ba nyid dag la// gang
244a7(phal chen): gi sems ni mi g.yo ba// de dag mi yi mchog tu gyur// sangs rgyas chos la gang gi rnams// mnyam pa'i sems su rab 'jug cing // mi gnyis mngon gyur brtan pa'i rnams// de dag
244a8(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur// gang rnams bdag dang sangs rgyas dag/ rang bzhin mnyam par rab gnas shing // mi gnas len pa med pa'i rnams// de dag bde bar gshegs par gyur//
244b1(phal chen): gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // rnam par shes dang 'du byed dag/ grangs med de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnams// de dag thub pa chen po 'gyur// blta bar byas la 'das pa dang // rnam
244b2(phal chen): par ltas las de bzhin de// chos la gang dag rmongs med pa// de dag rab tu 'ong byed 'gyur// gang gis shes rab chen po'i rnams// sems bskyed kun la rab gnas shing // thams
244b3(phal chen): cad mthong ba skye med pa// de dag grags pa chen por 'gyur// sems can rnams la skye ba med// 'jigs pa 'ang yod pa ma yin te// de ltar gang gis shes pa ni// de dag bla na med
244b4(phal chen): par 'gyur// gang gis gcig la mang shes shing // mang po'ang gcig tu rab rtogs to// gnas kyi rnams su'ang byung gyur te// de dag 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// de nas 'od zer
244b5(phal chen): de dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'das te// shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i snang bar byas so// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs kyi jig rten gyi
244b6(phal chen): khams bcu bcu snang bar byas so// byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams dang // lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / steng gi phyogs
244b7(phal chen): dag tu yang 'jig rten gyi khams re re zhing yang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi bye ba phrag brgya pasten pa nas/ 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi yod
244b8(phal chen): su gang ci yang rung ste/ rtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs
245a1(phal chen): @#rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / thabs cig pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re dag gi gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na'ang / de bzhin gshegs
245a2(phal chen): pa bye ba phrag rgya bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur te/ byang chub sems
245a3(phal chen): dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / ming 'di zhes bya ba ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal dang / sangs rgyas dpal dang / nor dpal dang / rin chen dpal dang / yon tan dpal dang / mig gi dpal dang /
245a4(phal chen): brtson 'grus dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / ye shes dpal dang / bzang po'i dpal zhes bya dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams/ ming 'di
245a5(phal chen): zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog dang / yid du 'ongs pa'i mdog dang / pad ma'i mdog dang / tsam pa ka'i mdog dang / ud pa la'i mdog dang / sa le
245a6(phal chen): sbram gyi mdog dang / rin po che'i mdog dang / rdo rje'i mdog dang / shel gyi mdog dang / dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag go/ byang chub sems dpa'i de dag thams cad kyang
245a7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na/ tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag go/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba dang / rig byed mi skyod pa dang / rig byed bcings
245a8(phal chen): pa med pa dang / rig byed kun spyod pa dang / rig byed bsgribs pa med pa dang / rig byed mtha' rgal dang / rigs byed dam pa dang / rig byed dbang phyug dang / rig byed tshangs pa dang /
245b1(phal chen): rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du
245b2(phal chen): phra ba snyed dang / lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ci lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de gcig
245b3(phal chen): na ci lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod de/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag so so nas snang bar gyur to// gang gis 'gro ba shin du gtsas gyur cing // sred pa'i gsal zhing ldan
245b4(phal chen): pa kun shes nas// rang 'byung kun mkhyen ye shes tshol ba'i rnams// de dag chos nyid 'di 'dra 'di yin no// chos kyi rang bzhin gnas pa mthong gyur nas// mtha' gnyis gang
245b5(phal chen): gis rab tu spang gyur cing // ldog pa med cing dgos pa kun shes pa// de dag nga yi 'khor lo mtshungs med bskor// gang rnams chos dang ldan pa'i bsam pa yis// 'khor ba'i
245b6(phal chen): skye rgu kun gyi don gyi phyir// bskal pa mtha' yas go gyon pa'i// drang srong chen po'i longs spyod 'di 'dra'o// gzhan gyis mi pham dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan can// bdud rnams thos
245b7(phal chen): cad mthar 'byin mgon po rnams// byams pas gang dag mi 'jigs sgra 'byin pa/ de dag chos nyid 'di 'dra 'di yin no// 'di dag nang nas byung ngo zhes bya bar// nyon mongs sel ba'i
245b8(phal chen): sems ni skad cig tu// thams cad shes pa su yi rgyud shes pa// de dug rnam par sprul pa 'di dag ston// gang rnams chos kyi rnga ni brdung byas shing // byang chub sems kyang srog chag thams cad la//
246a1(phal chen): @#phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams kun tu shes byed pa// rang byung de dag tshul ni 'di 'dra'o// 'dul bar dka' ba mtha' yas spyod yul can// zhing rnams bye ba gang dag
246a2(phal chen): spyod gyur cing // nam yang dngos po dag la mos byed pa// de dag de bzhin gshegs bzhin rnam par 'phrul// gang rnams dga' zhing mos pa mtha' yas pa// rgyal ba rnams ni shin du rnam
246a3(phal chen): dag cing // de bzhin gshegs pa mkha' 'dra rjes dran pa// de dag la ni smon lam 'di yang btab// sems can don la gang rnams mos gyur cing // re re dag gi mnar med sdug bsngal
246a4(phal chen): ba// bskal pa dpag med smin par bya dad pa// de dag skyon med pham med shin du bsrung // gang rnams lus dang srog la mi lta zhing // sangs rgyas chos la rtag tu brtul zhugs te//
246a5(phal chen): mkhas pa bdag med rnam par sus spyod pa// de dag sangs rgyas chos nyid 'di thob po// de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'das nas/ shar phyogs log su 'jig
246a6(phal chen): rten gyi khams brgya snang bar byas nas// gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams brgya snang bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams re re yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba brgya
246a7(phal chen): brtan pa nas/ 'og min bye ba phrag rgya bar du bstan te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste/ rtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan
246a8(phal chen): to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang / thabs gcig pa de
246b1(phal chen): bzhin du// 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag rgya kun na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du 'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs
246b2(phal chen): kyi phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ong bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal dang / sangs
246b3(phal chen): rgyas dpal dang / nor dpal dang / rin chen dpal dang / yon tan dpal dang / mig gi dpal dang / brtson 'grus dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / ye shes dpal dang / bzang po'i
246b4(phal chen): dpal zhes bya ba dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog dang / yid du 'ong
246b5(phal chen): ba'i mdog dang / pad mo'i mdog dang / tsam pa ka'i mdog dang / ud pa la'i mdog dang / rin po che'i mdog dang / rdo rje'i mdog dang / shel gyi mdog dang / 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya
246b6(phal chen): bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar
246b7(phal chen): rig byed mi g.yo ba dang / rig byed mi skyong ba dang / rig byed bcings pa med pa dang / rig byed kun spyod pa dang / rig byed de dag sgrib pa med pa dang / rig byed mtha' rgal dang / rig
246b8(phal chen): byed dam pa dang / rig byed dbang dang / rig byed tshangs pa dang / rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba dag go// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang
247a1(phal chen): pha @chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin te/ gcig ci lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na yang byang chub
247a2(phal chen): sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag go dor 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ci lta ba de bzhin brjod de/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur te/ bcom
247a3(phal chen): ldan 'das kyi sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du// thugasu chud nas bsgribs pa med gzigs te/ zil gyis mi non chags pa mi mnga' bar// skye dgu rab tu 'dul bar shin du snang // la las
247a4(phal chen): gser gyi ri bo 'dra ba de// sku cher skye bar gyur pa rab tu mthong // skyes bu'i zla ba rnam par mdzes pa der// tha ma'i sku yang 'dzin par la las mthong // yon tan chad las 'das pa
247a5(phal chen): kun mnga' zhing // dgongs pa mkhyen pa bzhin du mkhas gyur pa// skyes bu'i seng ge don yod gshegs pa der// la las 'chag cing gshegs pa shin du mthong // phyogs bcu kun du rnam
247a6(phal chen): par snang ba de// la las mthon ting spyan du de bzhin mthong // 'dod pa'i yon tan ldan pa'i skyes dgu rnams// gzigs nas gzhad par de bzhin la las mthong // gzi brjid mtshung
247a7(phal chen): med mnga' la la la yis// seng ge'i nga ro gsungs pa de bzhin mthong // zil gyis mi non ma logs gsung mnga' ba// sku'i tha mar ston pa la las mthong // bcings pa kun las
247a8(phal chen): rnam par grol ba de// la las khab nas byung bar rab tu mthong // sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas spyod pa rnams// gzigs shing zhi ba de gzhol la las mthong mthong // la las byang chub
247b1(phal chen): snying po rnam pa la// chos rnams thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas shing // yon tan thams cad pha rol phyin pa dang / mun pa rdul gsal nyon mongs sbyangs pa mthong // la las chos
247b2(phal chen): kyis 'khor lo bskor ba yang // thugs rje chen po brnyes pa de dag mthong // la las skyes dgu tshad med rnams 'dul bar/ skyes bu dam pa de ni de bzhin mthong // la las gzi
247b3(phal chen): brjid mtshungs pa med pa der// 'jig rten thams cad zil gyis mnon mdzad de// rdzu 'phrul chags med stobs mnga' ba/ seng ge'i nga ro sgrogs pa de bzhin mthong // la las rab
247b4(phal chen): du zhi ba'i mthugs mnga' ba// 'jig rten sgron mar mya ngan 'das par mthong // rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong nas kyang // stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' de dag rab tu shes// de dag
247b5(phal chen): 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'ongs te/ shar phyogs log su 'jig rten gyi khams stong snang bar byas nas/ gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi kham
247b6(phal chen): stong gi bar du snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag rgya bstan pa nas/ 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to// 'jig rten gyi khams
247b7(phal chen): de dag gi khongasu su gang ci yang rung ste/ rtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad zil gyis bstan to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ba de bzhin
247b8(phal chen): tu 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba khrag brgya kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pas sang+yas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo // thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi
248a1(phal chen): brlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/
248a2(phal chen): 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar du'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa ste/ 'di ltar
248a3(phal chen): gser gyi mdog can nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan 'di zhes bya ba'i zham 'bring na tshangs
248a4(phal chen): ba'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang re re zhing byang chub
248a5(phal chen): sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu dag ste/ gcig ci lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na'ang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal
248a6(phal chen): zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na'ang brjod de/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag so so nas smra bar gyur to// gang gis bde gshegs
248a7(phal chen): rnams kyi chos zab pa// zil gyis non pa med pa brjod pa rnams// gang la 'jig rten rtag tu myos 'gyur ba// de dag thams cad rim gyis rab tu ston// gal te bdag cig med
248a8(phal chen): du zin na ni// de'i spyod yul stong pa zhi ba'ang med// rang byung rdul rnams shin du stsal ba yi// bde gshegs rnams kyi sku yang ji ltar byung // mkhyen dang rnam gro zhabs dang ldan pa rnam/
248b1(phal chen): med la grangs kyang rnams kyang med// de ni 'jig rten dag na la la dag/ rgyu la thogs pa med pa 'dod phyir ro// gang la phung po med cing khams med de// skye mched dag dang skye zhing 'chi
248b2(phal chen): med pa'i// de'i grangs ni 'jig rten 'di rnyed pas// skyes bu seng ge rnams rab tu brjod// nang dang phyi zhes bya bar gdags pa'i// de dag rang bzhin dngos nyid stong pa ste// rtog pa med
248b3(phal chen): cing rnam rtog de bzhin med// gzhal du med pa'i chos nyid 'di 'dra'o// de dag la ni g.yo ba nam yang med// snyems shing ldeg dang sgrib pa gang yang med// 'jig rten thams cad
248b4(phal chen): rjes su rab tu mkhyen// mtha' yas 'dul ba'i tshul ni 'di 'dra'o// zhi ba'i ting 'dzin spyod yul rgyas pa'i rnams// rtse gcig gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin te// yid kyi stsogs
248b5(phal chen): pa'ang de la gang yang med// 'dir ni sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa'o// rgyu dang rkyen dang bya ba rnam dag dang / las kyi rnam smin sems can spyod pa yis// rgyal ba rnams kyi
248b6(phal chen): ye shes mi ldog ste// bde gshegs chos ni de ltar bsam mi khyab// phyogs rnams bcu na ci ltar 'khod pa yi// 'jig rten rnam pa sna tshogs kun gzigs shing // sems can
248b7(phal chen): tshad med yongasu 'grel mdzad kyang // skyes bu'i dbang po de dag rtog mi mnga'// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gser gyi mdog/ de yang kun na rnam par kun tu gnas// de dag
248b8(phal chen): bsam pa ji 'dra de bzhin tu// thub pa rnams ni de ltar chos kyang ston// bam po bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig
249a1(phal chen): @#rten gyi khams de dag nas 'ongs te/ shar phyogs log su 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcu snang bar byas so// gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyog su 'jig rten gyi
249a2(phal chen): khams stong phrag bcu snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu gling gi bye ba phrag rgya bstan nas/ 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to// 'jig rten gyi kham
249a3(phal chen): de dag gi yongs su gang ci yang rung ste/ rtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyis gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub
249a4(phal chen): sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dag gi gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag rgya kun na'ang / de bzhin
249a5(phal chen): gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis// phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// /
249a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal nas bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams
249a7(phal chen): cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser mdog nas 'dra ba'i mdog gi bar dag gi/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang
249a8(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo nas/ rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub
249b1(phal chen): sems dpa' de dag thams cad re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag te/ gcig ci lta ba de bzhin tham/
249b2(phal chen): cad do// thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na'ang brjod de/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad
249b3(phal chen): pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to// lha dang 'jig rten bcas pa zil mnan te// snying rje la ni gang zhig sems rtong zhing // 'gro ba thams cad bskyab par bzhugs pa rnams/
249b4(phal chen): de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur ba 'ong // bde gshegs rnams la snying nas dang bskyed cing // gang gi sems ni nam yang mi ldog par// sangs rgyas spyod pa yongasu mi rtong pa//
249b5(phal chen): de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur ba 'ong// gang rnams gang du 'jug pa yongs med cing // sangs rgyas yon tan rnams las mi ldog pa// shin du rten pa blo bdud med pa rnams// de
249b6(phal chen): ngag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur ba 'ongs// gang rnams 'gro zhing 'dug dang chags pa'i tshe// nyin mtshan rgyun tu rjes su sems byed cing // sangs rgyas bdag nyid che ba sems spel
249b7(phal chen): ga/ de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ongs// dus gsum thams cad rab tu gzhal byas kyang // gang gi sems ni zhum par mi 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas yon tan rjes su slob
249b8(phal chen): mos pa// de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong // bdag gi rang bzhin yongasu gzhal byas shing // thams cad ma lus zhi bar byed pa dang // bdag dang bdag med 'dod chags brag
250a1(phal chen): pa'i sems// de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong // gzhal gyis bsam pa yongs su gzhal byas shing // rtogs dang rnam rtogs thams cad rnam spangs te/
250a2(phal chen): spyod pa 'di 'drar bdag dang ldan gyur pa// de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur ba 'ong // gang rnams bsam gyis mi khyab zhing 'byam zhing // sems can rgya mtsho yid kyis 'thung byed de//
250a3(phal chen): blo chen rdzu 'phrul stobs dang ldan gyur pa// de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur ba 'ong // gang gi zhing rnams rnam par bsam pas na// gzugs dang gzugs med 'du shes yod med pa//
250a4(phal chen): thams cad grangs su nye bar 'gro ba ni// de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur ba 'ong // gang rnams zhing gi rdul du gzhig byas shing // thams cad yongs su bkang zhing bgrang byas te// de
250a5(phal chen): dag nang du rgyal ba 'dzud byed pa// de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong // de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das nas/ shar phyogs logasu 'jig rten gyi
250a6(phal chen): khams stong phrag brgya snang bar byas nas// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag brgya'i bar du snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye
250a7(phal chen): ba phrag brgya bstan nas/ 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su ci yang rung ste/ rtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan
250a8(phal chen): to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang thabs cig par snang ba de bzhin du/
250b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams re re gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya dag na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du'ang sangs
250b2(phal chen): rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar
250b3(phal chen): 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ong ba dag ste/
250b4(phal chen): 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas/ 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi
250b5(phal chen): zham ring dang tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas/ rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad
250b6(phal chen): kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig la cig lta ba'i bzhin thams cad do//
250b7(phal chen): thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba bzhin thams cad na'ang brjod de/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di so so nas
250b8(phal chen): smra bar gyur te// mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba mthu che la// gang dag kha dog rigs kyis lta 'dod pa// mig ma nyams log par lta bar gyur pa ste// de dag rgyal ba'i chos nyid mi shes so// de bzhin
251a1(phal chen): bal gshegs pa kha dog dbyibs dag ni// 'jig rten kun na'ang shes par nus pa med// gang gis bskal pa bye bar bsam byas kyang // mthu chen rnams kyi kha dog
251a2(phal chen): mtha' med do// de bzhin gshegs la mtshan nyid mi mnga' ste// chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med cing dbyen// yan lag kun ldan blta na nyams med par// bsas pa
251a3(phal chen): bzhin du kun na rab tu snang // sangs rgyas chos rnams gzhal du yod pa min// gang rnams ci la yang 'di'i tshul bshad de// ldan pa ma yin mi ldan ma yin pas// sangs rgyas
251a4(phal chen): chos rnams rang bzhin rab du dbyen// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phung po 'jig pa med// 'byung dang 'jig par spro bar mi mdzad de// mnga' brnyes mnga' sbyar rnam par gdon mi za// /
251a5(phal chen): brjod du med pa brtan pa rnam par spyod// lus dang sems kyang mnyam par rab gyur kyang // nang dang phyi'i rnam par dben pas na// gnyis po bgrang du mi rung shes pa rnams//
251a6(phal chen): chags med bcings med bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// gya nom snang zhing thugs gsal 'od mdzad pa// spyod yul yongs dag kun tu snang gyur ste// thams cad mkhyen pa kun
251a7(phal chen): gzigs kun na bzhugs// skye dgu'i don kyang rgya chen yangs pa mdzad// gcig tu gyur cing mang por rab tu 'gyur// mang por gyur cing gcig tu de bzhin 'gyur// 'gro ba'i kham
251a8(phal chen): ni du mar thugs chud cing // thams cad tshul dang 'drar bar rab tu 'gyur// sku med de chags pa yang med// byon pa med cing bstsags pa yod min yang // kha dog mtha' yas rnam
251b1(phal chen): par dgos byas shing // 'gro ba sna tshogs lus su de dag snang // 'jig rten thams cad sems kyis brtags pa yin// sems ni rtog pa nam yang ma yin te// bde gshegs ye shes
251b2(phal chen): de 'dra'i rang bzhin no// de phyir rgyal ba'i sku ni 'di 'drar snang // de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te/ shar phyogs log su 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag
251b3(phal chen): brgya bcu snang bar byas pa nas// bzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong phrag bcu'i bar du snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam
251b4(phal chen): bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa/ 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste/ rtogs par gyur pa de ril gyis
251b5(phal chen): bstan to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyis gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang thabs cig par snang ba de
251b6(phal chen): bzhin du// 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya dag na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag rgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan pa bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad
251b7(phal chen): du'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba
251b8(phal chen): dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya dag
252a1(phal chen): nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas/ 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten
252a2(phal chen): gyi khams 'di zhes bya ba'i ga nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas/ 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang
252a3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba nas/ rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go/
252a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig tu phyin pa dag
252a5(phal chen): ste/ gcig ci lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ci lta ba de bzhin thams cad
252a6(phal chen): na'ang brjod// de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to// 'jig rten rang byung de las tshogs med pa// mi gnas dam pa phul dang mchog gi rnams// drang srong
252a7(phal chen): chen po srid pa'i rgyud 'grel ba// yon tan kun ldan rnam dag 'di yin no// 'du 'dzi med cing chags pa mi mnga' ba// 'du shes dngos med gnas pa med pa'i rnams// phun sum dge ldan
252a8(phal chen): smad pa mi mnga' ba// mgon po rnams kyi chos nyid thub par dga'// shin du 'od sdang dag par gyur pa rnams// rgol du glags med rlog pa med pa'i rnams// g.yo med mtha' sa
252b1(phal chen): rnam par spangs pa yi// bde gshegs rnams kyi shes tshul 'di yin te// lus dang sems la rnam par rtogs med cing // bde gshegs chos la gang zhig 'jug 'gyur ba// de dag chos
252b2(phal chen): rnams kun gyi rang bzhin la// nam yang nem nur dbang du mi 'gro'o// 'jig rten dag na dmigs pa gang yod pa// de dag kun na bstan pa'i chos 'jug ste// gang dag phyir rgol med
252b3(phal chen): pas bstan mdzad nas// rang bzhin ldog par 'gyur ba gang yang med// dngos por rab shes las rnams yod min pa// the tshom thams cad rnam par spangs byas te// sangs rgyas
252b4(phal chen): byang chub rab tu rtogs pa'i tshe// sems la rnam par 'byed pa nam yang med// mi shes chos rnams rnam par bye ba dag/ rang byung tshig gi lam gyis rab brjod pa// sangs rgyas
252b5(phal chen): gsung gi rjes su 'brang byas nas// gcig kyang ma yin mang po'ang ma yin no// mang dang gcig pa nam yang yod min te// mang po rnams la gcig pa yod med do// mang dang
252b6(phal chen): gcig pa rnam par bsgom byas nas// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas shes par 'gyur// 'jig rten kun du sangs rgyas zhing rnams dang // shin du zhi ba'i chos rnams rnam
252b7(phal chen): bltas te// mi gnas sems la rtog pa med pa yi// dran ldan sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// sems can chos dang de bzhin zhing gi rnams// de dag rang bzhin ji bzhin brtag
252b8(phal chen): byas na// gcig dang tha dad gyur pa ma yin te// de ltar sangs rgyas tshul 'di shes pa yin// de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te/ shar phyogs logasu
253a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba snang bar bya ba nas/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bya ba'i bar du snang bar byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re yang 'dzam
253a2(phal chen): bu'i gling gi bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag rgya bstan pa nas// 'og min bye ba phrag rgya'i bar du bstan to// 'jig
253a3(phal chen): rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste// rtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyi bstan to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing
253a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig par snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa phrag rgya kun na'ang /
253a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo // thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi phyogs bcu nas/ byang chub
253a6(phal chen): sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas/ bzang po'i dpal
253a7(phal chen): zhes bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces
253a8(phal chen): bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa
253b1(phal chen): re re zhing byang chub sems dpa'
253b2(phal chen): spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas/ rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems
253b3(phal chen): dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan cig phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ci lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam
253b4(phal chen): dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na'ang brjod de/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to//
253b5(phal chen): shes rab dpag med chos rnams mtha' yas pa// srid pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin pa dag/ tshe ring nad med mnyam med mtshungs med 'od// yon tan cha mnga' de dag
253b6(phal chen): sbyor 'di'o// gang gis sangs rgyas chos rnams mngon rtogs shing // dus gsum kun du brtags kyang mi ngoms te// dmigs pa shes byed rnam par mi rtogs pa/
253b7(phal chen): bsam yas mos pa 'di dag sbyor 'di'o// sems can yul mos sems can 'du shes med// 'jig tshogs chos shes las kyi rgyud dang bral// bsam gtan nang dang
253b8(phal chen): sems la bcings pa med// tshogs med yid ldan de dag sbyor 'di yin// rtog mkhas rab du rtogs pa'i chos can rnams// mya ngan 'das spyod rigs la brtson pa dag
253b9(phal chen): thar pa'i lam brtson mnyam pa nyid ldan pa// zhi ba thob pa de dag sbyor 'di'o// ded dpon rjes song sangs rgyas byang chub mchog/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos dbyings bzhin
254a1(phal chen): rtogs shing // bden 'jug mkhas pas sems can rnams 'dul ba// bde gshegs bsam can 'di dag sbyor 'di'o// sangs rgyas don cig rjes su
254a2(phal chen): shes byas shing // chags med blo yangs rtogs shing bsam gtan byed// kun du 'gro bas song bas rtsol spyod pa// rang byung spyod pa de dag sbyor 'di'o// na mkha'i dbyings dang sprul pa
254a3(phal chen): yid ldan rnams// gnas dang rang bzhin mtshan nyid shes pa dag/ mya ngan 'das rigs spyod pa mkha' 'dra rnams// thob dka' thob pa rnams kyi sbyor 'di'o// zla ba zla phyed nyid dang
254a4(phal chen): nub bgrang zhing // lo dang bskal pa'i rang bzhin lus sems pa// 'jig rten 'du shing 'jig par gyur pa dang // grangs su sus rtogs de dag sbyor 'di'o// zhing gi sems can ci snyed
254a5(phal chen): skye mchi ba// gzugs dang gzugs med 'du shes 'du shes med// de dag ming dang gnas pa rtogs shes pa// bsam gyis mi khyab rtog pa'i sbyor 'di'o// 'das pa'i dus dang ma
254a6(phal chen): 'ongs da ltar gyi// ngag gis lam gyis gang na rtogs byed cing // dus gsum rang bzhin ji bzhin rtogs gyur pa// mnyam med de dag sbyor ba 'di yin no// de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig
254a7(phal chen): rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das nas/ shar phyogs log su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag bcu snang bar byas nas/ steng gi phyogs 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag bcu'i bar du snang bar
254a8(phal chen): byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/ 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongasu gang ci yang
254b1(phal chen): rung ste/ rtogs par de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul
254b2(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig par snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas
254b3(phal chen): kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo // thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi phyogs bcu nas/ bcu byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sem
254b4(phal chen): dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams
254b5(phal chen): cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ong ba dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas/ 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa'
254b6(phal chen): de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed sna
254b7(phal chen): tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba
254b8(phal chen): snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ci lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na
255a1(phal chen): @#ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod de// de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag so so nas smra bar gyur to// 'das dus gang gis bsgrub dka'i brtul shugs che brtsam
255a2(phal chen): zhing // nam yang zhum pa'i sems su rtong par mi byed de// rgal dka' brgal te bdag sems can kun 'dul zhes// seng ge'i sgra sgrogs de dag spyod yul 'di yin no// gang zhig
255a3(phal chen): 'dod dang sred pa 'byung zhing 'jug pa dang // ma rig gzhol pa gti mug mang bsgribs 'jig rten rnams// sems can rang bzhin bdag med brtan pa bzod par 'jug/ bdag kyang
255a4(phal chen): 'jig rten mgon gyur zhes pa de yul 'di// 'jig rten sems can gang zhig 'dod dregs 'dam bying ba// med pa'i chos la rtogs pas sdug bsngal thob gyur nas// sangs rgyas
255a5(phal chen): spyod yul chos la bag yod gang spyod cing // bdag gis sems can kun bsgrol de dag spyod yul 'di// sngon mtha' shes rga tshad med brtan pas mthong gyur cing // bdag bstan sem
255a6(phal chen): can pha rol mtha' yas 'khor gyur pa// de dag rgyal bas theg pa zhi ba mchog la bkod// bdag gis de 'dra'i chos brtan de'i spyod yulo// sems can khams rnams mgon med
255a7(phal chen): nad kyis gzir gyur cing // ngan song gzhol bar 'dod chag zhes sdang gti mug brdungs// me lce 'bar phung 'jigs gzugs mi bzad bsregs gyur pa// mthong nas dgrol phyir
255a8(phal chen): zhugs pa de dag spyod yul 'di'o// lam gol ma yin pa'i rkyen la spyod gyur cing // mun pa chen po rdol bar rga snyed 'gro mthong nas// snang ba chen po bskyed de sangs rgyas chom bstan ces/
255b1(phal chen): 'di skad tshigs brjod de dag spyod yul 'di yin no// sred pa'i mchos g.yengs sems can rab tu mang ba dag/ mtha' ma mi mthong skyabs med do zhes mi dga' ba// mthong nas brtson
255b2(phal chen): 'grus stobs bskyed chos kyi gru sbyar cing // pha rol 'gro zhes brjod de dag spyod yul 'di'o// sems can rtsa ba med la gnas pa mi mkhas kun// g.yang sa chen por lhung zhing sems
255b3(phal chen): nyams rmongs mthong nas// snying rjes chos kyi zam la mkhas pa su dgod cing // dran par gyis shes su smra de dag spyod yul 'di'o// shin tu dog pa'i brtson rar sdug bsngal sems can
255b4(phal chen): rnams// nad dang rga bas gzir cing mtshams kyis mnar ba dag/ mthong nas bdag gis thabs kyi chos rnams kun brtsams te// sems can kun grol sems dpa' de dag spyod
255b5(phal chen): yul 'di// sangs rgyas chos 'di rnams thams cad thog gyur the tshom med// chos dbyings spyod yul phyogs bcu kun tu rgyas bkang ste// 'di dag thams cad brtags na gsogs
255b6(phal chen): kyang mi 'jigs shing // sems can kun la snyoms de'i spyod yul lo// de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams dag nas 'das te/ shar phyogs log su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba
255b7(phal chen): phrag brgya snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya
255b8(phal chen): snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig stong snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams tsham med par
256a1(phal chen): pal @#snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal med par snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par snang bar byas so// de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams
256a2(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa kun du mtha' yas pa/ mu med pas 'tshams med pa/ dpag tu med pa dag kyang snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis
256a3(phal chen): klas pa/ na mkha'i mtha' brtags pa thams cad kyang snang bar byas so// gzhung de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi
256a4(phal chen): phyogs 'tshams dang / de bzhin du shar lce'i phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang / steng gi phyogs kyi bar du 'jig rten gyi kham
256a5(phal chen): bye ba snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong snang bar byas nas/ nam mkha'i mtha' brtags pa'i bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams
256a6(phal chen): bye ba snang bar byas so// de ltar phyogs bcu shin tu rgyas pas byas nas/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyang snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye
256a7(phal chen): pra phrag brgya brtan pa nas/ gzhung de bzhin du 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs gang ci yang rung ste/ rtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad
256a8(phal chen): kyang ril gyis bstan to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyis gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang thabs cig par snang
256b1(phal chen): ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi bdan la bzhugs par snang ngo // thams cad/
256b2(phal chen): du'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba ste/
256b3(phal chen): 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / ming 'di zhes bya ba nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar
256b4(phal chen): gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas/ 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing / byang chub sems dpa'
256b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ci lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes
256b6(phal chen): bya ba nas sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod de/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to// bskal pa gzhal yas bsam
256b7(phal chen): gyis mi khyab sems kyi skad cig la// gang gis mthong yang bstsags med 'gro dang dngos po'i tshul med pa'i// lam du rab tu 'jug pa de ni thams cad shes gyur te// stobs bcus
256b8(phal chen): tshul 'di ji ltar mkhyen bzhin 'jigs med sangs rgyas 'gyur// grags pa snyan par phyogs rnams kun du mtshungs med grags gyur cing // bgegs rnams kun las 'das te chos 'di
257a1(phal chen): la @dag la dgar spyad de// tshad med thams cad so sor zhi zhing don rnams kun rtogs pas// de phyir phyogs rnams kun bkang bde gshegs chos nyid 'di bstan to//
257a2(phal chen): dgongs pa ji bzhin de ni spyad pa'i 'bras bu 'thun pa ste// 'jig rten don 'gyur de bzhin gshegs pa chod pa yangs byas shing // de dag thams cad so sor 'thun par ye shes rnam bsgom
257a3(phal chen): pas// sems can dam pa sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra phyogs bcur ston// thog mar nyan 'dod bla ma bsnyen bkur bzod pa de byas shing // rang bzhin med pa'i chos la rab rtogs
257a4(phal chen): bsam gtan bskyed bsnyen pa// bde gshegs nyid ni rtogs 'gyur 'gro ba rnams sgoms sems tshig med// chos nyid de 'dra spyod pa myur tu bde gshegs par thob par 'gyur// snying
257a5(phal chen): nas 'dri zhing phyogs rnams rgyas byed rtse gcig thub byed cing // rgyal ba'i yon tan mos las mi ldog spyod pas tshim byed pa// dngos dang dngos med thams cad shes byas spangs shing
257a6(phal chen): dngos zad pa'i// sangs rgyas bdag med dpe med mthong ba de dag lus 'di yin// bzang po'i spyod yul can gyi sems kyis phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing // zhing rnams thams cad chos kyis
257a7(phal chen): rter gyis khyab byas tshim byed pa// ji bzhin chos gnas chos nyid mtha' la the tshom med pa'i rnams// stobs bcu ci 'dra de bzhin 'gyur ba'i lus ni 'di dag go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
257a8(phal chen): chos gang der brjod de la 'jug byed cing // chos kyi 'khor lo ci bzhin balka dka' gzhal yas rtag bskor ba// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsung kun byang chub yan lag tog/
257b1(phal chen): de ltar 'jug pas rtag tu sangs rgyas sku rab 'di dag mthong // mthong yang mig gi rnam shes tshul tu rdul tu mthong ba med// rnam shes rgyu ma bzhin pas mig stong pa stobs bcu mi mthong ngo //
257b2(phal chen): 'du shes thams cad rnam rtog yin par sangs rgyas mthong ba yin// shin tu chags med de ni rgyal ba mthong ba yin// sems can las mang bstsags pa de dag shin tu blta dka' ste/
257b3(phal chen): nang dang phyi dang dbyings dang mdog tu phyogs bcu kun na med// de bzhin rang byung sku ni gzhal yas phyogs rnams kun 'grengs pa// shes rab dka' ba 'dren pa chen po bsgrib pa med
257b4(phal chen): pas brnyes// na mkha' dag la zhing rnams bye ba dngos por gnas par snang // shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer las
257b5(phal chen): rnam par rgyas pa'i le'u ste// bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dpal la 'di skad ces smraso//
257b6(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rang bzhin gcig pa'i sems la bye brag tha dad pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag 'di lta ste/ bde 'gror 'gro ba dang / ngan song du 'gro ba dang / dbang po tshangs pa dang / dbang
257b7(phal chen): po ma tshangs pa dang / skye ba 'thun pa dang / skye ba mi 'thun pa dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / bde ba myong ba dang sdug bsngal myong ba snang ba dag la ltos// las kyis ni mi shes so//
257b8(phal chen): sems kyis ni las mi shes so// tshor bas ni rnam par smin pa mi shes so// rnam par smin pas ni tshor ba mi shes so// sems kyi ni tshor ba mi shes so// tshor bas ni sems mi shes so//
258a1(phal chen): rgyus ni rkyen mi shes so// rkyen gyis ni rgyu mi shes so// dngos pos ni dmigs pa mi shes so// dmigs pas ni dngos po mi shes so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs/
258a2(phal chen): rgyas dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshig su bcad de smras pa/ sems can bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ gang 'di yongs su dris pa dag/ chos rnams chos nyid 'di 'dra ba//
258a3(phal chen): 'jam dpal bdag las mnyam par gyis/ chos rnams 'di dag g.yo ba med// shin tu dngos po med pa ste// de phyir gzhan gyis gzhan dag gyis// ngo bo nyid kyang mi shes so// ji ltar
258a4(phal chen): chu rlung rgyud kyi rnams// gzhan dang gzhan tu 'grogs rgyu yang // gcig gi gcig ni mi shes ste// chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar 'bar ba'i mtshan ma can// 'od 'phro gzhan dang
258a5(phal chen): gzhan 'grogs kyang // gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te// chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no// de ltar rlung ni sten tshul gyis// gzhan dang gzhan tu rab tu rgyu// gcig gis gcig ni
258a6(phal chen): mi shes te// chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar sa'i khams kyi rnams// gcig gi gcig ni gnas gyur kyang // gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te// chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin//
258a7(phal chen): mig dang rna ba sna dag dang // lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnams// 'di dag lam gyi rgyu 'khod kyang // byed pa po ni gang yang med// 'byung ba'i rang bzhin med pa yis// 'byung ba nye
258a8(phal chen): par bstan byas kyang // bstan par byas pa gang yang med// bstan pa la ni dngos med do// mig ni rang bzhin nyid kyis stong // rna ba sna yang rang bzhin gyis// lce dang lus dang yid
258b1(phal chen): rnams kyang // med de yongs su brtags pa yin// gang zhig rang dngos med par// tshul bzhin rab tu rtogs byed pa// de'i mig la 'khrul pa med// chos mig bsam gyis mi khyab
258b2(phal chen): po// yang dag pa dang yang dag min// bden nam 'on te brdzun yang rung // 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten kun// tshigs gis lam gyis brjod pa'o// de nas byang chub sems
258b3(phal chen): dpa' 'jam dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sems can thams cad sems can med mod kyi// 'on kyang de bzhin
258b4(phal chen): gshegs pa ni/ sems can 'dul ba'i dus la bab pa dang / sems can gyi tshe ji lta ba dang lus ji lta ba dang / spyod pa ji lta ba dang / mos pa ji lta ba dang / mtshan ma ji lta ba dang /
258b5(phal chen): bsam pa ji lta ba dang / sbyor ba ji lta ba dang / sems ci lta ba dang / spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi sems can 'dul ba'i phyir mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems
258b6(phal chen): dpa' nor dpal gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshig su bcad de smras pa/ gang rnams rab tu zhi spyod cing // thos dang ldan pa'i sa 'di yin// 'di don ci 'dra de bzhin du/
258b7(phal chen): 'jam dpal bdag las mnyan par gyis// bdag gi lus la su gnas shes// gang gis nang ni rab shes pa// yang dag yod dam med pa'i don// des ni rab tu shes pa yin// lus
258b8(phal chen): kyi rnam par dgod pa ni// phyogs na mi gnas brjod pa yin// de bas shes pa de gnas la// nam yang chags par mi byed do// lus ni rnam par spyod pa yis// dngos po kun kyang
259a1(phal chen): la @rnam par bsgoms// sems ni phyir ldog mi 'gyur te// dngos po kun ni brtags pa'o// gang gi tshe ni rjes su 'brang // gang gi tshe ni phyir ldog 'gyur// ji ltar 'gal
259a2(phal chen): me'i 'khor lo yi// thog ma tha ma dkon pa yin// dngos po thams cad mi rtag par// skye bo gang rnams rtog pa yang // lus la bdag kyang med pa'i phyir// 'du shes phyir yang ldog
259a3(phal chen): par 'gyur// bdag med rmi lam lta bu yi// las ni kun du rab tu 'byung // rnam par smin las rab tu 'byung // phyi ma ji bzhin sngon ji bzhin// sems ni dbang byed yin par bshad//
259a4(phal chen): dad pa'i tshul ni ji bzhin du// tshul bzhin ma yin phyin ci log/ 'jig rten thams cad ston par byed// ci snyed 'jig rten 'ja' yod pa// de dag thams cad brtag pa ste// chos nyid
259a5(phal chen): de ni nam du yang // chos gcig la yang mi gnas so// rkyen rnam la ni rten gnas te// chos rnams so sor rab tu 'byung // de dag ldog par de bzhin 'gyur// phyi ma ji bzhin sngon de
259a6(phal chen): bzhin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sems can gyi 'byung ba chen po
259a7(phal chen): bzhi rnams yong su 'dzin pa med cing bdag gi med la mnyan pa yin yang 'on kyang / bde ba'i tshor ba dag kyang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag kyang rab tu snang // yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang /
259a8(phal chen): yid du mi 'ong bar bya ba dang / nad du byed pa dang phyi rol tu byed pa dang / tshor ba chung ba dang tshor ba che ba dang / tshe 'di la myong ba dang / tshe gzhan la myong ba dag kyang snang la/ chos kyi dbyings
259b1(phal chen): la ni yid du 'ong ba 'am yid du mi 'ong ba yang med pa 'di ci zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jas dpal la tshig su bcad de smras pa/
259b2(phal chen): ji ltar las rnams byas gyur pa/ tshor ba de bzhin 'byung 'gyur gyi/ 'di la byed pa gang yang med// 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o// shin du phyis pa'i me long la// ngo ni ji ltar
259b3(phal chen): 'dug pa bzhin// dri la de ni bzhin snang // chos kyis rang bzhin de bzhin no// ji ltar zhing dang sa bon dag/ gcig gi gcig ni mi shes kyang // rang bzhin nye bar ston pa byed// lus
