259b4(phal chen): kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// sgyu ma byed pa mkhas pa zhig/ lam por che ni song 'dug ste// gzugs rnams ston par byed pa bzhin// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// ji ltar shing
259b5(phal chen): ni 'khrul 'khor rnams// sna tshogs sgra mang brjod byas kyang // de ni bdag dang bdag med yin// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// ji ltar bya rnams mang po yi// sgo nga'i sgrub
259b6(phal chen): ni phye ba las// sgra skad gzhan dang gzhan 'gyur ba// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// ji ltar ma'i mngal du yang // bu ni 'phro bar mi 'gyur ba// 'on kyang dbang po sna tshogs
259b7(phal chen): 'gyur// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// ji ltar sems dmyal 'jig pa ni// gshin rje'i rigs rtogs sdug bsngal ba// de dag la ni 'ong ba med// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin//
259b8(phal chen): ji ltar rin chen mchog rnams dang // lha'i bu rnams kun ldan yang // 'pho ba snang ba gang yang med// de bzhin las kyi rang bzhin no// ji ltar 'jig rten la la dag/ bsam gyis mi
260a1(phal chen): @#khyab 'bar gyur kyang // de dag 'ong ba gang yang med// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems
260a2(phal chen): dpa' yon tan dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos cig mngon par sangs rgyas na/ 'on kyang chos tshad med pa yang yang dag par
260a3(phal chen): ston// zhing tshad med pa yang rnam par ston// sems can tshad med pa yang rab tu ston// gsungs tshad med pa yang rab tu sgrog/ sku tshad med pa yang shin tu ston// bsam pa tshad
260a4(phal chen): med pa yang thugs chud// rdzu 'phrul tshad med pa yang thugasu chud// rdzu 'phrul tshad med pa yang yang dag par ston// 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa yang shin tu bskyed// rgyan dang
260a5(phal chen): tshad med par yang byin gyis rlob// spyod yul tshad med pa yang shin tu ston la// chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam pa tha dad du mi snang ba 'di ci zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan
260a6(phal chen): dpal gyi// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshig su bcad de smras pa/ gnas 'di shes par dka' ba ste// rgyal ba'i sras kyis bdag la dris/ de ni mkhas pas rnam par
260a7(phal chen): shes// yon tan mos pa dpyod par byed// ji ltar sa ni gcig pu yang / sems mang po rab tu rgyu/ de la gcig dang tha dad med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar me ni
260a8(phal chen): gcig pu yang // 'jig rten kun na kun kyang 'bud// de la me lce tha dad med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar brgya mtsho gcig pu las// chu klung chad med 'bab gyur
260b1(phal chen): kyang // de la chu'i bye brag med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar klung ni gcig pu yang // 'jig rten kun du rgyu zhing ldang // de la gcig dang tha dad med// sangs rgyas
260b2(phal chen): chos nyid de bzhin no// sprin chen rnams ni 'brug sgrags shing // sa rnams kun kyang ngoms par byed// de'i char la bye brag med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// de ltar
260b3(phal chen): sa ni gcig pu yang // myu gu sna tshogs 'byin cing ston// sa la bye brag 'byed pa med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar grib med nyi ma ni// phyogs bcu kun du
260b4(phal chen): snang bar byed// de la 'od zer tha dad med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar na mkha'i zla ba ni// 'jig rten kun la rab tu snang // gnas nas 'gyur ba gang yang med//
260b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar tshangs pa mi mjed dag/ stong gsum na ni 'dug mod kyi// de la lus ni bye brag med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// de
260b6(phal chen): nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' mig gi dpal la 'di skad ces smra so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba bskyed par
260b7(phal chen): gcig kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can rnams/ gzugs sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / rigs sna tshogs dang / dbang po sna
260b8(phal chen): tshogs dang / longs spyod sna tshogs dang / dbang sna tshogs dang / 'khor lo sna tshogs dang / phyug dbul sna tshogs dang / yon tan sna tshogs dang / shes par sna tshogasu
261a1(phal chen): pa la yang snang la/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang la yang mi mnyam pa 'am/ tha dad du dgongs pa yang med ni ci zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' mig gi
261a2(phal chen): dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshig su bcad de smras pa/ ji ltar sa ni ro gcig kyang // sa bon tshul bzhin myug gu ston// byams dang sdang bar sems dpa' med/
261a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no// ji ltar chu ni ro gcig kyang // snod kyi dbang gis rnam par 'gyur// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon 'phrul ba// rgyud kyi rnams la rnam par 'gyur// ji
261a4(phal chen): ltar sgyu mkhan mkhas pa ni// rtag tu 'khor kyang snang bar byed// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba// shin tu sbyang ba dga' bar byed// ji ltar mkhas pa'i rgyal po dag/ 'gro ba
261a5(phal chen): mang po shes par byed// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba// ji ltar bskyed bzhin shes par byed// ji ltar dri med me long la// ji 'dri'i gzugs rnams de bzhin snang // de bzhin
261a6(phal chen): sems can bsam tshul du// sangs rgyas yon phul rnam dag 'gyur// ji ltar dug la sman pa'i sman// dug nang thams cad sos par byed// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba// nyon mong
261a7(phal chen): dug ni chen pos sal// ji ltar nyi ma shar ba ni// 'gro ba 'di dag snang bar byed// mun pa dge kyang rnam par sel// sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no// ji ltar zla ba dri ma med// kun
261a8(phal chen): tu mnyam pa nyid byas te// sa ni rab tu bsnang bar byed// sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no// ji ltar chu'i stobs shugs kyis// sa ni thams cad g.yos 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas
261b1(phal chen): yon phul de bzhin no// srid gsum 'gro ba rnams kyang spyod// 'bar dang 'od 'phror bcas pa'i me// thams cad dag tu bsregs pa'i dngos// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba/
261b2(phal chen): 'du byed thams cad bsreg par byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dpal la 'di skad ces smra so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin
261b3(phal chen): gshegs pa'i bstan pa gcig na/ thams cad lta ba 'thun pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar ci'i phyir mi 'gyur/ de dag kun la yang gzugs la ni gzugs nyid du zad/ tshor ba yang
261b4(phal chen): tshor ba nyid du zad// 'du shes kyang 'du shes nyid du zad/ 'du byed kyang 'du byed nyid du zad// rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa nyid du zad/ 'dod pa'i khams nyid 'dod pa'i khams
261b5(phal chen): nyid du zad/ gzugs kyi khams kyang gzugs kyi khams nyid du zad / gzugs med pa'i khams kyang gzugs med pa'i khams nyid du zad/ ma rig pa'ang ma rig pa nyid du zad/
261b6(phal chen): sred pa'ang sred pa nyid du zad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang phan par byed pa 'am gnod par byed pa ma yin na/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus
261b7(phal chen): dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshig su bcad de smras pa/ de ltar khyod kyis gang sris pa// la la myur du rnam grol zhing // la lerga par 'grol 'gyur ba// sangs
261b8(phal chen): rgyas sras pos bdag las nyon// 'di ni dpag tu med pa yi// sangs rgyas bsten gyi nyes ma yin// dang po brtson 'grus nan tan gyis// rtag tu khyad par 'gyur ba yin// ji ltar
262a1(phal chen): phal @rtsa dang shing gsher ba// mir gtsug shin tu nyams chung bzhin// ring por mi thogs 'chi bar 'gyur// de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// rtsi ltar rtsub mas rtsubs
262a2(phal chen): pa'i tshe// me byung ba ni myur bteg na// myur du 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin// de ltar le lor bstan pa yin// de ltar le lor bstan pa la// nyi ma'i nor bu lci ba la// yang dang yang bzhag btag
262a3(phal chen): pa ni// dril me 'byung mi 'gyur te// de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// ji ltar nyi ma shar ba'i tshe// byis pa rnams ni mig btsums shing // mi mthong ci phyir zhes smras pa// de bzhin le lo
262a4(phal chen): bstan pa la// rkang lag med par skyes pa'i phyir// ji ltar smig mnga' kha bu gis// sa ni dbugs par 'dod pa bzhin// de ltar le lo bstan pa la// ji ltar byis pas rgya mtsho las// yang
262a5(phal chen): dang yang du bcu byas shing // bskem par la la 'dod pa ltar// de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// ji ltar bum pa chus bkang zhing // bskal pa'i me ni byung ba'i tshe// la la bsad par 'dod pa ltar//
262a6(phal chen): de bzhin le lo'i bstan pa la// ji ltar la la phyogs bcu yi// nam mkha' ji snyed tha mal pa'i// gzugs kyis rgyas par dgang smra ba// de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// de nas byang chub sems
262a7(phal chen): dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' chos dpal 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras chos kyi tshul nyon mongs pa thams cad skyems pa 'di nyid/ blangs kyang sems can
262a8(phal chen): la la 'dod chags kyi dbang du 'gro/ la la zhe sdang gi dbang du 'gro/ la la gti mug gi dbang du 'gro/ nga rgyal gyi dbang du 'gro/ 'chal ba'i dbang du 'gro/ 'khon du 'dzin pa'i dbang du
262b1(phal chen): 'gro/ tha dog gi dbang du 'gro/ ser sna'i dbang du 'gro/ sgyu'i dbang du 'gro/ g.yo'i dbang du 'gro/ chos de dag kyang sems med par gzung du'ang mi nus te/ nyon mongs par gdag
262b2(phal chen): pa kun kyang rnam pa kun tu sems dpa'i rgyud du zad na// de ji lta bu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshig su bcad de smras pa/
262b3(phal chen): gang gis don tu dris pa rnams// sangs rgyas sras po nga las nyon// yang dag sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di// thos pa tha tsam gyis mi 'grub po// la la stobs med chu klung gis// nan
262b4(phal chen): gyis khyer bar gyur pa dag/ skom zhing shi bar gyur pa bzhin// ma sgoms chos kyang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'gro ba mang po la// zas dang skom dang byin byas kyang // bdag nyid bkres pas
262b5(phal chen): shi ba ltar// de bzhin chos lam bsgom pa'o// ji ltar smad pa la la zhig/ sman rnams thams cad bdog bzhin du// lto ba'i nad kyis shi ba bzhin// chos la ma bsgoms pa de bzhin no//
262b6(phal chen): ji ltar dbyig gi mdog dag tu// rin chen mang po 'grang byed kyang // nam byed tsam yang mi thob pa// chos la ma bsgom de bzhin no// ji ltar bde ba kun pa yi// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor
262b7(phal chen): skyes kyang // zas dang gos dag mi mdog pa// de bzhin chos la ma bsgoms pa'o// ji ltar 'on pha rol mo'i sgra// sil snyan glu la mkhas pa zhig/ gzhan dag de yis dga' byed pa/
262b8(phal chen): chos la ma sgoms pa de bzhin no// ji ltar dbus long ri mo mkhan// tshong 'dus dbus su 'drir 'jug kyang // bdag nyid kyis ni mithong ba// chos la ma bsgom pa de bzhin no// ji ltar
263a1(phal chen): @#mtsho chen mnyan pa zhig/ skye bo mang po sgrol byed kyang // bdag nyid de nang 'chi 'gyur ba// chos la ma bsgom pa de bzhin no// ji ltar lam gyi bzhi mdor yang // phun sum
263a2(phal chen): tshogs pa kun brjod cing // bdag gis thos pa'i mi 'gyur ba// chos la ma bsgom pa de bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal
263a3(phal chen): la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin// de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la la la ni sbyin pa
263a4(phal chen): brjod pa mdzad/ la la ni tshul khrims/ la la la ni bzod pa/ la la la ni brtson 'grus/ la la la ni bsam gtan/ la la la ni shes rab rjod pa mdzad/ la la la ni byams pa/ la la la
263a5(phal chen): ni snying rje/ la la la ni dga' ba/ la la la ni btang snyoms brjod pa mdzad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni/ chos gcig 'gas 'byung bar mi nus so// de nas
263a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigasu bcad de smras pa/ sems can gzhan gyi bsam shes pa// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba dag/ de ltar gang
263a7(phal chen): gdon dris pa// sangs rgyas sras po bdag las son// smra ba'i mchog ni gang yang rung // chas gcig gis ni byung ba med// gang yang byung ba yod pa min// 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin med
263a8(phal chen): bskal pa gang la gnas pa yi// bsam pa rnams ni mkhyen mdzad cing / gang la ci dag tshul 'thun pa// de bzhin chos kyang bstan pa mdzad// ser sna can la sbyin pa mdzad// tshul khrims ngan
263b1(phal chen): la tshul khrims rnams// mi bzod la ni bzod dang nges// brtson 'grus 'byor pa le lo la'o// rnam par 'khrugs pa bsam gtan brjod// shes rab 'byor pa shes med la'o//
263b2(phal chen): gdugs pa'i sems la byams pa bshad// 'che ba rnams la snying rje ste// zhum pa la dga' bar bshad// 'byor pa'i sems la btang snyoms te// sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad
263b3(phal chen): kyang // rim pas de ltar byung ba yin// ji ltar sa la las bya ba// khyim gyis ngos la rim pa bzhin// de bzhin sbyin dang tshul khrims dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i thog mar 'gro
263b4(phal chen): rgyal ba'i gnas dang grong rdal rnams// rub pa'i phyir ni ra ba ste// de bzhin bzod pa brtson 'grus dag/ byang chub sems dpa' rub phyir ro// ji ltar gcig cig rgyal po ni// sa
263b5(phal chen): rnam thams cad skyong bar byed// de bzhin bsam gtan shes rab dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyabs bzhin no// 'khor lo'i sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni// bde ba thams cad ster ba ltar/
263b6(phal chen): de bzhin tshangs pa'i gnas rnams kyang // byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba 'byin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dpal la 'di
263b7(phal chen): skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'byung ba gcig ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams na// sbyor ba rnam pa tha dad pa dag 'di ltar 'jig
263b8(phal chen): rten gyi khams rnam pa tha dad pa dang / chos bstan pa tha dad pa dang / sems can rnams 'dul ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang / tshe'i tshad rnam pa tha dad pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad
265a1(phal chen): bal @#pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / 'khor tshogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / bsten pa'i tshul rnam pa tha dad pa dang / chos kyi byin gyis brlabs
265a2(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa dag ci'i phyir snang bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs par ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
265a3(phal chen): rgya bar mi nus so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshig su bcad de smras pa/ chos kyi rgyal po'i chos nyid ni/ 'jam dpal
265a4(phal chen): rtag tu gcig pa ste/ sgrib pa med pa gzigs pa yi// 'byung ba de yang gcig pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad sku gcig ste// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku// shes rab thugs kyang
265a5(phal chen): gcig pa ste// mi 'jig stobs kyang de bzhin no// sngan chad byang chub bzhugs pa'i tshe// ji ltar yongs su bsngo mdzad pa// 'khor du chos rnams bstan pa dang // de dag zhing yang de
265a6(phal chen): bzhin 'gyur// zhing gi phun sum gang yod pa// sangs rgyas rnams la thams cad 'grub// sems can ji ltar sbyangs pa rnams// de'i rnam pa de ltar mthong // ji ltar sangs rgyas chos
265a7(phal chen): nyid du// kun gyis sangs rgyas mi mthong ste// sangs rgyas zhing dang skra dag dang // 'khor du chos bstan de bzhin no// gang rnams smon lam kun ldan zhing // sngan chad bsam pa yongs
265a8(phal chen): sbyangs pas// thams cad gzigs pa'i tshul gyi rnam// ji lta ba bzhin thams cad mthong // sems can bsam pa ji bzhin dang // las dang stobs kyang ji bzhin pa// de lta de ltar
265b1(phal chen): mthong gyur te// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnam 'phrul lo// sangs rgyas zhing la rtogs mi mnga'// de dag byams sdang yod pa min// bsam pa'i tshul ni ji bzhin tu// srogs chags rnam
265b2(phal chen): kyis de bzhin mthong // rnam pa tha dad 'jig rten khams// de ltar snang bar gyur pa de// drang srong chen po kun gzugs pa'i// nyes pa'i skyon las gyur pa med// gang na 'dul ba yod pa yi//
265b3(phal chen): 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// skyes bu drang srong rnams kyang snang // de nas sangs rgyas chos nyid do// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis// byang chub sems dpa'
265b4(phal chen): 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag cag gis rang rang gi spobs pa bstan pa rnams smras pa yin na// da khyod kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
265b5(phal chen): yul rtsom te/ spos par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi tshogs ni gang // sangs rgyas kyi yul du 'gro ba ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug pa ni
265b6(phal chen): ji lta bu/ sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud pa'i shes pa ni gang // sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rjes su 'gro ba ni gang // sangang rgyas kyi yul shin du bstan pa ni gang // sangs rgyas kyi yul
265b7(phal chen): shes par bya ba ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul rtogs pa ni gang // sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi tshul ni ji lta bu// sangs rgyas kyi yul ni ci tsam du yangs// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
265b8(phal chen): 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la tshig su bcad de smras pa/ na mkha'i yul dang 'dra ba ste// kun tu 'od la 'dra ba med/ sems can thams cad 'jug pa
266a1(phal chen): @#// ste// chos nyid la ni 'jug pa med// tshogs rnams thams cad bstan par ni// bskal pa bye bar mi nus te// ji snyed rgyal ba'i tshogs mnga' ba// de ni sangs rgyas yul
266a2(phal chen): yin no// blo gros sems kyang ci bzhin du// sems can thams cad rab tu 'jug/ de la bstan pa thogs pa med// de ni sangs rgyas yul yin no// 'jig rten thams cad 'jug pa dang /
266a3(phal chen): 'jig rten rgyu ba gang yod pa// de dag kun la ye shes gnas// gzugs med snang ba ma yin no// sangs rgyas ye shes chags med de// dus gsum kun la chags pa med// na mkha'
266a4(phal chen): 'byung dang mtshungs pa med// de ni ye shes yul yin no// chos kyi dbyings ni tha mi dad// sems can khams rnams rtogs par mkhyen// dbyings rnams thams cad rab tu brnyes/
266a5(phal chen): de ni sangs rgyas yul yin no// skar bdag ci snyed yod pa dang // sems can kun gyi sgra skad du// skra la mkhyen pa thugs chud kyang // rnam par rtogs pa gang yang med// rnam shes
266a6(phal chen): rnam par shes bya ste// sems kyis brjod pa ma yin te// ye shes rang bzhin du dag/ sems can rnams la rab tu bshad// nyon mongs med cing las med de// dngos po med cing
266a7(phal chen): gnas pa med// snang ba med cing rgyu ba med// 'jig rten dag tu'ang mnyam par spyod// sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rnams// dus gsum kun tu rab yangs pa// sems gcig
266a8(phal chen): la ni rab 'jug pas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes 'jug/ de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na// sems can gyi rgyud ci snyed pa dang / chos kyi rgyud ci snyed pa dang // las
266b1(phal chen): kyi rgyud ci snyed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi rgyud ci snyed pa dang / lus kyi rgyud ci snyed pa dang / dbang po'i rgyud ci snyed pa dang / skye ba'i rgyud ci snyed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu'i rgyud
266b2(phal chen): ci snyed pa dang / tshul khrims log pa'i 'bras bu'i rgyud ci snyed pa dang / yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ci snyed pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ rab tu snang bar byas te/
266b3(phal chen): ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rab tu snang bar gyur pa de bzhin tu/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong / tshad med dpag tu med pa/ grangs med bsam
266b4(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa sa 'tshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa/ na mkha'i dbyings
266b5(phal chen): kyi mtha' brtags pa thams cad na yang / sems can gyi rgyud ci snyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ gzhung de bzhin du yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ci snyed pa'i bar de dag thams cad sangs rgyas
266b6(phal chen): mthus rab tu snang bar gyur to// gzhung de bzhin du lce phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtsham dang /
266b7(phal chen): de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs 'tshams dang / de bzhin tu steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
266b8(phal chen): khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa/ dpag tu med pa grangs med pa/ bsam gyi mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas par mu med pa/ sa 'tshams med pa/
267a1(phal chen): @#gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi bkrus pa/ namakha'i dbyings kyi mtha' brtag pa dag na/ sems can gyi rgyud ji snyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ gzhung
267a2(phal chen): de bzhin du yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ci snyed pa'i bar du/ de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rab tu snang bar gyur to// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po zhes bya ba/
267a3(phal chen): las/ byang chub sems dpas dris pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcwo lnga pa'o// / bam po bcwo brgyad pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye she
267a4(phal chen): dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji ltar na kha na ma tho ba med pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan
267a5(phal chen): pa yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i nga gri las dang ldan pa yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin/ lus kyi las rnam par mnyam pa yin/ ngag gi las rnam par mnyam
267a6(phal chen): ba yin// yid kyi las rnam par mnyam pa yin// lus kyi las smad pa yin// ngag gi las ma smad pa yin// yid kyi las ma smad pa yin// lus kyi las mi 'phrog pa yin// ngag gi
267a7(phal chen): las mi 'phrog pa yin// yid kyi las mi 'phrog pa yin// lus kyi las mi ldog pa yin// ngag gi las mi ldog pa yin// yid kyi las mi ldog pa yin// lus kyi las mi 'khrug pa yin/
267a8(phal chen): ngag gi las mi 'khrug pa yin// yid kyi las mi 'khrug pa yin// lus kyi las bsngags pa yin// ngag gi las bsngags pa yin// yid kyi las bsngags pa yin// lus kyi las rnam
267b1(phal chen): bar dag pa yin// ngag gi las rnam par dag pa yin// yid kyi las rnam par dag pa yin// lus kyi las nye ba nyon mongs pa med pa yin/ ngag gi las nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yin/
267b2(phal chen): yid kyi las nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yin// lus kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin// ngag gi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin// yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin// rig
267b3(phal chen): phun sum tshogs pa yin// rus phun sum tshogs pa yin// rgyud phun sum tshogs pa yin// gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yin// mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yin// dran phun sum
267b4(phal chen): tshogs pa yin// blo gros phun sum tshogs pa yin// rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin// dga' ba phun sum tshogs pa yin// blo phun sum tshogs pa yin// blo gros phun sum
267b5(phal chen): tshogs pa yin// blo gros dam par gyur pa yin// blo gros rab tu gyur pa yin// blo gros tshad med pa yin// blo gros grangs med pa yin// blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin// blo
267b6(phal chen): gros mtshungs pa med pa yin// blo gros gzhal du med pa med pa yin// blo gros brjod du med pa yin// blo gros stobs can yin// sbyor ba'i stobs can yin// rkyen gyi stobs can yin/
267b7(phal chen): dmigs pa'i stobs can yin// dbang po'i stobs can yin// rnam par lta ba'i stobs can yin// zhig nas kyi stobs can yin// lhag mthong gi stobs can yin// nges par rtogs
267b8(phal chen): pa'i stobs can yin// phung po la mkhas pa yin// kham la mkhas pa yin// skye mched la mkhas pa yin// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin// 'dod pa'i khams la
268a1(phal chen): la@#mkhas pa yin// gzugs kyi khams la mkhas pa yin// gzugs med pa'i khams la mkhas pa yin// 'das pa la mkhas pa yin// ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pa/
268a2(phal chen): yin// da ltar byung ba la mkhas pa yin// dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin// chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin// brtson
268a3(phal chen): 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin// dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin// rab tu byang chub yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas
268a4(phal chen): pa yin// ting 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin// btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ stong pa nyid yongs su bsgoms pa yin//
268a5(phal chen): mtshan ma med pa yongs su bsgom pa yin// smon pa med pa yongs su bsgom pa yin// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
268a6(phal chen): tu phyin pa yin// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ byams pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ snying rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ dga' ba'i pha rol tu
268a7(phal chen): phyin pa yin/ btang snyoms kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i rnam par smin pa
268a8(phal chen): shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ dbang po dang brtson 'grus tha dad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gcig nas/ gcig tu rgyud pa khong du chud pa yin/ khams sna tshogs dang khams
268b1(phal chen): du ma'i shes bya khong du chud pa yin// mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa du ma shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ kun tu 'gro ba'i lam shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ bsam
268b2(phal chen): gtan dang rnam par thar pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dang / ldang ba shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ sgrib
268b3(phal chen): pa med pa'i rjes su dran pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ lha'i mig chags pa med pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par
268b4(phal chen): bcad pa zhes bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ lha'i dbang pos yongasu bzung ba yin/ ku'i dbang pos yongasu bzung ba yin/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos yongasu bzung ba yin/ dri za'i dbang
268b5(phal chen): pos yongasu bzung ba yin// lha ma yin gyi dbang pos yongasu bzung ba yin/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ mi 'am ci'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin//
268b6(phal chen): lto 'phye chen po'i dbang pos yongasu bzung ba yin/ mi'i dbang pos yongasu bzung ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ lha'i dbang pos yongs su bkur ba yin/
268b7(phal chen): klu'i dbang pos yongs bkur ba yin/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos bkur ba yin/ dri za'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bkur ba yin/ na mkha' lding gi dbang
268b8(phal chen): bos bkur ba yin/ mi 'am ci'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ mi'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/
269a1(phal chen): 2 @sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa yin/ skyabasu gyur pa yin/ dpung gnyen tu gyur pa yin/ mgon du gyur pa yin/ sgron mar gyur pa yin/
269a2(phal chen): snang bar gyur pa yin/ 'od du gyur pa yin/ 'dren par gyur pa yin/ rnam par 'dren par gyur pa yin/ yongs su 'dren par gyur pa yin/ sems can thams cad kyi mchog
269a3(phal chen): tu gyur pa yin/ gtso bor gyur pa yin/ thu bor gyur pa yin/ rab tu gyur pa yin/ dam par gyur pa yin/ phul du gyur pa yin/ bla na med pa yin/ kye rgyal sras ji ltar
269a4(phal chen): na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mnyam pa med pa yin/ de skad smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal la 'di
269a5(phal chen): skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod de ltar skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying rtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams ni don dang / phan
269a6(phal chen): pa dang bde ba dang / bde bar rnam par gzung spyad pa'i phyir zhugs shing / de ltar khyod rnam pa 'di lta bu'i gnas dag yongs su dri bar sems pa ni/ kye rgyal ba'i sras la leg
269a7(phal chen): so legs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yon tan gyi khyad
269a8(phal chen): par 'di dag thams cad thob par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la thog pa med pa'i las su 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang ma byon/
269b1(phal chen): pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi lam du 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi rtong pa'i sems kyang de dag la nye bar gnas pa dang / chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin
269b2(phal chen): du rnam par lta ba yang de dag la nye bar gnas pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / kun du bzang
269b3(phal chen): zhing kun tu mdzes pa dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i srog chags thams cad la ston pa/ gnyis par 'gyur ba'i
269b4(phal chen): sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i spyod pa yod de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan pas/ yon tan gyi khyad
269b5(phal chen): bar 'di dag thams cad thob par 'gyur ba'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba de dag gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la byang chub sems
269b6(phal chen): dpa' khyim gyi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad rang bzhin shes pa dang ldan pas/ khyim gyis thibs pos zil ni non par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do//
269b7(phal chen): ma dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams can thams cad skye bo thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas dang 'grogs par gyur cig ces
269b8(phal chen): bskyed do// bu dang bu mo dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad sred pas shin tu bral bas/ dga' ba dang mi dga' ba dang rnam par bral bar gyur
270a1(phal chen): @#cig ces sems bskyed do// 'dod pa'i yon tan dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad yon gyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'dod
270a2(phal chen): pa'i gsal zhing / rnam par sel bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// glu dang gar dang rol mo dang / sil snyan dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad dang /
270a3(phal chen): gar mkhan gyi tshe na lta bur mthong ba dang ldan zhing / chos yang dag par 'gro ba'i brjod pa rab tu thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chung ma'i 'khor gyi nang du 'dug pa'i tshe/
270a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i gsal shin dang bral zhing 'phags pa'i sar chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rgyan gyi brgyan pa'i tshe/ byang chub
270a5(phal chen): sems dpa' sems can thams cad srid par 'byung ba 'jig pa'i pha rol du phyin pas khur bor bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khang thog tu phyin pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
270a6(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi khyad par khong du chud cing khang stengs su phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad bdag
270a7(phal chen): gir bya ba med de yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems med cing / bdag gi thams cad yongs su gtong bar gyur cig sems bskyed do// ma bral zhing 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
270a8(phal chen): sems can thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar phyir te/ 'du ba dang shin du thal bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// btson ra la kha na ma thor mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
270b1(phal chen): sems can thams cad gnas med pa la spyod cing / gang du dga' bar 'dod par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khyim nas khyim med par 'byung ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
270b2(phal chen): sems can thams cad sems bcings pa dang / grol ba med cing grol ba med de mi dgos pa dang / bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dge 'dun gyi ra ba'i 'tshams 'da' ba'i
270b3(phal chen): tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad 'gal ba med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing 'thun par 'gro ba mang po dang ldan par cig ces bskyed do// mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi drung du
270b4(phal chen): 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad chos la brtson zhing cho ga la mkhas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba'i tshe/ byang chub sem
270b5(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad bar chad med ces phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ gos dkar po 'dor ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
270b6(phal chen): cad sdig pa la brtson pa spangs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu sbyangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// skra dang kha spu breg pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
270b7(phal chen): shin tu mnyam par bzhag cing / nyon mongs pa med par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do// gos ngur smrig gyon pa'i ma/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad drang srong chen po'i
270b8(phal chen): sems dang ldan zhing rnyog pa med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rab tu 'byung ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad skye bo thams cad yongasu bskyang ba'i phyir/
271a1(phal chen): @de bzhin gshegs pa'i rab tu byung bas rab tu 'byung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sangs rgyas la skyabasu 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can
271a2(phal chen): thams cad dge ba la mos pa mngon par skyes pas/ sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi 'chad pa'i don tu/ brtson par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// tshul skyabs 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub
271a3(phal chen): sems dpas sems can thams cad chos kyi gtor rab tu thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
271a4(phal chen): chags pa'i gnad dang bral zhing dge 'dun yongs su sdud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bslab pa'i tshig yang dag par len pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
271a5(phal chen): tshul bzang po la yang dag par spyod cing / bslab pa thams cad la shin tu bslab par gyur cig ces bskyed do// slob dpon gyis bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can tham
271a6(phal chen): cad log pa ma yin pa'i las la spyod cing / tshul dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mkhan pos bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
271a7(phal chen): thams cad gnas med pa la yang dag par gzhol shing / mi skye ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur ces sems bskyed do// bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems
271a8(phal chen): can thams cad kyi khyad par gyi/ pha rol tu phyin te/ thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// gtsug lag khang du 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
271b1(phal chen): sems can thams cad mi 'phrogs pa'i chos can tu gyur te/ bla na med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bstan 'ding ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems
271b2(phal chen): can thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing / legs par bkod pa'i chos can tu gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 'dug pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi
271b3(phal chen): gnas pa'i/ sems kyi snying po byang chub la 'dug par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dkyil mo dkrung 'cha' ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi g.yo ba'i
271b4(phal chen): sa la dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bstan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// zhi gnas yongs sbyong ba byed pa'i/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug
271b5(phal chen): pa la brtson zhing zhi ba dang / dul ba la rab tu gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lhag mthong yongs su sbyong ba byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
271b6(phal chen): cad shin tu nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos can tu gyur te/ chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do// dkyil mo dkrung 'jig pa'i tshe/ byang chub
271b7(phal chen): sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu mnyam par bzhag cing / 'du byed thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'jig rten rnam par mthong bar gyur cig ces sems skyed do// rkang 'thil
271b8(phal chen): gzhol ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad rnam par grol ba mi 'khrug pa la/ rab tu gnas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rkang 'thil 'deg pa'i tshe//
272a1(phal chen): la @#byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa dang ldan pa thob ste/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba las 'thon par gyur cig ces bskyed do// slad
272a2(phal chen): g.yogs gyon pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa bla na med pa dang ldan zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu brtan par gyur cig ces sems
272a3(phal chen): bskyed do// ska rags 'ching ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can tu gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad shin tu 'brel bar gyur cig ces ses
272a4(phal chen): bskyed do// bla gab gyon pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi khyad par gyi pha rol du phyin thob ste/ gong nas gong du dge ba'i rtsa ba thob par gyur
272a5(phal chen): cig ces sems bskyed do// sbyar ma gyon pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi 'khrugs pa'i chos tu gyur te/ thabs dam pas mngon par bkab par gyur cig
272a6(phal chen): ces sems bskyed do// so shing len pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad yongs su dag pa'i dngos po thob pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos rnam par dag pa thob par gyur cig
272a7(phal chen): ces sems bskyed do// so shing za'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa shin tu bcom te/ sems dul shing sems rnam par dag par gyur cig ces
272a8(phal chen): sems bskyed do// dben par 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug spangs te/ sdig pa'i chos thams cad spangs par
272b1(phal chen): gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chu ngog su 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pa'i chos thams cad tu byung bar gyur cig ces
272b2(phal chen): sems bskyed do// gtsang sbra'i las byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu dag pa'i dngos pos gtsang zhing nges pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyedado// /
272b3(phal chen): lag pa kru ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bzung shing bcang ba'i phyir/ bkra shis kyi lag pa dang ldan par gyur cig sems bskyed//
272b4(phal chen): ngo 'khru ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu nyon mongs pa dag dang bral zhing / chos thams kyi sgo rnam par dag pa thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do//
272b5(phal chen): khar ba len pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mchod sbyin byas shing / lam ston par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lhung bzed len pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems
272b6(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis mchod par 'os shing snod du gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// spyod yul tu mngon tu zhugs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
272b7(phal chen): sems can thams cad gnas med pa la yang dag par gzhol shing / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul la mngon tu phyogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lam du zhugs pa'i tshe/ byang
272b8(phal chen): chub sems dpas sems can thams cad phyin ma lus par 'gro zhing sangs rgyas kyi lam du zhugs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems
273a1(phal chen): can thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos bsgribs pa med pa grub par gyur pas/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpung med pa khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems
273a2(phal chen): bskyed do// lam mtho ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu zhum pa med de/ khams gsum las gyen du 'phags par gyur cig ces sems bskyed//
273a3(phal chen): lam dma' ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu brtan zhing sangs rgyas thams cad shin tu 'dud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do//
273a4(phal chen): lam nyam nga ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lta ba yo zhing mi drang ba dang bral te/ lam nyam nga ba yongs su spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed// /
273a5(phal chen): lam drang po mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad g.yo med cing sgyu med la/ sems drang po dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lam rdul
273a6(phal chen): chen po mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin du rdul med pa'i chos yang dag par thob ste/ 'dod chags par gyur pa'i chos las rnam par 'gral
273a7(phal chen): bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rdul med pa'i lam mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa dang ldan zhing /
273a8(phal chen): sems 'jam par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// g.yang sa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsgrib pa med par rtogs par khong du chud cing /
273b1(phal chen): sdig pa'i chos thams cad gsal te/ dge ba'i chos la rab tu gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 'khor mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
273b2(phal chen): dus gsum du rtogs pa'i chos bstan pa dang mthun par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// ka ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad khro zhing 'khon tu 'dzin
273b3(phal chen): dang bral te khengs pa dang 'khrugs pa dang / rnam par thal bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// nags 'tshal mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lha dang
273b4(phal chen): 'jig rten du bcas pas phyag bya ba'i gnas su gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// ri mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad thob par dga' ba dang thibs po
273b5(phal chen): tsha med pa rab tu thob cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi mngon par 'phags par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// shing tsher ma can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
273b6(phal chen): cad 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug med cing tsher ma dang bral bar gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do// shing lo ma can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
273b7(phal chen): cad bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dag gis/ rab tu yog par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// me tog mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub ses
273b8(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad las mngon par shes pa'i me tog rgyas par me tog lta bur gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// me tog gi shing mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub
274a1(phal chen): sems dpas sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi me tog shin tu rgyas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// shing rtogs mthong ba'i tshe/
274a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad snying po byang chub tu gzhol shing sangs rgyas kyi chos brtsal ba thams cad 'bras bu yod de/ 'bras bu dam pa rab tu thob par gyur cig ces
274a3(phal chen): sems skyed do// chu klung mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nyamasu myong ste/ chos kyi rgyud la mnyam par bzhag par gyur cig ces sems
274a4(phal chen): skyed do// lu ma mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir/ se gol rtogs pa tsam gyis khong du chud par gyur cig/
274a5(phal chen): ces sems bskyed do// rdzing bu mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi tshig shin tu bstan pa la mkhas shing / chos thams cad kyis rgyas pa'i
274a6(phal chen): tshig gi las dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khron pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad 'byor pa dang ldan zhing spobs pa mang
274a7(phal chen): bor gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mtsho mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gong nas gong du dmigs pa la rab du brtson zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad par gyur
274a8(phal chen): cig ces sems bskyed// zam pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad yongasu sprul ba la zam par red par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// yur ba mthong ba'i tshe/
274b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa la mkhas shing bag la nyal ba dang kun nas 'khor bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rab mthong ba'i tshe/ byed
274b2(phal chen): chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang / reg bya la sred pa rab tu byung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mya ngan med pa'i nags tshal mthong ba'i tshe/
274b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sred pa shin tu med cing mya ngan med par rab tu thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// gza' shing rab mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sem
274b4(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongasu mi btang bar bya ba la shin tu brtson par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sems can rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i mthong ba'i tshe/

274b6(phal chen): chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sbyang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas rgyan med pa thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dga' ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems
274b7(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad dga' zhing mos pa dang spro bas dga' ba mang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mi dga' mang po mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems
274b8(phal chen): can thams cad 'dus byas kyi dngos po thams cad la mi dga' ba mang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sems can bde ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems
275a1(phal chen): can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad rab tu thob pas shin tu bde bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sems sdug bsngal ba mthong ba'i tshe/
275a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rtsa ba rab tu thob ste/ sdug bsngal zhi bar byed par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// nad med pa ma yin pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/
275a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu mya ngan med pa'i chos can du gyur te/ tha dad pa med pa'i chos khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sems can sdug gu
275a4(phal chen): mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la/ mos pa mang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mi sdug pa'i sems can
275a5(phal chen): mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi ba la mos pa chung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// drin gzo ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang
275a6(phal chen): chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mdzad pa shes par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// drin gzo ba med pa'i sems can
275a7(phal chen): mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i lta ba la drin du gzo ba med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dge sbyong bya'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems
275a8(phal chen): can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug par bya ba la brtson shing zhi ba dang 'dul ba la gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bram ze mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems
275a9(phal chen): can thams cad tshangs pa'i dam par gyur de sdig pa spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rga thub can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar
275b1(phal chen): thug par bya ba la brtson zhing rga thub la shin tu gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// brtul zhugs la zhugs pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams can
275b2(phal chen): thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su mi rtong pa'i phyir brtul shugs dam par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// go gyon pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
275b3(phal chen): sems can thathas cad rang gi chos yongs su btsal ba la/ go cha bzang po shin tu bgos par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// go ma gyon pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub
275b4(phal chen): sems dpas sems can thams cad la go gyon pa med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rgol ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
275b5(phal chen): cad la bas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 'tsho ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad spyod lam
275b6(phal chen): bcos pa med cing / 'tsho ba dag par gyur cig ces seMs bskyed do// rgyal po mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams can thogs pa med par chos kyi 'khor lo
275b7(phal chen): bskor ba'i chos kyi rgyal por gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rgyal po'i bu mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sras chos las skyes pa
275b8(phal chen): chos kyi sprul par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khyim bdag mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gdon mi za ba'i blo can du gyur te/ grong gi chos
276a1(phal chen): @spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// blon po mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i chos kyi spyod pa thams cad la/
276a2(phal chen): bzang po'i yid la byed par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// grong khyer mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gdul dka' ba'i sems dang ldan par gyur te/
276a3(phal chen): mthu bo che'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do// rgyal po'i gnas mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad yon gyi rjes su 'brang bar 'thun pa
276a4(phal chen): la mos pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// nags tshal gyi 'dab ma mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
276a5(phal chen): rten gyis sngags par 'ongs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// slong du 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi
276a6(phal chen): dbyings su chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sgor phyin pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad kyi sgor phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// nang du phyin
276a7(phal chen): pa'i che/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dus gsum du mnyam pa nyid kyi nang du phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// me sbyin no zhes ma
276a8(phal chen): byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing / spangs pa med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mi sbyin no zhes byas pa'i tshe/
276b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten las phyir spang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do//
276b2(phal chen): lhung bzed stong pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis/ stong par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lhung bzed gang ba mthong
276b3(phal chen): ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos dkar po thams cad kyis yongs su rgyas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rim gror byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems
276b4(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi spyod pa thams cad la rim gror byed par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rim gro ma byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
276b5(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i chos mchod pa thams cad la rag ma lus par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khrel yod pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems
276b6(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad dbang po dben pa'i spyod pa dang ldan zhing khrel yod par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// ngo tsha med pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems
276b7(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad byams pa la gnas shing ngo tsha med pa yongasu spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyod do// kha zas gsod pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
276b8(phal chen): sems can thams cad zang zing med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing smon lam thams cad phun sum chog par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// kha zas ma bsod pa thob pa'i tshe/ byang chub
277a1(phal chen): @#sems dpas sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin nyam su bde ba thams cad thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// kha zas snum bag thob pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems
277a2(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad snying rje chen po yongasu bsgom pa'i sems dang ldan zhing sems 'jam par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// snum bag med pa'i kha zas thob pa'i tshe/ byang chub
277a3(phal chen): sems dpas sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi sred pa dang bral te/ snum bag med pa'i semasu gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// kha zas za ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
277a4(phal chen): thams cad chos la dga' ba dang rab tu dga' bas yongs su rgyas shing / bsam gtan gyi zas za bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// ro myong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
277a5(phal chen): thams cad bdud rtsi'i ro'i ngoms par gyur cig skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// zan zos pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
277a6(phal chen): thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi pha rol tu phyin cing bya ba byas par gyur cig ces seMs bskyed do// chos ston pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
277a7(phal chen): cad la yang dag par gzhol shing spobs pa mi zad pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// phyir byung ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
277a8(phal chen): nyamasu myong ste/ khams gsum thams cad nas byung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chu 'bog pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis/
277b1(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'bog par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khrus byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'od mtha' yas pa dang ldan zhing
277b2(phal chen): lus dang sems dri ma med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dro ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mu med par byin te/ yongs su brdung ba bsil bar
277b3(phal chen): gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bsil ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu gsal bar gyur te bla na med pa'i bsil ba'i dngos po khong du chud par
277b4(phal chen): gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chos thob par byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi gtam gyi rjes su 'gro zhing chos kyi dbyings dang / 'dris
277b5(phal chen): par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sangs rgyas mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'grogs pa rab tu thob ste/ bsgribs pa med
277b6(phal chen): pa'i mig dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mig mi 'gebs par lta ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad kun tu mdzes par kun tu bzang por gyur cig
277b7(phal chen): ces sems bskyed do// mchod rten mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyis mchod par 'os shing mchod rten lta bur gyur cig ces sems bskyed do//
277b8(phal chen): lta ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis lta bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// spyi bo'i sngags pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sem
278a1(phal chen): phal @#can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis spyi gtsug ltar mi snang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
278a2(phal chen): sems can thams cad/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du don dang 'thun par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lan gsum du bskor ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
278a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu mos pa'i rab dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan brjod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad yon tan
278a4(phal chen): gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yon tan mi zad par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mtshan rnams brjod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
278a5(phal chen): la gzhol zhing / yan lag dam pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rkang pa 'khru ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dri ma med pa'i mthar
278a6(phal chen): phyin cing rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas pha rol tu phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lus slong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsam pa la rnyog pa med cing
278a7(phal chen): lus kyi 'du byed shin tu bde bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// gnyid sad pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad phyogs bcu thams cad du mthu chen po thob par
278a8(phal chen): gyur te thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam
278b1(phal chen): kyi sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang ldan pas yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang gzhan thams cad kyang / thob par gyur cig lha dang 'jig rten tu bcas pa dang / pu dud du
278b2(phal chen): byas pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / skye dgur bcas pa dang / lha dang dri za dang mi dang / lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs
278b3(phal chen): rgyas su bcas pa thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba rnams so// shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs
278b4(phal chen): rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba spyod yul yongasu dag pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // bam po bcu dgu pa'o// // yon tan yangs pa'i spyod
278b5(phal chen): yul rnam dag pa// de skad smras nas sems kyi dri med pa// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis yon tan rnams// sems can dam pa bzang po'i dpal la dris// spyod yul yongs dag
278b6(phal chen): rgyal bas spyad pa'i rnams// bdag gi rgyal sras 'di bshad do// yon tan spyod pa ci snyed gang yod pa// rgyal sras la de ni khyod kyis shod// bzang po'i dpal gyis smras pa
278b7(phal chen): rgyal sras nyon// yon tan mtha' yas de dag yon tan las// mtsho las thigs pa ji bzhin nyung shes shig/ mgo spos tsam du chung zad brjod par bya// byang chub don du rab
278b8(phal chen): byung gyur byas zhes// thog mar byang chub sems skyes gyur pa yi// yon tan brjod pa'ang mtha' yas dpag tu med// dpe zla med pas brjod kyang zad ma gyur// pha rol phyin
279a1(phal chen): @#dang sa'i yon tan la// bskal pa mang por spyod pa ci zhig smos// de dag yon tan chu bo thams cad ni// phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas bstan kyang zad ma 'gyur/
279a2(phal chen): yon tan mtha' yas rnams la yon tan las// dpe tsam cha shas chung zad brjod par bya// mkha' las 'dab chags lam ltar shin tu chung // sa chen lhung las rdul phran
279a3(phal chen): gcig kyang 'dre// byang chub yon tan bsam pa'i sems bskye ba/ rgyu med ma yin gyi na 'byung ba yin// rgyal ba rnams dang bde gshegs chos rnams dang // dge 'dun rnams la
279a4(phal chen): dad pa bskyed pas skyed// de yang 'dod pa skyid pa rgyal srid dang // bdag bde'i don dang grags dang snyen phyir men// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus bsil ba'i phyir// 'jig rten phan
279a5(phal chen): skyed sems ni yongs su skye// de ni sems can rtag tu bde don dang // zhing sbyangs sangs rgyas mang po mchod pa'i rgyar// yongs su chos 'dzin byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing // ye shes rnam par
279a6(phal chen): spyod pa'i sems skye'o// rgyal ba kun dang chos dang dge 'dun dang // de bzhin bla mar gyur pa thams cad la// ngad dang mos pa dga' ba bskyed byas te// srid zhur mchod byas byang chub
279a7(phal chen): sems kyang bskyed// rgyal ba bde gshegs mos la yid ches nas// rgyal sras spyod pa rnams la yid ches te// byang chub bla na med pa yid ches shing // skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi sem
279a8(phal chen): skye'o// dad pa sngon 'gro ma ltar skyed pa ste// yon tan thams cad yongasu skyong zhing 'dren// nem nur rnam sel nad las rab tu sgrol// dad pa bde ba'i grong du phyin par byed// dad pa sem
279b1(phal chen): gsal rnyog pa med pa ste// nga rgyal rnam spangs sri nu'i rtsa ba yin// dad pa spyod mchog nor dang gter yin te// lag pa lta bur dag sdud rtsa ba yin// yongs su btang la dad pa
279b2(phal chen): dga' bar byed// rgyal ba'i chos dad pa spro ba ste// yon tan ye shes khyad par dad pa byed// sangs rgyas lam yang ston pa rnyed par byed// dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal ba dang /
279b3(phal chen): gzhan gyis mi thub dngos la dang stobs pa// nyon mongs grub pa med la gnas yin te// dad pa rang byung yon tan tshol ba yin// dad pa chags pa'i sgo yang mi 'grogs te//
279b4(phal chen): mi khom spongs shing 'du 'dzi med par byed// dad pa bdud kyi lam las zlog pa ste// thar pa dam pa yongs su bstan pa yin// yon tan rgyu yin sa bon ma rul ba zhig/ dad pa byang chub
279b5(phal chen): shing rab ram par skyed// ye shes khyad par sgoms rnams 'phel bar byed// dad pa rgyal rnams kyi ston pa yin// de bas dad mos khyad par dga' ba la// spyod pa rim gyis rnam par
279b6(phal chen): brjod par bya// chos tshul 'di 'dra 'jig rten rnams na rkon// rin chen seng ge'i rgyal po ji bzhin no// dad pas sangs rgyas sri zhwa gang byed pa// de dag tshul khrims slob pa mi rtong
279b7(phal chen): ste// tshul khrims slob pa gang rnams mi tong ba// de dag yon tan gsan pas yon tan ldan// tshul khrim byang chub shes rab ston par byed// bslab pas sa gzhi yon tan legs
279b8(phal chen): la brtson// tshul khrims bsam pa yongs su ma btang na// rgyal ba rnams kyis bstod cing bsngags par 'os// dad pas sangs rgyas sri zhu gang byed pa// de dag rgyal ba'i mchod pa
280a1(phal chen): phal @#yangs par yo// rgyal ba rnams la mchod par su byed pa// de dag sangs rgyas mos pa bsam mi khyab// dad pas chos la bu dud gang byed pa// de dag rgyal ba'i chos
280a2(phal chen): kyis mi ngoms nyan// rgyal ba'i chos kyis mi ngom su nyan pa// de dag bsam gyis mi khyab chos la mos// dad pas dge 'dun bu dud su byed pa// de dag mi ldog dge 'dun rnams la mos//
280a3(phal chen): mi ldog dge 'dun rnams las su mos pa// de dag dad pa'i stobs kyis phyir mi ldog/ dad pa'i stobs kyis gang rnams mi ldog pa// de dag dbang po rab tu gsal zhing rno// gang rnams
280a4(phal chen): dbang po rab tu gsal rno ba// des ni sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spangs// gang gis sdig pa'i grogs po rnams spangs pa// de dag chos kyi gshes gnyen yongs su 'dzin// chos kyi
280a5(phal chen): gshes gnyen gang gis yongs su bzung ba// de dag dge ba rgya chen yongs su stsogs// dge ba rgya chen yongasu gang stsogs pa// bdag nyid che ba de dag rgya 'thun ldan// bdag nyid che brgyu
280a6(phal chen): 'bru gang ldan pa// de dag mos pa'i khyad par yangs pa thob// mos pa yangs pa'i khyad par sus thob pa// de dag rtag tu rgyal bas byin gyis brlabs// rgyal ba'i byin gyis gang rnams
280a7(phal chen): brlab gyur pa// de dag byang chub don du sems kyang skye// byang chub don du gang gi sems skyes pa// de dag drang song chen po'i yon tan brtson// drang song chen po yon tu su brtson pa/
280a8(phal chen): de dag sangs rgyas rigasu rigs ldan skyes// sangs rgyas rigasu rigs ldan gang skyes pa// de dag 'du dang 'bral ba rnam par spangs// 'du dang 'bral ba gang gis rnam spangs pa//
280b1(phal chen): de dag bsam pa dang zhing rnam par dag/ gang gis bsam pa dang zhing rnam dag pa// de dag lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa'i mchog/ lhags bsam dam pa'i mchog dang su ldan pa// de dag
280b2(phal chen): rtag tu pha rol phyin la spyod// pha rol phyin la rtag tu su spyod pa// de dag theg pa chen po 'di la spyod// theg pa chen po 'di la su spyod pa// de dag nan tan dam pas sangs rgyas mchod// nan
280b3(phal chen): tan dam pas sangs rgyas su mchod pa// de dag sangs rgyas rjes dran byed pa med// sangs rgyas 'dren pa gang la mi byed pa// de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas bsam yas mthong // rtag tu
280b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas bsam yas su mthong ba// de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas mi 'grogs min// rtag tu sangs rgyas mi 'grog su ma yin// de la chos kyi nub pa nam yang med// gang la chos nub
280b5(phal chen): nam yang med 'gyur ba// de dag spobs pa sgrib pa med dang ldan// spobs pa sgrib med dang su ldan pa// de dag chos rab ston pa mtha' yang yas// gang gis chos rab bstan pa ma
280b6(phal chen): yas pa// de dag 'gro la byams pas phan pa tshol// 'gro la byams pas phan pa su tshol ba// de dag snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba brtan// de dag snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba su bstan pa// de dag
280b7(phal chen): chos kyi dga' bar dbang po dga'// chos kyi dga' bas dbang po su dga' ba// de dag 'du byed nyes pa btang snyom so// 'du byed nyes pa gang gis btang snyoms pa// de dag nga rgyal
280b8(phal chen): rlom sems bag med su sbyangs pa// de dag rtag tu bdag dang gzhan don brtson// bdag dang gzhan don rtag tu su brtson pa// de dag 'khor bas yongasu skyob pa med// gang la 'khor bas
281a1(phal chen): @#yongs su skyo med pa// de dag brtson 'grus dam pa mchog dang ldan// brtson 'grus dam pa mchog dang su ldan pa// de dag mngon shes rnam dag mngon par skyes//
281a2(phal chen): gang gis mngon shes rnam dag mngor skyes pa// de dag spyod pa mchog gi dra bar zhugs// spyod mchog 'dra bar gang rnams zhugs gyur pa// de dag 'gro ba yongasu smin par mkhas// 'gro
281a3(phal chen): ba yongs su smin par gang mkhas pa// de dag 'gro sdud ye shes tshul la mkhas// 'gro sdud ye shes tshul la su mkhas pa// de dag sdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la brtson// bsdu dngos bzhi la gang
281a4(phal chen): rnams brtson gyur pa// de dag 'gro ba'i don yang mtha' yas byed// 'gro ba'i don mang mtha' yas su byed pa// de dag shes rab kyi stobs mchog ldan// shes rab thabs kyi stobs mchog
281a5(phal chen): su ldan pa// dpa' ba de dag bla med lam la gnas// bla med lam la dpa' bo gang gnas pa// de dag bdud kyi dpung gi thub pa min// gang rnam bdud kyi dpung gi thub min pa// de dag
281a6(phal chen): bdud lam bzhi las yongasu 'das// de dag bdud lam bzhi las yongs 'das pa// de dag phyir mi ldog gi sar yang byin// mi ldog sar ni gang gis phyin gyur pa// de dag mi skye ba'i bzod
281a7(phal chen): pa thob pa yin// mi skye'i bzod pa gang gis thob gyur pa// 'jig rten sgron de rgyal bas lung yang bstan// 'jig rten sgron ma rgyal bas lung bstan pa// de dag rgyal ba kun dang mngon du
281a8(phal chen): gnas// rgyal ba kun dang mngon tu su gnas pa// de dag rgyal ba'i sprul pa gsang la mkhas// rgyal ba'i sprul pa gsang la su mkhas pa// de dag rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa yin// gang
281b1(phal chen): rnga da mar gyi ri bo 'dra bar 'bar
281b2(phal chen): rnams rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs gyur pa// de dag sangs rgyas yon tan yongs kyis brgyan// sangs rgyas yon tan yongs kyi su brgyan pa// de dag bsod nams dam pas lus kyang sbyangs/
281b3(phal chen): bsod nams dam pas gang gis lus sbyangs pa// de dag gser gyi ri 'dra bar su 'bar ba// ngo dag mtshan rab sum bcu rtsa gnyis ldan// mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis su ldan pa// de dag
281b4(phal chen): dpe byad bzang pos lus kyang brgyan// dpe byad bzang po gang gis lus brgyan pa// de dag lus 'od kun tu mtha' yas so// gang gis lus 'od kun tu mtha' yas pa// de dag 'od zer rgyan
281b5(phal chen): kyang bsam mi khyab// gang la 'od zer bsam yas rgyan yod pa// de dag 'od las pad mo mang po 'byung // gang gi 'od las pad mo mang byung ba// de dag rgyal ba pad mo'i gdan bzhugs
281b6(phal chen): pa// ston cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun du yang // don yod rnam par spyod cing sems cing 'dul// gang rnams rgyal ba pad mo'i gdan bzhugs pa// ston cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig
281b7(phal chen): rten kun tu yang // don yod rnam spyod sems can 'dul byed pa// de dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yang yas// gang gis mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa// de dag bsam gyis
281b8(phal chen): mi khyab dgar byed pas// bsam gyi mi khyab zhing na rnam par spyod// gang rnams bsam gyis mi khyab chos ston cing // bsam yas sems can dga' bar su byed pa// de dag bsam pa
281b9(phal chen): ji bzhin 'jig rten na// tha dad yang dag shes mthus sems can 'dul// tha dad yang dag shes pa'i ye shes 'thus// bsam pa ji bzhin sems can su 'dul ba// de dag lus dang
282a1(phal chen): ngag yid rtag dus su// ye shes mngon du 'gro bar shin tu 'byung // gang gis lus dang ngag yid rtag dus su// ye shes mngon du 'gro bar rab 'byung ba// de dag smon lam
282a2(phal chen): spobs kyis ci dga' ba// sems can rgyud du gzugs mang yongs su ston// smon lam stobs kyis gang rnams ci dga' bar// sems can rgyud du gzugs mang snyan par byed// de dag
282a3(phal chen): tshig tu brjod cing ci smra yang // sgra la dbyangs kyis yan lag bsam mi khyab// tshig tu brjod cing ci dang ci smra yang // gang gi sgra dbyangs yan lag bsam yas pa// de dag 'gro ba
282a4(phal chen): ma lus thams cad kyi// bsam pa'i sems rnams yul gyis rnam par shes// gang gis ma lus 'gro ba thams cad kyi// bsam pa'i sems rnams yud kyis rnam shes pa// de
282a5(phal chen): dag skye dang 'phyi 'phos nam yang med// nyon mongs rgyu ba'ang de bzhin skye ba med// skye dang 'chi 'pho gang la med gyur cing // nyon mongs rgyud kyang de bzhin skye med su spyod pa// de dag
282a6(phal chen): sa bcu rnams dang dbang bcu'i// pha rol phyin mchog rnam par thar la spyod// gang rnams sa bcu dbang rnams bcu po yi// pha rol phyin mchog rnam par thar spyod pa// de dag mngon
282a7(phal chen): shes rgyan gyis rnam par sprul// ting nge 'dzin dam pas rnam par spyod pa thob// mngon par shes pa'i rgyan gyis rnam 'phrul zhing // ting 'dzin mchog gis rnam spyod sus thob pa/
282a8(phal chen): de dag phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las// dbang bskur rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su non// gang rnams phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las// dbang bskur brgyan rnams
282b1(phal chen): thams cad gnod byed pa// de dag spyi bor phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi// phyag 'thil bdud rtsis mngon par dbang yang skur// gang rnams spyi bor phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyis// phyag
282b2(phal chen): 'thil bdud rtsis mngon par dbang bskur ba// de dag ma lus na mkha' rgyas byas shing // phyogs rnams kun du mthu brtan gnas pa byed// gang rnams na mkha' ma lus rgyas bkang zhing
282b3(phal chen): phyogs rnams kun tu mthu brtan gnas byed pa// dpe med de dag spyod yul shes pa ni// 'jig rten lha dang bcas pas mi lus so// dpe med gang gi spyod yul shes bya bar// 'jig rten
282b4(phal chen): lha dang bcas pas mi nus pa// de dag brtson 'grus thams cad don kyang yod// mthong dang ming thos spobs pa don yod do// gang rnams brtson 'grus thams cad don yod cing /
282b5(phal chen): mthong dang ming mthos spobs pa don yod pa// skyes chen de dag sbyin bdag rtod pa yin// sbyin pa'i gnas te thams cad don kyang yod// skyes bu dam pa de dag byin 'bru yis// dam
282b6(phal chen): chos tshul ni mi 'jig brtan par gnas// dge ba'i las lam dam pa mchog rnams kyang // rin chen 'dra mthus kun na rgyu zhing gnas// rdo rje stug po'i rin tshan tshogs yod pas/
282b7(phal chen): de'i mthu yis rgya mtsho rin chen rnams// mi zad 'phel zhing 'gribs pa gang yang med// de bzhin yon tan mtha' yas yon tan mtsho// sangs rgyas mi bzhugs shing rnams gang
282b8(phal chen): yod pa// de dag kun du byang chub sems rgyas ston// phyogs rnams gang nad ma chos med gyur pa// de dag kun tu'ang chos kyi bter ston to// de dag mi rtogs rnam par mi rtog ste/
283a1(phal chen): bal @#lhun gyis 'grub par phyogs rnams thams cad du// zla ba lta bur gzugs brnyan ston byed cing // thabs mang stong gis sems can 'dul bar byed// de dag skad cig/
283a2(phal chen): re rer byang chub tu// rnam par sangs rgyas phyogs bcu kun tu ston// 'khor lo bskor dang mya ngan 'das zhi dang // sku gdung rgya chen de bzhin dpa' bo ston// mkhas pa de dag nyan thos rang rgyalas//
283a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgyan rnams mtha' yas pa// yongasu ston cing bskal pa mtha' yas su// theg pa gsum gyi sgom nas sems can 'dul// khye'u dang bu me de bzhin bud med lus//
283a4(phal chen): skyes pa lha dang lha min klu rnams dang // gnod sbyin grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs// mos pa thams cad tshul mkhas yongs su ston// ting 'dzin rgya mtsho'i sgo dag nas// 'gro ba'i
283a5(phal chen): gzugs mang rgyud ni ci snyed dang // cha byed spyod pa sgra dbyangs tshul gyi rnams// thams cad ma lus dpa' bo ston par byed// de dag zhing rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab ste// phyogs bcu'i
283a6(phal chen): rgyal ba thams cad mchod pa byed// de dag 'od zer mang po bsam mi khyab// sems can 'gro ba'i ye shes mtha' yang yas// de dag tshig gi rnam 'phrul ye shes rnam 'phrul dang // lus kyi
283a7(phal chen): rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ste// sbyin pa cu gzis rnam par 'phrul pa dang / bzod pa brtson 'grus rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ de dag bsam gtan shes rab rnas 'phrul dang /
283a8(phal chen): thabs dang mngon shes rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas tshegs kyi rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab// yon tan kun gyis rnam 'phrul mtha' yang yas// de dag rdul phran 'jug pa'i ting
283b1(phal chen): 'dzin rnams// rdul phran kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing // rdul phran rtse gcig bsam yas zhing gi rnams// sten pa byed kyang rdul la 'phel ba med// rdul gcig rtse la sangs rgyas/
283b2(phal chen): bzhugs shing dang // sangs rgyas mi bzhugs zhing yang de bzhin ston// la la kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag dang // yangs shing phra dad che ba'i zhing yang ston// zhing rnams la la 'jig cing/
283b3(phal chen): 'du ba dang // la la spyi'u tshugs rim gyis gnas pa ston// la la snrel gzhi smig rgyu lta bu ste// de bzhin gzhan rnams mig 'phrul lta bur ston// de dag rdul gcig rtser ston ji bzhin tu/
283b4(phal chen): ma lus rdul rnams kun la de bzhin te// drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// de dag rgyal ba mchod pa rnams 'phrul ting nge 'dzin// rgyal ba kun la mngon par bsgrub byed kyang //
283b5(phal chen): lag pa'i 'thil gyis stong sum rgyas bkang zhing // skyes bu chen po rnams mchod pa byed// phyogs bcu kun na me tog phreng ba dang // spos dang byug pa rin chen rin chen kun// de dag
283b6(phal chen): byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa yis// rgyal ba mchod phyir lag pa'i 'thil nas 'gyed// na bza' phye ma rin chen ci snyed dang // rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs dam sna tshogs dang // gser
283b7(phal chen): gyi rgyan dang rin chen ba re dag/ lag 'thil de nas char du mngon par 'bebs// phyogs rnams mtha' yas kun gyis yo byad rnams// drang srong che la mngon par gang yos pa// de dag las
283b8(phal chen): 'thil de las char tu 'bebs// byang chub shing drung rgyal ba mchod par byed// rol mo'i rnam pa phyogs na ci snyed pa// rnga chen rnga dang pi wang sgra snyan dang // rol mo brdang dkrol gling bu
284a1(phal chen): bal @#sgra rabs rnams// de dag lag 'thil de nas sgra yang sgrogs// phyogs bcu'i dpe med ji snyed bzhugs pa yi// bde gshegs yon tan legs pa sna tshogs dang /
284a2(phal chen): bstod pa'i tshigs bcad sgrub pa sna tshogs dang // lag 'thil de dag sgra rab snyan par 'gyur// de dag 'od zer las kyis yongs bsags pa// lag pa g.yas nas yongs su 'gyed
284a3(phal chen): byed cing // rgyal ba'i zhing rnams spos chus ma lus par// kun tu btab cing 'jig rten sgron ma mchod// 'od zer yid 'ong sdang zhing rgyan ldan pa// lag pa'i 'thil bkye pad ma bsam mi
284a4(phal chen): khyab// pad ma rgyan 'phyang mtshan sdug du ma'i gzugs// mang po bkye zhing rgyal ba mchod par byed// 'od zer me tog rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing // me tog rgyan dang me tog bla re dang // me
284a5(phal chen): tog sna tshogs kun kyang yongs bzang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer spos kyi rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing // spos kyi rgyan dang spos kyi bla re dang // sna tshogs spos kyi
284a6(phal chen): kun du yongs bzang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal mchod// 'od zer phye ba'i rnam pa rab bkye zhing // phye ma sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod//
284a7(phal chen): 'od zer na bza'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing // na bza'i rgyun dang na bza'i bla re dang // na bza'i sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer
284a8(phal chen): rin chen rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing // rin chen rgyan dang rin chen bla re dang // rin chen sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer pad mo'i
284b1(phal chen): rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing // pad me'i rgyan dang pad mo'i bla re dang // pad mo sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer phreng ba'i rgyan rnams rab
284b2(phal chen): bkye zhing // phreng ba'i rgyan dang phrang ba'i bla re dang // phreng ba sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer rgyal mtshan mchog rgyan rab bkye zhing //
284b3(phal chen): de dag rgyal mtshan dkar dmar ser po dang // sngo dang sna tshogs rnams sangs rgyan can gyis// rgyal ba'i zhing rnams kun nas brgyan par byed// de dag bde gshegs dbu la bzhugs kyi
284b4(phal chen): mchog/ rin chen dra ba sna tshogs rgyan ldan pa// dar gyi lnga lding ba dan yongs sbyangs shing // dril 'phreng rgyal ba'i gsung sgrogs 'dzin par byed// de dag lag pa'i 'thil nas bsam
284b5(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa'i// mchod pa cig la byed pa ltar// ma lus rgyal ba rnams la'ang de bzhin te// drang srong ting 'dzin rnams 'phrul 'di 'dra'o// de dag 'gro ba yongs sdud ye shes kyis/
284b6(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa'ang ting 'dzin mngon bsgrubs shing // bya ba'i tshul dang yon tan thams cad du// thabs mang stong gis sems can 'dul ba byed// la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
284b7(phal chen): mchod sgo dang // sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab brtod pa'i sgo// sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun gyi tshul khrims sgo// bzod pa mi zad mi skul sgo dag dang // la la btul zhugs dka' thub brtson
284b8(phal chen): 'grus sgo// bsam gtan rab tu zhir gnas sgo dag dang // don rnams rnam par 'byed pa'i shes rab sgo// tshul rnams kun ldan thabs kyi sgo dag dang // tshangs pa'i spyod pa dag dag
285a1(phal chen): @#/ mngon shes sgo// bsdu ba'i dngos por phan tshol sgo dag dang // bsod nams yongs su bsags dang ye shes sgo// bde brtan pa'i rnam thar sgo dag dang // la la stobs dang /
285a2(phal chen): dbang po lam gyi sgo// nyan thos theg pa rnam grol sgo dag dang // rang rgyal theg pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo// theg pa dam pa rnam 'phrul sgo dag dang // la la mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal sgo/
285a3(phal chen): la la bdag med srog med sgo dag dang // mi sdug 'du shes 'dod chags bral ba'i sgo// la la zhing 'gog ting 'dzin sgo dag dang // 'gro ba'i spyod sgo ci snyed yongs rgya ba// de snyed chos kyi sku
285a4(phal chen): la rab zhugs te// de dag kun gyi sgo'i sgo dge nas// bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul// gang rnams kun gyi sgo'i sgo dag nas// bsam pa ji bzhin sems can 'dul byed
285a5(phal chen): pa// de dag mtshan ma bzung bar mi nus te// ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul tshul ni de 'dra'o// de dag dga' ba'i rgyan gyi ting 'dzin mchog/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs smin byed 'thun pa// dga'
285a6(phal chen): bde spro ba rab dga' kun ldan pas// bsam gyis mi khyab yongs ston sems can 'dul// gang tshe lo nyes thams cad rkon gyur pa// de tshe 'jig rten bde ba'i yo byad rnams// thams cad
285a7(phal chen): bsam pa rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir// sbyin pa yongasu rtong zhing 'gro don mdzad// de dag mchog skom dang ro gcig dang // gos dang dga' ba rin chen sna tshogs dang // rgyal srid nor dang bdag
285a8(phal chen): sdug yongs btang bas// sbyin la mos pa'i 'gro ba 'dul bar byed// de dag mtshan rab kun gyis lus brgyan cing // gos dang rgyan mchog yongs su bgos btags te// phreng bas rnam
285b1(phal chen): rgyan spos kyis sku byas pa'i// gzugs rnams yongs su bstan pas sems can 'dul// mos pas dga' bde rab tu mos pa la// de dag gzugs mchog gzugs bzang cha byas
285b2(phal chen): mdzes// gzugs kyi dam pa yongs su ston byed cing // gzugs la mos pa'i sems can 'dul ba byed// de dag ka la ping ka'i sgra snyan dang // ko ki la kun la ngang ba'i sgra dbyangs dang /
285b3(phal chen): rnga dang tshangs pa'i mi dang ci'i sgras// mos pa thams cad tshul bzhin chos kyang ston// de dag stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi po// gang gis rgyal ba 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i// chos kyi bye brag
285b4(phal chen): sgo me de dag gis// bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul// de dag bde dang sdug bsngal grogs kyang byed// don dang don med grogs kyang de bzhin te// sems can dgos la
285b5(phal chen): grogs su 'gyur byas shing // grogs kyi sgo nas sems can rnam par 'dul// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho 'dus byas skyon gyi rnams// grogs kyi don du de dag bzod par byed// 'gro ba kun la
285b6(phal chen): phan don bde don du// de dag grogs mi bde ba nyam su len// gang na 'byung ba med cing chos med de// dgon pa'i yon tan thar pa mi dmigs pa// de dag kun du rgyal sra'i tshe spangs shing /
285b7(phal chen): zhi ba'i yid kyis gnas med mngon par 'byung // de dag khyim gyis brtson ra sred gnas pa'i// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i rgyur// 'dod pa'i dga' ba kun la mi gnas par//
285b8(phal chen): mngon par 'byung zhing thar par yongs su brjod// de dag spyod pa bcu rnams brjod byed cing // skyes chen rnams kyi chos la de dag brjod// drang srong spyad pa thams cad ma lus par// yongasu
286a1(phal chen): bal @#sgom zhing 'gro ba'i don kyang byed// gang na sems can tshad med tshe ldan pa// bde ba phun ldan nyon mongs chung yod pa// de dag kun nad gzer nad bu can// bdag la dbang med
286a2(phal chen): tsam gyi dbang sgyur ston// 'dod chags 'bar zhing zhe sdang 'bar gyur te// gti mug rgyu las 'jig rten me 'bar zhing // rga shi nad kyis rab tu 'bar gyur pa'i// 'jig rten bton cing sems can
286a3(phal chen): 'dul ba byed// de dag sangs rgyas stobs bcu mi 'jigs bzhi// chos kyi khyad par bco brgyad rnams kyis kyang // sangs rgyas bdag nyid che ba brjod byed cing // sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyis
286a4(phal chen): 'gro don byed// de don yongs ston rdzu 'phrul rjes ston cing // gzugs rnam byin rlob mthu yis mthu che ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed cing // rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul par sem
286a5(phal chen): can 'dul// de dag thabs kyi tshul mang sna tshogs kyis// 'jig rten mi chags chu la pad mo bzhin// dga' ba mos pa skye ba rnam par brjod// de dag brjod byed brjod pa'i rgyal po byed// gar
286a6(phal chen): mkhan rnga mkhan kyang dang rol mo mkhanan// mdzes shing sdug par gzhad gang byed pa dang // sgyu mkhan gzugs mang kun tu ston pa dang // grong khyer grong dpon kha lo sgyur ba dang // ded dpon tshang da
286a7(phal chen): khyim bdag de bzhin te// rgyal po blon po mda' bar po nya dang // smad pa mi 'jig gcugs ka mkhas pa byed// de dag nags chal sdong ba cher 'gyur// sman dang rin chen mi zad gter dag dang /
286a8(phal chen): bzhin nor bu 'dod pa 'byin shing dang // lam gol 'khyams dang de bzhin lam ston 'gyur// 'jig rten 'byung gnas mi ring shes 'gyur zhing // sems can las kyi tshul la mi shes pa// de
