286b1(phal chen): ngag kun la mongs thabs chong thabs dang // sna tshogs gzo rnams kun kyang brjod pa byang // 'tshe med gnod pa med pa'i sbyor ba rnams// sems can bde skyid mkhas pas rab sngags pa/
286b2(phal chen): rig mthu sman dang gtsug sna tshogs dang // kun kyang drang srong de dag rnam par brjod// drang song rnams kyi spyod pa dam pa mchog/ gang la lhar bcas 'jig rten dang gyur dang // brtul shug
286b3(phal chen): ka sbyong dka' thub mchog gi rnams// kun kyang mkhas pa de dag ston pa byed// de dag rgyu dang kun rgyu mu stegs can// dka' thub spyod yul mi slar brjod pa dang // sgren mo gos med ri'i
286b4(phal chen): dge sbyong la// mu stegs can gyi mkhan po mkhas pa byed// de dag yangs 'tshe chos la spyod pa dang // bla na yod dang bla na med pa rnams// ral pa ring dang byis pa'i brtul zhags can//
286b5(phal chen): de dag tu yang de dag mkhan por 'gyur// nyi ma'i rjes 'brang dka' thub lnga ldan dang // khyi dang ba lang brtul zhugs ri dag spyod// gle'u can mu stegs bcu gsum spyod pa rnams// de dag kun
286b6(phal chen): tu'ang de dag slob dpon 'gyur// lha rnams ye shes tshul la dga' ba dang // mu stegs khrus byed yul du rgyu ba dang // rtsa ba 'bras bu chu la spyod pa rnams// chos sems nang na de dag dam
286b7(phal chen): par 'gyur// gnas btag gnas dang gcig tu spyod pa dang // tsher ma tsha dang thal ba'i mal can dang // dbyig pa'i mal can gcig tu spyod pa'i rnams// de dag kun tu'ang de dag slob dpon
286b8(phal chen): 'gyur// phyi rol mu stegs can rnams ci snyed pa// de dag bsam pa rtogs byas shing // bsgrubs dga' mi zad drag shul dka' thub kyi// mu stegs can gyi sdug bsngal spang bas 'dul/
287a1(phal chen): @#'jig rten lta bas 'khrugs pa shes byas nas// lta ba ngan la gnas pa'i mu stegs can// kun la phra ba'i tshig dang thabs tshul gyis// bden pa ston pa de dag kun tu byed//
287a2(phal chen): la lar dra byi la'i sngags tshig tu// shing tu gsang ba'i tshig gis bden pa ston// la la dag la gsal shing drang tshig gis// la la dag la lha'i gsang tshig gis// la la dag la yi ge dbye
287a3(phal chen): tshigs dang // don des rtog pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams dang // rgol ba 'dul ba'i ye shes tshig rnams dang // bstan pa thub med thar pa'i tshig rnams kyis// la la dag la mi skad tshigs rnams
287a4(phal chen): dang // kun la 'jug pa tshigs nges tshig rnams dang // la la dag la lha'i tshig nges tshig rnams dang // klu'i tshig nges gnod sbyin tshig rnams kyis// la la dag la srin po 'byung po dang /
287a5(phal chen): dri za grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i tshig/ mi ci lha min na mkha' lding tshig gis// bden pa bstan cing thar par 'dren par byed// de dag bden pa'i tshig tshul shes bzhin// de ltar rgyal ba'i
287a6(phal chen): chos rnams ma lus pa'i// chos nyid bsam yas tshig lam shes pas ston// de dag ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// de dag 'gro bde mchog gi ting 'dzin// 'gro ba kun la mngon
287a7(phal chen): par 'grub byed cing // 'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab rab bkye ste// 'od zer bkye nas sems can de dag 'dul// 'od zer mthong na legs par rab bkye zhing // sems can ci snyed 'od
287a8(phal chen): zer de shes pa// de dag mthong legs don med ma yin te// bla na med pa'i ye shes mchog gi rgyu// sangs rgyas bstan te chos rnams yongs bstan nas// dge 'dun bstan nas mi rnam
287b1(phal chen): lam bstan te// rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod rten bstan pas na// des ni mthong ni legs pa'i 'od zer grub// lha'i 'od zer zil gyis mi non pa'i// 'od zer 'od byed rab tu 'gyed
287b2(phal chen): byas shing // mun pa kun dang rdul rnams kun gsal te// 'jig rten phan pa'i 'od de rab tu snang // 'od des sems can yongs bskul ba// de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir me mar
287b3(phal chen): 'dzin// rgyal ba mchod phyir me mar gzung byas pas// 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur// 'bru mar mer me mar gyis me mar dang // shing dang rtsa dang smig ma spa'i
287b4(phal chen): sgron// spos dang ro mchog rin chen sgron ma dag/ rgyal ba rnams gsel 'od byed de thob po// 'od zer sgron zhes bya bar rab bkye zhing // sems can ci snyed 'od zer des bskul
287b5(phal chen): ba// de dag sred pa rnams yangs srid pa'i mtshor// sems can bsgral don go cha bstan pa gyon// gang rnams sred pa rnam yangs srid pa'i mtshor// sems can bsgral phyir go cha
287b6(phal chen): bstan gyon pa// de dag chu bo bzhi las sgrol ba byed// mya ngan med pa bde ba'i grong yangs ston// stegs dang zam pa gcig min byas pa dang // chu klung lam la sgrol ba'i gru byin te/
287b7(phal chen): 'dus byas sun phyung zhi ba sngags pas na// des ni sgrol ba'i 'od zer de grub po// 'od zer sgom pa sel bar rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul pa// 'dod pa'i
287b8(phal chen): yon tan skom pa rab spangs shing // chos kyis rnam grol rol don du gnyer// 'dod pa'i yon tan skom pa rab spangs te// chos kyis sgrol ba'i rol don gnyer bas// sangs rgyas bdud
288a1(phal chen): rtsi'i char pa 'bebs par 'gyur// 'jig rten sred pa'i skom pa rnam par sel// rdzing dang chu klung khron pa lu ma dang // mtshon nams byang chub don du byed btsud de/
288a2(phal chen): 'dod pa rnams smad bsam gtan bsngags pas na// skom pa rnam sel de ni des grub po// 'od zer dga' bar byed pa rab bkye zhing // sems ci snyed 'od zer des skal ba// dga'
288a3(phal chen): bas rgyas shing byang chub mchog don du// rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed do// thugs rje mnga' ba rnams kyi sku gzugs mtshan brgyan pa// pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs shing
288a4(phal chen): byas bsgrubs shing // rtag tu sangs rgyas yon tan brjod pas na// dga' ba byed pa'i 'od ni des sgrub bo// 'od zer mos par byed pa rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des skal
288a5(phal chen): ba// de dag thams cad sangs rgyas mos pas dga'// chos la mos dga' dge 'dun mos pas dga'// de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas chos dga' ste// chos la mos dga' dge 'dun
288a6(phal chen): mos dga' bas// sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin dge 'dun dang // rtag tu 'grogs 'theb bzod pa bla med 'thob// sangs rgyas rjes dran chos dang tshogs mchog la// sems can mang
288a7(phal chen): po bskul zhing dran byas te// byang chub sems kyi yon tan bstan pas na// de ni 'od zer mos par byed pa grub// 'od zer bsod nams bsags pa rab bkye zhing // thams cad ji
288a8(phal chen): snyed 'ad zer des bskul ba// bla na med pa'i byang chub don gnyer cing // sbyin pa sna tshogs du ma yongs su gtong // de dag mchod sbyin lhug pa byed pa'i tshe// slong mo pa'i bsam pa rjes
288b1(phal chen): byas te// bsam pa kun tshul sbyin pa sbyin byas nas// des ni 'od zer bsod nams bsags grub po// 'od zer ye shes ldan pa rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba//
288b2(phal chen): chos gcig sgo nas gcig byin min pa yi// chos kyi sgo rnams yud kyis rjes su song // chos kyi bye brag sems can 'dzin btsud de// des rtogs don gyi ye shes rnam phye zhing // chos kyi
288b3(phal chen): tshig don brjod pas byas pas na// des ni ye shes ldan pa'i 'od zer grub// 'od zer shes rab ldan sgron rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer de bskul ba// stong pa bdag med ma
288b4(phal chen): skyes ma byung ba'i// rang bzhin med pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug/ bdag po med chos stong pa byed med pa// sprin dang smig rgyu chu zla 'dre'i dngos// rmi lam lta bu gzugs brnyan dang bzhin
288b5(phal chen): rnams// bstan pas shes rab sgron ma de grub bo// 'od zer chos kyis rnam 'phrul rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// mi zad gzugs kyi mdzod rnams rab
288b6(phal chen): thob cing // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mdzod kyang 'dzin// chos 'tshang rnams la yongasasu pan btags te// drang srong rnams la yongs kyis bsrungs byas shing // 'gro ba kun la
288b7(phal chen): chos bzhin phan btags pas// 'od zer chos kyis rnam 'phrul de grub po// 'od zer stong dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing // sems can 'jung ba ji snyed des bskul ba// skyid pa mi brtan mi
288b8(phal chen): rtag shes gyur nas// de dag rtag tu sbyin mos dga' bar 'gyur// 'jungs pa dul ka'i sems can ma dul dang // nor rnams rmi lam sprin tshul shes gyur nas// dga' ba'i yid
289a1(phal chen): @#// kyis sbyin pa rnam spel bas// tong dang ldan pa'i 'od zer des grub bo// 'od zer yongasu gdung med rab bkye zhing // tshul ngan sems can ji snyed des bskul ba// tshul
289a2(phal chen): khrims rnam dag rab tu gnas gyur te// rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed do// dge ba'i las lam yongs su dag pa dang // tshul khrims bzang la sems can meng bskul cing //
289a3(phal chen): byang chub sems la yang dag bskul byas pas// yongs su gdung med 'od zer des grub bo// bzod pa rnams rgyan 'od zer rab bkye zhing // mi bzod sems can ji snyed des bskul ba//
289a4(phal chen): khro ba'i tha ba nga rgyal yongs spangs shing // de dag bzod mos rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur// sdig sems ldan pa nyes pa bzod byas te// byang chub don tu 'khrug pa ma byas shing // bzod pa'i
289a5(phal chen): yon tan rtag tu brjod byas pas// des ni bzod pas rnam brgyan de grub po// 'od zer brtson dang ldan pa rab bkye shing // le lo'i sems can ci snyed des bskul ba// rigs par btson
289a6(phal chen): zhing dkon mchog gsum rnams la// sbyor ba skyon med mchod pa byed par 'gyur// rigs par brtson pas dkon mchog gsum rnams la// sbyor ba med pas mchog byas nas// de dag
289a7(phal chen): bdud bzhi lam las yongs 'das te// myur du byang chub bla med rab du thob// sems can mang po brtson 'grus bskul byas te// dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rab byas nas/
289a8(phal chen): ma'i dus su dam chos yongs bzung bas// des ni bcon ldan 'od zer de grub bo// 'od zer zhi bar byed pa rab bkye zhing // rnam 'khrugs sems can ji snyed des bskul ba// de dag 'dod
289b1(phal chen): chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// nyam su mi gnod mnyam bzhag sems su 'gyur// sdig to'i grogs po nye ldan spyod pa can// 'du 'dzi yongs su rnam par spang byas te// bsam gtan
289b2(phal chen): zhi ba'i dgon par rab bsngags pa// des ni zhi byed 'od zer de grub bo// 'od zer shes rab rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing // shes rab 'chal pa ci snyed des bskul ba// bden dang rten dang
289b3(phal chen): rnam thar tshul rnams dang // dbang po'i rgyus la rtogs par shes par 'gyur// bden dang rten dang rnam thar tshul rnams dang // dbang po'i rgyus la rtogs par shes gyur cing // nyi ma'i sgron
289b4(phal chen): dad ting 'dzin thob gyur nas// shes rab 'od gsal mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur// rgyal srid nor dang bdag 'phangs yongs btang ste// byang chub don du chos rnams gang btsal ba/
289b5(phal chen): de dag rim gror rab tu brjod byas pas// shes rab rnam rgyan 'od zer de grub po// 'od zer sangs rgyas ldan par rab bkye zhing // sems can ci snyed 'od zer de skul ba// sangs rgyas
289b6(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab shin tu mang ba'i rnams// pad mo mchog la bzhugs par rab tu mthong // sangs rgyas bdag nyid che dang rnam thar dang // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yang
289b7(phal chen): yongs rten nas// sangs rgyas stobs dang rdzu 'phrul brjod byas pas// sangs rgyas ldan pa'i 'od zer des grub po// 'od zer ma 'jigs sbyin pa rab skye shing // 'jigs mnar sem
289b8(phal chen): can ci snyed des phog pa// 'byung po gza' dang gsad cing brdeg pa dang // nad kyi 'jigs pa kun las rab tu dkrol// mi 'jigs sbyin pas sems can skyabs pa dang // srog gcod
290a1(phal chen): pal @#las las sems rgyud phyir bzlog cing // 'jigs pas skyabs tshol rnams la bskyabs byas pas// 'od zer mi 'jigs sbyin pa de grub bo// 'od zer thams cad
290a2(phal chen): bde bar rab bkye shing // nad pa na ba ci snyed des reg pa// thams cad nad kyi sdug bsngal rnam par grol// bsam gtan ting 'dzin bde ba rnams kyang thob// nad sos 'bras bu sman dang
290a3(phal chen): rtsa ba dang // rin chen ro mchog spos dang byug pa dang // bu ram sbrang rtsi 'o ma mar dag dang // 'bru mar zas skom byin pas de 'grub po// 'od zer sangs rgyas ston pas rab bkye zhing //
290a4(phal chen): tshe zad mthar ni ci snyed des bskul ba// sangs rgyas rjes dran sangs rgyas rab mthong bar// de dag shi 'phos sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'gro// 'chi ba'i dus su sangs rgyas snang byas te// /
290a5(phal chen): dgar 'gyur rgyal ba'i sku gzugs bstan byas shing // 'chi kar sangs rgyas skyabasu btang byas pas// sangs rgyas ston pa'i 'od zer des thob po// 'od zer chos rab brjod pa rab bkye
290a6(phal chen): zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des skul ba// chos nyan brjod cing de bzhin dri ba byed// chos la mos pas rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur// chos kyi mu ge'i dus su chos brjod de// chos
290a7(phal chen): chol rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs byas shing // mos pa bskyed de chos la brtson gyis shig/ brjod pas chos rab brjod pa des thob bo// sangs rgyas sras rnams yongasu bskul ba'i phyir/
290a8(phal chen): 'od zer dbyangs dang ldan pa rab bkye shing // khams gsum sgra rgyud ji snyed yod pa dag/ kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung du thos// gsal ba'i dbyangs sgrar drang song che bstod de/
290b1(phal chen): rol mo sgra can dril gyi sbyin pa rnams// 'gro ba kun la rgyal ba'i gsung don du// yongs su btang bas 'od zer dbyangs ldan thob// 'od zer 'chi med sbyin pa rab bkye zhing // sems can
290b2(phal chen): ci snyed 'od zer des bskal ba// bag med spyod pa thams cad rnam spangs te// yon tan kun la rnal 'byor nyamasu len// 'dus byas rtag tu bde ba med pa ste// sdug bsngal 'tshe ba mang pos
290b3(phal chen): yongs su gang // 'gog pa rtag tu bde zhing zhi dga' zhes// brjod pas 'chi med sbyin pa des thob po// 'od zer khyad par ldan pa rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul
290b4(phal chen): ba// tshul khrims khyad par ting 'dzin khyad par dang // shes rab khyad par rgyal ba rnams la nyid// tshul khrims 'phags pa'i ting 'dzin 'phags pa ste// shes rab 'phags pa
290b5(phal chen): thub pa rgyal chen zhes// byang chub don tu bsngags shing bstod byas pas// des ni 'od zer khyad par ldan pa thob// 'od cheran rnam par brgyan pa rnams bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed
290b6(phal chen): 'od zer des bskul ba// rin chen gter mang mi zad thob gyur te// drang srong che la rin chen dam pas mchod// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// rin chen phul zhing 'gro
290b7(phal chen): ba nyon mongs la// rin chen bstud de rin chen sbyin btang bas// rin chen rnam par rgyan pa'i 'od zer grub// 'od zer spos mchog ldan pa rab bkye shing // sems can ci snyed 'od
290b8(phal chen): zer des skul ba// mi la med pa'i spos dri thob gyur nas// sangs rgyas 'du shes rnams la nges par 'gyur// mi dang lha'i spos dang byug pa yis// mi'i rtsol mchod pa rab byas
291a1(phal chen): phal @#te// spos kyi rgyal ba'i gzugs la mchod rten dag/ byas pas 'od zer spos mchog snang ba grub// 'od zer sna tshogs rnam rgyan rab bkye zhing // gdugs dang
291a2(phal chen): rgyal mtshan pa dan sna tshogs mchog/ rol mo sgra snyan spos dang bdug spos mchog/ pho brang dam pa yongs brgyan me tog 'gyengs// sngan chad rgyal ba rol mos su byas te// me
291a3(phal chen): tog byug pa bdug spos bye ma dang // bdug dang rgyal mtshan pa dan mchog dag gis// mchod pa byas pas sna tshogs rgyan grub po// 'od zer shin tu dang byed rab bkye zhing // sa
291a4(phal chen): rnams lag 'thil bzhin du gnas par byed// mchod rten drang srong gnas rnams spyad byas pas// des ni 'od zer shin tu dang byed grub// 'od zer chen po sprin ldan rab bkye zhing /
291a5(phal chen): spos kyi char 'bebs sprin rnams kun tu gnas// mchod rten gam yo spos chub yongs btab pas// 'od zer sprin dang ldan pa rab tu thob// 'od zer lhab lha ba rnams brgyan
291a6(phal chen): rab bkye zhing // gos med gos yod rgyan dang ldan par 'gyur// gos dang phreng ba sna tshogs dag/ yongs su btang bas lhab lhub rnam brgyan grub// 'od zer ze mchog ldan pa rab
291a7(phal chen): bkye zhing // bkres pa kha zas ro mchog thob par 'gyur// zas dang skom dang ro mchog ldan pa 'od kyang thob// 'od zer nor ston rab tu rgyu byas shing // 'phongs la rin chen gter
291a8(phal chen): rnams thob par 'gyur// gnas dang gter rnams mi zad dkon mchog gsum// gsol bas nor ston 'od zer de thob bo// 'od zer mig sbyong rab tu dge byas shing // gnas
291b1(phal chen): dang gter rnams mi zad dkon mchog gsum// gsol bas nor ston 'od zer de thob bo// 'ang zer mig sbyang rab tu dge byas shing // long ba de tshe sna tshogs gzugs mthong 'gyur//
291b2(phal chen): rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// mar me gsol bas mig sbyong 'od zer grub// rna ba rnam sbyong 'od zer des bkye zhing // rna ba nyams dga' sgra yang thos par 'gyur//
291b3(phal chen): rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// sil snyan phul bas rna ba rnam sbyong thob// 'od zer sna skyong rab tu dag byas shing // sngan chad ma tshor dri zhim tshor bar 'gyur// rgyal
291b4(phal chen): ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// spos zhim gsol bas sna skyong 'od zer grub// 'od zer lce spyod rab tu dge byas shing // sgra snyan yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas bstod//
291b5(phal chen): ma snyen gleng bar smra bar rnam spangs te// 'jam par smra bas lce sbyong 'od zer grub// 'od zer lus sbyong rab tu dge byas shing // dbang po nyams pa dbang po ldan par 'gyur//
291b6(phal chen): rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// lus kyis rab tu lus sbyong 'od zer slob// 'od zer sems sbyong rab tu dges byas shing // smos pa thams cad rang bzhin sems
291b7(phal chen): su 'gyur// ting 'dzin rjes su sems 'gro la rab byas pas// des ni sems sbyong 'od zer de grub po// 'od zer gzugs sbyong rab tu dge byas shing // bsam yas sku mnga' min
291b8(phal chen): dbang po mthong // sku gzugs ri mo sna tshogs mang po dang // mchod rten brgyan byas gzugs sbyongs thob par 'gyur// 'od zer sgra sbyong rab tu dge sbyong shing // sgra ni sgra min
292a1(phal chen): la @#ston par rab tu shes// rkyen las byung bas sgra stan 'dra'o zhes// sgra rnams bstan pas 'od zer de grub po// 'od zer dri skyong rab tu dge byas shing // dring thams cad
292a2(phal chen): dri zhim mchog tu 'gyur// spos mchog rab chus rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag/ khrus byas byang chub shing gi 'od de bzhin// 'od zer bro mchog rab tu dge byas shing // dug can dug
292a3(phal chen): med ro'i mchog tu 'gyur// sangs rgyas nyan thos bcas dang pha ma la// bo mchog thams cad phul ba'i 'od de bzhin// 'od zer reg sbyong rab tu dge byas shing // reg na mi bde tham
292a4(phal chen): cad 'jam bder 'gyur// dri shul mdung dang ral gri mnga' dang char// phreng ba yid 'ong ud dpal pad mor 'gyur// gos mang 'jam pa reg pa'i rnams// rgyal ba gshegs
292a5(phal chen): pa'i lam du gting bkram ste// me tog byug pa na bza' 'jam pa dang // phreng ba bla re gsol ba'i 'od de yin// 'od zer chos spyod rab tu dge byas shing // ba spu kun nas 'jig rten
292a6(phal chen): phan mdzad pa'i// bsam yas chos mang 'byung ba thob par 'gyur// mos pa'i lam tshul bzhin du dga' bar byed// rkyen las byung bas ma skyes rang bzhin yin// rgyal ba'i sku ni/
292a7(phal chen): chos kyi sku yin te// chos nyid na mkha' bzhin du rtag gnas shes// brjod pas chos spyod 'od zer de thob po// 'od zer sgo me de dag la sogs pa// drang srong rnams kyi ba spu'i sgo gcig
292a8(phal chen): nas// gang gi bye ma snyed kyi 'od zer 'byung // kun kyang tha dad las kyi tshul chen no// ci ltar ba spu gcig gi sgo gcig nas// 'od zer gang ga'i bye snyed yongs 'byung ba// de bzhin ma lus
292b1(phal chen): spu rnams thams cad nas// drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// yon tan gang gis 'od zer grub gyur pa'i// yon tan de la bstang grogs sus byas pa// de dag 'od zer de dag nyid
292b2(phal chen): kyang 'byung // drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// de dag bsod nams bstang grogs byas pa la// rjes su yid rang gsol ba sus btab pa// gang gis mthong de dge ba bas
292b3(phal chen): gyur pa// de dag kun kyang 'od zer de dag shes// gang gi bsod nams byas shing dge bstsags te// sangs rgyas yang dang yang du mchod byas shing // sangs rgyas yon tan
292b4(phal chen): 'dod cing don nyer ba// de dag kun la 'od zer de dag bskul// dmus long rnams kyis nyi ma mi mthong yang // de med ma yin 'jig rten kun du 'chang // mig dang ldan pas shar bar
292b5(phal chen): gyur nas// kun kyang rang rang so so'i las la 'jug/ de bzhin skyes chen 'od zer de dag kyang // med pa ma yin kun tu 'bros pa ste// de dag mos pa log pas mnar ba yi// phal
292b6(phal chen): gyis mi 'thong blo gros yongs la mong // rgyan dang nor bu gzhon pa gzhal med khang // rin chen ro mchog spos dang byug pa dang // de dag che bar 'gyur la yod mod kyis// nyon mongs
292b7(phal chen): phongs pa rnams la yod pa min// gang gis 'od zer bye brag 'di zos te// dad la yid ches mos pa skyes gyur na// bdag ni yon tan chen po rgyal mtshan du// mi 'gyur snyam du nem
292b8(phal chen): nur de mi skye// de dag 'khor ba'i rgyan tu rnam 'phrul bar// ting 'dzin dam pa mngon par rab bsgrub shing // phyogs bcu kun tu dpe zla med pa yi// rgyal sras 'khor rnams yongasu
293a1(phal chen): @#// ston pa byed// de dag pad mo mdzes pa stong gsum tsam// 'od kyis rnam rgyal byin gyis brlabs byas shing // lus gcig dkyil mo dkrungs gis pad mo des// yongs
293a2(phal chen): rgyas ston ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul// de dag ni bcu'i rdul snyed pad mo gzhan// 'khor dang bcas pa byin gyis brlab byas shing // rgyal sras kun gyis kun nas yongs bskor bar// de
293a3(phal chen): dag ting 'dzin med par spyod// drang song des ni yongs su smin byas te// rgyal ba'i legs pa yongasu gang bsgrub pa// de dag pad mo chen po'i 'khor byed cing // kun kyang thal mo sbyar
293a4(phal chen): te de dor lta// skyes bu chen po'i chos nyid de dang 'dra// gang rnams ting 'dzin rnam spyod zhugs gyur pa// kun kyang rang rang slong mos bskor gyur te// zla ba skar ma'i tshogs kyi bskor ba
293a5(phal chen): bzhin// de dag ci ltar phyogs gcig 'jug byed cing // sangs rgyas sras kyi 'khor rnams ston byed pa// de bzhin ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du// ston te ting 'dzin rnam
293a6(phal chen): 'phrul de 'dra'o// bcu drug ting 'dzin rab rnams mngon bsgrub cing // phyogs kyi dra bar snrel gzhir spyod pa byed// la lar mnyam bzhag la lar rnams langs par// rang rang lus
293a7(phal chen): kyang phyogs rnams kun tu ston// de dag shar gyi phyogasu mnyam bzhag cing // dpa' bo de dag nub kyi phyogs nas ldang // nub kyi phyogasu de bzhin mnyam bzhag cing // shar phyogs kyi
293a8(phal chen): nas bdag nyid che ba ldang // de dag phyogs bcu kun du 'jug byed de// phyogs rnams gzhan du mnyam par bzhag byas shing // ye shes yon tan mang po gzhan nas ldang /
293b1(phal chen): drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// shar phyogs zhing drangs ci snyed yod pa rnams// ma lus de dag kun gyi rang 'byung gi/ spyan snga zhabs kyi drung na ting 'dzin la// zhi par/
293b2(phal chen): rnam par spyod pa de dag snang // der ni mnyam bzhag sems can bstan byas nas// nub kyi zhing rnams kun nas dpa' bo rnams// langs shing rgyal ba kun gyi spyan snga na// mchod pa
293b3(phal chen): rnam mang du ma byed par snang // nub kyi zhing rnams ci snyed pa yi rnams// ma lus de dag kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi// spyan snga zhabs kyi drung na ting 'dzin la// zhi bar rnam par spyod pa de dag snang //
293b4(phal chen): der ni mnyam bzhag sems can bstan byas nas// shar gyi zhing rnams kun nas dpa' bo rnams// langs shing rgyal ba kun gyi spyan snga na// mchod pa rnams mang du mar byed par snang //
293b5(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i zhing du 'jug pa de 'dra ste// phyogs rnams ma lus dpa' bo rnams// la la mnyam bzhag la la rnam par langs// 'jig rten sgron ma kun la mchod byed snang // de dag mig
293b6(phal chen): gi lam lam mnyam bzhag cing // bdag nyid che ba gzugs kyi lam las ldang // 'jig rten ltar bcas myos par 'gyur ba yi// bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs kyang rab tu ston//
293b7(phal chen): gzugs kyi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing // dran dang ldan pa mig gi lam las ldang // mig ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// ston pa byed pa med par ston par byed// de dag
293b8(phal chen): rna ba'i lam las mnyam bzhag cing // bdag nyid che ba sgra'i lam las ldang // sgra dbyangs thams cad sgra snyan bzhin du shes// 'jig rten lhar bcas de la myos par 'gyur// sgra'i lam
294a1(phal chen): @#la mnyam par bzhag byas shing // dran dang ldan pa rna ba'i lam las ldang // rna ba ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med par ston pa byed// de dag sna'i lam
294a2(phal chen): la mnyam bzhag cing // bdag nyid che ba dri'i lam las ldang // dri rab mchog la 'jug pa rab tu zhugs// 'jig rten ltar bcas de la myos par 'gyur// dri'i lam la mnyam par bzhag
294a3(phal chen): byas shing // dran dang ldan pa sna'i lam las snang // sna ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ stong pa byed pa med par ston pa byed// de dag lce'i lam las mnyam bzhag cing // bro mchog
294a4(phal chen): kun gyi lam las ldang bar byed// bdag nyid che ba de dag tho mchog shes// 'jig rten ltar bcas de dag myos par 'gyur// bro'i mchog las mnyam par bzhag byas shing // dran dang
294a5(phal chen): ldan pa lce'i lam les ldang // lce ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med par ston pa byed// de dag lus kyi lam la mnyam bzhag cing // bdag nyid che ba rig gi
294a6(phal chen): lam las ldang // 'jig rten bde ba bskyed pa'i reg la zhugs// 'jig rten lhar bcas de la myos par 'gyur// reg gi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing // dran dang ldan pa lus kyi
294a7(phal chen): lam las ldang // lus ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med par ston pa byed// de dag sems kyi lam la mnyam bzhag cing // bdag nyid che ba chos kyi lam las ldang //
294a8(phal chen): chos grub 'jug par byed la rab tu zhugs// 'jig rten lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur// chos kyi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing // dran dang ldan pa sems kyi lam las ldang /
294b1(phal chen): sems ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med par ston par byed// byis pa'i lus su de dag mnyam bzhag cing // gzhon nu dar la bab pa'i lus su ldang // gzhon nu dar la
294b2(phal chen): bab par mnyam bzhag 'dis// rgan zhing 'khogs pa'i lus su rnam par ldang // rgan zhing 'khogs pa'i lus su mnyam bzhag cing // dge snyen dang ma'i lus su rnam par ldang //
294b3(phal chen): dge snyen dad ma'i lus su mnyam bzhag cing // dge bsnyen dad pa'i lus su rnam par ldang // dge bsnyen dad pa'i lus su mnyam bzhag cing // dge slong lus su rnam par ldang //
294b4(phal chen): dge slong ma'i lus su mnyam bzhag cing // dge slong mang thos lus su rnam par ldang // dge slong mad thos lus la mnyam bzhag cing // slob dang mi slob lus su rnam par ldang/
294b5(phal chen): slob dang mi slob lus su mnyam bzhag cing // rang rgyal lus las de dag mnyam bzhag cing // sangs rgyas sku mchog phul tu rnam par ldang // sangs rgyas sku mchog phul la
294b6(phal chen): mnyam bzhag cing // lha'i lus su de dag rnam par ldang // lha'i lus su de dag mnyam bzhag cing // 'phrul chen klu'i lus su rnam par ldang // 'phrul chen klu'i lus su mnyam bzhag
294b7(phal chen): cing // 'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus su mnyam bzhag cing // 'byung po kun gyi lus su rnam par ldang // 'byung po kun gyi lus su mnyam bzhag cing // spu rtse gcig gi sgo nas
294b8(phal chen): rnam par ldang // spu rtse gcig gi sgo la mnyam bzhag cing // spu rtse gcig gi sgo la rnam par ldang // spu rtse kun gyi sgo nas mnyam bzhag cing // skra rtse gcig gi sgo la rnam
294b9(phal chen): rnam par ldang / 'phrul chen gnod sbyin
295a1(phal chen): phal @par ldang // skra rtse gcig gi sgo la rnam par ldang // skra rtse gcig sgor ni mnyam bzhag cing // skra rtse kun gyi sgo nas rnam par ldang // skra rtse kun gyi sgor ni
295a2(phal chen): mnyam bzhag cing // rdul phran gcig las de dag mngon par ldang // rdul phran gcig la de dag mnyam bzhag cing // rdul phran ma lus kun la rnam par ldang // rdul phran kun la
295a3(phal chen): de dag mnyam bzhag cing // rgya mtsho rdo rje'i gzhi la rnam par ldang // rgya mtsho rdo rje'i gzhi la mnyam bzhag cing // rin chen shing gi 'bras las rnam par ldang // rin chen shing gi
295a4(phal chen): 'bras la mnyam bzhag cing // rgyal po'i 'od zer rnams las rnam par ldang // rgyal po'i 'od zer sgor ni mnyam bzhag cing // rgya mtshor chu dang chu klung kun nas ldang // rgya mtsho'i
295a5(phal chen): chu klung kun la mnyam bzhag cing // bdag nyid che ba'i mi'i lam las ldang // mi'i lam la de dag mnyam bzhag cing // dran dang ldan pa klung gi lam las ldang // rlung gi lam la
295a6(phal chen): de dag mnyam bzhag cing // bdag nyid che ba sa'i gzhi las ldang // sa'i gzhi la mnyam par bzhag byas shing // lhag pa'i gzhal med khang las rnam ldang // lha'i gzhal med
295a7(phal chen): khang du mnyam bzhag cing // dran dang ldan pa klu'i gnas nas ldang // yon tan mtha' yas bstsags pa de dag gi/ ting 'dzin rnam thar de dag bsam mi khyab// rgyal ba kun gyi
295a8(phal chen): skal pa bsam yas su// bstan pa mdzad kyang zad par mi rung ngo // rgyal ba kun gyis de skad ma gsungs min// 'gro ba kun gyis rnam smin bsam mi khyab// klu'i rnam 'phrul sangs
295b1(phal chen): rgyas rnams 'phrul dang // bsam gtan pa yi rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab// de dag la yang dpe bstan brjod par bya// de la 'dra ba'i dpe lta yod min te// mkhas shing gsal ba'i
295b2(phal chen): skye bo dpe rnams kyis// bstan na myur tu rnam par don shes 'gyur// sems kyi lam la rnam thar gnas pa yi// nyan thos gcig tu gyur cing mang bar 'gyur// mang por gyur cing de
295b3(phal chen): bzhin gcig gyur te// na mkha' 'di la bsam gtan 'cha' zhing 'bar// 'og nas 'bar yang steng nas chu'i rgyun// steng nas me 'bar 'og nas chu'i rgyun// 'gro 'dug nyal zhing
295b4(phal chen): 'greng ba de bzhin du// skad cig gcig la lus 'phrul bsam mi khyab// de ni snying rje chen po ldan ma yin// byang chub mi 'chol 'jig rten yal bar 'jog/ 'on kyang lus 'phrul
295b5(phal chen): bsam gyi mi khyab ston// 'jig rten phan tshol ci phyir de mi ston// nyi zla mkha' las rnam par rgyu 'dong zhing // phyogs rnams kun gyi mtsho dang lu ma dang // steng ka khron pa rin chen
295b6(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i snod// chu klung kun tu gzugs brnyan ston pa byed// de dag bams kyis mi khyab gzugs kun tu// skyes bu dpa' bo de dag phyogs bcur ston// ting 'dzin rnam thar
295b7(phal chen): kun gyi tshul la mkhas// de la de bzhin gshegs pa rang byung dpal// mcho gsal dang bar yan lag bzhi'i dpung // so so rang rang gzugs brnyan tshul bzhin mthong // ral
295b8(phal chen): gri shang lang ral gri mde'u thung mda'// gzhon pa theg pa go cha bcas par mthong // gang ba'i gang gzugs cha byad ci 'dra ba'i// chu gsal de la de bzhin ma nor mthong // chu la zhe sdang
296a1(phal chen): byams pa rnyog pa med// drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// rgya mtsho'i lha'i mo sgra dang dang ldan pa// sems can rgya mtsho ci snyed skyes pa'i rnams// de dag sgra'i
296a2(phal chen): yan lag dbyangs tshul shes// sgra skad kun tu rang rang skad du brjod// dbyangs ldan de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang can// 'on kyang sgra kun dbyangs kyi tshul la mkhas// gzungs dang chos kyi stob
296a3(phal chen): la dbang thob rnams// 'jig rten ltar bcas ci phyir mgur mi byed// dga' byed chung ma sgra snyan ldan pa mo// tshangs pa'i bu mo sems las byung ba ste// dam tshig bden sgrub mi tshe dag
296a4(phal chen): la 'dis// sems yi dag rnams byin gyi rlab pa byed// sgra bsnyen ldan pa 'dod chags zhe sdang can// brtul zhugs grub la dbyangs kyi rjes su 'brang // 'jig rten yid 'ong sgras kyang
296a5(phal chen): tshim par byed// ye shes yon tan mang ba cir mi ston// sngags kyi tshul mkhas sgyu ma'i mkhan po yang // sna tshogs mtha' yas gzugs mang snyan pa byed// nyin mtshan yud dang
296a6(phal chen): zla ba lo brgya dang // khyim bzang rgyas pa shin tu mdzes pa ston// 'dod chags sdang ldan sgyu ma'i mkhan po yang // sgyu ma'i 'phrul gyi 'jig rten dga' bar byed// bsam gtan mngon
296a7(phal chen): shes rnam 'phrul rab byed rnams// spyod pa'i tshul la ci phyir dga' mi byed// lha dang lha min dbang po 'thab pa'i tshe// lha min lha ya rung ste gang pham pa// de dag gzhon pa theg pa
296a8(phal chen): dgas bcas par// go cha gyon bzhin 'jigs pas kun tu byer// lha dbang de dag 'dod chags sdang ldan yang // lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam gyi mi khyab ston// dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul
296b1(phal chen): dbang la gnas pa'i dbang po rnams// lus kyi rnam 'phrul ci phyir ston mi byed// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i glang po shugs ldan pa// 'phrul chen dbang po yi ni 'khor gyur pa// mgo mang sum cu
296b2(phal chen): rtsa gnyis sprul pa byed// mgo rnams kun la'ang mche ba drug drug ste// so rnams re re kun la'ang rdzing gi rnams// bdun dang bdun bcus rgyas yongs sprul pa byed// rdzing rnams
296b3(phal chen): re re kun du pad mo rnams// bdun bdun rgyas kyis rnam brgyaran sprul pa byed// pad mo re re la yang lha'i bu mo dag/ sgyu rtsal kun mkhas bdun bdun sprul pa byed// de dag rtsed mo gru
296b4(phal chen): gar kun la mkhas// sum cu rtsa gsum dbang po de dag ce// glang po de dag klu'i lus btang zhing // lha rnams kun dang mnyam zhing 'dra bar rdzu// skyed pa'i tshul dang long spyod kun
296b5(phal chen): dang mthun// glang po mchog gi rnam 'phrul ci 'drar ltos// de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can// 'on kyang de 'dra rdzu 'phrul ston byed na// shes rab thams cad kyi stobs la byang
296b6(phal chen): gyur rnams// ting 'dzin brgyas kyang ci rab 'phrul mi byed// sgrag can ci dga'i tshul du lus rdzu na// rdo rje'i gzhi la rkang pa'i 'thing bor zhing // rgya mtsho'i gzabs ring lte bar byin
296b7(phal chen): tsam byed// ri rab rtse dang nyid kyi go yang snyom// de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can// 'on kyang de 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed na// 'jig rten sgron ma bdud rnams yongs
296b8(phal chen): 'dul ba// rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas ji rab ston mi byed// bsam yas brgya byin 'phrul la'ang ltos shig dang // lha dang lha dbang 'thab par gyur pa'i che// lha min bye ba 'byes pa ci
297a1(phal chen): bal @#snyed pa// de sbed brgya byin rang gi lus 'phrul byed// lha min dbang po lha min bal kun gyis// brgya byin rang rang bdun na 'dug par shes// de ni rdo rje 'chang bas gzungs
297a2(phal chen): 'gyur zhes// lha min dbang po kun kyang mgo myos so// 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyi mig stong rab bstan te// rdo rje me lce 'bar ba rab gzas shing // lus la go bgos gzi brjid
297a3(phal chen): thub dka' ba'i// brgya byin mthong nas lha min dbang po 'byer// de ni bsod nams phal gyi stobs dang 'thus// lha rgyal don du rnam par 'phrul byed na// 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi mgon
297a4(phal chen): gyur pa'i// bsod nams mi zad rnam ko cir mi 'phrul// lha rnams skul ba'i lha rdzas rnga yod pa// lha'i las rnams rnam par smin pas byung // lha rnams bag med spyod par shes gyur nas/
297a5(phal chen): mkha' las rnga'i dbyangs kyang rab tu sgrogs// 'dod pa thams cad mi rtag mi brtan te// 'jig cing mi gnas dbu ba'i rang bzhin 'dra// sgyu ma smig rgyu chu'i zla ba bzhin// srid pa kun kyang
297a6(phal chen): rmi lam sprin gyi dngos// bag med thams cad bcug can mya ngan ldan// tsham gis ma yin 'chi med lam ma yin// ci snyed bag med rnam par spyod pa'i rnams// bdud kyi chu srin chen po
297a7(phal chen): zos pa yin// yongasu 'dzin pa thams cad sdug bsngal rtsa// skye ba thams cad 'phags pa kun gyi smad// 'dod pa'i yon tan mthar zad rang bzhin gyis// chos la mos par rtag tu
297a8(phal chen): dga' bar gyis// brgya byin lhar bcas rnga yis bskul byas nas// kun kyang chos bzangs mdun sar dong byin te// lha mang kun la chos brtan zhi ba'i rnams// 'dod chags bral dang
297b1(phal chen): rjes su 'thun par brjod// rnga rab de ni gzugs med mi mthong yang // don che rnga'i sgra ni sgrog byed na// bsam pa'i tshul bzhin gzugs mang ston byed pa// 'gro ba kun gyi don chen
297b2(phal chen): cir mi byed// lha dang lha min 'thab par gyur pa'i che// lha'i bsod nams khyad par 'bru stobs kyis// lha rnams skul ba'i lha rdzas rnga'i mchog/ lha rnams 'jigs sa re zhes sgra yang
297b3(phal chen): sgrog/ rngas bskal lha rnams yongs dga' ba skye// 'jigs med stobs dang shin tu ldan par 'gyur// lha min dbang po 'jigs shing dngangs gyur te// de ma thag tu 'jigs shing rab
297b4(phal chen): tu 'byer// de bzhin rnga 'dra 'chi med stobs pa'i rnams// 'gro ba kun gyi mgon dang dpung gyur te// bdud dang nyon mongs bcom pa'i snying rje can// zhi ba'i sgra sgrogs nyon mongs rab
297b5(phal chen): tu sel// dbang po'i lha mo dgu bcu rtsa gnyis te// dbang po sprul pas kun kyang dga' bar 'gyur// gcig kyang bdag dang rgya byin rtse bar shes// gcig ltar lha mo kun kyang de bzhin//
297b6(phal chen): lha mo kun dang dga' bar gnas snang yang // chos bzangs mdun sar kun na'ang de bzhin tu// lha rnams kun la chos rab ston par yang // brgya byin skad cig gcig gis rnam par
297b7(phal chen): 'phrul// brgya byin 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can// sprul pas rang gi 'khor rnams dga' byed na// 'gro don mi skyo spyad pa ci'i phyir// rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'jig rten dgar
297b8(phal chen): mi byed// bdud kyi dkrugs ma 'gro ba'i dbang gyur pa// de'i dbang du sems can 'di kun 'dong // las dang nyon mongs kun tu 'khri zhags kyi// so so'i skye bo bdud 'khrugs des kyang
298a1(phal chen): la@#/ bcings// de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can// 'gro ba mang po bdud kyi dbang byed na// dbang bcu'i dbang thob gyur pa ri rab ste// 'gro ba thams cad rang gi dbang /
298a2(phal chen): mi gzhog/ stong gsum bdag po tshangs pa chen po yang // stong gsum kun gyi tshangs pa'i gnas rnams na// ma lus kun du 'dug par rab tu snang // tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yid 'ongs
298a3(phal chen): rnams kyang sgrogs// de ni 'jig rten pa yi tshangs lam gyi// bsam gtan mngon par shes pas rnam par 'phrul// 'jig rten yongs 'das bla na med pa'i// bsam gtan rnam thar
298a4(phal chen): gnas pa cir mi 'phrul// dbang phyug chen po'i ye shes rnam 'phrul ltos// rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi char rnams rab kye ba// skad cig gcig gis thams cad bgrang ba byed// thigs 'ga'i
298a5(phal chen): zer kyang ma lus des shes na// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab tshul brlabs te// sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med thob rnams// ri rab 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kyi// skad gcig
298a6(phal chen): gcig la sems bsags shes mi 'gyur// sems can las smin bsam gyis mi khyab pas// rlung las 'jig rten thams cad yongasu byung // rgya mtsho ri dang lha'i gzhal med khang //
298a7(phal chen): sa bon rnam mang kun kyang de las byung // rlung la sprin byung char pa kun tu 'bab// sprin mang zhi bar 'gyur ba rlung gi 'gyur// lo tog rnam par 'phel ba 'ang rlung gi ste// 'jig rten kun
298a8(phal chen): la rlung ni bde ba bskyed// de ni pha rol phyin la ma bslabs te// sangs rgyas yon tan rlung gi bslab min na'o// 'jig rten rnam grub mtha' yas ston byed na// rang nyam thob pa ji
298b1(phal chen): za bu mo bud med skyes skad/
298b2(phal chen): rab ston mi byed// rgya mtsho'i 'brug sgra'i sprin gyi tshul tshogs ni// bya skad rnams dang ji snyed ri dag skad// thams cad sgra bzhin 'gro la rnam par sgrog/ de bzhin sgra snyan rang bzhin
298b3(phal chen): skrag shes nas// bsgribs pa med pa'i spobs pa rab ldan pas// 'gro ba kun tu sgra snyan brjod byas shing // 'jig rten thams cad yid 'ong sgra tshim byed// rgya mtsho 'di la ngo mtshar
298b4(phal chen): rmad kyi chos// 'gro ba thams cad rgya dang mnyam snang zhing // chu dang 'byung po rin chen yongs mi zad// chu rnams bzung bas yongs su ngoms pa med// de bzhin de dag 'gro kun rgyar
298b5(phal chen): gsal te// bsod nams bsam gtan rnam thar zad mi shes// shes rab ye shes yon tan de bzhin du// bsod nams yon tan tshogs kyi ngoms pa med// rgya mtsho'i klu ni rnam
298b6(phal chen): par rtse byed na// sa'i gzhi nas dbang gyur gnas kyi bar// gling bzhi btsas par sprin chen rgyas par 'gengs// de dag kun kyang rgyan mang sna tshogs ldan// de na dbang gyur gnas su
298b7(phal chen): 'dzam bu chu klung gi/ gser gyi mdog tu sprin mang rnam par bsgrub// 'phrul dgar mu ga ti dmar po'i mdog lta bu// dga' ldan gnas su kha pa ba mo'i mdog/ 'u tshe 'thon 'thing
298b8(phal chen): bai DUr+ya'i mdog/ sum cu gsum du ma sa gar ba 'dra// rgyal chen gnas su shil gyi mdog lta bu// rdo rje mi byed sra mdog rgya mtsho'o// mi gnas su dad pa spos mdog 'dres
298b9(phal chen): par sr-i// klu'i gnas su pad mo'i mdog lta bu// gnod sbyin gnas su dad pa chu skyar mdog/ ri'i mdog tu lha min gnas su'o// byang du gser gyi kha dog 'od ston te// gling rnam gzhan
299a1(phal chen): la @#du'ang sna tshogs rgyan tu ston// 'dzam bu'i gling du ri gnas 'dra bar te// sprin rnam gang rnams ji ltar grub pa bzhin// dbang gyur gnas su gser gyi sprin bstan
299a2(phal chen): nas// nyi ma'i mdog 'dra glog kyang rab tu 'gyed// 'phrul dga' gnas su zla 'od bzang 'dra dang // dga' ldan gnas su 'dzam bu gser mdog ston// kha ba pa mo'i mdog tu 'tshe mar
299a3(phal chen): te// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas su gser mdog tu// rgyal chen gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mchog/ mu tig dmar po'i mdog tu rgya mtsho ro// mi ci'i gnas su 'thon 'thing bai DUr+ya/
299a4(phal chen): klu'i gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog/ gnod sbyin gnas su shel gyi kha dog ste// a sma'i mdog tu lha min gan su'o// byang du ngang gis snang ba'i rin chen mchog/ gling rnams
299a5(phal chen): gzhan du'ang rnam phyed gzhan dang gzhan// 'dzam bu'i gling du 'od 'phro an da rnyis// sprin gyis mtshan nyid tshul 'thun grog kyang 'gyed// de tshe tshangs pa'i dbang sgyur gnas su tshangs
299a6(phal chen): dbyangs su// 'brug sgra sgrog byed 'phrul dag rnga'i dbyangs// rol mo'i sgra yang dga' ldan gnas su ste// lha mo gnas su mtshe ma dag tu'o// sum cu gsum du mi 'am ci'i skad du ste/
299a7(phal chen): rgyal chen gnas su dri za'i skad du'o// ri 'thab dbyangs rgya mtsho kun du ste// mi 'am ci'i gnas su gling bu'i sgra// klu'i gnas su thal mo brdabs pa'i sgra// gnod sbyin gnas su klu'i
299a8(phal chen): bu mo'i sgra// lha min gnas su lha rdzas rnga'i sgra// rgya mtsho 'i shug slar mi'i gnas su'o// dbang sgyur gnas su lha rdzas gsum nim pa'i// me tog sna tshogs rgyan mad char yang 'beb/
299b1(phal chen): ba bzang po'i 'od ni 'phrul dgar te// me tog man d+ha ra ba'i char 'bebs so// dga' ldan gnas su rin chen po yi char// rgyan gyi dam pa rin chen sna tshogs dang // gtsug gi rin
299b2(phal chen): chen zla ba 'dra ba dang // gser 'od bzang po'i char pa rab tu 'bebs// rgyal mtshan gdugs dang ba dan bzang po dang // phreng ba byug brgyan gyi dam pa dang // mu tig dmar po la
299b3(phal chen): ltar btags mdog tu// rol mo yid 'ong char pa 'tshe mar 'bebs// sum cu gsum tu rin chen sna tshogs te// tsan dan dam pa'i spos dang a ka ru// gur gum ge sar lha rdzas te
299b4(phal chen): ma la// spos chu'i rgyun dang me tog 'dres par 'beb// nyam du 'gyur ba'i kha zas skom gyi rnams// kha dog dri zhim ro dang ldan pa dang // de min chen char 'bab bsam yas kyang /
299b5(phal chen): rgyal chen bzhi'i gnas su klu dbang 'bebs// de ni rgya mtsho chen po'i rgyun tu yang // char rgyun rgyun mi 'chad par gnya' shing tsam// mi zad rin chen shin du rgyal ba'i// rin chen
299b6(phal chen): char ni mtha' yas rgyun tu 'bab// mi ci gnas su phreng ba sna tshogs dang // pad mo ud be la gos dang rin chen dang // me tog par shi ma li phye ma spos// pi wang rda' dang gling bu
299b7(phal chen): snyan par ro// klu'i gnas su mu tig dmar po ste// gnod sbyin gnas su rin chen dang snang ba// lha min gnas su ral gri mde'u thung mdung // dgra 'dul gzhu dang ste'u kha'i char
299b8(phal chen): 'beb so// byang chub de ni phreng ba'i rkyen dang // me tog par shi ma li tsam pa ka'i// phreng ba bzang po kur na mug ta ka/ gling rnams gzhan du'ang char ni sna tshogaso// 'dzam bu'i
300a1(phal chen): ba @#gling du chu 'dang rab gsal ba'i// char rnams chos bzhin du ni za bar 'bebs// me tog 'bras bu sman dang spos dang shing // lo zas de bzhin 'jig rten bde 'phel
300a2(phal chen): byed// de ltar sprin rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dang // glog dang 'brug dang char pa rnam 'byed kyang // khyim nas mi g.yo rnam par rtog pa med// klu'i 'phrul yang de ltar bsam mi khyab
300a3(phal chen): de ltar chu'i rgya mtsho gnas pa yi// klu'i rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na// chos kyi rgya mtsho zhugs pa'i yon tan bdag/ mtha' yas rnam 'phrul mang po cir mi ston// dpe bya de
300a4(phal chen): ngag kun gyi mgo smos tsam// skyes bu de dag bzod byas te// dpa' bo de dag dpe dang rnam par bral// de dag de 'dra'i rnam thar dbang 'gyur ro// mtha' yas blo gros yangs pa'i
300a5(phal chen): blo gros can// ma nor blo gros mtha' yas blo gros can// ye shes mchog dang khyad par blo ldan pa'i// rnam thar dam pa de 'dra'i tshul du bshad// gang gis rnam thar 'di dag thos
300a6(phal chen): gyur nas// yid ches 'dzin cing 'jig rten sgrog pa ni// ngo mtshar slad kyi chos dang de ldan de// mi yul kun na de ni bka' ba byed// 'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dad byed na// so so'i
300a7(phal chen): skye bo'i tsho gas na'ang shin tu dkon// dge bsags bsod nams byas pa de dag ni// rgyu'i stobs kyis 'di la yid ches 'gyur// gang rnams nyan thos theg pa la yang yid ches
300a8(phal chen): pa'i// mi rnams 'jig rten kun na dkon pa ste// de bas rang rgyal theg la dad pa dkon// thag chen dang byed de bas shin tu dkon// theg chen 'di la zhugs pa mod pa ste// 'di
300b1(phal chen): 'dra'i chos chos la dad pa shin tu dkon// 'dzin cing spel byed smos kyang ci dgos te// yang dag ma nor 'jug pas smos mi dgos// la la stong gsum ri dang mtshor bcas pa/
300b2(phal chen): bskal par 'dzin cing mgo la khyer byas na'ang // 'di 'dra'i chos la dad par byed pa las// de 'dra de ni bka' bar rtsi ma yin// la las stong gsum rdul snyed sems can rnam
300b3(phal chen): bde ba kun gyis bskal par snyen bkur na'ang // 'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dad byed pa'i// bsod nams ci 'dra de 'dra de las min// la la zhing bcu ri dang mtshor bcas pa// lag
300b4(phal chen): pa'i 'thil gyis na mkha'i dbyings 'dzin kyang // 'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dang byed pa'i// dka' ba de 'dra de la yod pa min// la las zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sems can rnam//
300b5(phal chen): bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur kyang // 'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dang byed pa'i// bsod nams ci 'dra de 'dra de la min// la las zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas
300b6(phal chen): rnams// bskal par bde ba kun gyis bsnyen bkur te// la las le'u 'di yongs su bzung byas te// bsod nams 'di ni las khyad par 'phags// rnam thar de dag yongs su
300b7(phal chen): bstan pa yi// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad g.yos par gyur// lha dang bdud kyi gnas rnams zil gyis man na// 'on kyang bkye bas ngan song rab tu zhi// phyogs bcu kun
300b8(phal chen): gyis mi'i seng ge rnams// thams cad kun gyis mngon par zhal bstan te// phyag rkyang mtha' yas yon tan mang bdog kyang // bzang po'i dpal gyi mgo la zhag par gyur// phyag
301a1(phal chen): la @#gi 'thil gyi mgo la byug mdzad de// sangs rgyas de dag kun gyi gsung brjod pa// rnam thar 'di dag khyod kyis legs bshad kyi// legs par bstan la rjes su nged
301a2(phal chen): dgyes so// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las// bzang po'i dpal gyi le'u zhes bya ste// bcu bdun pa'o//
301a3(phal chen): bam po nyi shu pa'o// // de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus shar phyogs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang // de bzhin tu lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang
301a4(phal chen): phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams dang // shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams dang / 'og gi phyogs dang /
301a5(phal chen): steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams cad du/ gling bzhi pa 'di la sogs pa gleng bzhi pa re re na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag de bzhin tu bzhugs par snang ngo // byang
301a6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis// chos ston cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung na 'khod pa so so nas shes te/ bcom ldan
301a7(phal chen): 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de/ ma brtul bar byang chub kyi shing drung du ri rab kyi rtse mo'i lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang pa rnam par rgyal ba gang na ba der
301a8(phal chen): gshegs par snang ngo // 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa 'di ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dge
301b1(phal chen): gi ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par snang ste/ byin gyis rlabs snga ma dag kyang ma nyams par snang ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa
301b2(phal chen): logs su mngon par gshegs pa rgyang ring po nas mthong nas/ rgyal ba'i khang pa'i nang du rings pa'i gzugs rdzu 'phrul gyi rang bzhin te/ seng ge'i phyogs rnam par snang ba'i
301b3(phal chen): snying po can pog re stong phrag bcus brgyan pa/ gser gyi dra ba stong phrag bcus kun tu bres pa/ ga nas yol stong phrag bcus bla re bres pa/ gdugra stong phrag bcu shin tu bres pa/
301b4(phal chen): dar gyi lnga lding stong phrag bcu rab tu sbyangs pa/ mu tig gi se mo stong phrag bcus dga' dga' ltar byas pa/ gos stong phrag bcus mngon par bkab pa/ lha'i bu stong phrag
301b5(phal chen): bcus mdun du byas pa/ tshangs pa stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor ba/ 'od zer stong phrag bcus zhin tu snang bar gyur pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bdan du bshams so// ji
301b6(phal chen): ltar gling bzhi pa 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po khang pa rnam par rgyal ba'i lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdan bshams pa de bzhin tu/ 'jig rten
301b7(phal chen): gyi khams thams cad kyi ri rab rtse mo dag tu yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan dag tshul de 'dra ba dang / rgyad de 'dra ba shams par gyur to//
301b8(phal chen): de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri la bshams nas/ rjes dang rim gro chen pos bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar te/
302a1(phal chen): pal @phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa gshegs su gsol//
302a2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs sam zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
302a3(phal chen): spyan drangs nas/ rnam par rgyal ba'i khang par gshegaso// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi lha'i khang par dag tu yang
302a4(phal chen): gshegs par snang ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus sum cu rtsa gsum gyi khang par brtsegs pa thams cad du/ glu dang rol mo dang / sil snyen brgya
302a5(phal chen): phrag mang po dag btang ste zhi bar byas nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snga ma rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag rjes su dran nas/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di
302a6(phal chen): dag smras so// bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// thugs rje chen po mnga' ba 'od bsrungs rigs skyes pa// rnam par rgyal bar gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis
302a7(phal chen): legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// gser thub bsgribs pa med par rab tu gzigs pa de// rin chen sna tshogs gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis
302a8(phal chen): legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// bsod na skyabs gser gyi ri bo 'dra ba de// rtse mo mchog tu gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur
302b1(phal chen): cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// thams cad mnga' ba dgra bcom dri ma gsum sel ba// mdzod spu'i rtse mo gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur
302b2(phal chen): cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// sangs rgyas gtsug gtor dgongs pa zil gyis mi non pa// rin chen sna tshog gsheg gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis leg gyur
302b3(phal chen): cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// rnam par gzigs pa skyes bu'i zla ba mi'i mgon// rin chen rgyan tu gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis leg gyur
302b4(phal chen): cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// shin du rgyas pa don dam mkhas shing brtan pa de// ma la ya'i rtser gshegs pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur
302b5(phal chen): cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// grags pa dri ma med pa mgon po pad mo'i bla// dri ma med par gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur
302b6(phal chen): cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// mgon po mar me mdzad pa 'od snang mnga' ba de// 'od zer 'dra bar gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur
302b7(phal chen): cig/ ci ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis// sangs rgyas kyis 'thus yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu'i rgyal ba gshegs pa/ grur blangs te tshig su bcan pa de bzhin
302b8(phal chen): tu// 'jig rten gyi kham thams cad na sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i dbang po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gzhan dang gzhan gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu
303a1(phal chen): @#rgyal ba gshegs pa dag glur len cing / tshig su bcod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba'i khang par gshegs nas/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas te
303a2(phal chen): bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bzhugs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dag gdan de las bzhugs par snang ngo // bcom ldan
303a3(phal chen): 'das de ltar bzhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyis mthus rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa de yang sum cu rtsa gsum thams cad kyi khang pa/ lha'i ris tsam du che bar gyur te/ 'di na ci lta ba
303a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang de bzhin no// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rtse mo gshegs pa'i le'u
303a5(phal chen): ste/ bcwo brgyad pa'o// / de nas sangs rgyas kyis mthus phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ong bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so
303a6(phal chen): nas 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol na 'ongs pa sha stag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi
303a7(phal chen): zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar chos kyi blo gros dang thams cad
303a8(phal chen): blo gros dang / dpal gyi blo gros dang / yon tan bla gros dang / brtson 'grus blo gros dang / dge ba'i blo gros dang / ye shes blo gros dang / bden pa'i blo gros dang / mchog gi blo gros dang / dam
303b1(phal chen): pa'i blo gros dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / ming 'di zhes bya ba nas 'ongs pa ste/ 'di ltar dbang po'i me tog dang / pad mo'i me tog dang / rin po che'i me tog
303b2(phal chen): dang / ud pa la'i me tog dang / rdo rje'i me tog dang / spos kyi me tog dang / yid du 'ongs pa'i me tog dang / 'od zer gyi me tog dang / sdum bu'i me tog dang / na mkha'i me tog dang / byang
303b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba de dag gi zham ring na tshangs par spyod pa dag ste// 'di ltar zla ba bzhin ma yin pa dang // zla ba mnyam
303b4(phal chen): pa dang / zla ba mi g.yo ba dang / zla ba mi skul ba dang / zla ba chu'i lha dang / zla ba thogs pa med pa dang / zla ba'i 'od zer dang / zla ba brdul med pa dang / zla ba rnam par grub pa dag go/
303b5(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas kyis mthus phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang nas/ gang nas 'ongs pa'i
303b6(phal chen): pa'i phyogs su brten te/ seng ge'i khri rnam par snang ba'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mo
303b7(phal chen): la byang chub sems dpa' rnams lhags pa de bzhin tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad dang lha'i dbang po'i khang pa kun na yang de bzhin te/ byang chub sems
303b8(phal chen): ming de skad ces bya ba sha stag go// 'jig rten gyi khams kyang de skad ces bya ba nas 'ongs pa sha stag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi 'the bo gnyis nas/ 'od zer bye ba phrag
304a1(phal chen): @#stong bkye ste/ phyogs bcu thams cad snang bar byas nas 'jig rten gyi khams cad kyang bstan to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis kyang / 'jig rten
304a2(phal chen): gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad dang / ri rab kyi rtse mo thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyang mthong
304a3(phal chen): bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// snang ba dri
304a4(phal chen): ma med la ltos// ri rab rtse mo thams cad la// mgon po dag ni rab tu snang // rnam par rgyal ba kun na bzhags// lha'i rgyal po thams cad kyi// spyan drangs shing ni gshegs par
304a5(phal chen): gyur// kun kyang sangs rgyas bcu dag gis// rab tu gshegs pas mngon par ston// kun gyi 'khor kyang gcig pa ste// byang chub sems dpa' mang po lhags// phyogs bcu dag
304a6(phal chen): nas 'ongs gyur cing // yid du 'ong ba'i bstan la 'khod// kun gyi ming yang 'di nyid de// ji ltar nged la btags pa bzhin// 'jig rten khams kyi ming dag kyang // de dag nas kun
304a7(phal chen): kyang 'ongs// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad na// drang srong chen po'i mtshan kyang de// de na tshangs spyod bla med la// the tshom med par de dag spyod// kye ma rgyal sros khyod ltos
304a8(phal chen): shig/ drang srong chen po'i byin gyis brlabs// 'dzam bu gling rnams thams cad na// rgyal ba 'di na bzhugs snyam byed// bdag cag rnams ni 'di snyam du// ri rab rtse la bde gshegs
304b1(phal chen): skams// 'jig rten khams rnams kun na'ang // sangs rgyas ngo mtshar smad re che// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad na// byang chub mchog tu sems btang zhing // de dag
304b2(phal chen): smon lam 'di btab ste// byang chub spyad pa rab tu spyod// kha dog mdog ni tshad med pas// gang zag mchog ni spyod byed kyang // chos kyi dbyings la mi chags te// de dag sus kyang
304b3(phal chen): mi shes so// gang gis 'jig rten mun bsal cing // thams cad du ni rnam snang ba// de la 'dra ba gang yang med// de ni shes par ci ltar rung // de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams
304b4(phal chen): cad blo gros kyis// phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'dren pa rnams ni mthong nas kyang // bskal pa mang por 'das gyur te// 'jig
304b5(phal chen): rten mgon skyob de dag/ chos nyid de ni shes pa min// mtshan ma dag la spyod pa'i rnams// gti mug 'dra ba 'phel bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas gang gis ma mthong ba// 'khor
304b6(phal chen): ba'i brtson rar mdongs pa yin// chos rnams 'di dag brtags byas na// rang bzhin shes par mi rung ste// skye rang 'chi 'phor 'gyur ba rnams// ming tsam du ni bstan pa yin//
304b7(phal chen): chos rnams gang yang 'phro ba med// gang yang de bzhin skye ba med// chos nyid 'di ni shes gyur na// sangs rgyas kun na rab tu snang // gzung du med cing bltar med de// chos kyi
304b8(phal chen): rnams ni rang bzhin gyis// dngos po med pa'i mtha' shes na// sangs rgyas rnams la tshad kyang med// tshad med pa'i chos rnams kyi// rang bzhin gang gis yongs shes pa// des ni
305a1(phal chen): bal @#ci zhig yod ces par// mthong bar 'gyur ba gang yang med// gang rnams mtshan ma'i rjes 'brang ba// de dag byis pa'i chos nyid de// de'i phyir mtshan nyid kun med pa'i//
305a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnams kyang mi mthong ngo // dus gsum byung ba'i thub pa rnams// mtshan rab kun dang ldan pa ste// mi gnas tshul du bzhugs pa yin// chos kyi dbyings la g.yo ba med/
305a3(phal chen): la la dag gis chos nyid shes// la la dag la chos kyang brjod// gang la the tshom mi mnga' ba// yang dag sangs rgyas de ring mthong // sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid 'di// chos kyis
305a4(phal chen): blo gros 'dis brjod de// de thos nas kyang bdag cag gis// sangs rgyas byang chub mtha' yas shes// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi blo gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis
305a5(phal chen): rlabs kyi phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// kye ma sangs rgyas dpal mnga' ba// ye shes shes rab shin tu che// de la 'jig rten shin du
305a6(phal chen): rmongs// sangs rgyas chos ni bsam mi khyab// tshul bzhin ma yin 'du shes kyis// byis pa rnams ni sems byed pas// de phyir 'du shes kun sbyangs pa'i// sangs rgyas rnam
305a7(phal chen): ni mi mthong ngo // shes rab chung ba thams cad ni// phung po'i 'du shes rnams la gnas// phung po rnam par ma bsgoms pas// de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ngo // dngos med dngos
305a8(phal chen): su mi shed pa ni// bdag gi dngos shes bya ba yin// chos rnams thams cad shes kyis shing // rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad ltos// sngan chad phung po'i tshul bzhin tu// ma 'ongs
305b1(phal chen): rnams kyang sus mthong ba// ma 'ongs pa'i tshul shes pas// sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab ltos// ji ltar snang ba med pa yi// mun pa'i nang na gzugs mi snang // de bzhin
305b2(phal chen): chos rnams ma bshad pa// mkhas kyang shes par mi rung ngo // ji ltar dri mi ldan mig gis// bsal ba'i gzugs kyang mi mthong ba// de bzhin sems ni ma sbyangs pa// sangs/
305b3(phal chen): chos ni mi mthong ngo // ji ltar nyi ma sgribs med pa'i// ri rab can gyis mi mthong ba// de bzhin phug na gnas sems kyis// sangs rgyas dag ni mi mthong ngo // de bas
305b4(phal chen): mig ni rnam par sbyongs// gzugs kyis 'du shes rnam par sgoms// chos rnams mthong ba med pa yis// 'od mdzad rab tu mthong ba yin// ji ltar sngon blos kun
305b5(phal chen): bshad cing // bdag gis ji ltar thos pa yin// sangs rgyas byang chub mi snyed pas// rnam par snang mdzad rab tu mthong // de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan
305b6(phal chen): blo gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gnas med pa yi chos rnams la// gnas ni yongs
305b7(phal chen): su brtags pas na// de phyir srid pa'i brtson ra na// byis pa rnams ni rab tu 'khor// brjod pas brjod du mi rung chos// blo gzhan rnams kyis rnam par brtag// des ni yongs
305b8(phal chen): su bsgribs byas pas// bdag gis sems kyang rab rmongs byed// shes rab chung ba lam nor cing // bdag gis sems la mi mkhas pa// phyin ci logs gi blo dag gis/
306a1(phal chen): @#mi bzad lus ni 'phel bar byed// bdag gis stong pa ma mthong ba// de dag 'khor zhing nyam yang // chos mig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// mig kyang de
306a2(phal chen): la yod pa min// de bas mig ni sbyar bar gyis// bsam pa rnams kyang rnam par soms// gang phyir bdag cag lnga 'chad du// bde gshegs ma mthong chud kyang zos// yang dag sangs
306a3(phal chen): rgyas mthong na'ang // gang gis sems la chags med pa// des ni sangs rgyas cis byung ba'i// chos rnams de dag rab tu mthong // gang gi shes rab che mnga' ba// chos rnams bde ga
306a4(phal chen): mthong ba'i rnams// de dag 'jig rten mig can te// gang gis mthong ba mthong zhes bya// lhag mthong med par mthong ba ni// chos rnams ngan par mthong ba ste// lhag mthong gis ni
306a5(phal chen): mthong gyur na// thams cad mthong ba med pa yin// skye ma chos kyis chos nyid ni// yang dag sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad// de ni rang bzhin thams cad du// shi ba med cing 'tsho ba
306a6(phal chen): med// sangs rgyas byang chub ci 'dra ba// dpal gyi blos ni sngon bstan te// de las bdag gis thos nas kyang // sangs rgyas chos nyid shes ma gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
306a7(phal chen): brtson 'grus blo gros kyi phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe chegasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rnam par rtogs la spyod pa yi// mig ni shin tu 'khrul pa yin// 'khrul
306a8(phal chen): bar mthong ba log pa ste// sangs rgyas la ni log mi mnga'// gang gis log par shes gyur te// yang dag ci bzhin ma nor ba// yang dag ma yin bden shes na// sangs rgyas dri med
306b1(phal chen): mthong ba yin// mthong ba dag gis dri mar 'gyur// rnam par mthong na de med de// sangs rgyas rnams ni mthong dang bral// de bas rnam par gzigs zhes bya// de ni 'jig rten spyod pa ste//
306b2(phal chen): 'jig rten de yang rnam par rtags// 'jig rten 'jig par shes gyur na// snang ba dag ni skye bar 'gyur// 'jig rten mtshan nyid snang ba ste// yang dag ci bzhin mnyam byas shing // de ltar
306b3(phal chen): mthong na mthong ba'o// de dag ltar mthong nyon mongs med// dbang du gyur cing zag pa med// gang gis tha dad med mthong na// dngos por brtags pa ma yin na// dngos por brtags pa
306b4(phal chen): ma yin no// rtogs dang rnam par rtog pa ni// sangs rgyas chos rnams brjod pa ste// de dag yod pa ma yin pas// rang bzhin de phyir sbyangs pa yin// de dag rang bzhin rnam par dag/ nam
306b5(phal chen): mkha' bzhin du mtshan nyid med// de dag la ni ston pa med// mkhas pa rnams kyis de ltar ltos// chos kyi 'du shes rnams bsgoms shing // shes pa de yang ma bsgoms pa// des ni
306b6(phal chen): thub chen mthong ba yin// ji ltar yon tan blos brjod pa// de phyir yang dag sangs rgyas mthong // de mthong bas na 'du byed kun// rang bzhin gyis kyang rnam par zhi// de nas byang chub
306b7(phal chen): sems dpa' dge ba'i blo gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// kye ma sangs rgyas dpa'
306b8(phal chen): chen rnams// de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med do// rnam grol thugs ni sdig mi mnga'// 'jig rten mthar phyin 'gal ba'o// yang dag ci bzhin ma nor pa// bskal pa rnams ni
307a1(phal chen): bal @#tshad med par// ji ltar mkhas pa mthong ba yin// 'jig rten sgron mas rab tu gzigs// 'du byed thams cad skad cig ma// so so'i skye bo de dag 'gengs// namakha'i
307a2(phal chen): khams ni gzung byas shing // de dag de phyir khoms pa med// khong pa med cing bya ba ni// ji yang brjod pa med pa ste// khoms pa bsam gyis mi khyab thob// gang la dngos po med pa yi// mi
307a3(phal chen): zad khom pa med par bshad// yod pa'i rang bzhin shes gyur na// de ni grags med mthong ba yin// mthong ba med pa mthong shes bya// yod pa med pa'ang yod ces bya// mthong ba dag gam
307a4(phal chen): yod pa min// ma bsgom pa ni rnam par bsgom// ji ltar blta ba sus mthong ba// de ni 'jig rten snang bar byed// rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad bzhi// chos rnams kyis ni snang ba gcig/
307a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu bstan// de ni brtson blo bstan pa de// chos mang byed pa rab tu ston// yod dang med pa shes byas te// gang gis 'du shes rnam bsgoms pa// des ni sangs
307a6(phal chen): rgyas mthong ba ste// yang dag mtha' la rab tu gnas// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes blo gros kyi 'thus phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// /
307a7(phal chen): rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di thos nas// snang ba bdag cag shes gyur// phyogs bcu kun tu snang ba yin// yang dag sangs rgyas des kyang mthong // sems can rang bzhin yod gyur pa// de ni
307a8(phal chen): sems can yang sa ste// 'di la ci yang yod pa min// tshig gi lam rnams bsdus pa'o// byis pa 'dzin dang bcas pa rnams// bdag lus yang dag 'dzin pa la// sangs rgyas snang bar mi
307b1(phal chen): 'gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa bzung ba med// yang dag sangs rgyas ma mthong zhing // gang rnams mig yod ma yin pa// de dag bskal pa grangs med du// srid pa'i gang chen mtshon
307b2(phal chen): 'khor// nyon mongs can ni 'khod par bshad// nyon mongs med pa mya ngan 'das// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba yang // rang bzhin rnyed par mi rung ngo // 'khor zhes bya ba brda yin te//
307b3(phal chen): mya ngan 'das pa brjod pa yin// 'phags pa'i chos rnams ma skyes pa// bla ma dag ni mi shes so// de ni sangs rgyas thob pa 'di// de yin 'dra'i 'du shes can// de dag sangs rgyas mi
307b4(phal chen): mthong ste// tshul bzhin ma yin phyin ci log/ zhi ba'i rang bzhin ji lta bar// gang gis zhi ba shes gyur na// de ni tshig gi lam 'das pa'i// yang dag sangs rgyas rab tu mthong // chos
307b5(phal chen): rnams kun gyi spyod pa ni// rab tu brjod kyang bstan pa med// 'on kyang mnyam pa nyid du lta// rgyal ba chos rnams kun dang mnyam// yang dag sangs rgyas mtha' dpung med// thog ma
307b6(phal chen): dag dang mtha' yang // 'gal med rtsa ba med pas na// de ni sangs rgyas de phyir brjod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bden pa'i blo gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis rlabs
307b7(phal chen): kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas rnams dang mnyam pa'i phyir// bskal pa khams kyis mi khyab par// sems can
307b8(phal chen): dmyal bar gnas kyang bla// de ni bde ba bsam mi khyab// ci phyir zhe na bskal pa'i rnams// grangs med sdug bsngal sngan chad byung // 'on kyang bde gshegs ma thos pas// bdag
308a1(phal chen): phal @#cag 'khor las ma grol lo// de bzhin ma nor chos kyi rnams// yang dag nyid tu rtogs gyur te// gang la rtogs pa med pa'i rnams// de dag byang chub bla na med//
308a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnams dang mngon gsum pa// sngan chad ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur// gang phyir sangs rgyas brjod pa'i chos// de dag mnyan nyid med pa'o// chos rnams blta bka' ci bzhin du/
308a3(phal chen): gang zhig de ltar rtogs pa ni// de dag sangs rgyas kun gzigs pa// yang dag lta bas shin tu mthong // yang dag la ni yang dag gzigs// yang dag min par yang dag min// 'di'i
308a4(phal chen): mtha' ni ston pas na// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes kyang bya// khong du chud par chos bstan te// sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu brjod// 'di ni sangs rgyas bsgom pa te// gcig tu dmigra
308a5(phal chen): pa ma yin no// de ltar mang dang gcig gnas pa// mang po dag tu rnam par shes// gnas pa med pa'i chos kyi rnams// bsags pa dag kyang rab tu byas// byas pa med cing byed pa med//
308a6(phal chen): las kyi 'du shes rnam bsgoms shing // las 'di ji bzhin shes gyur na// rnam pa dag kyang mi dmig so// gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yi// nges pa'i gnas ni dmigs med pas/
308a7(phal chen): gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis// sangs rgyas g.yo ba gang yang med// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog gis blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis rlobs kyis/ phyogs
308a8(phal chen): bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sems can chen po bla na med// sems can 'du shes rnam par bsgom// 'jug par bya ba gang yang med// de bas tha
308b1(phal chen): na med ces bya// gang la phra ba yod min pa// de la spobs pa'ang yod pa min// de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi brnyes// rnam par mi rtog 'dus ma byas// gang zhig sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/
308b2(phal chen): de la grang ba yod pa min// yang dag sangs rgyas bgrang dang bral// de ni sangs rgyas chos nyid do// mun pa rnams ni rnams gsal cing // de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang // de
308b3(phal chen): la snang ba gang yang med// mi snang ba 'ang ci yang med// thams cad chos la kun nas dga'// skyes pa med cing gnas pa med// 'dod chags med cing rten pa med// chos
308b4(phal chen): nyid de yang rten pa med// chos nyid de yang sbed pa med// gang la gnyis su bgrang med cing // gcig kyang yod pa ma yin pas// ci bzhin rab tu gnas pa rnams// shes
308b5(phal chen): rab chen po legs par mthong // mi gnyis pa la gnyis pa med// gnyis pa med pa stong pa ste// stong pa de yang khams gsum kun// de ni sangs rgyas mthong ba'o// byis pas
308b6(phal chen): byang chub mi shes kyang // de dag de la rab tu gnas// gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis// rang gis lus ni rjes su blta// lus med pa ni lus su bshad// 'byung ba med
308b7(phal chen): cing bstan tu med// 'jigs rdzogs mang po lta med pa// sangs rgyas sku ni bla na med// sangs rgyas chos nyid rang bzhin med// de skad bden pa'i blo smra ste// de thos pas ni mig
308b8(phal chen): kyang sbyangs// shin tu 'od kyang dang shing snang // de nas byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/
310a1(phal chen): de'i tshe tshig su bcad de smras pa// drin bzo med pa'i sems can phyir// skyes bu drang srong chen po mchog gi rnams// dpa' chen sems can gtso bo dag/ 'od mdzad pa
310a2(phal chen): ni rab tu byung // thugs rje chen po bskyed mdzad de// sems can khams la rnams gzigs kyang // srid pa'i bcings pas sdug bsngal ba'i// sems can rnams ni de nas gzigs//
310a3(phal chen): 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa na// yang dag sangs rgyas dpa' mnga' ba// sems can gtso bo ma rtags par// skyob pa gzhan ni gang yang med// gal te sangs rgyas ma skyes la/
310a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' 'di 'dra dag/ med na 'jig rten khams kun na// sems can bde ba gcig mi 'byung // sems can gtso bo 'dren mdzad pa// de bzhin gshegs pa skyes pa dang /
310a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' 'di 'dra dag/ byung ba 'jig rten bde ba'i rgyu// gang gis de bzhin gshegs mthong ba// de dag thob pa legs par thob// gang gis thos shing dad 'gyur ba/
310a6(phal chen): de yang 'jig rten mchod rten no// gang gis sangs rgyas mthong gyur pa// bdag cag rnams kyis thob legs thob// 'di 'dra ba'i tshul thos nas// kun kyang yang dag sangs rgyas
310a7(phal chen): 'gyur// 'das pa'i dus na'ang dpal 'di yod// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi// shes rab mig ni rnam sbyangs pas// spyod yul 'di 'dra mthong bar 'gyur// rnam par snang
310a8(phal chen): mdzad thub mthong nas// da rung phyir zhing dad pa skye// de'i ye shes mtha' yas pas// da rung brjod du yod pa yin// gang zhig mchog gri blos smras dang // rgyal sras rnams kyi bshad pa'i
310b1(phal chen): rnams// de dag da rung bdag gis kyang // bskal pa bsam yas bshad par bya/ shin tu rgyas pa chen po mdo las// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las ri rab kyi rtse mor/
310b2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi tshig su bcad pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / bam po nyi shu gcig pa/
310b3(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis rlabs kyis// sbyor ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go// de ltar
310b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i ci du sbyor ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu de'i mod la/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs
310b5(phal chen): re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang chos
310b6(phal chen): kyi blo gros zhes bya bar/ mtshan 'thun par sha stag gis zhal mngon par bstan pa mthong bar gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
310b7(phal chen): chos kyi blo gros khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sbyor ba mtha' yas pa la mnyam par bzhag pa legs so// de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod la phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs
310b8(phal chen): pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang / mtshan 'thun pa sha stag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ sngon gyi smon lam dang khyod
311a1(phal chen): bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar rten pas/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad bstan par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / chos kyis dbyings
311a2(phal chen): su chung bar bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams rnam par bsgom pa dang / chags pa med pa nyid du chud par bya ba dang / bsgribs pa med pa'i spyod yul thob par bya ba dang / kun nas sbyor ba thob
311a3(phal chen): par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bzung bar bya ba dang / chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ba dang / dbang po thams cad yongasu shes par bya ba dang / chos bstan pa thams
311a4(phal chen): cad yongs su bzung ba dang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgongs pa bcu la rtsom par bya ba'i phyir byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad kyis// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus
311a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis chos bstan pa 'di la spobs pa bskyed cig/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la chags pa med
311a6(phal chen): pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// thogs pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// chod pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// rmongs pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// tha dad med pa nye bar bsgrub
311a7(phal chen): pa mdzad do// kha na ma tho ba med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// dpag tu med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// zhum pa med par nye bar bsgrub par mdzad do// 'phrogs pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa
311a8(phal chen): mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyi spyi bo la phyag g.yas
311b1(phal chen): par byug pa mdzad de/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyag gi reg ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ byang chub sems
311b2(phal chen): dpa' de dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa'i rigs zhes bya ba 'di ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mtha' rtags pa shin tu yangs pa ste/ de la
311b3(phal chen): gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigasu skye ba yin/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs skye ba
311b4(phal chen): yin// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigasu skye ba yin// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' brtson par byed pa gang lags bsam te/ de skad du smra ba
311b5(phal chen): de dag gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa ste/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
311b6(phal chen): rnams kyis// gsung ba dang gsung ba dang / gsung bar 'gyur ba dag go// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa dang las dang po
311b7(phal chen): pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam
311b8(phal chen): par dgod pa dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / gzhon nur gyur pa'i
312a1(phal chen): @#byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o//
312a2(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa ste/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsung ba dang /
312a3(phal chen): gsung bar 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la sems dang po bskyed pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bco
312a4(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams mthong nas/ mdzes pa dang / bzang ba dang / mig tu 'ongs pa dang / kha dog rgyas pa dang / thub par dga' ba dang / mthu che bar mthong ba 'am/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul
312a5(phal chen): pa dang / yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rjes su bstan pa'i rnam par mthong ba 'am/ sems can sdug bsngal bar mthong ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
312a6(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rgya chen po thos par gyur nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon cing / snga phyi med par byang chub tu sems bskyed
312a7(phal chen): de/ sems bskyed pa dang po des ni/ thub par dka' ba'i gnas bcu ni yongs su bzung bar gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang / las kyi rnam pa
312a8(phal chen): smin pa shes pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang bar shes pa dang / dbang po dang brtson 'grus rnam pa tha dad pa yongs su rdzogs pa mchog dang tha ma shes pa dang / mos
312b1(phal chen): pa dang tha dad pa dang mos pa du ma shes pa dang / khams tha dad pa dang / khams du ma shes pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang
312b2(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang byang ba shes pa dang / rjes su dran pa'i sgrib pa med par shes pa dang / chags pa med pa'i lha'i mig shes pa
312b3(phal chen): dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid zag pa med pa shes pa'o// thub par dka' ba'i gnas bcu po dag yongs su zin par 'gyur te/ 'di ni sems dpa' thob po bskyed pa'i byang chub
312b4(phal chen): sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa de ni/ sangs rgyas mchod pa la sbyar bar bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bstan par
312b5(phal chen): bde ba yang de la brjod par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi nang na gtso bor gyur pa'ang de la brjod par bya'o// phul tu phyin pa'ang de la brjod par bya'o// zil gyis mi non pa'i gnas kyang de la
312b6(phal chen): brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba yang de la bstan par bya'o// sangs rgyas tshad med pa dang phrad par 'gyur ba yang de la bstan par bya'o// rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin
312b7(phal chen): gyi sbyor ba yang de la brjod par bya'o// 'khor ba'i 'khar lo las ldog par 'gyur ba yang de la brjod par bya'o// sems can sdug bsngal ba yongs su bskyab pa yang de la brdad
312b8(phal chen): bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de las kyang shas cher sems bskyed par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang bdag nyid
313a1(phal chen): gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i
313a2(phal chen): sras 'di la byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nyid du sems can thams cad la rnam pa bcur sems nye bar 'jog ste bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste phan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog go/ snying rtse ba'i
313a3(phal chen): sems dang / bde ba'i sems dang / gnas pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / phan 'dog pa'i sems dang / yongs su bsrung ba'i sems dang / mnyam pa'i sems dang / slob
