313a4(phal chen): dpon gyi sems dang / ston pa'i sems nye bar 'jog go/ rnam pa bcu po de dag gis sems can thams cad la sems nye bar 'jog go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni las dang po pa'i byang chub
313a5(phal chen): sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa'i de ni thog ma nyid du kha don la yongs su bskal bar bya'o// mang du thos nas dben pa gnas pa la
313a6(phal chen): yongs su bskul bar bya'o// rab tu dben par gyur nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen su 'gyur bar yongs su bskal bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes su gyur nas nga lo bde ba la yongs su
313a7(phal chen): bskul bar bye'o// nga lo bde bar gyur nas/ 'du shes pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// dus shes nas mi 'jigs pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// mi 'jigs par gyur nas/
313a8(phal chen): doni shes pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// don shes nas chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// chos kyi rjes su 'gro bar gyur nas rmongs pa med pa la yongs su
313b1(phal chen): bskul bar bya'o// rmongs pa med par gyur nas/ rnam par dgod pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad la de bas kyang shas cher sems can
313b2(phal chen): thams cad la snying rje chen po mngon du gzhog pa bya ba dang / gnas gang thos nas kyang bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyis drin 'jog par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i
313b3(phal chen): phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni las dang po pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
313b4(phal chen): rnam par dgod pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa'i rnam pa bcus/ chos thams cad la brtson par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di
313b5(phal chen): ltar chos thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad bdag med pa dang / chos thams cad byed pa med pa dang / chos thams cad myong ba med
313b6(phal chen): pa dang / chos thams cad brda' med pa dang / chos thams cad gnas med pa dang / chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / chos thams cad la tshad du byed pa med pa ste/ dmig
313b7(phal chen): ba'i rnam pa bcu po de dag gi chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tshul du brtson par byed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag 'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
313b8(phal chen): de ltar rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can gyi khams brtag pa la yong su bskul bar bya'o// chos kyi khams rtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// 'jig
314a1(phal chen): @#rten gyi khams rtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// sa'i khams rtag pa la yongasu bskul bar bya'o// chu'i khams rtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// me'i
314a2(phal chen): khams rtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// rlung gi khams rtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// 'dod pa'i khams rtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// gzugs kyi khams rtag
314a3(phal chen): ba la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// gzugs med pa'i khams rtag pa la yongasu bskul bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bas kyang chos la snang bar 'gyur ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang
314a4(phal chen): bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa'o//
314a5(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i gsung rab la yongs su smin pa bcus skyes pa
314a6(phal chen): yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa dang / sangs rgyas la shes pas mos pa'i mthar phyin pa dang / chos nges par rtogs pa dang / sems can rnam par bsgom pa dang /
314a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsgom pa dang / las rnam par bsgom pa dang / rnam par smin pa rnam par bsgom pa dang / 'khor ba rnam par bsgom pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa rnam
314a8(phal chen): par bsgom pa ste/ yongs su smin pa bcu po 'di dag gis/ 'phags pa'i gsung rab la skyes pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// de ltar
314b1(phal chen): cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'das pa'i/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos rnam par bsgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par bsgom
314b2(phal chen): pa la yongs su bsgom par bya'o// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par bsgom pa la yongs su bskal bar bya'o// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par
314b3(phal chen): bsgrub pa rnam par bsgom pa la yongs su bsgom par bya'o// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba rnam par bsgoms pa la yongasu bskul bar bya'o//
314b4(phal chen): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub pa rnam par bsgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub pa rnam
314b5(phal chen): bar sgom pa la yongs su bskal bar bya'o// mi byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub par bya ba rnam par bsgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// da ltar byung
314b6(phal chen): ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub pa rnam par bsgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa la yongs su bskul bar
314b7(phal chen): bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la de bas kyang sems 'jug par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor ba dang / bdag
314b8(phal chen): nyid gzhan gyi dring la 'jog par mi bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni cher skyes pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
315a1(phal chen): la @dag de la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtse ba gang ci com
315a2(phal chen): yang rung ste/ de thams cad sems can yongs su skyabs pa'i phyir rtsom mo// sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo// sems can thams cad bde bar bya
315a3(phal chen): ba'i phyir rtsom mo// sems can thams cad la snying rtse bar bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo// sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo// sems can thams cad yong
315a4(phal chen): su 'grol bar bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo// sems can thams cad la gnod pa med par bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo// sems can thams cad drang bar bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo// kye rgyal ba'i
315a5(phal chen): sras dag 'di ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ste/ sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la ni/ sems can mtha' yas pa brjod par
315a6(phal chen): bya'o// sems can tshad med pa brjod par bya'o// sems can grangs med pa brjod par bya'o// sems can thabasam gyis mi khyab pa brjod par bya'o// sems can gzugs
315a7(phal chen): med pa brjod par bya'o// sems can dpag tu med par brjod par bya'o// sems can stong pa brjod par bya'o// sems can byed pa brjod par bya'o// sems can dngos po
315a8(phal chen): med pa brjod par bya'o// sems can rang bzhin med pa brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i sems de bas kyang shas cher mngon par zhen pa la mi gnas par bya ba dang /
315b1(phal chen): gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag 'di ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs
315b2(phal chen): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
315b3(phal chen): ngag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu nyan na/ bsam pa nges pa rab tu thob pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas la snyan pa 'am mi snyan pa brjod
315b4(phal chen): kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos la snyan pa mi snyan pa brjod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ byang chub
315b5(phal chen): sems dpa' la snyan pa 'am mi snyam pa brjod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la snyan pa 'am mi snyan par
315b6(phal chen): brjod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ sems can gyi khams chung ba dang / sems can gyi khams che ba brjod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi
315b7(phal chen): chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa med par brjod kyang / sangs
315b8(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ sems can gyi khams skyo bar bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams skyo bar dga' ba brjod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la
316a1(phal chen): bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings chung ba 'am/ chos kyi dbyings che bar brjod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings
316a2(phal chen): 'grub pa 'am/ chos kyi dbyings 'jig par brjod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings yod pa 'am med par brjod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam
316a3(phal chen): pa nges pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa sum tshogs pa ste/ de ltar bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos la 'jug pa bcu
316a4(phal chen): brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang / chos thams cad dngos po med pa dang / chos thams cad yod pa ma
316a5(phal chen): yin pa dang / chos thams cad brdzun pa dang / chos thams cad bden pa dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang / chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang /
316a6(phal chen): chos thams cad rtog pa med par brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i bsam pa de bas kyang shas cher mi 'phrog pa la rnam par bsgrub par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang bdag nyid
316a7(phal chen): sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o//
316a8(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag de la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa bcu nyan pa'i tshe brtan pa rab tu thob ste/
316b1(phal chen): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas yod ces 'am/ sangs rgyas med ces na yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go// chos yod ce 'am chos med ce'am/ sangs rgyas kyi
316b2(phal chen): chos las phyir mi ldog go/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa yod ce 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa med ce na yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go// byang chub
316b3(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa'i spyad pa la byung zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i spyod pa la mi 'byung zhe na/ yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go// de bzhin gshegs
316b4(phal chen): pa 'das shes 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'das zhe na yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldeg go/ de bzhin gshegs pa byon ce 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa ma
316b5(phal chen): yin zhe na yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go// sangs rgyas da ltar byung ba zhe'am/ sangs rgyas da ltar bya ma yin zhe na yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog
316b6(phal chen): go/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zad mi shes so// zhe 'am sangs rgyas kyi ye shes so// zhe na yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go// dus gsum mtshan nyid gcig
316b7(phal chen): ce 'am/ dus gsum mtshan nyid tha dad ce na yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go/ kye rgyal ba'i srase dag 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ste/ de ltar
316b8(phal chen): phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la ni chos 'byam klas pa bcu brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gcig las rnam pa tha dad par 'gyur bar brjod par bya'o//
317a1(phal chen): @mang po las tha mi dad par brjod par bya'o// don dang 'thun pa'i yi ge brjod par bya'o// yi ge dang 'thun pa'i don brjod par bya'o// dngos po med pa dang yod pa dang
317a2(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o// dngos po yod pa dang med pa dang mnyam pa'i nyid du brjod par bya'o// mtshan ma med pa dang mtshan ma yod pa dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o//
317a3(phal chen): mtshan ma med pa dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o// mtshan nyid med pa mtshan nyid dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o// mtshan nyid med pa dang / mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o//
317a4(phal chen): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ci nas kyang de bas kyang shas cher mkhas pa thams cad la yongs su byang bar 'gyur ba dang / gnas gang thos nas kyang bdag nyid kyang de la sbyor bar bya ba dang /
317a5(phal chen): bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la gzhon
317a6(phal chen): nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' las bcu la rab tu gnas pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar lus kyi spyod pa kha
317a7(phal chen): nam tho ba med pa yin/ ngag gi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ yid kyi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ sems bskyed pa tsam gyi skye ba bsgrub pa yin/ sems can gzhan gyi bsam
317a8(phal chen): pa shes pa yin/ gang zag gzhan gyis mos pa rtogs pa yin/ sems can gyi khams tha dad pa shes pa yin/ las kyis byin rlabs tha dad pa yin tu rtogs pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi kham
317b1(phal chen): 'grub pa dang 'jig pa yongs su 'jal ba yin/ gang dga' bar 'gro ba la myur ba yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ste/ kye rgyal ba'i
317b2(phal chen): sras dag sde ltar gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la ni chos mngon par bsgrub pa bcu brjod par bya'o// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su brjod par
317b3(phal chen): bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu bskyod pa brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gis byin gyi brlab brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rnam par rgyu ba brjod par bya'o// sangs
317b4(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su gnas pa brjod par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par 'gro ba brjod par bya'o// chos grangs med pa yongs su dri ba brjod par bya'o// yid kyi rang
317b5(phal chen): gis lus mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// dbyangs kyi sbyor ba rab tu dge ba brjod par bya'o// sems bskyed pa cig la sangs rgyas grangs med bstan par bya ba brjod par bya'o// de ci'i
317b6(phal chen): phyir zhe na/ de de bas kyang shas cher chos thams cad la mngon par bsgrub pa'i mkhas pa la 'byung bar bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid
317b7(phal chen): gzhan gyis dring 'jog par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras rgyal tshab
317b8(phal chen): kyis byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can gyi
318a1(phal chen): la @#skye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ nyon mongs pa'i rgyud rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin bag chags kyi 'tshams 'brel pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/
318a2(phal chen): spyad yul rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ chos sna tshogs rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ spyod pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bye ba rtog
318a3(phal chen): par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ mngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' shes par rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyi bden pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin//
318a4(phal chen): don dam pa'i bden pa rtag pa rtogs pa la mkhas pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni rgyal tshab kyis byang chub sems dpa' des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba de la ni gnas
318a5(phal chen): brjod par bya'o// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste rgyal po'i khab gnas la mkhas par brjod par bya'o// rgyal po'i gnas kyi tshul brjod par bya'o// rgyal po'i gnas su gnas par brjod
318a6(phal chen): par bya'o// rgyal po'i gnas su 'gro ba brjod par bya'o// rgyal po'i gnas su spyod pa brjod par bya'o// chos kyi rgyal po dbang bskur bar brjod par bya'o// chos kyi rgyal po'i byin brjod
318a7(phal chen): bar bya'o// chos kyi rgyal po'i mthu brjod par bya'o// chos kyi rgyal srid la gnas par brjod par bya'o// chos kyi rgyal po'i sngags pa brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji gnas kyang de'i
318a8(phal chen): sems sgrib pa med pa'i don par sgrub pa la de bas kyang shas cher gnas par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang bdag nyid de la sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par bya ba'i
318b1(phal chen): phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal
318b2(phal chen): ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes la rnam par spyod pa bcu dang ldan pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su bskyed pa'i sems mang
318b3(phal chen): ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa snang bar bya ba'i sems mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i byin gyis rlabs pa'i sems mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khas
318b4(phal chen): grangs med pa 'da' bar bya ba'i sems mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su sbyangs pa'i sems mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa rnam par dmigs par bya
318b5(phal chen): ba'i sems mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa rnam par dag par sems mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa'i dbang po rtogs par bya ba'i sems mang ba yin/ sems can
318b6(phal chen): grangs med pa yongs su bzung ba'i sems mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa 'dul ba'i sems mang ba yin te/ de'i lus ni byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab la gnas pa'i bar gyi
318b7(phal chen): kyang shes par mi nus so// lus kyi las shes par mi nus so// rdzu 'phrul shes par mi nus so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa shes par mi nus so// 'das pa lta ba 'am shes
318b8(phal chen): par mi nus so// ma 'ongs pa lta ba 'am shes par mi nus so// da ltar byung ba lta ba 'am shes par mi nus so// zhing mngon par 'du byed par shes par mi nus so// sems kyi yul yang
319a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab la gnas pa'i bar shes par mi nus so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni dbang skur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
319a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dbang bskur ba de la ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes la 'jug pa bcu bka' stsal te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar dus kyi ye shes brjod pa mdzad do// sangs
319a3(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos kyi ye shes brjod pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ye shes brjod pa mdzad do// chos kyi dbyings chags pa med pa brjod pa mdzad do// chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus
319a4(phal chen): med par brjod pa mdzad do// 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par dgeng ba brjod pa mdzad do// 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba bya bar brjod pa mdzad do// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
319a5(phal chen): byin gyis rlabs pa brjod pa mdzad do// sems can thams cad yongs su shes pa'i ye shes brjod mdzad do// chos thams cad yongs su shes pa'i ye shes brjod pa mdzad do//
319a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas mtha' yas brjod pa mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ci nas kyang de'i sems rnam pa thams cad mdzad pa nyid du de bas kyang shas cher gnas par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos
319a7(phal chen): kyang bdag nyid de la sbyor bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag 'di ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa'
319a8(phal chen): rnam par dgod pa'o// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/ rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ g.yos so rab tu
319b1(phal chen): g.yos so// kun tu g.yos so// 'gul to rab tu 'gul to// kun tu 'gul to// ldeg go// rab tu ldeg go// kun tu ldeg go/ chem che ma rab tu chem chem/ kun tu chem mo/
319b2(phal chen): 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ shig shig rab tu shig shig/ kun tu shig shig go/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang chos nyid thob pas/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyis char mngon par phab po//
319b3(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi phye ma'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po// lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po// lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par phab po// lha rdzas kyi gos kyi char mngon
319b4(phal chen): par phab bo// lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub kyi char mngon par phab po// lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra mngon par 'byung bar gyur to// lha rdzas
319b5(phal chen): kyi snang ba rab tu byung bar gyur to// lha rdzas kyi nga ro shin tu grag par gyur to// gling bzhi pa 'di na ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang pa ji lta bar de bzhin tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams
319b6(phal chen): cad du'ang phyogs bcur rgyas par byung ste/ chos bstan pa 'di yang thams cang du byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i
319b7(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' mang po lhag ste phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams
319b8(phal chen): kyi chos nyid de lta bu ston pa legs so legs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bdag cag kun gyi kyang ming chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba sha stag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan chos kyi blo gros
320a1(phal chen): @#zhes bya ba/ sha stag gis zham ring 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sprin ces bya ba sha stag ste/ 'dir phyin te thams cad na'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi chos bstan pa 'dis
320a2(phal chen): nying 'khor gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag tu tshig 'di dag dang yi ge 'di dag dang / khong du chud par bya ba 'di dag gi don 'di nyid mngon par smos shing lhag chad med par ston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
320a3(phal chen): de ltar bdag dbang du gyur cing / she stag sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rab kyi 'dir phyin te/ ji ltar bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tham
320a4(phal chen): cad kyi/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa dag gi ri rab kyi rtse mo'i lha'i dbang po'i khang pa dag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mang po phyin par
320a5(phal chen): gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyi phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ chos kyi dbyings la rnam par ltas nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
320a6(phal chen): dag spus so// rang 'byung sangs rgyas thugs mchog rab mnga' ba// sku gzugs sku mdog shin tu mdzes ldan zhing / mtshan bzung thub pa med pa mthong gyur nas// byang chub don du bstan pa/
320a7(phal chen): sems 'gyur ro// dpe zla med pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs chen dang // yongs su bstan dang rjes su bstan mthong ste// srid las kun tu sdug bsngal gyur mthong zhing // byang chub don du bstan pa sems
320a8(phal chen): 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan kun mnga' ba// kun tu bzang po'i yon tan thos gyur cing // mkha' dbyings rnams rtogs med pa'i// bstan pa byang chub don tu sems 'gyur ro//
320b1(phal chen): khams rnams kun gnas ni 'di dag yin// gnas min rang bzhin bdag kyang 'di yin zhes// ma nor dngos po khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro// 'das dang ma byon da
320b2(phal chen): ltar byung ba dang // dkar gnag las rnams yod pa dang // de kun mnyam nyid rjes su rtogs bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems 'gyur ro// bsam gtan ting 'dzin rnam par thar pa dang //
320b3(phal chen): mnyam bzhag de bzhin kun nas nyon mongs dang // rnam byang rnam par ldang ba khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems 'gyur ro// sems can rnams kyi ngo bo ci 'dra ba dang // brtson 'grus
320b4(phal chen): stobs kyang de bzhin ci 'dra ba// rnam pa sna tshogs de dag rtogs bya'i phyir// byang chub don tu bstan pa sems bsgyur ro// sems can kun gyi mos pa ci 'dra ba// 'jig rten kun gyi bsam pa sna
320b5(phal chen): chogs rnams// rnam pa kun tu thams cad rtogs bya'i phyir// byang chub don du bstan pa sems bsgyur ro// 'gro ba rnams kyis sna tshogs khas rnams dang // 'jig rten kun gyis khams mang du
320b6(phal chen): ma dag/ khams kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro// kun tu 'gro ba'i chos rnams ci 'dra dang // lam rnams ci 'dra 'dus byas 'di dag gis// ma
320b7(phal chen): nor rang bzhin rtogs par bya'i phyir// byang chu don du brtan pa sems bsgyur ro// zhing rnams thams cad mthong bar bya ba dang // sems can 'di dag ji ltar 'khor gyur ces// chags med mig ni
320b8(phal chen): rnam par dag bya'i phyir// 'das pa'i dus su gang rnams ci byung yang // mtshan nyid gang yin ci 'dra ci dngos pa// sngon gyi gnas rnams rjes su rtogs bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems
321a1(phal chen): la @#bsgyur ro// 'jig rten kun na kun sbyor ci snyed dang // don gyi 'tshams 'brel bag chags de bzhin te// nyon mongs zad bya mthar thug shes bya'i phyir// byang chu don du brtan pa sems
321a2(phal chen): bsgyur ro// 'gro ba rnams kyis tha snyad bdags pa dang // tshigs lam skad du brjod pa ji snyed pa// brda'i gdan pa rjes su rtogs bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro// chos
321a3(phal chen): rnams ji ltar brjod du med pa dang // stong pa byed med rang bzhin dben pa'i rnams// de dag dngos nyid khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro// zhing rnams thams cad
321a4(phal chen): rab tu bskyod pa dang // rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su kam bya bar// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul stogs bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro// spu rtse re re'i sgo nas 'od
321a5(phal chen): zer rnams// phyogs bcu kun tu ji ltar dge bya ba// de 'dri'i rang bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro// zhing rnams brjod med bsam gyis mi khyab pa/
321a6(phal chen): bdag gis lag pa'i 'thil tu bzhag par bya// sgyu ma'i rnam pa thams cad rtogs bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro// ji ltar zhing gi sems can yangs pa kun// gnod pa
321a7(phal chen): med par gzhog byed par// srog med chos rnams khong du chub bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro// rgya mtsho thams cad chu chen gang rgyas pa// skra rtse brang zhing kun du dor bya bar/
321a8(phal chen): mthar thug ma lus khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro// ji ltar bsam gyis mi khyab zhing gi rnams// rdul blag ma lus bgrang zhes bya bar// rdul phran grangs
321b1(phal chen): rnams khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro// 'das pa'i bskal pa de bzhin ma 'ongs dang // 'jig rten tshi gcig 'grub pa'ang de bzhin te// bskal pa zad cing
321b2(phal chen): gnas pa shes bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro// dus gsum 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang // rang rgyal nyan thos thams cad kyis// chos kyi rang bzhin
321b3(phal chen): khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro// brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams// skra'i nyag mas bcings shing tshad 'dab par// dngos po'i rang
321b4(phal chen): bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro// brjod med 'khor yug shin tu yangs pa dag/ ba spu'i khong bu'i ji ltar bzud pa dang // phra dang yangs pa khong
321b5(phal chen): du chud pa'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// ji ltar dbyangs cig kun du grags gyur pa// dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam dag
321b6(phal chen): shes bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro// sems can kun gyi sgra skad ci snyed pa// dbyangs cig brjod pas ji ltar brjod bya bar// sgra'i rang bzhin khong du chud bya'i
321b7(phal chen): phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad ma lus shes byed cing // ji ltar 'gro kun zhing zhes ston gyur par// ce yang khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/
321b8(phal chen): brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro// zhing rnams thams cad tshig pa dang // kun nas gnas par ma lus mthong gyur par// rnam rtog chos ni khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang
322a1(phal chen): chub don du sems bsgyur ro// zhing rnams thams cad sangs rgyas cig bzhin du// de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar rgyas bya bar// rang 'byung chos ni rjes su rtogs
322a2(phal chen): bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro// zhing rnams rdul mchog phrar blags pa// de snyed lus su ji ltar sprul bya bar// thams cad yid kyis dngos su shes bya'i phyir/
322a3(phal chen): bstan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro// kun gzigs ci snyed byas pa dang // ma byon sangs rgyas de bzhin bzhugs pa'i rnams// skad cig sems kyi thams cad rtogs bya'i phyir//
322a4(phal chen): brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro// tshig cig brtsams te brjod cing bshad byas kyang // bskal pa brjod med thams cad zad 'gyur bar// chos kyi rnam grangs khong chung bya'i phyir
322a5(phal chen): brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro// phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten ma lus rnams// 'byung zhing ji ltar rjes su 'brang ba dag/ sems kyi rang bzhin 'khong du chud bya'i phyir/
322a6(phal chen): brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro// lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyi kyang // phyogs kun spyod che chags par mi 'gyur bar// dus gsum stong pa khong du chud bya'i phyir/
322a7(phal chen): brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro// de ltar byang chub don du sems bskyed des// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas brjod du med pa kun// mchod par bya la yongs su skul bar bya//
322a8(phal chen): 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i gdam ngag go// 'khor ba dag na byang chub don spyod che// byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba ci snyed pa// de dag de la yongs su brjod par bya// 'di ni phyir mi ldog
322b1(phal chen): pa'i gdam ngag go/ 'jig rten gtso bo 'jig rten ci snyed pa// phyogs bcu mtha' dang ji snyed yod pa'i rnams// de dag byang chub sems dpa' de la brjod// 'di ni phyir ldog pa'i
322b2(phal chen): gdam gdam ngag go// mchog gi mchos dang ji snyed dam pa'i chos// 'phrul gyi chos dang bla na med pa'i chos// de dag byang chub sems dpa' de la rten// 'di ni skyon med rnams kyi gdam
322b3(phal chen): ngag go/ gzhan gyi mi thub ji snyed gnas yod pa// 'jig rten kun gyi mi non rnams// de la gnas par rgyal sras de brjod des// 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i gdam ngag go/ de bzhin
322b4(phal chen): gshegs pa yon tan kun ldan pa// 'jig rten mgon po bdag nyid che ba kun// de la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhag ste// de ni skyes bu khyu mchog gdam ngag go/ sangs rgyas grangs
322b5(phal chen): med brjod du med pa dang // ji ltar 'grogs par 'gyur ba thams cad kyang // byang chub sems dpa' de la brjod par bya// 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i gdam ngag go// ting 'dzin zhi ba
322b6(phal chen): snyed gang yod pa// de dag gdam ngag ci snyed ma lus par// byang chub sems dpa' de la gtan par bya// 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i gdam ngag go/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ldog par 'gyur
322b7(phal chen): ba dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba dang // 'jig rten kun gyi chags par mi 'gyur ba// byang chub sems dpa' de la brten par bya// sems can sdug bsngal gzir ba
322b8(phal chen): ci snyed pa dang // de dag ngan song rtses par gyur pa'i tshe// skabs dang mgon dang rten du 'gyur ba dang // byang chub sems dpa' de la brjod par bya// rnam pa 'di 'dras rgyal sras dang po
322b9(phal chen): ste// byang chub don du sems rab skyer 'gyur te// de ltar gdam ngag rjes su rten par bya// 'di ni rgyal ba rnams kyi rnam par 'god pa'o// de nas gnyis pa las kyi dang po pa// thog ma ga
323a1(phal chen): dus sems can thams cad la// sems bcu nye bar bzhag cing smon byed pa// 'di ni skyon dang bral ba'i gdam ngag go// phan pa'i sems dang de bzhin bde ba'i sems/
323a2(phal chen): snying rje'i sems de bzhin byams pa'i sems// bsrung ba'i sems dang de bzhin mnyam pa'i sems// slob dpon sems dang de bzhin ston pa'i sems// de 'dra'i sems rnams nye bar
323a3(phal chen): bzhag pa la// kha ton lung la yongs su bskul bar bya// mang du thos pa dgon par gnas par bskul// dben par gyur pas dge ba shes rnyed gyur bya// dge ba shes gyur nas dang bder
323a4(phal chen): gyur par bya// ngang tshul de bas dus tshul shes par bya// dus rnams shes na mi 'jigs 'gyur bar bya// mi 'jigs 'gyur bas don la brtson par bya// don shes gyur nas chos rjes shes
323a5(phal chen): par bya// chos shes gyur nas rmongs pa med par bya// rmongs pa mang gyur nas legs bshad chos la// rgyal sras de ni rnam par gnas par bya// de tsam gyi ni las kyi dbang po pa// byang chub
323a6(phal chen): don zhugs byang chub sems dpa'o// gdam ngag rjes su bstan pa'ang de bzhin te// sangs rgyas sras po de ltar slob par byed// gang yang byang chub sems dpa' gsum brjod pa//
323a7(phal chen): chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung la shin tu brtson// mi rtag sdug bsngal de bzhin stong pa nyid// bdag med de bzhin byed pa med pa dang // chos rnams thams cad de bzhin ro med dang // 'du byed ma
323a8(phal chen): yin de bzhin gnas med par// ched du spyod med de bzhin rtogs med par// kun la byang chub sems dpa' spyod med pa// de ni 'gro khams yongs su rtag pa dang // de bzhin chos dpying
323b1(phal chen): rtags pa bskul bar bya// 'jig rten khams yang ma lus mthar thug par// rtag par bya ba'i yongs su bskul bar bya// sa dang chu dang me dang de bzhin chu khams dang // de bzhin rlung dang /
323b2(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' dang // 'dod pa gzugs dang de bzhin gzugs med pa// brtag par bya la yongs su bskul bar bya// mkhas rnams yangs pa de bzhin kun rtog cing // mkhas kyi
323b3(phal chen): rang bzhin ma lus mthar phyin pas// byang chub sems dpa' rab tu brtson byed pa// des na de 'gyur gdam ngag de yin no// cher rgyas pa yi byang chub sems dpa' ni// 'phags pa'i gsung
323b4(phal chen): rab 'di la skyes pa ste// dngos po rang bzhin me tog dran pa can// chos kyi chos 'byung rigs ldan legs par skyes// de'i gnas las phyir ldog mi 'gyur te// sangs rgyas rnams la shin tu
323b5(phal chen): mos pa yin// chos rnams de bzhin nges pa rtogs pa ste// sems can rang bzhin med par ston// chos dang 'jig rten de bzhin zhing rnams dang // rnams smin 'khor ba de bzhin mya ngan
323b6(phal chen): 'das// rnam sgoms rgyal sras de ltar cher skyes pa// thugs las byung ba'i sangs rgyas sras zhes bya// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar byung ba yi// sangs rgyas chos rnams rnam par
323b7(phal chen): bsgom pa'i phyir// yongs su sdu ba ci 'dra mthar thug dang // de ltar de dag 'grub par 'gyur ba dang // sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid thogs shing // dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis
323b8(phal chen): rjes song bas// mnyam pa nyid la sna tshogs mi dmigs shing // dus gsum sku la tha dad med par 'jug/ de tsam gyi ni rgyal sa zhi ba ste// de'i sngags pa rnam pa de 'dra'o// de ltar 'di la
324a1(phal chen): nan tan bsgrub byas shing // byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog tu 'byung // de las gzhan yang rgyal sras lnga pa ni// sbyor ba phun sum tshogs shes brjod pa ste/
324a2(phal chen): thabs mkhas tshul la rjes su zhugs gyur cing // bsod nams las rnams brtsam pa'i mthar phyin byed// 'jig rten dag na bsod nams gang byed kyang // sems can kun gyis skyabs su
324a3(phal chen): 'gyur ba dang // phan tshol de bzhin bde ba bskyed pa dang // snying rtse skye dgu dgrol bar 'gyur ba dang // 'jig rten rnams kyi brtsol ba rtse ba dang // drang zhing de bzhin dang bar bya ba dang // sems
324a4(phal chen): can mang po thams cad gdul mos shing // mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyi mthu 'ang ches// sems can thams cad kun tu mtha' yas dang // de bzhin tshad med dran las 'das pa dang /
324a5(phal chen): bsam gyi mi khyab gzhal med dpag med pa// de 'dri'i chos rnams de la brjod par bya// de tsam gyi ni rgyal sras lnga pa ste// sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i snying rje dang // de'i gdam ngag
324a6(phal chen): tshul ni 'di 'dra ste// yon tan thams cad mnga' bas brtan pa yin// gang yang bsam pa phun sum tshogs bya'i phyir// chos nyid ngo bo nyid kyis rmongs med cing // rnam rtog rtog bral dang
324a7(phal chen): ldan pa ste// lhar bcas 'jig rten kun gyi sku mi nus// sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin rgyal sras dang // spyod pa sngags sam rnam par smad kyang rung // sems can nyung zhes 'am 'on tam
324a8(phal chen): mang ngo zhes// thos par gyur kyang bsam pa zhum ma 'gyur// sems can nyon mongs med ce 'am// gdul sla 'on tam mang du 'dul dka' dang // chos kyi dbyings ste chung ngam rgya che yang /
324b1(phal chen): kun nas sgrub gyur rnam par 'jig ce 'am// chos dbyings de ni yod dam med ces kyang // byang chub sems dpa' mthong gyur dus gsum tshul// nges par rtogs nas thams cad rnam
324b2(phal chen): rtog 'di// sangs rgyas chos la bsam pa shin tu nges// mtshan ma med dang mtshan nyid med pa dang // dngos med yod rdzun bden pa dang // sgyu ma rmi lam mi rtog rang bzhin med// 'di
324b3(phal chen): 'dra'i chos tshul de dag snyam pa byed// phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// sangs rgyas sras de de bzhin rgyal sras dang // spyod pa yod min rtag tu rnam par sgom// 'byung
324b4(phal chen): ngam mi 'byung zhes na'ang phyir mi ldog/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'am 'das zhes 'am ma 'das dang // ma byon to zhes 'am ma byon ma yin dang // mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' brtan
324b5(phal chen): bar bya// mtshan ma med la mtshan ma yod pa dang // mtshan nyid med la mtshan gyis dmigs pa dang // rnam phye phan tshun yongs su sbyar ba rnams// thog nas 'di la mthar thugs
324b6(phal chen): 'jug pa ces// gzhan yang byang chub sems gzhon gyur pa// lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kun gyis// ci 'dod tshul bzhin de ni skye bar byed// gzhan gyi bsam pa ci zhin rab tu
324b7(phal chen): shes// de dag mos pas yong su rtog par byed// phyogs rnams gang du yid kyis smon byed pa// kun tu mngon shes myur ba yid bzhin thob// bde bar gshegs pas brtan pa'i
324b8(phal chen): chos thos shing // de la zhum bskyed pa gang yang med// zhing rnams yongs su bskyed pa shes pa dang // de bzhin byin brlabs rnam par rgyu ba dang // sangs rgyas zhing rnams yongs
325a1(phal chen): la @#su gnas pa dang // grangs med kun tu 'gro ba brjod par bya// grangs med chos rnams yongs su dri ba dang // ci nas yid kyi rang bzhin lus 'gyur zhing // dbyangs kyi
325a2(phal chen): rnam pa shin tu yangs 'gyur dang / sems cig sangs rgyas grangs med bsnyen bkur brjod// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab brjod pa yin// sems can rnams kyi skye ba rab tu shes/
325a3(phal chen): nyon mongs rgyud dang rnam par rgyu ba shes// de 'dri'i spyod yul de 'dri'i sbyor ba can// chos kyi rgyud mang rnam pa tha dad dang // sngon mtha' phyi mtha' 'jig rten rnam phye dang // brda'i bden pa
325a4(phal chen): don dam bden pa dang // ma lus rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin// de ni rgyal po'i gnas la mkhas par bskul// der yang ji ltar yongs su spyad bya dang // rgyal po'i gnas su
325a5(phal chen): ji ltar rnam spyad brjod// de la chos kyi rgyal po dbang bskur dang // byin gyi rlabs dang rang bzhin mthu chen dang // chos su gnas dang 'gro bar bya ba dang // brjod pa bya ste rgyal tshab de 'dra
325a6(phal chen): yin// de tsam gyis ni de'i thas tug te// gdam ngag de kyang rnam sems byed pa med// khong du chud byed dran ldan rgyal tshab nges// rgyal ba kun gyi drung na slob pa byed// bde gshegs
325a7(phal chen): sras po dbang bskur ba// de nyid thub mchog dam par gyur pa ni// 'jig rten grangs mangs brjod pa dang // yongs su snang bar bya ba'i sems kyang mang // byin gyis rlabs dang yongs
325a8(phal chen): su gda' bya dang // yongasu sbyang ba'i sems kyang rab tu mang // grangs med 'jig rten shes par bya ba dang // dbang po phun sum rnam par spyad la mkhas// de dag gzud cing rnam par
325b1(phal chen): 'dul ba dang // thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyi shin tu mang // zhing mang brjod du med par 'gro byas shing // dam chos mkhas rnams ma lus rnam par mchod// de'i lus dang lus
325b2(phal chen): kyi las rnams dang // rdzu 'phrul bstan pa'ang shes par mi nus ste// dus gsum zhing du rgyu ba'i sems dag kyang // rgyal tshab gyur pa'i bar gyi shes mi nus// de la thams cad gzigs
325b3(phal chen): pas dus gsum dang // sangs rgyas chos shes chags med de bzhin nyid// chos dbyings mtha' dang dpung med pa'i// rgyas par 'gengs par bde gshegs brjod par bya// ci gnas
325b4(phal chen): 'jig rten khams kun ma lus par// yongs su snang byed byin gyis brlab pa dang // sems can chos rnams de bzhin ma lus dang // sangs rgyas mtha' yas de bzhin brjod pa ba mdzad//
325b5(phal chen): rgyal sras brtan pa rnam pa bcur bgrangs pa// rnam par dgod la gnas pa de dag kun// rang rang spyod yul rab tu brtson byed pa// 'jig rten lhar bcas kun gyi shes par dka'
325b6(phal chen): 'on kyang dang por sems bskyed mtha' yas pas// phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad rgyas par bya// dus gsum kun tu gang tshe sems stong pa// de tshe thams cad mkhyen pa kun gzig
325b7(phal chen): 'gyur// zhing rnams kun la mu mtha' yod pa min// sems can chos ni 'jig rten de bzhin te// las dang nyon mongs gnas kyang mtha' yas te// byang chub sems rab de la gnas pa
325b8(phal chen): yin// skad cig som la byang chub gzhol ba'i tshe// gang skyes 'jig rten kun gyi shes mi nus// rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos kun gyi min// de nas gong du spyod pa ji skad brjod// gang
326a1(phal chen): // zhig phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams// skus cig sred la tshad du 'jal byed pa// des ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shes// 'on kyang sangs rgyas ye
326a2(phal chen): shes yongs su tshol// phyogs bcu'i rgya mtsho ji snyed yod pa kun// spu co'i thigs kyis yongs 'jal shes byed pa// de ni rgyal sras spyod pa 'di 'dra dag/ sems kyi skad cig cig la
326a3(phal chen): bsgrub par byed// ji ltar zhing rnams rdul rab phra thags shing // sems can ma lus grangs byed de// ci snyed yod ces grangasu btsod byed pa// de 'drang rgyal sras bcod pa brjod pa'o//
326a4(phal chen): 'das pa'i sangs rgyas de bzhin ma byon dang // gang rnams phyogs bcur byung bar gyur pa dang // rang rgyal de bzhin nyan thos rab mnga' ba// rnam par dmigs shing byang chub sems
326a5(phal chen): skye'o// sems can khams rnams ma lus rgyas bkang zhing // byang chub don du thogs mar sems bskyed pa// de'ang bgrang bar nus par ma yin na// de las gong du ci zhig smos
326a6(phal chen): kyang dgos// shin du rgyas pa po'i mdo// sangs rgyas bal po che zhes bya ba las byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa bcu brtan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // bam po nyi shu
326a7(phal chen): gnyis pa'o// // de nas lha'i bu dran pa dang ldan pas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi blo gras la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras jig rten gyi khams tham
326a8(phal chen): cad na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i gsung rab la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste ngur smig gi gos 'chang ba de dag gi tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang gis/
326b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams dgod pa 'di dag las 'das te// myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de ci ltar yid la bya// de skad ces
326b2(phal chen): smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis/ lha'i bu dran pa dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bas na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
326b3(phal chen): la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi/ dmigs pa bcu rnam par bsgom te gong du chos bcu yid la bya'o// dmigs pa bcu rnam sar bsgom pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus la
326b4(phal chen): lus kyi las dang // ngag la ngag gi las dang // yid la yid kyi las dang // sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang // bslab pa la yang dag par blang ba dag ste/ ci tshangs
326b5(phal chen): par spyod pa de'i lus sam/ de ste tshangs pa'i spyod pa de lus yin na ni/ tshangs pa'i spyod pa mi 'tshang bar 'gyur/ tshangs pa'i spyod pa gtsang ba ma yin par 'gyur// tshangs pa'i
326b6(phal chen): spyod pa mi mthun par 'gyur// tshangs pa'i spyod pa kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur// tshangs pa'i spyod pa kyang rus su 'gyur/ tshangs pa'i spyod pa sprin gyi tshangs du 'gyur/ de ste
326b7(phal chen): lus kyi las tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni nyal ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ 'dug pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur// sgreng ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ 'gro ba tshangs spyod par
326b8(phal chen): 'gyur// bltas pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ rnam par ltas pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur// bskum pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ rkyang ba tshangs par spyod par 'gyur/
327a1(phal chen): 'khor ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ 'grengs pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur ro// de ste ngag tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni/ dbyangs tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ nga ro
327a2(phal chen): tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ brjod pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ smra ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ smos pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ thong ka nas tshol ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/
327a3(phal chen): lce sgyur ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur// chu sbyar ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ tshig sbyar ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ de ste ngag gis las tshangs par spyod pa yin na ni/ brjod pa tshangs
327a4(phal chen): pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ brdar byas pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ shin tu rten pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ brten pa rnam par brtan par tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ legs par spyod
327a5(phal chen): pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ nang du brjod pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ rnam par gdams pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ rnam par spyod pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ yongs su
327a6(phal chen): smos pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ de ste yid tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni/ spyod pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ rnam par spyod pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ tog pa tshangs pa'i spyod
327a7(phal chen): par 'gyur/ rnam par rtog pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ dran pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ phyir dran pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ sems pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ rnam
327a8(phal chen): par sems pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ rgyu ma tshangs pa'i sbyong bar 'gyur/ rmi lam tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur te/ yid kyi las tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni/ 'du shes tshangs pa'i
327b1(phal chen): spyod bar 'gyur/ yid la tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ grangs pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ dro ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ bde ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ sdug bsngal tshangs
327b2(phal chen): pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ bkres pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ skom pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ dga' ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ zhum pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur ro// de
327b3(phal chen): ste sangs rgyas tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni/ gzugs sangs rgyas sam/ 'on tam tshor ba sangs rgyas sam/ 'du shes sangs rgyas sam/ 'du byed sangs rgyas sam/ rnam par shes
327b4(phal chen): ba sangs rgyas sam/ mtshan rnams sangs rgyas sam/ mngon par shes pa sangs rgyas sam/ las sangs rgyas sam/ 'on tam rnam par smin pa sangs rgyas sam/ de ste legs par
327b5(phal chen): bshad pa'i chos nyid tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas yin na ni/ 'gogs pa gnas su mya ngan las 'das pa gnas su 'gyur ro// bral su 'gyur ro// ma skyes pa gnas su 'gyur ro//
327b6(phal chen): ma byung ba gnas su 'gyur ro// grangs med pa gnas su 'gyur ro// rtog pa med pa gnas su 'gyur ro// skye ba med pa gnas su 'gyur ro// phrad pa med pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro//
327b7(phal chen): de ste dge 'dun sdom pa'i nan tan can tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir dge 'dun yin nam/ 'on tam rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dge 'dun/ lan
327b8(phal chen): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyir dge 'dun nam/ 'on tam lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyir dge 'dun nam/ 'on tam phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dge 'dun nam/ dgra bco
328a1(phal chen): pa'i 'bras bu'i dge 'dun nam/ 'on tam dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu dge 'dun gsum rig pa nyid dge 'dun nam/ drug mngon par shes pa dge 'dun nam/ 'on tam
328a2(phal chen): khong du chud par na tan du byed pa tshangs pa'i spyod pa/ de ste rlab pa yang dag par blang ba'i tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni/ tha dad du gnas pa slab pa yang dag par blang ba 'am/ slob dpon gyi
328a3(phal chen): tshig slab pa yang dag par blang ba 'am/ lan gsum du bzlas pa yang dag par blang ba 'am/ mkhan po bslab pa yang dag par blang ba 'am/ skra brag pa dang / dur smig gis gos bcang ba
328a4(phal chen): bslab pa yang dag par blang ba 'am/ slong mo'i mche ba slab pa yang dag par blang ba 'am/ 'on tam de dag tshangs pa'i spyod pa 'am/ de ltar chos de dag la rnam par sgom na bdag gis lus
328a5(phal chen): la mngon par chags pa med pa dang / sgom pa zhan pa med pa dang / chos rnams gnas pa med pa dang / 'das pa rgyu ba med pa dang / ma 'ongs pa ma phyin pa dang / da ltar byung ba stong pa dang / las
328a6(phal chen): byed pa med pa dang / rnam par smin pa la tshor ba med pa dang / 'jig rten 'di bos pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol chud mi za ba'i phyir/ tshangs pa'i spyod pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gang yin/ de gang
328a7(phal chen): las byung / de su'i de ci zhig/ de sus byas/ de yod dam/ de med dam/ de gzugs sam/ gzugs ma yin nam/ de tshor ba ma yin nam/ de shes sam/ 'du shes ma yin nam/ de 'du byed dam
328a8(phal chen): 'du byed ma yin nam/ de rnam par shes pa 'am/ rnam par shes pa ma yin nam/ tshangs par spyod pa'i chos de gang zhig ces de ltar mi dmigs shing / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du na mkha'
328b1(phal chen): sgrib pa med pa'i sbyor ba dang /
328b2(phal chen): yongs su rgyas par bya ba dang / chags pa med par yid la bya ba dang / sems la sgrib pa med pa dang gnyis su med par shin tu spyod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i chos bzung ba dang / mtshan
328b3(phal chen): nyid med pa'i chos rab tu shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad la yang dag par shes pas tshangs pa'i spyod ba yongs su dag pa yid la bya'o//
328b4(phal chen): gong du yang chos bcu dang ldan pas yid la byas te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pas shes pa dang ldan pa dang / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las dang
328b5(phal chen): rnam par smin pa shes pa dang ldan pa dang / bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / rnam par
328b6(phal chen): ldang ba shes pa dang ldan pa dang / dbang po dang brtson 'grus tha dad pa dang / rdzogs pa mchog dang / tha ma shes pa dang ldan pa dang / mos pa tha dad pa ldan pa dang / mos pa du ma shes pa dang ldan pa
328b7(phal chen): dang / khams tha dad pa dang / khams du ma shes pa dang ldan pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i pa'i lam shes pa dang ldan pa dang / lha'i mig thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i
328b8(phal chen): rjes su dran pa dang shes pa dang ldan pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang dag bcad pa shes pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs re re la yang / rnam par dbye ba shin tu rgya
328b9(phal chen): bar khong du chud par bya'o// thams cad kyang tshad med par lta bar bya'o// thos nas kyang snying rje chen po la brtan par bya'o// sems can rnam par bsgom pa yang mi bstang bar bya'o// chos la
329a1(phal chen): shin tu rtag pa'ang mi zhig par bya'o// bla na med pa'i chos la yang dag par dga' ba'i yid ma yang shin tu brtsam par bya'o// rnam par smin pa 'ang re ba med par bya'o// rgyu ma'i
329a2(phal chen): rang bzhin yang rjes su rtogs par bya'o// rmi lam gyi rang bzhin du yang dag par bya'o// mig yor gyi rang bzhin dang yang tha dad par bya'o// sgra snyan gyi rang bzhin yang spyod par bya'o// sprul pa'i rang
329a3(phal chen): bzhin du'ang mos par byas ste/ de de ltar zhugs pas nyon mongs pa chud par sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ro// des chos de dag gnyis su med par rtogs pas sems
329a4(phal chen): dang po skyed pa nyid kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i gnas yod do// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin du shes pas/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i
329a5(phal chen): shes rab kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las tshangs par spyod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba las nyi shu rtsa cig pa'o// /
329a6(phal chen): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bsod nams kyi phung po ci tsam zhig dang ldan na/ sems dang po skyed pa'i
329a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyi lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras nas 'di ni yid ches par
329a8(phal chen): shin tu dka'/ shes par dka' btag par bka' mngon par dad par bka'/ shin tu rtogs par rka/ kun nas bsgrub par dka'/ yang dag par spyod par dka'/ brjod par dka'/ bskyed par dka'
329b1(phal chen): rgal bar dka'/ khong du chud par rgas kyang / 'on kyang ci'i tshul du sangs rgyas kyi mthus bshad par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de la ci snyed du sems gangs/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi/
329b2(phal chen): khams grangs med par rtogs pa'i sems can de dag la la zhig gis bskal par bde ba yo byed thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'gro byas te/ bslab pa'i tshig lnga po de dag kyang 'dzin du btsud
329b3(phal chen): par gyur la de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams
329b4(phal chen): dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du rting gis phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par rtogs pa'i sems can rnams
329b5(phal chen): kyang bskal par bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te/ bslab pa'i chos lnga po de dag kyang 'dzin du btsud na/ rgyal ba'i sras de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i rgyud bsod nams
329b6(phal chen): mang du 'phel lam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bsod nams 'di ni sangs
329b7(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ma rtogs par gzhan gyis shes par mi nus so// smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyis
329b8(phal chen): phung po la ni/ de dag gis bsod nams snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// brgya stong gi cha dang bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang bye ba stong gis cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gis
330a1(phal chen): dang / bye ba khrag khrig stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba dang / dpe dang rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//
330a2(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dpe lnga ma de dag lta zhog gis/ kye rgyal ba'i sras phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par rtogs pa'i sems can ci snyed pa de dag bskal pa brgyar/ bde ba'i yo
330a3(phal chen): byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la yang dag par spyad par gyur la/ gzhung de bzhin du bskal pa stong du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi rim gror byas
330a4(phal chen): te/ bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / bskal pa brgya phrag stong du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te/ tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang /
330a5(phal chen): bskal pa bye bar bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi rim gror byas te/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod par 'gyur ba dang / bskal pa bye bar bde ba'i yo byad thams
330a6(phal chen): cad kyi rim gror byas te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / bskal pa bye ba stong du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
330a7(phal chen): la rab tu bkod pa dang / bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi rim gror byas te/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu bde
330a8(phal chen): ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi rim gror byas ste/ dgra bcom pa la rab tu bkod pa dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te/ rang sangs rgyas
330b1(phal chen): kyi byang chub la rab tu bzhag par 'gyur na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de la ji ltar snyam du sems/ de'i rgyus bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i/
330b2(phal chen): sras de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mkhyen to// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyi smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po skyed pa'i bsod nam/
330b3(phal chen): kyi phung po lnga ma de bas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba dang dpe dang / rgyur yang
330b4(phal chen): nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gang 'di ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par rtogs pa'i sems can bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong du bA'i
330b5(phal chen): yo byad thams cad kyi rim gror bya zhing bslab pa'i tshig snga ma la bzhag pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par sbyar bar bya ba dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu dgod pa dang /
330b6(phal chen): tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa bcu dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
330b7(phal chen): bu dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang / de tsam gyi na sangs rgyas su mi 'gyur te/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rgyun mi chad pa'i
330b8(phal chen): phyir sems skye'o// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rtogs pa'i sems can thams cad yang dag par sprul ba'i phyir sems skye'o// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'du ba dang
331a1(phal chen): 'jig pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems skye'o// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rtogs pa'i sems thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba
331a2(phal chen): yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems skye'o// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir sems skye'o// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang bag
331a3(phal chen): la nyal ba dang / bag chags kyi 'tshams sbyor ba yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems skye'o// sems can thams cad kyi shi pho dang skye ba yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems skye'o//
331a4(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi dbang po dang sbyor ba yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems skye'o// sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems skye'o/
331a5(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems skye'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad
331a6(phal chen): dang yul snyam pa nyid du bya ba'i phyir sems skye'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dpe ldan dag lta zhog gis/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la skyes bu la la zhig byung ste/ de sems bskyed pa cig gis/
331a7(phal chen): shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 'das pa la sems bskyed pa de dang 'dra bar/ shar phyogs su bskal pa grangs med pa zad du 'das par byas kyang / shar phyogs kyi
331a8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams cig nas gcig tu rgyud par zad par ma rung nas/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu gnyis pa zhig byung ste/ skyes bu snga ma de bskal pa grangs med pa la 'das pa snyed sems bskyed
331b1(phal chen): kha cig gis 'das ste/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu gsum zhig byung nas skye bu de gnyis kyi bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis kyis 'das pa de dag sems bskyed pa cig gi 'das ste/ de'i 'og tu
331b2(phal chen): skyes bu bzhi pa zhig byung nas/ snga ma gsum gyi 'jig rten gyis khams grangs med pa 'das pa de dag sems bskyed pa cig 'das la/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu lnga pa zhig byung ste/ skyes bu
331b3(phal chen): snga ma bzhis bskal pa grangs med pa 'das pa de dag sems bskyed pa cig gi 'das na/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu drug pa zhig byung ste/ skyes bu snga ma rnams kyi bskal pa grangs med par 'das
331b4(phal chen): ba de dag sems bskyed pa cig gis 'das ste/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu bdun pa zhig skyes la/ skyes bu snga ma drug gis bskal pa grangs med pa de dag sems bskyed pa gcig 'das ste/
331b5(phal chen): de'i 'og tu skyes bu brgyad pa zhig skyes te/ skyes bu snga ma bdun gyi bskal pa grangs med pa 'das pa de dag sems bskyed pa cig gis gda' la/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu b+ha zhig byung
331b6(phal chen): ste/ skyes bu snga ma brgyad kyi bskal pa grangs med par 'das pa de dag gis sems skyed pa cig gda' bar byas te/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu bcu pa zhig byung ste/ skyes bu snga ma dgus bskal
331b7(phal chen): ba grangs med par 'das pa de dag gis sems skyed pa cig gda' la/ sems skyed pa de lta bu 'da' bas/ shar phyogs su bskal pa grangs med par bgrod kyang / shar
331b8(phal chen): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams cig nas cig tu rgyud pa'i mtha' nas shes par mi rung ngo // shar phyogs ji ltar bde ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang /
332a1(phal chen): @#/ byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs bcu po thams cad du yang de
332a2(phal chen): bzhin du rgya che bar bstan ste/ skyes bu de dag gis phyogs bcur ci snyed 'das pa de dag skyes bur der phyogs bcur rnam par dgod pas/ sems bskyed pa cig gis bskal pa grangs
332a3(phal chen): med pa 'da' ba'i tshul du bskal pa grangs med par 'das pa de dag skyes bu brgya dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gang ba'i tshul du phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams cig nas
332a4(phal chen): cig tu rgyud cing / mthar snyed par rung srid kyi byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni tha med do// de ci'i
332a5(phal chen): phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems skye ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams cig tu 'gro ba 'am grangs yongs su shes pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
332a6(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu skye ba ma yin gyi/ 'di ltar phyogs bcu tshad med par yongs su med par shes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems skyes te/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams
332a7(phal chen): za ba yangs par yongs su shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yangs pa dang phra ba yongs su shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams snrel zhi 'jig rten gyi khams spyi gtsugs su rgyu
332a8(phal chen): bar yongs su shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams spyi gtsug tu rgyu ba 'jig rten gyi khams snrel zhir 'jig rten gyi khams chen por yongs su shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
332b1(phal chen): chen po 'jig rten gyi chung ngu yongs su shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yangs pa 'jig rten gyi khams dog par yongs su shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dog pa 'jig
332b2(phal chen): rten gyi khams yang par yongs su shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams cig 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med par yongs su shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med
332b3(phal chen): pa 'jig rten khams gcig tu yongs su shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa 'jig rten gyi khams cig tu yongs su shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyis khams
332b4(phal chen): brjod du med pa 'jig rten gyi khams cig tu bzud pa yongs su shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams cig 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med par gzud par yongs su shes pa dang / 'jig
332b5(phal chen): rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag par yongs su shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs
332b6(phal chen): bar yongs su shes pa dang / shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba/ bam po nyi shu bzhi pa// / de ltar btan pas rgyal bas stong
332b7(phal chen): min zhing shes nas/ 'jig rten kyang spu rtse cig la yod par 'jug/ dus gsum rgyud rnams mtshan nyid tha dad khams kun dang / nyin zhag dus dang zla phyed rgyud kyi rnam thar 'jug/ de
332b8(phal chen): ltar rgyal sras 'jigs med byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ skyes bu khyu mchog ye shes rgyal srid thob zhugs pa/ de dag 'di 'dra zhes nas rjes su sems byed cing / bde gshegs rnam
333a1(phal chen): la@#la dga' ba mtha' yas yang ba thob/ gang rnams bye ba khrag khrig sna tshogs lus sgyur cing / phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad mngon par mchod pa'i phyir/ rnam 'phrul
333a2(phal chen): dam pa bzang po kun du ston byed pa/ de dag dgon pa rnams kyi spyod yul rab la zhugs/ gang rnams sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig drug bslab shing / gang rnams chos kyi mdzod rtogs yid
333a3(phal chen): la ngom med pa/ gang dag mgon po khyu mchog rnams la dga' sems dpa'// de dag chos kyi sprin yin spyad pa mang la spyod/ ye shes 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi gnas mkhas pa/
333a4(phal chen): de dag sangs rgyas 'byung gnas ting 'dzin thob pa yin/ ri rgyal lta bu de dag dad pa'i 'byung gnas brtan/ ye shes 'byung gnas 'gro ba'i yon tan 'byung gnas so// gnas pa med
333a5(phal chen): pa dam pa shin tu yang pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa mngon gyur mya ngan med pa dang / sems can skyob cing nyon mongs rnyogs pa med zhugs pa/ byams pa'i bsam pas 'gro ba kun kyang
333a6(phal chen): 'gengs/ de dag snying rje slob yang shin tu yangs pa yin// bdag la phyir sems de bzhin sangs rgyas sems can la/ gzhan du nam mkha' lta bur mtshan nyid med par 'jug/
333a7(phal chen): snyam par gyur pa'i sems can rnam mthong phyir zhing brtsom/ byang chub sems la mkhas pa dag gis tshad dag ni/ skal pa bye ba'i mtha' kyang brjod par mi nus ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
333a8(phal chen): de las sangs rgyas thams cad byung / dbang bde rim gror byas dang rang rgyal kun kyang byung / phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams grangs med bcur ni bgrangs 'gyur ba'i/ sems can thams
333b1(phal chen): cad bskal pa gcig tu bder bkod des/ bslab pa bcu dang dge bcu bsam gtan ma thob pa dang / tshangs pa dag dang rnam grol zhi ba'i gnas bkod cing / de dag bskal pa bde
333b2(phal chen): bar rab bkod des/ dgra bcom nyon mongs zhi la rab tu bkod byas kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i tshogs kyi char mi phod/ byang chub sems dpa' zhus ma thag tu tshogs
333b3(phal chen): can rtsogs/ nyon mongs med cing shin tu pra la ma rtogs pa'i/ rang rgyal sems can bye ba khrag khrig bkod gyur kyang / bsod nams bsags pa de ni byang chub sems rab la/
333b4(phal chen): grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba'i rnam par nyer mi 'gro/ zhing gi rdul ni tshad kyis shes par rung yang srid/ skad cig sems kyi zhing mang yongs su 'das byas shing / de ltar skal pa brjod
333b5(phal chen): byas zad par 'gro byas na/ zhing mthar thug pa rung srid byang chub sems mchog min/ mtha' rnams kun du bskal pa mang po'i thar med de/ sngon gyi mthar gyur bskal pa de bzhin ma 'ongs
333b6(phal chen): dang / da ltar byung ba'i bskal pa zad dang thugs med pa'i bskal pa de dag zad srid byang chub sems ma yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing / rtogs dang rnam
333b7(phal chen): rtog yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ skad cig cig gis dus gsum rtogs par bya don tu/ 'gro ba'i don du 'dod cing sems mchog rin chen skyes/ phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams stong ma
333b8(phal chen): kun mtha' yas pa'i/ 'gro ba'i rnams kyis mos pa bsam pa ci 'dra ba/ sbyor ba gang dang sems dang spyod pa de bzhin ste/ mtha' thug rung srid kha 'dri'i byang chub sems thar min/ de ni 'di
334a1(phal chen): ltar phyogs bcu byams dang snying rje dang / bsam pa chen po'i 'gro ba thams cad rgyas byas shing / thar pa'i don tu sangs rgyas yon tan kun sbyor phyir/ rin chen sems kyi
334a2(phal chen): stobs ni tshad med rab tu skyes/ mos dang bsam pa yid bzhin yang dag sbyor ba dang / 'gro ba'i dbang po sbyor ba'i sems dang spyod pa dang / skad cig cig gis ci bzhin rtogs par bya/
334a3(phal chen): ba'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes lta bu sems skyes so// 'gro ba'i las dang nyon mongs sna tshogs 'byam klas pas/ gang gi khams gsum 'di dag tu ni skye 'gyur ba/ de dag
334a4(phal chen): mtha' ni phyogs bcur sbed par rung srid kyi/ byang chub sems kyi mchog la kun gyi mtha' med de/ ci'i phyir zhe na 'di ltar nyon mongs las bral ba'i/ sems ni de bzhin gshegs pa
334a5(phal chen): mchod pa'i don du skye/ nyon mongs grol byed de bzhin las kyi rgyud kyang gcod/ dus gsum mun pa sel cing mi zad snying rje 'byung / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas ma lus
334a6(phal chen): thams cad dang / sems can mang po thams cad sems cig skyed pa yis/ spos dang me tog phreng ba byug pa dam pa dang / gdug dang rgyal mtshan bza' gtung na bzas mchod par byed/
334a7(phal chen): gzhan gyi bdag gi rnam par chags sa dam pa dang / pho brang mang po sna tshogs tsan dan tshegs rtsegs pa/ nor bu rin chen rnam par snang bar brgyan pa dang / yid bzhin nor bu yid 'ong
334a8(phal chen): brgyan pas mchod byas ste/ de ltar bde gshegs sems can mngon par mchod byed pas/ bskal pa khrag khrig brjod du med pa zad byas kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i bder rtsags
334b1(phal chen): mthar byin bde bzhing / gang sgrub byang chub sems la snyam pa nyer mi 'gro/ ci snyed dper brjod byas pa 'di dag thams cad kyang / yang dag skyes pa'i byang chub sems kyi
334b2(phal chen): mi rung / de yang 'di ltar dus gsum bzhugs pa'i skyes bu'i mchog/ thams cad byang chub sems mchog de las byung ba yin/ byang chub sems ni chags pa med pa'i mthar phyin
334b3(phal chen): te/ thams cad tshad la gnas kyang de la tshad mod min/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gzhol zhing tshad med stobs/ sems can rang bzhin de bzhin byang chub mthar yang byin//
334b4(phal chen): byang chub sems ni nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa ste/ chos rnams kun la khyab pa chos dbyings ji bzhin no// tshad med de bzhin nyid kun de'i spyod yul gyur/ de ni kun du khyab pa
334b5(phal chen): sems can rtson bzhin no// de ni 'byam klas chos rnams kun la rjes su zhugs/ de ni zhing rnams ma lus 'byam klas kun tu khyab/ de ni shes pa 'byam klas thams cad rtogs par chud
334b6(phal chen): de ni sangs rgyas 'byam klas kun dang 'gal med thob/ rtag tu bsod nams bla na med pa dag dang ldan/ de bzhin rtag tu tshul khrims rnam dag mig gnas ldan/ rtag tu kun stong rtag
334b7(phal chen): bar rab tu dge ba ste/ ldog pa med pa'i brtson 'grus mchog dang rab tu ldan/ bsam gtan mdzod la rtag tu bsam gtan 'jug pa byed/ shes rab shin tu yangs pa dang yang rtag
334b8(phal chen): tu ldan/ rgyal sras rnams kyi rab ngas pa gang yod pa/ de dag don du ye shes kun du bzang po byung / 'gro ba kun na skyes bu'i seng ge gang zhugs pa/ de dag gi ni byang chub sems rab
335a1(phal chen): bal @#byin gyis rlabs/ ting nge 'dzin dang gzugs kyi dam pa rab tu brgyan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam 'phrul rdzu 'phrul rnam par brgyan/ 'jig rten kun dang 'gro ba
335a2(phal chen): rnams kyi ci tsam tshad/ nam mkha'i tshad kyang phyogs bcu kun tu ci tsam pa/ de dag pas kyang byang chub sems 'di tshad med de/ de las skyes bu'i seng ge kun kyang skyes shing byung / byang chub
335a3(phal chen): sems 'di stobs bcu rnams kyi rtsa ba ste/ brtan pa bzhi'i gnas yin so sor shes pa'i rtsa/ rgyal ba'i chos rab bco brgyad yang dag 'byin pa ste/ skyes bu'i gtso bos mkhyen par bya
335a4(phal chen): ba'i chos kun 'byin/ gzugs kyi sku ni mtshan rab rnams kyi brtsegs pa dang / chos sku snyam nyid rtogs pa mi mnga' bsnyes pa dang / 'gro bas mchod pa'i ye shes chags med gang
335a5(phal chen): 'byung ba/ kun gyi rtsa ba 'byung gnas byang chub sems 'di yin/ rang rgyal theg pa 'byung zhing nyan thos theg pa 'byung / gsam gtan ting 'dzin bde ba gzugs kyi dam pa dang /
335a6(phal chen): gzugs med khams rnams ting 'dzin bde ba dang / kun gyi rtsa ba byang chub sems mchog yin no// ming dang de bzhin lha'i dbang po'i bde ba dang / lam rgyu sna tshogs kun kyang
335a7(phal chen): 'di la shin du sbyangs/ brtson 'grus stobs dang dbang po bde ba gang yod pa/ kun gyi rtsa ba dang po byang chub sems 'di yin/ ci phyir zhe na 'di ltar byang chub sems bskyed cing / pha rol
335a8(phal chen): byin drug brtson par spyad pa spyod/ sems can rnams la yang spyod pa yang dag rab tu ston/ des ni khams gsum 'gro ba'i bde ba kun kyang 'byung / sangs rgyas chags med thugs chud
335b1(phal chen): don med mkhyen pa rnams/ chos kyi dam pa mchog rnams yang dag kun ston cing / rgya chen nyon mongs las las sems can 'gro la mdzad de/ mya ngan 'das pa dam pa mchog la mgod
335b2(phal chen): mdzad pa/ ye shes 'od zer 'od yang nyi ma lta bu ste/ 'gro bar spyod pa dkar pos yongs rgyas zlas pa bzhin/ yon tan shin tu bsags pa'i tshad med chu lta bu/ dri med chags pa mi mnga'
335b3(phal chen): tshad med mkha' dbyings 'dra/ gang zhig yon tan mtha' yas byang chub sems yangs pa/ shin tu che zhing bde skyid tshad med smon byed cing / phyi ma'i mur thug spyod par smon pa su brtson
335b4(phal chen): ba/ de dag sems can 'dul ba'i don phyir rtag tu brtson/ 'jig rten 'jam klas thams cad rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir/ smon lam bye ba khrag khrig bsam gyis mi khyab dang / stong pa mtshan
335b5(phal chen): ma med pa sngon pa med mi gnas pa'i/ smon lam bye ba brgyas ni sems de dag par 'gyur/ sems kyis rang bzhin nam mkha' lta bu sus rtogs shing / zhi dang rab zhi nyer zhi thams cad
335b6(phal chen): mnyam 'jog pa/ de dag chos grangs khrag khrig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ grangs su 'gro ba ston kyang de'i gnas pa med/ phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gtso bo ji snyed pa/ de dag
335b7(phal chen): kun gyi byang chub sems mchog 'di sngags ste/ yon tan brgya phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pas kyang rgyan/ sems can gtso bzhin yongs dag pha rol phyin pa 'di/ bskal pa sems
335b8(phal chen): can snyed du gal te legs brjod kyang / byang chub sems rab de la thar thug gang yang med/ rgyal ba 'byung ba'i rigs chen der ni gang skyes pa/ de'i dpe na khams gsum glongs kyang
336a1(phal chen): gang yang med/ dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi gang zhig rnams brtsams pa'i/ byang chub sems rab de la smon lam kun gyi shig/ byang chub sems rab dam pa de ni
336a2(phal chen): bsod nams gter/ des ni rgyal sras chags pa med par rab tu thob/ 'gro ba'i sems dang spyod pa'i shes shing mthong rung srid/ zhing rnams brdul du rlags te bgrang bar nus kyang
336a3(phal chen): srid/ bar snang skra yis mnyam par nus srid kyis/ byang chub sems mchog yon tan mthar phyin mi nus so// 'di las dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu byung / 'di las
336a4(phal chen): 'jig rten 'gro ba kun gyi bde bar 'byung / 'di la rgyal bas bsngags pa'i legs pa thams cad 'byung / 'dis ni sems can gtso la the tshom med par 'gyur/ 'dis ni 'jig rten
336a5(phal chen): kun gyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ 'di ni zhing rnams yongs su dag pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ 'di las 'jig rten dam pa shes dang ldan pa 'byung / gang zhig phyogs bcu'i rgyal
336a6(phal chen): bar lta bar 'dod pa dang / gang zhig byin dang bsod nams mi zad 'dzod 'dod dang / gang zhig 'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal zlog 'dod pa/ de ni yon tan mtha' yas byang chub sems
336a7(phal chen): bskyed bya/ shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po zhes bya ba las/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i dpe yang dag par rtsagra
336a8(phal chen): pa'i tshig su bcad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// // byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus blo gros kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros
336b1(phal chen): la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sems bskyed pa rab tu thob pa/ sems dang po bskyed pa la gnas pa de ltar tshad/
336b2(phal chen): med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ye shes rgya mtsho la yang dag par 'dzegs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par shin tu chud pa/ 'jig
336b3(phal chen): rten kun du khyed par byed pa rnams par bzlog pa/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos nyid rjes su song ba dang 'das pa dang ma byon pa/ da ltar byung ba'i de
336b4(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlab pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa la shin tu nges par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rab tu gzhol ba de dag gis de bzhin
336b5(phal chen): gshegs pa'i bstan pa la ji ltar brtson par bya ba'i rnam pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyes par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa las
336b6(phal chen): 'das par 'gyur ba dang / spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gter
336b7(phal chen): chen po rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams la snod ci bzhin du sbyin pa byed par 'gyur ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs yongs su mi gtong bar 'gyur ba dang /
336b8(phal chen): ltar dam bcas pa'i sems can rnams sgrol bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi gdung mi chad par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dmigs pa thams cad
337a1(phal chen): du sbyor ba don med par mi 'gyur ba dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de la brtson par byas la/ chos kyi yul 'di dag yongs su rdzogs
337a2(phal chen): par 'gyur ba ci ltar rtsam par bya ba de legs par bshad par mdzod cig/ 'khor 'di dag thams cad kyi nyan par 'dod do// sems can chen po de dag gis brtson rnam pa ci lta
337a3(phal chen): bus ma rigs pa'i mun nag thams cad gsal te/ bdud kyis dkrug pa'i 'khor thams cad las shin tu rgyal bar byas nas bas kyis rgol ba thams cad zil gyis mnan te/
337a4(phal chen): sems kyi dri ma kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad kun tu brtsal te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad shin tu sgrub ste/ mi khom pa dang ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i lam
337a5(phal chen): thams cad rnam par zlos nas/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnam par byas ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang / gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon
337a6(phal chen): par shes pa dang / rig pa dang mi 'jig pa yongs su dag pa rnam mngon par sgrub nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams thams cad rnam par dag pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po
337a7(phal chen): dang / sku dang gsung dang / thugs kyi brgyan mngon par sgrub pa'i yongs su rgyas par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas
337a8(phal chen): kyi chos ma 'dres pa mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / de ltar mngon par byang chub nas kyang bsam pa'i tshul
337b1(phal chen): bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su grub pa dag tu ji lta ba yongs su smin par bya ba'i sems can dag la dus dang dbang po'i rgyud ci lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha'
337b2(phal chen): yas pa 'byin par 'gyur ba de legs par shod cig/ 'khor 'di dag thams cad ni nyan par 'dod do// ci ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan
337b3(phal chen): 'di dang gzhan dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi yul rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas ste/
337b4(phal chen): myur du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyam pa nyid thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bskal pa brgya stong grangs med
337b5(phal chen): par yang dag par bsgrub pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'di yang dag par bsrung zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas shing / ston pa dang 'chang ba'i tshe/ bdud dam bdud kyi rigs su
337b6(phal chen): rtogs pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi zil gyi mi non pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang skye bar yang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang / de
337b7(phal chen): yang dag par bstan pa'i tshe lha'i dbang po rnams kyi rim gror bya ba dang / gzhung de de bzhin du klu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / dri za'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyis
337b8(phal chen): dbang po dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'byed chen po'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa'i dbang pos rim gror bya ba rab tu thob pa dang / de bzhin
338a1(phal chen): gshegs pa'i chos kyis dbang pos rim gror bya ba rab tu thob pa dang / de ltar rim gror byas nas kyang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi phyag bya ba dang / 'jig rten thams
338a2(phal chen): cad kyi mngon par mchod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis dbang skur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shin tu dgongs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi shin tu bsrungs
338a3(phal chen): pa/ rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang smon lam rab tu thob pa/ chos dkar po yang dag par dpel ba rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
338a4(phal chen): rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod rnams par byed par 'gyur ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rgya chen po rab tu 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rims kyi spyod pa yongs su
338a5(phal chen): bsgrub pa shin tu ston par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas dag par mdzod cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus blo gros kyi don 'di nyid mnan te/ brjod pa'i phyir byang chub
338a6(phal chen): sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ spyod la 'jug pa mtha' yas yangs pa dag/ rang 'byung ye shes sgrub pa dge ba rnams/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub
338a7(phal chen): sems dpa' yon tan can/ grags pa chen po rnams la legs pa shog/ byang chub sems dpa' gang rnams sems slob cing / bsod nams ldan pa ye shes thob pa
338a8(phal chen): rnams/ skyon med zhugs pa 'jig rten rnams zlog cing / yang dag sangs rgyas chos nyams nyid thob rnams/ de dag gi ni bde gshegs brtan pa la/ brtson 'grus brtan pas
