338b1(phal chen): de ltar brtson par bya/ gang gi phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba rnyed bya shing / yang dag sangs rgyas sa yang gnan bya dang / spyod pa dag dang smon lam yongs dag dang / ye shes gter chen
338b2(phal chen): rab tu thob gyur cing // thob nas de dag 'gro kun mi gnas pa/ yongs su blangs pa rtags tu stong byas dang / gang yang pha rol byin pa cho ga gi lam/ de dag mi gto rab tu spyod pa dang /
338b3(phal chen): sems can ji ltar sgrol byed dam bcas shing / yang dag sangs rgyas bsam pa mnyam 'dzin dang / mig gi dmigs pas brten pa thams cad kyis/ 'byung ba yon tan can la
338b4(phal chen): stobs 'gyur zhing / skyes bu khyu mchog de dag brtson 'gyur ba'i/ rnam dag lam nges khyu mchog khyod kyi ston/ ji ltar de dag mun pa kun gsal cing / 'khrug pa'i 'khor
338b5(phal chen): rnams thams cad pham byas nas// dri ma bral ba'i dge ldan mkhas pa rnams// skyes bu khyu mchog ye shes ldan 'gyur dang / mi khom ngan song lam rnams yongs spangs zhi//
338b6(phal chen): ye shes chen po'i dkyil 'khor mchog sbyong dang / yon tan bzang po thams cad ldan gyur cing / rgyal ba'i ye shes stobs kyang thob 'gyur dang / skyes bu khyu mchog zhugs nas
338b7(phal chen): kyang / sems can bsam pa ci bzhin ston byed cing / mtha' yas yangs pa'i zhing rnams mtha' yas su/ ston pa chen po'i las kyang byed pa dang / ci nas de dag spyod pa
338b8(phal chen): mchog thob nas/ ma'i khyu mchog mdzod rnams ston byed des/ zil gyis mi non gzhan gyi mi pham par// rgyal ba'i chos nyid rtag tu 'dzin byed ston/ seng ge bzhin du ji ltar
339a1(phal chen): 'jigs pa med// ji ltar zla bzhin dag pa'i 'dog tu sbyong // tshul pad mo bzhin du chags med pa// de dag rgyal ba'i yon tan ji ltar stong / de skad ces
339a2(phal chen): smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis/ byang chub sems brtson 'grus blo gros la 'di skad ces so// kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod ni skye bo mang po la phan
339a3(phal chen): pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying rtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod byang chub sems
339a4(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa shin tu rtogs shing rnam par dag brtsams te dri zhing / de ltar rgyal ba'i sras khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dri ba chos mang po la rab tu gnas pa/ brtson 'grus chen
339a5(phal chen): po shin tu bsags pa/ brtson 'grus ldog pa med pas shin tu byung ba/ dri bar byed pa ni/ kye rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de'i phyi shin tu legs
339a6(phal chen): bar nyon la yid la bzung shig dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi phyogs mtshams bstan par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen
339a7(phal chen): ba nyid du sems bskyed pa thob pa rnams kyis/ thog mar sems bskyed pa de minyam par yongs su bsrung ba dang / rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ bag yod par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i
339a8(phal chen): sras de la rnam pa bcus na/ byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa la gnas pa zhes bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ tshul khrims kyi phung po shin du bsrung ba dang / byang chub kyi sems ma
339b1(phal chen): mnams shing shin du sbyangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa g.yo dang / rgyu med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyor ba'i phyir mi ldog pa dang / rang gis sems bskyed pa shin
339b2(phal chen): du rtogs pa dang / phyogs khyim pa dang / so so skye bo dang / ma 'dres pa dang / dge ba'i las 'jig rten gyi 'du shes dang / 'dod pas thams cad bral ba dang / byang chub sems
339b3(phal chen): dpa'i lam/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa spang ba rab tu thob pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsam pa nan tan rgyun chad pa med pa dang / bdag gi rgyud kyi stobs kyi shugs
339b4(phal chen): shin du rtags pa dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras rnam pa bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bag yod pa la gnas pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de la
339b5(phal chen): byang chub sems byug yod pa la gnas pa ni/ rnams pa bcus na yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
339b6(phal chen): ji ltar smras pa de ltar byed pa yin/ shes bzhin gyi dran pa can yin/ khang pa med cing yangs pa med des/ bsam gtan zab mo la rab tu gnas pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
339b7(phal chen): zab po brtsal ba nan tu byed cing rgyun mi bcod pa yin/ lhag mthong mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing ji ltar thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin du rtogs par zhugs pa yin
339b8(phal chen): bsam gtan gyis rjes su song ba'i sems kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo rjes su song ba yin/ sa dang mnyam zhing thon sman dang bral ba yin/
340a1(phal chen): pha la @sbyor ba bzang ngan dang bar ma la sems nyams pa med pa yin/ sems can kun gyi nang na chung ngu na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems cig bskyed pa la'ang
340a2(phal chen): ston pa'i bas pa thob pa yin/ mkhan po dang slob dpon dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / chos smra ba rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / tshul can du gnas
340a3(phal chen): pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras rnam pa bcu po de dag gi/ byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa la gnas yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa'
340a4(phal chen): bag yod pa brtson 'grus brtsams la/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mos pa che la/ rnal 'byor rgyun ma chad pa/ chos thams cad la mi gnas pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul la zhugs
340a5(phal chen): pa/ sems yangs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rjes su song ba rnams kyis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
340a6(phal chen): mnyes par 'gyur te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpas chos bcus de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par bya'o// bcu gang zhe na byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus
340a7(phal chen): thams cad la phyir mi ldog pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad dang / mtsho ba'i rkyen gyi don du mnyes pa med pa dang / chos thams cad rnam par sgom pas
340a8(phal chen): nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dang / chos kyi dbying la yang dag par gzhol ba'i lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang / mi gnas pa'i chos rnam par sgom pa'i phyag rgya dang / rtag tu rgyun mi
340b1(phal chen): 'chad par sgrub pa'i smon lam chen po dang / yongs su sbyangs pa'i bzod pa shes pa'i sdang ba dang / rang gis dge ba'i chos bsags pa dang / ma bsags par shin tu rtags pa dang
340b2(phal chen): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i sgo shin tu byung ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa'
340b3(phal chen): chos bcu la gnas pa rnams kyi ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par 'gyur ba yin te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste bag yod pa la gnas pa dang / mi skye ba'i bsod pa la gnas
340b4(phal chen): bya dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas pa dang / spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas pa dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa la gnas pa dang /
340b5(phal chen): thabs mkhas pa la gnas pa dang / brtan pa'i stobs kyi shugs la gnas pa dang / chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bu la rab tu gnas pa dang / len pa med pa la gnas
340b6(phal chen): ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras chos de dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras de la chos bcu dang
340b7(phal chen): ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sa rnam par dgod pa las 'da' ba yin te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste bsod nams dang ye shes kyis tshogs shin du bsags pa dang /
340b8(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa rnam par phye ba tshad med pa'i lam gzhan gyis dring mi 'jog pa'i ye shes snang ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs par rgyun ma chad pa dang / brtson 'grus
341a1(phal chen): la @zhig pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis legs par brlabs pa dang // dge ba'i rtsa bo sbyor bar mi skyo ba dang / theg pa'i brgyan shin tu bshams
341a2(phal chen): ba dang / ye shes kyi bsam pa rab tu sngo ba dang sa dang sa ma yin pa'i chos kyis sgo la gnas pa dang / 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
341a3(phal chen): thams cad dang / dge ba'i rgyud kyi tshul cig tu gyur pa dag te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras chos bcu po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams nas sar rnam par dgod pa las 'da'
341a4(phal chen): ba yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni thog ma nas sa rnam par dgod pa thams cad la mkhas pa// rnam par spyod pa yin te/ chos kyis mgo gang gis
341a5(phal chen): khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / ye shes kyi sgo gang gis thob par 'gyur ba dang / bsgrub pa gang yin pa dang / rgyu 'thun pa gang yin pa dang / spyod yul gang yin pa dang / rnam par
341a6(phal chen): 'phrul pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag par mthong ba gang yin pa dang / chos kyi sgo rnam par dbye ba'i khyad par gang yin pa dang / ci ltar thob par bya ba thams cad rnam par 'byed do//
341a7(phal chen): de dag la bzhin du rnam par spyad par chos thams cad la mi gnas zhing / sems kyis rang bzhin chos thams cad khong du chud pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa yang dag par
341a8(phal chen): mda'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'di ltar bdag cag gi ci nas kyang myur du mnga' bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni snyam du sems te/
341b1(phal chen): bdag cag sa nas sa la rnam sar gnas pas ji lta ji ltar yang dag par gnas pas/ de ltar de ltar bsod nams kyis tshogs chen po skyes par 'gyur ro// ji lta ji ltar bsod nam
341b2(phal chen): kyi tshogs chen po skyes par gyur pa/ de lta de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su song zhing / sangs rgyas kyis mdzad pa tshad med pas nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro snyam ste/ de dag sbyor
341b3(phal chen): ba rgyun ma chad cing skyo ba med pa'i yid dang ldan pa dang / tshogs kyis brgyan chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnam par dgod pa las yang dag par gda'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de la
341b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam pa bcus spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyang ba byas te/ bcu gang zhe na/ yo byad yongs su bzang ba med pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad tshim
341b5(phal chen): par byed pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / bzod pa dang nges pa mi zad pa'i rjes su song ba dang / brtson 'grus brtsom pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba
341b6(phal chen): dang ldan pa dang / dran pa'i stobs kyis shugs rmongs pa med pa dang / gcig las rnam pa tha dad pa'i rjes su song zhing khong du chud pa dang / gnas med pa'i spyod pa bsgrub par dka'
341b7(phal chen): ba thams cad la sems ri'i rgyal po lta bu dang / sems can thams cad dang ma 'dres pa'i mu stegs su gyur pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad dang rgyud kyis tshul
341b8(phal chen): cig tu gyur pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras rnams pa bcu po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// de dag gis byang chub sems
342a1(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa de ltar yongs su sbyang ba de rnams pa bcus bzhin du dag par 'gyur ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sems can gyis gtso bo 'jig rten gyis khams gzhan na bzhugs
342a2(phal chen): pas gang yang dag par dgongs pa dang / 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i grogs kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs yang dag par gzung
342a3(phal chen): ba la mkhas pa dang / dge ba'i bshes bsnyen la yang dag par bstan pa dang / mos pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bag yod pa la rab tu gnas pa dang / chos tha dad pa thams cad la
342a4(phal chen): tha dad par rtogs pa dang / snying rje'i byin gyis rlabs shin tu che ba dang / chos thams cad yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rnam par lta ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub
342a5(phal chen): pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa rnam par spyod pa'i sbyor ba dang / sbyor ba thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyis rjes su 'brang ba dang dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras rnam pa
342a6(phal chen): bcu po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rnam par dag pa
342a7(phal chen): bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ skyo ba med pa'i sems can gyis khams yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bsags pas 'jig rten gyis khams
342a8(phal chen): yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam dang / lus dang srog gi bsngo zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i lam dang / ye shes kyi sgo rnam par spyad par khong du chud pas sangs rgyas
342b1(phal chen): kyi zhing la 'jug pa'i smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang gnyis su med pas tshul gcig tu rgyud du 'gro ba'i smon lam dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgo la 'jug
342b2(phal chen): pas chos thams cad khong du chud pa'i smon lam dang / mos pa rnam par sbyangs pas blta na don yod pa'i smon lam dang / phyi ma'i mtha' byin gyis brlabs bskal par gnas pa'i
342b3(phal chen): smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos theg pa'i rgyan rnam pa thams cad mkhyen gyi sgo nas rnam par dag pa'i smon lam dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sem
342b4(phal chen): dpa' rnams ni de ltar smon lam rnam par sbyong ngo // de dag rnam pa bcus smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na yongs su skyo ba med pa dang / rgyan chen po mngon par
342b5(phal chen): sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam khyad par du 'phags pa rnams kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
342b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyis zhing thos nas rang gi smon lam du mngon par bsgrub pa dang / bsam pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thugs pa dang / sems can gyis khams thams cad yongs su
342b7(phal chen): smin par bya ba'i btug pa'i smon lam chen po dang ldan pa dang / bskal pa thams cad du gnas pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang / sdug bsngal thams cad mi spen pa dang / bde ba thams cad
342b8(phal chen): la ye mi rngam pa dang / bsam pa nyam pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su bsrungs pa dag ste/ de dag smon lam chen po de ltar yongs su sbyong zhing rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe/ sangs
343a1(phal chen): rgyas mthong ba'i gter zad mi shes pa yang rab tu thob po// gzugs 'khrul pa med pa'i gter zad mi shes pa yang rab tu thob po// smon lam zad mi shes pas chos
343a2(phal chen): thams cad shin tu rtogs pa'i gzugs kyang rab tu thob bo// snying rje chen pos 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i gter zad mi shes pa yang rab tu 'thob bo// ting nge 'dzin gyis
343a3(phal chen): rgyud kyis gter zad mi shes pa yang rab tu thob po// 'gro ba thams cad tshims par bya ba'i bsod nams kyis gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob po// chos thams cad yang
343a4(phal chen): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtags pa'i ye shes kyis gter zad mi shes pa yang rab tu thob po// rnam par smin pa la gnas pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i gter zad mi shes pa 'ang rab tu thob bo//
343a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs mtha' yas pa'i gter zad mi shes pa yang rab tu thob po// 'jig rten gyis khams mtha' dang dpung med par rtogs pa la 'jug pa'i gter zad mi
343a6(phal chen): shes pa'ang rab tu thob po// de ltar gter rab tu thob cing bsod nams dang ye shes tshogs zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa de dag ye shes chen po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pas/ sems
343a7(phal chen): can rnams la bsam pa ji ltar ba bzhin du chos kyis gter gyi sbyin pa byed des/ de la rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can rnams kyis bsam pa ji ltar 'jug
343a8(phal chen): ces nas/ sbyor ba ji lta bur rgyu ba dang / rgyu dang rkyen ji lta ba dang / sems dang sems las byung ba'i sbyor ba ji lta ba las sems can rnams kyis bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug ste/
343b1(phal chen): de dag de ltar bsam pa la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyis bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes shing chos yang dag par ston to// de dag gis 'dod chags kyi bsam pa rnam par bzlog
343b2(phal chen): pa'i phyir mi 'dug pa yang dag par ston to// zhe sdang gis bsam pa rnam par zlog pa'i phyir/ byams pa chen po'i sbyor ba yang dag par ston to// gti mug gi bsam pa rnam par
343b3(phal chen): zlog pa'i phyir/ chos rnam par 'byed pa mkhas pa yang dag par ston to// cha nyams pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/ ye shes kyis khyad par dang ldan pa'i chos kyis sgo yang dag par
343b4(phal chen): ston to// 'khor ba'i bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/ sdug bsngal rnam gsum dang ldan pa'i yang dag par ston to// gnas kyis bsam par rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/
343b5(phal chen): gnas med pa'i chos kyis sgo yang dag par ston to// zhum pa'i bsam pa rnam par zlog pa'i phyir/ rgya chen po'i yang dag par ston to// bdag gi nga rgyal gyis bcom pa'i bsam
343b6(phal chen): pa rnams par zlog pa'i phyir chos kyis mnyam pa nyid yang dag par ston to// g.yo dang sgyus mi nyam pa'i bsam pa rnam par zlog pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa mnyam
343b7(phal chen): ba nyid dang / zhi ba'i gnas kyis bsam pa mngon par grub pa yang dag par ston to// de dag ni de ltar sems can rnams la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin chos kyis gter yang dag par
343b8(phal chen): ston te/ de yang don dbyer med par yang dag par ston to// yi ge'i 'tshams 'byor par sbyar bas yang dag par ston to// shes pa rnam par dbye bas yang dag par ston to// bstan
344a1(phal chen): pa lnga phyi ma 'dres par yang dag par ston to// chos kyi sku dang tshul ma yin par bye brag dper med par ston to// mtshan nyid kyis phyag rgya rnam par mi 'khrugs
344a2(phal chen): pas yang dag par ston to// chos rab tu dgod pa rgyud chad pa med pas yang dag par ston to// mtha' las sbyangs pas yang dag par ston to// the tsom thams cad shin du bcad pa'i
344a3(phal chen): phyir yang dag par ston to// dbang po'i rgyud la 'jug pa'i phyir yang dag par ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya la dgod par gzhol bas yang dag par ston to// yang dag pa'i
344a4(phal chen): mtshan nyid med par mi 'khrugs pas yang dag par ston to// chos kyis dbyings la yang dag par gzhol bas yang dag par ston to// chos kyis rnga yang dag par brdungs pas yang
344a5(phal chen): dag par ston to// gnas thams cad yang dag par spangs par yang dag par ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dran pa mi gtong bas yang dag par ston to//
344a6(phal chen): tshig dang skad dang sgra dang ngag gi las thams cad mnyam pa nyid la mi gnas pas yang dag par ston to// rnam par med pa'i dbyings kyi rjes su 'gro ba yang dag par ston to// dpe
344a7(phal chen): thams cad yang dag par dgod pas rgyu dang mi 'gal bar/ brtan par bya bas yang dag par ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rang gis su sems dpa'
344a8(phal chen): la yang dag par ston to// de ltar sems can la chos dag par ston cing / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos kyis nan tan gyi mtshan nyid rjes su 'brang ba dang / rang gis don ting tshug
344b1(phal chen): par byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs mi gtang bas rgya chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa yang dag par sgrub po// de la yang sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba dang /
344b2(phal chen): yo byad kyis yongs su sdud pa dang / sbyor ba mnyam par yongs su gtong bas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do// yang dag par thang ba mi gtong ba dang /
344b3(phal chen): gnas med pa dang / nga rgyal med pas tshul khrims kyis pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do// nyes pa thams cad khyad du gsod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis
344b4(phal chen): mi 'khrugs pa dang / mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba dang / mtho dman med pa dang / zad mi shes pa'i mnyam par 'dzin pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed
344b5(phal chen): des/ brtsam pa chen po'i brtsom pa dang / rtsam pa thams cad la zhum pa med pa dang / sbyor ba'i phyir mi ldog pa dang / yid la byed pa phyir mi 'gyur ba dang / mthu mtha' yas pa
344b6(phal chen): dang / stobs la thugs pa med pa dang / sngon du 'gro ba mi 'phrog pa dang / dad pa'i mthu chen po dang / blang ba dang / dor ba med pa'i tshogs thams cad yongs su rgyas par bya ba dang /
344b7(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo nyams pa med pa la/ yang dag par 'jug pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do// 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad kyi 'du
344b8(phal chen): 'dzi yongs su sbyong ba dang / rims kyi bsam brtan dang ting nge 'dzin mngon par sgrub pa dang / gnas med cing blang ba med pa shin tu rtogs pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad sel ba
345a1(phal chen): la dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis sgo mtha' yas pa mngon par sgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par 'phrul pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / rims kyis rnam par
345a2(phal chen): spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la 'jug pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis sgo la mtha' yas par rab tu 'jug pa dang / ting nge 'dzin spyod yul thams cad shes pa dang / de'i yul gyis rjes
345a3(phal chen): su rab tu zhugs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad kyis ye shes kyis phyag rgya mi 'khrugs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la nye bar gyur pas/ bsam
345a4(phal chen): gtan gyis pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do// sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad la mnyam pa dang / gzung ba dang / blang ba dang / bcang ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen
345a5(phal chen): thams cad gnyen skar bas yongs su mi skyo ba dang / thos pa thams cad kyi mi ngoms pa dang / ji ltar thos pa la tshul bzhin du rtogs pa dang / de la mngon sum du snyoms par bzhog
345a6(phal chen): pa dang / sgro 'dogs pa dang / lta ba thams cad dang bral ba dang / chos thams cad rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyis phyag rgya tha mi dad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
345a7(phal chen): pa'i sgo nas lhun gyis grub par sgom zhing / rnam par bsgom pa dang / stobs la 'jug pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
345a8(phal chen): tu phyin pa sgo kun dang ldan pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgor 'jug pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do// 'jig rten gyi bya ba'i rgyud thams cad ston pa
345b1(phal chen): dang sems can gyis khams su smin pas yongs su mi skyo ba dang / bsam pa bzhin du ston pa dang / bya ba thams cad la mngon par chags pa dang / byis pa'i spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i
345b2(phal chen): spyod pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa nye bar ston pa dang / sbyor ba thams cad shin tu rtag par rgyu ba dang / rgyan thams cad brtan pa gnas
345b3(phal chen): pa med pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing rjes su 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i spyod pas thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su sbyong ngo //
345b4(phal chen): sems can gyis khams mthar thug pa yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mthar thug par yongs su sbyang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthar thug pa dang chod pa
345b5(phal chen): dang / chos chags pa med pa'i mthar thug pa rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyis dbyings kyi mthar thug par spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bskal pa phyi
345b6(phal chen): ma'i mthar thug par rab tu gnas pa dang / sems bskyed pa'i mthar thug pa'i stobs la 'jug pa dang / 'gro ba dang ldog par mthar thug par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
345b7(phal chen): zhing gi gnas kyis mthar thug par thams cad mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis mthar thug pa rab tu thob par byas pas/ smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
345b8(phal chen): su dag par byed do// bsam pa'i stobs kun nas nyon mongs pa med do// lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dbang du 'gyur cing thub pa med pa dang / snying rje chen po'i stobs kye ba med pa
346a1(phal chen): dang / byams pa chen po'i stobs nyams pa'i sbyor ba gzhan dang / gzugs kyi stobs don thams cad kyis sbyor la sgrib pa med pa dang / spos pa'i stobs 'gro ba tham
346a2(phal chen): cad tshim par byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs thams cad kyis rgyan byed pa dang / smon lam gyis stobs gcad du mi rung ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i stobs tshad med pa
346a3(phal chen): mngon par sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs la mos pa dam pa'i stobs rab tu 'dzin pa dang / stobs kyis pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do// 'dod chags
346a4(phal chen): kyi spyod pa khong du chung ba dang / zhe sdang gis spyod pa rjes su rtogs pa dang / gti mug gis spyod pa rab tu rtogs pa dang / cha nyams pa'i spyod pa rjes su shes pa dang slob pa'i
346a5(phal chen): sems can gyi spyod pa rab tu rtogs pa dang / skad cig gcig gis sems can mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa rnam par rtogs pa dang / sems dang bsam pa mtha' yas pa thams
346a6(phal chen): cad shes par byed pa dang / chos thams cad yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyis rjes su 'jug pa dang / chos kyis dbyings kyi
346a7(phal chen): sgo thams cad dang ldan pa khong du chud pas ye shes kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do// shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba// bam po nyi/
346a8(phal chen): lnga pa'o// // de dag de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su sbyong zhing pha rol tu phyin pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / pha rol gyi phyogs
346b1(phal chen): yang dag par sgo'o// de dag dge ba'i lda shi
346b2(phal chen): mi gtong bar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa brgya chen po'i brgyan dang ldan pa la gnas shing sems can gyi khams ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du brtsegs pa ston pas//
346b3(phal chen): ngan song du 'gro ba'i sems can sgrol lo// brtsal ba chen po la gzung bas gzugs med pa'i khams su skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyis khams mi khom par 'gro ba
346b4(phal chen): sgrol lo// lhag mthong nye ba rab tu btabs pas gzugs kyi khams na 'khod pa'i sems can gyi khams sgrol lo// phra ba'i ye shes nye bar bstabs pas gzugs med
346b5(phal chen): pa'i khams su skyes pa'i sems can bsgrol lo// zhi ba'i tshul nye bar stabs pas nye bar thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa'i sems can gyi khams sgrol lo//
346b6(phal chen): stobs bcu'i rgya chen po dang ldan pas stabs pas theg pa chen po la mos pa'i sems can gyi khams sgrol lo// de ltar sngon las dang po'i sa la gnas pa'i tshe/ sems can gang
346b7(phal chen): lang chen po nas lhung ba rnams par dad par gyur pa ci lta bu bzhin du shes ste/ sgo sna tshogs nas bzung bar bya'o zhes seng ge'i sgra sgrags pa de bzhin du ye shes thob pa rnams/
346b8(phal chen): sems can skal ba'i phyir rab tu zhugs pa yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' ye shes de lta bu la zhugs pa'i rtag tu rgyun mi gcod par sangs rgyas kyi rig
346b9(phal chen): dang / chos kyis rigs dang / dge 'dun gyis rigs mi bcad pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin te/ de dag byang chub kyi sems gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la gzhol bas sangs rgyas kyi
347a1(phal chen): rigs mi spyod pa yin/ chos kyi mdzod rnam par 'grel bar chos kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin/ bstan pa'i tshul dang 'gal bar mi byed pas dge 'dun gyis rig
347a2(phal chen): mi gcod pa yin/ smon lam chen po yang dag par brjod pa sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshul yang dag par ston pas chos kyi rigs mi gcod
347a3(phal chen): pa yin/ snying po thob par byed pa'i chos la brtson pas dge 'dun gyis rigs mi spyod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bon sems can gyi zhing la 'debs pas sangs rgyas
347a4(phal chen): kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin/ dam pa'i chos yongs su mi gcod pa yin/ tshogs chen po yongs su bsdud pa mi skyobs/ dge 'dun gyis rigs mi gcod pa yin/ 'das pa dang
347a5(phal chen): ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzad pa dran pa'i phyir/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdam ngag dang rjes su brtan pas mi gtong bas/ sangs
347a6(phal chen): rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa yin/ de dag de ltar skyabs sum gyis rigs mi gcad pa'i phyir zhugs pas/ brtson pa thams cad la kha na ma tho ba med pa
347a7(phal chen): yin te/ brtsam pa gang ci brtson yang rung / de dag thams cad du thogs pa med par/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgor 'byung ba thob par byed do// de dag de ltar lus kyis las
347a8(phal chen): kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / yid kyis las kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsom par don yod par rtsam pa yin te/ sems can gyi
347b1(phal chen): don yod pa 'du bar byed do// chos don yod pa bton to// de'i chos brtan pa thams cad kyang sems can gyi bsam pa tshim par bya ba la thogs pa med pas khong du chud par 'gyur ro//
347b2(phal chen): de'i sems bskyed pa cig tsam yang log par mi 'gyur te/ sems bskyed pa gzhan thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su zin pa thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs
347b3(phal chen): su bsde'o// de de ltar chos dkar po bsags pa don yod pa de lta bu gnas pas/ brgyan rnam par che ba bcus sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad yongs su bsngo ste/ bcu gang zhe
347b4(phal chen): na/ 'di ltar lus kyis brgyan sems can 'dul ba ci bzhin du yang dag par ston pa dang / ngag gi rgyan the tsom thams cad gcod pa dang / sems kyis rgyan skad cig gis ting nge
347b5(phal chen): 'dzin rjes su rtogs par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'od kyis brgyan 'od zer gyi dra ba mtha' dbus med pa skye bas/ 'gro ba tham
347b6(phal chen): cad snang bar byed pa dang / 'khor gyis dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan sems can gyi rnam pa tshad med pa'i tshogs yongs su mgu bar byed pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan
347b7(phal chen): sems kyis bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa dang / bstan pa'i rgyan mkhas pa'i skye bo thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i
347b8(phal chen): brgyan mngon par sangs rgyas par cig phyogs bcu ma lus par rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / chos byin gyis brlabs pa'i rgyan dang yul dang dus dang / snod ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dag
348a1(phal chen): ste/ de dag rgyan de lta bus sems bskyed pa thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i phyir sems can rnams la don yod pa yin te/
348a2(phal chen): thos pa dang bsnyen bskur ba dang / 'grog pa dang rjes su dran pa dang / rjes su rab tu byung ba dang / chos ston pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba la rjes su yid rang ba dang / dad cing mos pa dang / chung
348a3(phal chen): du na ming brjod pa tsam yang 'di ltar/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin pa'i phyir/ sems can rnams la don du gyur pa yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la
348a4(phal chen): ste/ dper na rtsa'i ming mthong na bde ba zhes bya ba de mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi lus la zhe na 'am/ lhor zos pa'i dug rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du chos
348a5(phal chen): de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mthong ma thag tu/ sems can rnams kyis nyon mongs pa'i dug thams cad byang bar gyur ste/ chos dkar po'i stobs kyis shugs kyang skye bar
348a6(phal chen): 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos nyid de lta bu dang ldan zhing chos de dag la gnas ste/ shes rab kyi 'od chen pos ma rigs pa'i
348a7(phal chen): pa spyi dol
348a8(phal chen): mun pa bsal nas bdud kyis bsrungs ma'i 'khor thams cad byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis pham par byas ste/ ye shes dang bsod nams kyi stobs kyi shugs thams cad
348a9(phal chen): zil gyis mnan pas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pas/ sems kyi dri ma thams cad dang nyon mongs pa'i phyogs thams cad bsal nas/ kye ba med pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis/
348b1(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pA thams cad rab tu grub ste/ sngan chad sangs rgyas kyis zhing yongs su dag par spyod pa'i stobs dang shugs kyi/ mi khoms pa dang ngan song dang / ngan 'gro'i
348b2(phal chen): las thams cad rnam par zhen pa med pa'i stobs kyis shugs kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyangs te/ rims kyi thabs dang shes rab kyi stobs dang shugs kyis/ byang chub
348b3(phal chen): sems dpa'i sa dad pha rol du phyin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang mngon par shes pa dang / rigs pa dang mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa mngon par bsgrub nas/ chos dkar po thams
348b4(phal chen): cad kyi stobs dang shugs kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / sku dang gsung dang / thugs kyi rgyan yongs su dag pa mngon par sgrub pa rab tu rgyas par
348b5(phal chen): 'gyur ste/ ye shes kyi shes par bya ba'i dbang dang byin gyis rlab kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid khong du chud
348b6(phal chen): par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du thob cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul yang smon lam gyi khyad par ji lta ba bzhin du thob par
348b7(phal chen): 'gyur ro// sngon gyis byin gyis rlabs dang ye shes kyis/ mngon par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gtan ste/ 'dul ba
348b8(phal chen): lta ba bzhin du rnams la chos kyis 'khor lo chen po bkor cing / mtha' yas pa'i sems can rnam 'dul lo// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos de lta bu dang
349a1(phal chen): phal @#/ ldan pa dag ni/ tshul de lta bus sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyis bar du thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thob nas kyang / 'jig rten gyis kham
349a2(phal chen): mtha' yas pa dag tu dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin cing chos smra ba chen po yang byed do// de ltar chos smras pa byed pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
349a3(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa de dag chos kyi mdzod chen po bzung zhing bgrang ba'i phyir/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas/ chos kyi tshul rab tu dbye ba'i rjes su song ba'i
349a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gis 'khor gyis dkyil 'khor mtha' yas par bdag gis lus kyi rgyan byin gyis brlabs te/ bstan pa mngon par grub pa rnams pa'i mchog thams cad
349a5(phal chen): dang ldan pa dang / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i mkhas pa mtha' yas pa dang / ye shes mi zad pa'i sar 'jug dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor shin du rnam par phye ba'i byin gyis brlabs
349a6(phal chen): ba dang / dbyangs gcig sgrags pas 'khor gyis dkyil 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i dbyangs kyis yan lag rnam par dag pa bsam pa bag la nyal ba dang / shes pa'i sa ji lta
349a7(phal chen): ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba dang / lus kyi byin gyis rlabs 'khor gyis dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi nang du byin kyang zil gyi mi non pa dang / lus kyi brgyan dang sgo thams cad du rnam par brtan
349a8(phal chen): ba dang / 'khor gyis dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sems dang / bsam pa khong du chud pas rab tu rtogs pa dang / tshig grol ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyi brtan pa dang / chos chad pa'i byin gyis
349b1(phal chen): rlabs la mkhas pas chos kyis rtam chen pos byed de/ stobs dang shugs kyi dbang thub pa med pa dang / 'jigs pa'i dbang du zhum pa med pa dang / chos kyi dbang gis zil gyis mi non pa dang /
349b2(phal chen): ye shes kyi dbang gzhan gyi mi thub pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dbang chos kyi mtshan nyid 'khrugs pa med pa dang / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i dbang mtsham sbyor ba rgyun
349b3(phal chen): chad pa med par bsam pa shin tu rtogs pa dang / gzugs kyis dbang chos thams cad rnam par gdon mi za ba la 'jug pa dang / smon lam gyis dbang dpe sna tshogs kyi brtan pa'i
349b4(phal chen): tshul nye bar brtan pa shin tu bstan pa dang / snying rje chen po'i dbang phyir mi zlog cing / rgyan mi chad pa dang / byams pa chen po'i dbang po sngon shin du bskyed pas bsam pa thams cad
349b5(phal chen): tshims byed cing 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po gtong bas chos kyi btam chen po byed do// de dag ni chos de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs shing / chos kyi rtam gsung ba dang /
349b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' ye shes smon lam gyi khyad par dang ldan pa ma rtogs par sems can gyi rigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' de phyir rgal ba 'am/ spyi rtsags blta ba 'am zil
349b7(phal chen): gyis mnan pa 'am/ dri ba'i tshogs yongs su dri bas thub par bya bar nus pa'i sems can gang yang med do// de ni gnas med de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gal te byang chub sems dpa'
349b8(phal chen): dbang de lta bu thob pa la 'jig rten gyis khams brjod du med pa tsam du yangs pa'i 'khor gyis dkyil 'khor cig yod la/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de yang sems can stong gsu
350a1(phal chen): stong chen po bdag po'i gzi brjid thob pa sha stag gi khang pa zhig yin na yang de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tu 'ong ma thag tu/ lus
350a2(phal chen): bstan pa'i dbang gis zil gyis mnan ste/ byams pa chen po'i dbang gis lus kyi zhi tshim par byas nas/ ye shes chen po'i dbang gi sems dang bsam pa rnam par shes pa byas
350a3(phal chen): te/ mi 'jigs pa'i bsam pa chen po chos ston par byed cing / spobs pa chen po'i dbang gi sems can tshim par byed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub
350a4(phal chen): sems dpa' de ni ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa dang ldan/ chos rnam par 'byed pa shin tu phye ba la mkhas pa dang ldan/ drag pa'i stobs shugs ma nyams shing rgya che ba dang ldan
350a5(phal chen): ba/ thams cad kyis tshul rnam par gdon mi za bar gzung zhing blang bas rtogs par mkhas pa dang ldan/ byang chub sems dpa'i mkhas pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dang ldan pa/
350a6(phal chen): chos kyis mtshan nyid sgrib pa med pa'i chos bstan pa la mkhas pa dang ldan pas/ mos pa la mkhas pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis rlabs kyis blang ba dang ldan/ dus
350a7(phal chen): gsum gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor du yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kyi byin gyis brlabs la mkhas pa dang ldan/ sems can thams cad kyi gtso bo 'das
350a8(phal chen): pa ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ ye shes byin gyis brlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yid kyi smon lam dang ye shes lam 'byam klas pas
350b1(phal chen): dab pa'i chos kyis yongs su 'dzin to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis byang chub sems dpa' rims kyi yang dag par 'byung ba'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u yang dag par
350b2(phal chen): bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bsod nams tshogs bsags byang chub sems la gnas pa rnams/ rtag tu
350b3(phal chen): bag yod blo brtan mthu chen bdog pa dang / dran dang ldan zhing byang chub sems rab mi stong pas/ phyogs rnams bcu po bde gshegs rnams ni mnyes par byed/ brtson 'grus brtsam pa
350b4(phal chen): dran ldan mos pa brtan pa can/ 'jig rten kun las rtag tu mi gnas mi ldog pa/ zad pa'i chos zhugs mya ngan med pa'i tshul mkhas rnams// phyogs rnams bcu por bde gshegs
350b5(phal chen): rnams kyi mnyes par byed/ brtson 'grus brtsam pas bde gshegs mnyes par byas nas kyang / dus gsum bsod nams tshogs dang ye shes ldan pa rnams/ sa rnams gdon byed
350b6(phal chen): spyod mchog nyams pa med par byas/ thub pa'i smon lam rdzogs byed ston pa 'ang de bzhin byed// ye shes cig la zhugs pa de dag thos bya ba// thob nas 'gro ba kun la sbyin pa rab stong
350b7(phal chen): bya bas// bsam pa dag dang khams dang spyod po shes byas nas// dbang po ci gzhin mkhas pa de ltar chos kyang sten// pha rol phyin la brtson pa mthu chen ldan pa rnams// 'gro ba rnams
350b8(phal chen): la chos gton bdag gi don mi gtong // pha rol byin rdzogs grol ba mthu chen ldan pa rnams// khyu mchog chu'i 'khor ba'i mtsho las sems can sgrol// de ltar nyin mtshan skyo ba med par
351a1(phal chen): brtson byed cing // drang song rgyal ba chos rigs mi bcad zhugs pa yis// dkar po'i spyod pa gang yang rung ste spyad pa rnams// thams cad don yod rgyal ba rnams kyi sar
351a2(phal chen): 'gro'o// de ltar gis ci'i spyod pa thams cad 'gro ba rnams la yangs rnam smin don yod nyon mongs dri ma sbyong bar 'gyur// 'di 'dra'i chos ldan de dag mun pa bsal byas shing //
351a3(phal chen): bdud 'khrugs 'khor lo pham byas byang chub thob par byed/ de dag brtson zhing ye shes thob pa'i bde gshegs rnams kyis chos rab mdzad kyang rab tu ston// de dag chos smra'i bya ba
351a4(phal chen): kun kyang shin du byed// bdud rtsi'i mchog zhim sprin gyis char yang mngon par 'bebs/ de dag snying rje'i byams pas 'gro kun bzang zhing / brtan pa de rnams kyis bsam pa shes byas
351a5(phal chen): nas/ gang gis bsam pa blo gros sems rgyud ci 'dra ba/ de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos ni stong phrag du ma ston/ glang po'i stabs sdug tshul bzang 'gro ba'i rnams/ seng ge'i rtsal ltar rtag tu
351a6(phal chen): sus kyang mi thub cing / ye shes rgya mtsho lta bu'i ri rab zhig gnas pa/ sprin ltar 'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs zhi bar byed/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyis blo gros kyis de skad ces
351a7(phal chen): smras pa dang / de la ston pa rjes su dges par mdzad do// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ chos snang ba zhes bya ba ste le'u nyi shu gsum pa'o//
351a8(phal chen): / de nas sangs rgyas kyis mthus/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyis khams thams cad dang / gzhung de bzhin du
351b1(phal chen): steng gis phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gyi bar thams cad na gling bzhi pa 'di la sogs pa'i gling bzhi pa re re na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mang po bzhugs pa snang ngo // byang chub sems
351b2(phal chen): dpa' de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi chos ston to// bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung na 'khod pa shes so// bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon
351b3(phal chen): par 'du mdzad pa ma shig ma btang bar/ byang chub kyis shing drung yang ma spang par/ ri rab kyi rtse mo nas 'tshe ma'i gnas kyi lha'i bu rab mtshe ma'i khang pa nor bu sna tshogs gang na bde
351b4(phal chen): gshegs par snang ngo // ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'di na bcom ldan 'das rab 'tshe ma'i gnas su gshegs par snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas yang rab 'tsha
351b5(phal chen): ma'i gnas su gshegs par snang ste/ byin gyis rlabs snga ma rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs par snang ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po rab 'tshe mas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas khang
351b6(phal chen): ba nor bu sna tshogs log su mngon par shes pa mthong nas/ rings pa'i gzugs su khang pa nor bu sna tshogs kyi nang du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan rdzu 'phrul gyis grub pa'i seng
351b7(phal chen): ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can lnga rdzas kyi rim po che las byas pa/ bog re brgya stong phrag bcu'i brgyan pa/ gser gyi dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas mngon par bris pa/ me tog
351b8(phal chen): gi bla re brgya stong phra bcus kun nas khyab par byas pa/ phreng ba'i bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun du rgyus pa// spos kyi bla re brgya stong phrag bcus spos thams cad kun du thul bar
352a1(phal chen): @#bdug pa/ rin po ches bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu thos pa/ me tog gi gdugs brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bzung ba/ zang ba'i gdug brgya stong phrag
352a2(phal chen): bcus kun nas bzung ba/ rin po che'i gdugs brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bzung ba/ 'od zer brgya stong phrag bcus snang bar byas pa/ rab 'tshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po brgya stong phrag
352a3(phal chen): bcus rab tu bdud pa/ tshangs pa brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par phyag bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par bstod pa/ rol mo'i bdud pa brgya stong phrag bcus
352a4(phal chen): sgra sgyur byung ba/ chos kyi klu'i dbyangs brgya stong phrag bcus klu'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/ me tog gi sprin brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par phab pa/ phreng ba'i sprin gyis char brgya stong phrag
352a5(phal chen): bcu phab du bab pa/ rgyan gyi sprin char phab pa brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu phab pa/ gos kyis sprin gyis char bstong phrag bcu rab tu phab pa/ kun nas g.yog pa nor bu rin po che'i sprin
352a6(phal chen): brgya stong phrag bcu'i char rab tu phab pas kun tu snang bar byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas byung ba/ sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag bcus byin gyis rlabs pa/
352a7(phal chen): bson rnams brgya stong phrag bcus bsngags shing sgrub pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa brgya stong phrag bcus shin du sbyangs pa/ smon lam brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par dag par byas pa
352a8(phal chen): spyod pa brgyad stong phrag bcus kun nas bslang ba/ chos brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bslang ba/ chos brgya stong phrag bcu stobs rab tu brtan pa/ rnam par 'phrul pa brgya stong phrag bcu dang /
352b1(phal chen): ldan pa dang / yon tan brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu 'phags pa/ brjod pa brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu brjod par bshams so// ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'dir rab tshe ma'i gnas kyis
352b2(phal chen): lha'i rgyal po rab 'tshe ma'i khang pa nor bu sna tshogs su de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan snying pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyis khams thams cad gling bzhi pa dag gis rab 'tshe ma'i
352b3(phal chen): gnas su khang pa nor bu sna tshog su lha'i rgyal po rab tshe ma rnams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan rgyan pa'i 'dra ba dang / bshams pa'i tshul 'di 'dra ba bdag kyang bting bar 'gyuraro//
352b4(phal chen): de nas lha'i dbang po rab che ma'i bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan sting nas/ zhe sa dang rims gror bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan
352b5(phal chen): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa gshegs su gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
352b6(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs sam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po rab 'tshe mas spyan drangs pa bzhin du/ khang pa nor bu sna tshogs su gshegs ji ltar
352b7(phal chen): gling bzhi pa 'dir/ rab tshe ma'i gnas su lha'i rgyal po rab che ma'i khang pa nor bu sna tshogs su gshegs pa de bzhin du 'jigs rten gyi khams thams cad du'ang rab tshe ma'i gnas kyi
352b8(phal chen): khang pa nor bu sna tshogs su gshegs par snang ngo // de nas lha'i rgyal po rab tshems/ lha'i dbang po'i gnas thams cad du sgra grag so// lha'i dbang po rab chems bcom ldan 'das la
353a1(phal chen): gsol ba btabs so// de nas lha'i dbang po rab tshems/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dge
353a2(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bskyed pa de rjes su dran pas/ sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// sangs rgyas
353a3(phal chen): grags pa'i dam par mtshan btags mtshan gsol pa/ nor bu gtsug tu gshegs pa ltar/ des ni 'dir yangs bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ 'jig
353a4(phal chen): rten sgron ma blo'i mtshan btags pa// sbyang ba'i lam du zhugs pa ltar// de ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// sgrib med gzigs pa 'dzum
353a5(phal chen): pa'i spyan du mtshan btags pa// rgyan cig ldan pa gshegs pa ltar// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// 'jig rten sgron ma mar me mdzad
353a6(phal chen): ces mtshan btags pa// rnam par rgyal bas gshegs pa ltar// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchos gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// bde gshegs yang dag don gzig
353a7(phal chen): pa zhes mtshan btags pa// dri med rtse mor phyin pa ltar// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// de bzhin gshegs pa rang 'byung mchog
353a8(phal chen): ces mtshan btags pa/ rin chen spos su gshegs pa ltar// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// 'jig rten sgron ma dbyings kyi zhes mtshan
353b1(phal chen): btags pa// dri med sna tshogs shes pa ltar// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// 'gro ba med pa smra ba'i stags ces mtshan
353b2(phal chen): btags pa// thams cad tshul du gshegs pa ltar// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// yon tan kun mnga' dpal gyis rgyan par
353b3(phal chen): mtshan btags pa// dga' ba'i rgyan du gshegs pa ltar// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// 'jig rten phan brtson bka' thub
353b4(phal chen): drag por mtshan btags pa// kun nas mngon du gshegs pa ltar// der ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ ji ltar lha'i rgyal po rab 'tshems/ sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis
353b5(phal chen): rlabs kyis sngon gyis rgyal ba gshegs pa brjod de// mngon par stong pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyis khams thams cad kyi rgyal po rab tshe ma snam kyang / sangs rgyas kyis byin
353b6(phal chen): gyis rlabs kyis mngon gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gshegs par brjod des/ klu'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad des mngon par stod des/ de nas bcom ldan
353b7(phal chen): 'das khang pa nor bu sna tshogs su gshegs nas gdan snying pa la dkyil mo dgrangs bcas te bzhugs so// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhugs de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyis
353b8(phal chen): khams thams cad du gdan sting pa de dag la bzhugs par snang ngo // bcom ldan 'das zhugs ma thag tu// khang pa nor bu sna tshogs de 'di lta ste/ dper na rab tshe ma'i lha'i
354a1(phal chen): @#/ rigs thams cad tsam du che rab gyur pa snang ste 'di ni ji lta ba bzhin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na'ang de bzhin no// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas
354a2(phal chen): phal po che zhes bya ba las/ rab tshe ma'i gnas na rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ nyi shu bzhi pa'o// // de nas sangs rgyas kyis mthus/ phyogs bcu nas
354a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' mang por lhag par gyur ste/ byang chub sems dpa' re re'i zhing yang / 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong gis rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan cig 'ongs pa ste/
354a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' re re'i zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed pa dang lhan cig tu phyin to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang
354a5(phal chen): ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar yon tan dang ldan pa dang / blo gros dang ldan pa dang / dpal ldan dang ldan pa dang / khrel dang ldan pa dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / stobs
354a6(phal chen): dang ldan pa dang / rigs pa dang ldan pa dang / blo dang ldan pa dang / ye shes dang ldan pa sha stag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes
354a7(phal chen): bya ba dag nas/ 'ongs pa ste/ 'di ltar snyan pa dang ldan pa dang / me tog dang ldan pa dang / nor dang ldan pa dang / dpal dang ldan pa dang / sgron ma dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje dang ldan pa dang /
354a8(phal chen): bde ba dang ldan pa dang / nyi ma dang ldan pa dang / dge ba dang ldan pa dang / tshangs pa dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di
354b1(phal chen): zhes bya ba dag gis zham ring na tshangs par spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar snyam pa med pa'i spyan dang / gzhan ma yin pa'i spyan dang / mi g.yo ba'i spyan dang / mi spyod pa'i spyan dang / chu'i spyan
354b2(phal chen): dang / bcings pa med pa'i spyan dang / kun tu spyod pa'i spyan dang / 'od kyis spyan dang bya'i spyan dang / mthon thing gis spyan rnam par dag go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag
354b3(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ sangs rgyas kyis mthus phyogs bcur rgyas par byas ste/ gang nas 'od phyogs su brtan nas/ seng ge'i khri rin po che'i snying po can dag
354b4(phal chen): bshams ste/ dkyil mo dkrungs bcas te 'khod do// 'di ltar gling bzhi pa 'di rab tshe ma'i gnas su byang chub sems dpa' 'ongs par gyur pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams
354b5(phal chen): thams cad kyis gling bzhi pa kun yang / rab tshe ma'i gnas kyis khang pa nor bu sna tshogs su yang lhags par gyur ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang de skad ces sha stag/ de
354b6(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan kyang de skad ces bya ba'i zham ring na tshangs par spyod pa sha stag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi bol gnyis nas 'od zer bye ba brgya stong
354b7(phal chen): skye ste/ phyogs bcu thams cad snang bar byas ste/ 'jig rten gyis khams thams cad rten ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'jig rten gyis khams thams cad kyis
354b8(phal chen): gleng bzhi pa kun gyi rab che ma'i gnas thams cad na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yod par mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan ldan pas/ sangs
355a1(phal chen): @#/ rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas 'od zer 'od snang bas// phyogs rnams thams cad
355a2(phal chen): rnam par snang // des ni rab tu snang byas pas// mig la rab rib gang yang med// tshe ma rab kyis gnas 'di na// gang zag dam pa sangs rgyas bzhugs// de bzhin kun na'ang
355a3(phal chen): gsal bar snang // de ni 'jig rten ngo mtshar to// sems can gtso bo bcu yi rnams// gshegs par gyur pas mngon par bstod// de dag 'khor kyang ci 'dra ba// de bzhin
355a4(phal chen): kun 'ang rab tu snang // phyogs rnam bcu po thams cad na// chos kyis dam pa rab tu ston// de kun gyis ni ming yang ste// bdag cag rnams kyi kun brjod zhing // 'jig rten khams
355a5(phal chen): kyi ming dag kyang // de zhes bya ba kun nas 'ong // gang zag rnam pa de dag gis// tshangs pa'i spyod pa'ang de ni spyod// bdag cag rnams la gang rtags pa// kun gyis ming yang de dang
355a6(phal chen): 'thun// sangs rgyas zhing rnams phun ldan pa// de dag sangs rgyas rnam sprul pa'o// mi'i 'jig rten kun na'ang // 'di na rgyal ba bzhugs par shes// gzhan gyis de'i rgyal po yi//
355a7(phal chen): gnas na de bzhin bzhugs par snang // 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad na// gang zag dam pa de bzhugs kyang // rgyal ba tshe mar rab gnas na// bzhugs par bdag cag kun
355a8(phal chen): kyang sem// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad na// sangs rgyas gzi brjid bsam mi khyab// de dag smon lam bskul ba'i phyir// 'jig rten khams su rab tu bkye// sems can
355b1(phal chen): gtso bo rnams 'phrul pa// de dag de rnams kun gyis mthong // sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas ste// 'jig rten zang zing thub pas gsungs// phyogs rnams thams cad kun tu
355b2(phal chen): rgya// chags pa med pa nam mkha' bzhin// de ni cig las shin du 'das// mang po dag tu mi dmigs so// mtha' yas legs mnga' sangs rgyas rnams// de dag shes par
355b3(phal chen): ji lta bur// gnas pa med cing len pa med// chos dbyings rtogs par thugasu chud// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros dang ldan pas// sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis rlabs kyi
355b4(phal chen): phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'jig rten mgon po 'phrul chen rnams// rdul med gang zag dam pa dag/ 'dus shing tshogs
355b5(phal chen): pa bsam yas pa'i// bskal pa dag tu shin tu rkon// de dag thams cad kun gshegs pa// sems can gtso bo 'od mdzad de// srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir// sems
355b6(phal chen): can rnams kun la phan to// 'jig rten mun nag 'di dag tu// 'jig rten mgon 'byung gyur pa// 'jig rten sgron ma de dag ni// lta bar shin tu rga ba yin// sbyin pa tshul khrims
355b7(phal chen): bzod pa'i bar// brtson 'grus bsam gtan sgom pa dang // shes rab sngan chad spyad pas na// 'gro la thams cad snang bar mdzad// sangs rgyas 'dra ba gang yang med// chos
355b8(phal chen): rnams yod pa ma yin pas// sangs rgyas ye shes chen po rnams// mtshan gyis tshogs ni bsam mi khyab// sku'i tshogs kyis shin tu pags// chos rnams kun gyi yang dag
356a1(phal chen): @#byung // 'jig rten grangs chen chen po rnams// dpa' bo chen po de dag snang // de dag mtshan tsam thos pas kyang // ngan song thams cad spang bar 'gyuraro// skal
356a2(phal chen): pa rnams spyod med pas// byang chub don du 'khor byas kyang // 'di'i tshul ni mi shes na// byang chub don du zhugs pa min// sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa// bskal pa bye
356a3(phal chen): bskur byed pa// gang gis tshul 'dis bsam pa gnyis// 'di ni de las khyad du 'phags// gang gis brjod yas zhing gi rnams// rin chen gang gis thob gsol kyang //
356a4(phal chen): 'di'i tshul ni mi shes sam// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dang ring // de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal dang ldan pas// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis// phyogs
356a5(phal chen): bcur rnam par ltas ste/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// nam mkha' dri ma med pa la// nyi ma'i 'od zer mtha' yas pa// sgyid kyi zla ba thams cad la// phyog
356a6(phal chen): bcu dag tu rab tu snang // de'i tshe smig rgyu ci 'dra ba// de dag bgrang bar mi nus te// mig chen rnams kyang de la rmongs// long ba rnams kyis spyod yul min// de bzhin sems
356a7(phal chen): can gtso bo yi// yon tan mtha' dang dpung med pa// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par// sus kyang shes par mi nus so// de dag nas ni blang ba med// de bzhin sus kyang byas pa/
356a8(phal chen): med// de ni ci nas skyes pa med// rnam par sgom na yod pa min// 'ongs pa med pa'i chos rnams la// 'gro ba de bzhin mi dmigs ste// de phyir de dag rgyu yang med// de bzhin 'jigs
356b1(phal chen): pa'ang yod pa yin// 'jigs med pa'i chos rnams kyis// rang bzhin gang gis shes pa ni// gang la skye ba med pa'i// yang dag sangs rgyas mthong ba min// skyes pa med pa'i chos
356b2(phal chen): rnams kyis// rang bzhin dngos po mi dmigs ste// de 'dri'i don du shes pa ni// dmigs pa med pa'i shes pa yin// 'di la shes byed gang yang med// chos rnams thams cad mtshan
356b3(phal chen): nyid med// chos nyid 'di ni shes gyur na// yongs su shes pa gang yang med// skye ba bdag ni brjod pa ste// de phyir zhing rnams rab tu brjod// zhing gis rang bzhin shes gyur na/
356b4(phal chen): 'khrul pa med pa rab tu shes// gang tshe 'jig rten zhing yin pas// tshul bzhin du ni rtog byed na// de tshe thams cad don bstan pa// byang chub sems dpa' rab tu shes// de nas
356b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyis mthus phyogs bcu rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gnas 'di shin tu rgya che ba/
356b6(phal chen): chos kyis dbyings kyis klas pa yin// rtag tu kun du song ba ste// yid du 'ong zhing gnas kyang med// de la yang dag rtag bcas ste// rim gro yod par dang bcas na// sdug bsngal
356b7(phal chen): rnams yang mi mthong ste// ngan song rnams kyang mi mthong ngo // tshad med de bzhin grangs med pa'i// 'jig rten khams su su 'gro ba// gang rnams 'di na snang ba yi// sangs rgyas
356b8(phal chen): byin rlabs thos par gyur// drang srong chen po'i byin gyis rlobs// gang gis thos par gyur nas kyang // 'di 'dra sangs rgyas chos su shes// rtog med blo med byang chub po// gang rnam
357a1(phal chen): 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// chos nyid la ni yid ches pa// de kun 'jig rten sgron ma ste// rkang gnyis ldan pa'i dam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa 'dri/
357a2(phal chen): la la zhig gis thos gyur cig/ thos nas dad par byas gyur na// de dag mi'i dam par 'gyur// brtan par gang rnams da ltar yang // sangs rgyas chos la dad byed pa// de dag don gzig
357a3(phal chen): mi 'jigs pa'i// de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa yin// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par// 'di 'dra'i thos pa shin du skon// smon lam dbang ni ma togs par// blo gros 'di 'drar
357a4(phal chen): 'gyur ba min// sangs rgyas dam chos 'di las kyang // legs par bshad pa bzung byas shing // gzhan la gton pa su byed pa// de dag bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur// de las brtson
357a5(phal chen): 'grus bskyed byas shing // yid la go cha bgos byas ste// gang las sangs rgyas brjod pa yi// shes pa 'di 'dra mnyan par bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' khrel dang ldan pa sangs
357a6(phal chen): rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis// phyogs bcu rnam par ltas ste/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa de smras pa/ gang zhig thos nas 'di 'dra ba// dgo' ba yangs pa skye 'dra ba// the tshom
357a7(phal chen): rnam par bcad pa ni// 'jig rten na ni ngo mtshar ne// de ltar thams cad gzigs pa rnams// nyid kyis 'gro na bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas mi mkhyen gang yang med// de ltar
357a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// mi shes pa yi rgyud las ni// ye shes 'jug par mi 'gyur ste// mun pa'i mthu dang snang ba gnyis// lhan cig 'byung bar mi 'gyur rten// ji
357b1(phal chen): ltar gzugs dang gzugs med pa// bskal pa mnyam par med par bshad// de ltar shes dang mi shes pa// 'grogs par shin du mi 'gyur ro// 'khor dang mya ngan
357b2(phal chen): 'das pa dang // ji ltar med las rtags pa ltar// de bzhin shes dang mi shes pa// mtshan nyid bzhin du dmigs pa med// ji ltar 'jig rten 'jigs pa dang // 'du
357b3(phal chen): bar gyur pa ring ba med// phan tshun 'grogs par mi 'gyur ba// shes dang mi shes de bzhin no// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' yi// thog ma'i sems dang tha ma'i sems/
357b4(phal chen): lhan cig mi gnas 'byung ba ltar// shes dang mi shes de bzhin no// ji ltar lus dang rnam shes pa// gzhan dang gzhan las 'byung 'gyur ba// de bzhin gshes dang mi
357b5(phal chen): shes gnyis// 'grogs par 'gyur ba nam yang med// ci ltar bdug la phan pa'i rtse// phral du dag ni dag min byed// de ltar shes pa mi shes pa// shin du sel bar med par
357b6(phal chen): mdzod// sangs rgyas bla na gang yang med// de dang 'dra ba yod pa min// de las bzhin du 'byung ba med// de bas rgyal ba shin du dkon// de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson
357b7(phal chen): 'gras dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par ltos ste/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras pa/ chos rnams 'di dga'agal med par// mkhyen nas sangs rgyas thugs su chud /
357b8(phal chen): de ni mi mkhyen gang yang med// ye shes kyi 'ang pha rol phyin// ji ltar gser dang sa le sbram// ngo bo nyid kyis mga' ba byed// de ltar chos min de bzhin chos// de dag thams cad mtshan nyid cig
358a1(phal chen): @/ sems can sems pan ma yin pa// ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin med// bdag su med las byung ba ltar// chos rnams rang bzhin de bzhin no// sa 'ongs dus ni ci bur// 'das
358a2(phal chen): pas brjod par bya ba ste// de bzhin chos la mtshan nyid med// rang bzhin med dang rang bzhin dag/ rnam pa ba dang gyur pa ltar// sangs rgyas rang bzhin de bzhin no// mya ngan 'das pa bzung med pa//
358a3(phal chen): gnyis kyi dus na brjod par byed// de la bye brag gang yang med// de bzhin gzugs rnam rtog pa'o// ci ltar ci grangs byas pa shing // bgrang bar byed ces brjod pa yang // de la ba dang gang yang med/
358a4(phal chen): de bzhin gzugs kyi rang bzhin no// ci ltar ciganas gcig gi zer// mang po'i tshul du 'grang ba yis// dngos po brang med 'byung ba yang // blo'i rnam pa pa dang brtan// 'jig rten khams rnams
358a5(phal chen): la 'dag/ bsam gyi mi khyab tshig gyur kyang // namakha' 'jigs pa 'gyur ba med// rang byung ye shes de bzhin no// de ltar 'jig rten phyogs bcu mi// namakha' so sor dgas pa zlum/ de banin
358a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnam mthong ste// sangs rgyas rnams la rtog mi mnga'// de nas byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang ldan pas// sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te// de'i tshe tshig su bcad
358a7(phal chen): de smras pa// de ltar dus rnam gsum po yi// sems can khams rnams brjod par 'gyur// sems can de dag thams cad kyang // phung po lnga las shin du brjod// de rnams las ni phung byed yin//
358a8(phal chen): las kyi che ba'ang sems yin te// sems ni sbrum bzhin du bgad// skum bcud 'gro 'dis 'o// gan 'jig rten 'di 'byung zhing // mang na thog par gyur ba ni/ 'jig rten 'dzi rten mi byeng deg/
358b1(phal chen): gzhan gyis rgyus kyang byas pa min// 'jig rten 'din 'byung ba 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di yang ldog par 'gyur// 'byung zhes brjod par mi byas ste// 'di ni 'jig rten shes pa yin// gang la 'jig
358b2(phal chen): rten snang ba zhes// 'du shes rnam par rtags pa yi// 'jig rten zhes bya gang zhig yin// gang ba zhes bya ba'ang ci zhig yin// dus gsum dag tu rgyu ba yin// phung po 'di ni 'jig rten yin//
358b3(phal chen): de dag mgog pa snang ba zhes// 'gro ba dag tu 'du shes gyur// phung po zhes bya ba 'di ni ci// phung po'i rang bzhin ci lta bu// phung po rnams ni mi 'jigs phyir// dngos po med ces rab tu brjod//
358b4(phal chen): phung po 'di dag rnam dag ston// de dag rang bzhin stong pa yis// mi 'jigs don ni stong pa ste// dngos po med ces bya ba'o// 'jig rten ci bzhin sangs rgyas ste// sangs rgyas chos kyang de bzhin no//
358b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas chos dang sangs rgyas rnams// ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin ming // ma nor yang dag ji bzhin pa'i// chos nyid 'di ni shes gyur nas// kun gzigs thams cad mkhyen pa'i// sangs rgyas kun
358b6(phal chen): ni rab tu snang // de nas byang chub sems dpa' rig pa dang ldan pas// sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par sbas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras te// rang bzhin dngos po med
358b7(phal chen): pa yis// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad kyis// sa'i khams rnams thams cad ci bzhin ste// sangs rgyas rnam phul ngo mtshar che// de'i rang bzhin 'di yin la// brjod cing sngags pa mtha' yas ste//
358b8(phal chen): 'das pa'i 'jig rten khams rnams su// su kyang brjod par ma yin no// gzhan du sems can las kyin// shin du brtan pa brjod pa ste// sems can rnams ni ma rtogs par// las zhes bya ba de
359a1(phal chen): @#/ ci mi dmigs// de bzhin stong pa'i las kyis kyang // brjod pa rnams ni chad med pas// sems can kun mi lus su 'gyur// de la'ong ba gang yang med// ji ltar
359a2(phal chen): mkha' 'dog dbyib kyi rnams// las kyi rgyud ni bsam mi khyab// snang yang de dag de na med// rnam par rig pa'i dngos nyid 'dra// de bzhin sems can gtso bo'i// sku ni bsam gyis
359a3(phal chen): mi khyab pa// brjod pa rnams kyang tshad med pa// shing rnams kun na rab tu snang // sku ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas min// sangs rgyas rnams la sku mi mngab// dpa' bo chen po chos
359a4(phal chen): sku ste/ chos kun rtogs par thugs su chung // gang gis rang 'byung rnams kyis sku// yang dag ci bzhin mthong ba ni// sangs rgyas chos ni rnams kun dang // chos rnams la yang
359a5(phal chen): rmongs pa med// 'das par gyur pa'i chos rnams kun// mya ngan 'das par shes gyur na// de dag shin tu mi gnas pa'i// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba yin// yang dag
359a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas sus mamang ga// dran pa zhin du sgor byas ste/ nas pa dang med pa'i rnams// de dag cis kyis rgyal po mas// den byung semam dpa'abrod ba nas
359a7(phal chen): sa sa rgyas kyi mthus phyogs baDUr ma par sa te// de'i ri tshigs su bcad de smras pa// dza~M mo'i rnam pa ga/ rnams pa tshogs kun 'dug/ kun kyang 'byung
359a8(phal chen): chen por snyam// sems kyi yongs su rtags pa yin/ khams latshon gyi de dag med// tshon cil yang khams med de// khams rnams ma rtogs gzhan rnams yang /
359b1(phal chen): tshon ces bya ba gang yang med// sems la ri mo de med na// ri mo la ni sems med do// sems de ma rtogs gzhan du yang // ri mo gang yang mi dmigs so// sems de dag pa ma yin
359b2(phal chen): pa bsam gyi mi khyab tshad med cing // phan tshun shes pa med pa'i// gzugs rnams thams cad ston par byed// sems ni gang gis ri mo de// bris pa'i sems kyang
359b3(phal chen): mi shes pa// de bzhin chos kyi rang bzhin no// sems ni ri mo mkhan dang 'dra// sems ni phung po byed pa ste// 'jig rten khams ni ji snyed pa// 'jig rten 'di dag sems
359b4(phal chen): kyi bros// sems dang 'dra bas sangs rgyas te// sangs rgyas ji bzhin 'gro 'o// sems dang sangs rgyas dag la yang // ngo bo nyid kyi bad pa med// sems kyi rgyud rnams ci 'drag/
359b5(phal chen): de dag sangs rgyas rab tu mkhyen// de phyir sangs rgyas rang bzhin gyis// bgro ba sna tshogs gyur pa snang // las kyi rnams la sems med de// sems la'ang lus rnams mod pa min//
359b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas mdzad pa'ang rab tu byed// de ltar spyod pa ngo mtshar che// gang zhig dus gsum thams cad kyis// rgyal ba thams cad shes 'dod na// sangs rgyas thams
359b7(phal chen): cad sems kyis dngos// chos kyis dbyings su lta bar gyis// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu rnam par ltas te/
359b8(phal chen): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa// bzung du med la 'dzin ces bya// snang ba med la snang ste// mnyan du med la mnyan par byed// sems med pa ni sems dang ldan/
360a1(phal chen): tshad med pa la tshad ma yin// gang zhig 'dzin par mi 'dod pa// de ni tshad med chad pa yis// nam yang 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro//
360a2(phal chen): brjod du med par smra byed pa/ bdag la shin du slu ba ste// de'i don kyang rdzogs mi byed// srog chags kun kyang tshim mi 'gyur// de bzhin mtha' yas brjod ldan
360a3(phal chen): pa yi// brjod pa gang zhig sgra 'dod pa// bskal pa grangs med zad byas kyang // rang 'byung rnams ni brjod mi zad// yid bzhin nor bu dag pa ni/
360a4(phal chen): kha dog kun du rab tu snang // de la kha dog yod pa min// sangs rgyas yon tan de bzhin no// ci ltar na mkha' dri med cing // gzugs med rten du med yin
360a5(phal chen): kyang // gzugs rnams thams cad ston par byed// namakha' snang ba gang yang med// de bzhin thams cad gzigs pa'i rnams// yon tan kun kyang ldan
360a6(phal chen): ston kyang // de ni sus kyang mthong ba med// sems la'ang de ni mi dmigs so// sangs rgyas sgra ni grags mod kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa sgra ma yin// sman
360a7(phal chen): ma rtogs gzhan du yang // sangs rgyas shes par mi rung ngo // ji ltar bdag gis mthong tshul du// de ni shes bya'i gnas ma yin// sangs rgyas byang chub blang du med// de la rnam
360a8(phal chen): par rtogs pa med// sangs rgyas chos rnams gang dag kyang // su la'ang sangs rgyas gsung ba'ang med// sems can bsam pa ci bzhin du// de la de 'dra'i ston pa mdzad/
360b1(phal chen): shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las rab tu tshe ma'i gnas su byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pas tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste
360b2(phal chen): nyi shu lnga pa'o// / sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las// / bam po nyi shu drug pa'o// /
360b3(phal chen): de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyis mthus byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par phye ba'i rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba
360b4(phal chen): la mnyam par gzhag par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bye ba rna
360b5(phal chen): par 'byed pa de la mnyam par gzhag par ba zag tu/ du de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i re reng yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing / stong phrag bcu'i rdu
360b6(phal chen): shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yon tan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba// sangs rgyas kyis zhing stong phrang bcu'i rdul shin
360b7(phal chen): du phra ba snyed kyis zhal brtan pa mthong ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yon tan dang ldan pa de ltar khyod/
360b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin du rnam par phye ba'i rnam par 'byed pa la mnyam par gzhag pa la legs so legs so// rigs kyis bus
361a1(phal chen): @#khyod la ni de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdus shin tu phra brnyed thams cad kyang mtshan 'thun pa sha stag gis 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
361a2(phal chen): gagags pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis sngon rgyal sngon lam kyis dang / sngon gyis byin gyil na dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa bshin tu brtan pa
361a3(phal chen): na 'di ltar chos bstan pa dang / sang+yas kyi ye shes rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug par bya ba dang / sems
361a4(phal chen): can gyi khams la rnam par bsgom pa dang / chags med pa la 'jug par bya ba dang / sgrib pa med pa'i spyod yul dang / kun nas rab tu sbyor ba dang /
361a5(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa'i rab tu sgrub pa dang / chos brtan pa thams cad khong du chud pa dang / dbang po thams cad yong su shes par bya ba dang / chos thams cad
361a6(phal chen): yongasu bzung bar bya ba dang / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bcu brtsam pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad kyi/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sangs rgyu
361a7(phal chen): kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ chos 'di brtan pa la spong par bgyi zhig/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa'
361a8(phal chen): yon tan dang ldan pa la chags pa med pa nye bar bsgrubs pa mdzad do// sgrib pa med pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// byin gyis brlang pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do//
361b1(phal chen): slob dpon med pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// rmongs pa med pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// tha dad pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// kha na mthong
361b2(phal chen): med pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// tshad med pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// zil gyi non pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// zhum pa med pa nyid nye bar
361b3(phal chen): bsgrub pa mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ti nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyag bas parkyang ste
361b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang ldan pa'i mgo la byung ba mdzad do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi de ltar reg ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' yon
361b5(phal chen): tan dang ldan pa/ ting nge 'dzin de las langs te byang chub sems dpa' rnams la smras pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa'i las ni bsam gyis mi
361b6(phal chen): khyab pa/ de ni 'di ltar chos kyis dbyings kyis bkrus so// na mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas thugs go// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang
361b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis spyod pa la'ang slob bo// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
361b8(phal chen): spyod pa la slob bo// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod pa la'ang slob bo// kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spyad
362a1(phal chen): pa gang la bsam ste/ de skad du smras pa/ de dag gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa/ sangs rgyas
362a2(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsung ba dang / gsung ba dang gsung bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste dga' bar byed pa
362a3(phal chen): zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod ba dang po dang / bde ba skyed pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gnyis pa dang / mi mthun pa zhes bya ba byang chub
362a4(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa gsum pa dang / mi zad pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i spong ba bzhi pa dang / rmongs pa med pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lnga pa
362a5(phal chen): dang / lta ba bzang po zhe bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa drug pa dang / gnas med pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bdun pa dang / thub par
362a6(phal chen): dga' ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brgyad pa dang / chos bzang po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dgu pa dang / bden pa dang ldan/
362a7(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sbyod ba bcu dag te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa/ sangs rgyas
362a8(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsung pa dang / gsung pa dang / gsung bar 'gyur ba'o//
362b1(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang po dga' bar byed pa/ zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la byang chub sems
362b2(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sngon gyi spyod pa rjesu slob cing rjes su dran par bya'o// yid zhum pa med pa dang /
362b3(phal chen): yid dang bas kun du 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongasasu bzung ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa dang / rjes su rgya che bar byed cing / sdug bsngal ba
362b4(phal chen): sems can dag par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la/ bdog pa thams cad yongasu stong pa dang / 'gyod pa med pa'i sems kyi sbyor ba dang /
362b5(phal chen): rnam par smin pa la ye snga ma med pa dang / grags pa 'dod pa med pa dang / gnyen 'dod pa med pa dang / khyed 'dod pa med pa dang / gzhan rje su bzung
362b6(phal chen): ba dang / pha rol la phan bdag pa dang / sems can thams cad pan bdag pa'i sems kyis/ sbyin pa'i bdag po sbyin pa byed pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
362b7(phal chen): dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang po'o// spyod pa de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong ba yin te/ de ni sems
362b8(phal chen): can dbul ba gang dag gang na yod pa de dang der smon les kyi dbang gi rab tu skyes te/ lus nas kyang bad mi shes pa'i longs spyong dang ldan zhing zhin
363a1(phal chen): du phyug pa yin te/ de la gal te dus cig tu spong ba'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa zhig 'ongs te/ 'di skad du kye shes par gyis shig/
363a2(phal chen): bdag cag thams cad ni bkres par mchi'o// gal te bdag cag gis khyod kyis sha zos na ni 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// zhes tshig tu smras par gyur kyang /
363a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin phun sum tshogs pa rgyas 'di lta bu dang ldan te/ slong ba'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa de rnyed cig nye bar lhags
363a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' la de'i phyir sems bskyed pa cig kyang zhum pa'i bsam par mi 'gyur gyis// sems can de dag thams cad snying rje chen po rab tu skyes
363a5(phal chen): te/ gzhan mang po zhig 'ongs kyang de bas kyang ches dga' ba dang / spro ba 'byung zhing bdag gis gsol ba ma btabs par sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang
363a6(phal chen): dag par stobs pa'i dge ba'i bshes snyen sdug bsngal zhing / slong ba'i sbyin pa'i gan su 'gyur ba 'di lta bu dag 'grogs par gyur pa
363a7(phal chen): ni bdag gis thos pa legs par thob des/ ci nas kyang sems can dag yid kyang mi snyoms par bya ba de ltar bdag gis bya'o// bdag gi dge
363a8(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba ci byed par 'gyur ba des ci tsam gyis/ sems can dag thams cad 'drangs shing dus byed par 'gyur ba de tsam du che ba'i lus su gyur cig/
363b1(phal chen): sems can de dag 'drangs shing tshim par gyur gyi bar du bcad cing skyabs mi zad pa de tsam gyis lus su gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des kyang bla na med pa
363b2(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bsgrub ste/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das par bya'o// /
363b3(phal chen): rnam grangs 'di bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis/ sems can de dag thams cad las 'di 'dra ba dang ldan par gyur te/
363b4(phal chen): de dag thams cad kyang bdag gis sha zos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par sgrub te/ sangs rgyas kyis chos
363b5(phal chen): thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ye shes kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byas nas/ phung po lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las
363b6(phal chen): 'da' bar gyur cig/ bdag nyid kyang sems can gyi bsam pa yongasasu rdzogs par ma byas kyis/ bdag tu 'du shes pa'i/ sems can bu 'du shes pa 'am/ srid pa
363b7(phal chen): 'du shes pa 'am/ srog tu 'du shes pa 'am/ so so kye bor 'du shes pa 'am/ gang zag 'du shes pa 'am/ shed can du 'du shes pa 'am/ shad bdag du 'du shes par
363b8(phal chen): byed pa por 'du shes pa 'am/ tshor ba por 'du shes pa 'dra 'am/ gzhan du chos kyis dbyings nye bar bzung ba dang / sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i
364a1(phal chen): chos nyid nye bar bzung ba dang / song ba'i chos nyid nye bar bzung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid nye bar bzung ba dag mtshan cing /
364a2(phal chen): med pa'i chos nyid nye bar bzung dang / dngos po med pa'i chos nyid nye bar bzung ba dang / gnas med pa'i chos nyid nye bar bzung ba dang / gzhi med pa'i chos nyid nye ga
364a3(phal chen): bzung ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos nyid nye bar bzung ba ma rtogs par/ mngon par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig ces te/ de ni bdag kyang yang dag
364a4(phal chen): par rjesu mi mthong / bdag gis lus kyang yang dag par rje su mi mthong / len to zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes mi mthong / len pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong //
364a5(phal chen): sbyin pa'i gnas kyang yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ste/ de ni las kyang yang dag par rje su mi mthong / rnam par smin pa'ang yang dag rjesu mi mthong // 'bras bu
364a6(phal chen): 'ang yang dag par rje su mi mthong / 'bras bu chen po 'ang yang dag par rje su mi mthong / 'bras bu chung ngu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / de 'das pa'i dus kyi
364a7(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyis lus zhig pa yid la byed do// ma 'ongs pa dang ltar byung ba'i sems can thas cad lus 'jigs pa yid la byed do// de 'di/
364a8(phal chen): snyams du sems te/ kye ma sems can 'di dag rang gis lus grangs med pa zhig 'gags te/ 'gag par 'gyur yang snying po med pa'i lus las/
364b1(phal chen): snying po mi len pa ni ngo mtshar che'o// de ltar yin gyi bdag gi sems can thams cad bde bas rim 'gro bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu bslab par bya'o//
364b2(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang mngon par sangs rgyas so// chos thams cad rnam par sbyangs pa'i phyir// de ltar yin gyis bdag gis sems can tham
364b3(phal chen): cad bde bas rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu bslab par bya'o// thams mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang mngon par sangs rgyas te/ chos thams cad
364b4(phal chen): rnam par spyang pa'i chos nyid mi 'jigs pa nye bar bzung ste/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du 'thun pa'i tshul gyis zhi bar bya ba'i sems can rnams la chos bstan
364b5(phal chen): par bya'o snyam du sems so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang po te/ dga' bar byed pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub
364b6(phal chen): dpa' rnam kyis spyod pa gnyis pa te bde ba bskyed pa zhes bya ba de gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la bya b+hA sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin pa te/
364b7(phal chen): de ni mi gnas pa yin/ gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang / ro dang / reg la mi gnas pa ljon pa yin/ rigs kyi bdag nyid che ba la mi gnas pa yin ste/ rgyud kyi bdas
