397a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i gter yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo gsung bar 'gyur ro//
397a3(phal chen): bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i gter dang / tshul khrims kyi gter dang / ngo mtshar shes pa'i gter dang / khrel yod pa'i gter dang / thos pa'i gter dang / gtong ba'i gter dang /
397a4(phal chen): dam tsha ba'i gter dang / rtogs pa'i gter dang / blo gros kyi gter dang / blo'i gter ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i gter
397a5(phal chen): bcu po de dag ni/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo gsung bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
397a6(phal chen): de la dad pa'i gter bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad stong par dad par byed do// chos thams cad mtshan ma med
397a7(phal chen): par zhes bya bar dad par byed do// chos thams cad smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dad par byed do// chos thams cad byas pa zhes bya bar dad par byed do// chos thams cad ma rtag pa zhes
397a8(phal chen): bya bar dad par byed do// chos thams cad gnas pa med pa zhe bya bar dad par byed do// chos thams cad tshad med pa zhes bya bar dad par byed do// chos thams cad blang ba med pa zhes
397b1(phal chen): bya bar dad par byed do// chos thams cad gdar mi rung ba zhes bya bar dad par bye'o// chos thams cad 'byung ba med par dad par byed do// 'di ni chos dang 'thun pa'i dad pa
397b2(phal chen): dang ldan pa yin te/ chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya ba bas/ zhum par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya bas zhum
397b3(phal chen): par mi 'gyu ro// sems can gyi khams thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya bas zhum par mi 'gyuraro// chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab po lde bya bas zhum pa mi 'gyu ro//
397b4(phal chen): na mkha'i dbyings pasaM gyis mi khyab po zhes bya bas zhum par mi 'gyur ro// mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya bas zhum par mi 'gyur ro// 'das pa'i dus
397b5(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya bas zhum par mi 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i dus bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya bas zhum par mi 'gyur ro// da ltar byung ba'i dus bsam gyis mi
397b6(phal chen): khyab bo zhes bya bas zhum par mi 'gyur ro// bskal pa thams cad la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya bas zhum par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i dad pa ni sangs
397b7(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ji ltar mkhyen pa bzhin du gcig tu nges par gyur pa yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mtha'ang zad mi shes so// 'jig rten gyi khams
397b8(phal chen): rnams kyang zad mi shes te/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
398a1(phal chen): la chen @#par sangs rgyas so// mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes yang dag par byung ngo // yang dag par 'byung ngo // yang dag pa 'byur
398a2(phal chen): bar 'gyu ro// yongs su mya ngan las 'daso// yongasu mya ngan las 'da'o// yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di ni 'bri ba 'am 'phel ba 'am/ skye ba 'am
398a3(phal chen): 'gag pa 'am/ 'pho ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ nye bar byed pa 'am/ ring bar byed pa 'am/ shes par byed pa 'am/ 'byin par byed pa ma yin te/ de ni sangs rgyas kyis ye shes la yA
398a4(phal chen): dag par gnas par zad par byed cing / mtha' yas pa'i dad pa'i gter dang ldan pa yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag dad pa 'di ni mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pas mi
398a5(phal chen): zad pa phyir mi ldog pa'i myu gur gyur pa yin/ tha dad pa ma yin pa ma 'dres pa/ rtsa ba brtan pa/ 'phags pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rgyud du
398a6(phal chen): gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mos pa yang dag par bskyed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
398a7(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rjes su song ba/ nges par rtogs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rigs la mkhas par gyur pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems
398a8(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis dad pa'i gter te/ de la byang chub pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par 'gyur na bden pa
398b1(phal chen): khong du chud te/ sems can thams cad rnam par 'byed pa'i phyir nan tan du byed par 'gyur ba'o// kyes rgyal ba'i sras dag de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi
398b2(phal chen): gter dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' thog mar phun sum tshogs pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i
398b3(phal chen): tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ lhag par lta ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ 'gal ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan
398b4(phal chen): pa yin/ gzhan la mi gnod pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan yin/ ma 'dres pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan yin/ skyon med pa'i
398b5(phal chen): tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ kyes rgyal ba'i sras dag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thog mar phun sum tshogs pa'i tshul
398b6(phal chen): khrims dang ldan pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nyid du/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar sems dpa'o// kyes rgyal ba'i
398b7(phal chen): sras dag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ mu stegs can dang gnas dang mi badra ba'i tshul khrim te/ 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis
398b8(phal chen): dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du go cha dgos shing spyod pa'o// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'dod pa'i
399a1(phal chen): phas chen @#khams la mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims can yin/ gzugs kyi khams la mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims can yin/ gzug med pa'i khams la mi gar+tha
399a2(phal chen): pa'i tshul khrims yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'khor de dag la bdag gir bya ba med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yino// kye rgyal ba'i sras
399a3(phal chen): dag ci ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' lhag par lta ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'gyod pa med pa'i rgyu dang ldan pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
399a4(phal chen): de ni 'di ltar mtsham med pa'i las mngon par 'du byed de/ tshul khrims lhod pa la gzhol ba ma yin no// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lhag par lta ba med pa'i tshul khrim dang ldan pa yin
399a5(phal chen): no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gal ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dam bcas pa ni mcha' bA mi byed/ da ma bcas pa ni spyod par mi byed de/
399a6(phal chen): de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug tu ji ltar 'thun pa'i chos dang ldan pa yin no// gang gis pha rol sdug bsngal gyi rgyur gyur pa dang / pha rol 'khrugs par 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims de lta
399a7(phal chen): bu dam bca' ba la dam bcas shing mi gnas te/ de ni 'di ltar pha rol gyi sems dad par bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims yang dag par len par byed do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
399a8(phal chen): gzhan la mi gnod pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la brtse ba'i phyir tshul khrims kyi rigs dang / gsang sngags dang /
399b1(phal chen): sman dang / sbyor ba de lta bu mi sgrub kyis/ sems can thams cad skyabs pa'i phyir tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas so// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma 'dres pa'i tshul
399b2(phal chen): khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / 'dres pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par len par mi byed// de ni 'di ltar rten
399b3(phal chen): cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rten cing / tshul khrims yang dag par len to// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ yon tan med pa
399b4(phal chen): brtan par bya ba'i phyir te/ gzhan gyi sems la lta zhing rtogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs su 'gyur ba ma yin no// de ni 'di ltar chos kyi ngom pa dang ldan pa yin te/ 'byung ba'i lam
399b5(phal chen): tshol zhing sbyor ba'i tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas so// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skyon med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
399b6(phal chen): tshul khrims dang / log pa'i tshul khrims nye bar bzung ste/ gang gis pha rol po dma' ba'i tshul can du 'gyur ba/ bdag la mi bstod gzhan la mi smod do// de ni 'di ltar ga
399b7(phal chen): ba med pa nye bar bzung ste tshul khrims yang dag par blangs zhing gnas so// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub
399b8(phal chen): sems dpa' srog gcod pa yongs su spangs pa yin te/ ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma'i tshig dang / ngag blang ba dang / tshig
400a1(phal chen): khyal ba dang / chags sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba yongs su spangs pa yin te/ dge ba bcu'i lam yang dag par blangs te/ gnas
400a2(phal chen): so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin te/ 'di snyam du sems bskyed te/ gang ji snyam du sems du sems can rnams tshul khrims ngan pa la yi
400a3(phal chen): dam mtsha' zhing / spyod pa thams cad ni phyin phyi log gi rgyu las byung ba ste/ de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs su chud de/ phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams ni
400a4(phal chen): tshul khrims log pa la spyod kyis bdag gi ni ci nas kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin nyid kyi don du chos bstan par 'gyur
400a5(phal chen): ba de ltar bya'o snyam mo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis/ tshul khrims kyi gter te gnyis pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la/ byang chub sems
400a6(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi ngo tsha shes pa'i gter gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' mngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa nye bar bzung ste/ gang 'di tshe rabs kyi 'khor ba/ thog ma dang
400a7(phal chen): tha ma med pas rgyas par mdangs 'grogs pa dang / pa dang 'grogs pa dang / zhang po dang 'grogs pa dang / sring mo dang 'grogs pa dang / dpyan dang 'grogs pa dang / bu dang 'grogs pa dang /
400a8(phal chen): bu mo dang 'grogs par gyur kyang / cig la cig rtse ba dang / gcig la cig rgyal ka byed pa dang / gcig la gcig gnod par byed pa dang / gcig la gcig khrig pa dang / gcig la gcig sngo ba
400b1(phal chen): dang / gcig la gcig 'jigs pa dang / gcig la gcig 'bod pa dang / gcig la gcig za ba dang / gcig la gcig dbang ba dang / gcig la gcig 'khor bar 'gyur ba dang / de yang 'dod
400b2(phal chen): chags kyi dbang dang / zhe sdang gi dbang dang / gti mug gis dbang dang / rgyugs pa'i dbang dang / nga rgyal gyi dbang dang / 'chab pa'i dbang dang / gnya' drag gi dbang dang / phra dog gis dbang dang / 'jug
400b3(phal chen): pa'i dbang dang / g.yo ba'i dbang dang / rgyu'i dbang dang / mi dag gis las 'di rnams blangs pa'i phyir// sems can dag gcig la gcig 'di lta bu'i/ rnam pa ngan pa dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/
400b4(phal chen): thams cad mi shes pa'i dbang gis gyur pa nas/ g.yo dang rgya'i bar gyi dbang gis gyur ste/ gcig la gcig bag mi byed/ rim gror mi byed/ gcig la gcig bkur sti mi byed/ gcig la gcig
400b5(phal chen): bud du mi byed/ gcig la gcig rtsam pa med pa dang / gcig la gcig mkhas pa dang / gcig la gcig gnod pa dang / gcig la gcig gsod pa dang / gcig la gcig dgrar byed par 'gyur
400b6(phal chen): ro// zhes ngo mtshar bskyed// ji ltar na 'das pa'i dus na bdag dang / sems can rnams kyi rnam par ran pa de lta bu'i tshul 'byung ba de bzhin/ de ltar 'byung ba'i dus na yang / bdag dang seMs
400b7(phal chen): can thams cad la rnam par ngan pa 'di lta bu dag yod do// ji ltar da ltar 'byung ba'i dus na bdag dang sems can rnams la rnam par ngan pa de lta bu dag go/ yod pa de bzhin ma 'ongs pa'i dus
400b8(phal chen): na yang bdag dang / sems can thams cad la rnam par ngan pa de lta bu bdag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
401a1(phal chen): kyi kyang / thugs su chud do// de ltar bdag gis ngo tsha med cing mi bzod la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi/ thugs
401a2(phal chen): su chud pa bzhin du rnam pa ngan pa 'di lta bu gnas pa ni rigs mi chad pa de ni bdag gis ci nas kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/
401a3(phal chen): de bzhin nyid kyi don du sems can rnams la chos brtan par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo tsha shes pa'i gter te gsum pa'o// kye rgyal
401a4(phal chen): ba'i sras dag de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi khrel yod pa'i gter gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni/ mtha' med par mchos pas 'khrel bar
401a5(phal chen): 'dzin pa yin te/ gzugs btsal ba dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang / reg btsal ba dang / bu dang bu mo'i don du btsal ba dang / nor dang bran po dang / bran mo dang / g.yog yid du 'ong ba brtsal pa'i phyir/
401a6(phal chen): bdag gi yang mi tshul mi che ba'i bca' bar bya bar 'gyur ro zhes/ de ni tshol ba'i dbang du chags pa nye bar mi len pa/ zhe sdang nye bar mi len to// gti mug nye ba mi len to// de bzhin du nga rgyal dang /
401a7(phal chen): 'chab pa dang / phra dog dang / 'jungs pa dang / g.yo dang sgyu dang / gnod par bya ba nye bar mi len ste/ de 'di 'dra ba skyes ste/ gang ci yang rung ste/ sems can rnam par ngan pa de lta bu nye bar 'dzin
401a8(phal chen): pa thams cad mi rigs pa'i dbang nas/ g.yo dang sgyu dang / gnod par byed pa'i dbang gis bar gyi 'byung ba ste/ de dag cig la gcig bab mi byed/ rim gro mi byed sti bstang du mi byed/ phud dang du
401b1(phal chen): mi byed cing / btsam pa med des/ grogs por mi shes shing / gcig la cig nyam nga ba med dang / gcig la gcig bsad pa dang / gcig la gcig dgrar len pa 'di lta bus rnam par ngan pa
401b2(phal chen): dag nye bar len to// mngon par dga'o mngon par zhan to// tshol lo kun du tshol lo// kun tu btsal nas mngon par smon to// 'jal lo kun tu 'jal lo// de ltar yang mig mnyam pa de dag
401b3(phal chen): lam gang dang gang nas mngal gyis dri mas/ gos ste byung ba de nyid du 'khrig pa'i chos la sten te/ mi gtsang bar 'byung ba ni kun gyi kyang shes so// de bas na de ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par
401b4(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam khrel med pa 'di dbang du gyur nas/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sku bsla ba med pa 'di ni mi
401b5(phal chen): rigs kyi da ni bdag gis/ ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ de bzhin nyid kyi don du chos brtan par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o snyam mo// kye
401b6(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi khrel yod pa'i gter te bzhi pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis thos pa'i gter gang zhe na/
401b7(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' thos pa dang ldan pa yin te/ 'di yod na 'byung ngo // 'di med na 'di mi 'byung ngo // 'di 'byung bas 'di skye'o// 'di 'gags pas 'di
401b8(phal chen): 'gag go// 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so// 'di dag
402a1(phal chen): ni lung bstan pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni lung ma bstan pa'i chos so// de la ci yod pas gang 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/ ma rigs pa yod pas/ 'du byed rnams
402a2(phal chen): 'byung ngo // ci med pas gang med 'gyur zhe na/ rnam par shes pa med pas/ ming dang gzugs med par 'gyur ro// ci skyes pas gang skye bar 'gyur zhe na/ sred pa skye bas sdug bsngal skye'o//
402a3(phal chen): ci 'gags pas gang 'gags par 'gyur zhe na/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gags pa'o// de la 'jig rten gyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
402a4(phal chen): dang / rnam par shes pa'o// de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol
402a5(phal chen): ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang / 'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so// 'das byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i khas
402a6(phal chen): dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / sems can gyi khams te/ 'di dag ni 'du byas kyi chos so// 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ nam mkha' dang mya
402a7(phal chen): ngan las 'das pa dang / so sor rtags te/ 'gog pa dang / so sor ma rtags pa'i 'gog pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / chos kyis gnas nyid des/ 'di dag ni 'dus ma
402a8(phal chen): byas pa'i chos so// lung bstan pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi dang / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa zhi dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
402b1(phal chen): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdza 'phrul gyis rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyis yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam
402b2(phal chen): yan lag brgyad des/ de dag ni lung rten pa'i chos so// lung ma rten pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'jig rten mtha' yod pa dang / 'jig rten mtha' med pa dang / 'jig rten mtha' yod
402b3(phal chen): pa'ang ma yin/ mtha' med pa'ang ma yin zhes bya ba 'di ni lung ma bstan pa'o// 'jig rten rtag pa dang / 'jig rten mi rtag pa dang / rtag pa'ang ma yin la/ mi rtag pa'ang ma yin pa dang /
402b4(phal chen): rtag pa yang ma yin/ mi rtag pa'ang ma yin zhes bya ba 'di ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa shi phan chad sod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shi phan chad med pa dang / de
402b5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa shi phan tshad yod kyi yod la med kyang med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shi phan chad yod pa yang ma yin med pa'ang ma yin zhes bya ba 'di ni lung ma bstan pa'o//
402b6(phal chen): bdag dang / sems can rnams yod pa dang / bdag dang sems can rnams med pa dang / bdag dang sems can yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin pa dang / bdag dang sems can
402b7(phal chen): rnams yod pa'ang ma yin med pa'ang ma yin zhes bya ba 'di ni lung ma bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas ci snyed cig yongs su mya ngan las 'das/ rang sangs rgyas ci snyed cig yongs su mya ngan la
402b8(phal chen): 'das/ nyan thos ci snyed cig yongs su mya ngan las 'das/ sangs rgyas ci snyed cig ma byon/ rang sangs rgyas ji snyed cig ma byon/ nyan thos ji snyed cig ma byon/ byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed
402b9(phal chen): cig skye bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas ci snyed cig bzhags/ rang sangs rgyas ji snyed zhugs/ nyan thos ji snyed gzhugs/ byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed zhugs/ sangs rgyas dag pas su lnga/ rang sad
403a1(phal chen): rgyas dag pas su lnga/ nyan thos dag pas su lnga/ byang chub sems dpa' dag pas su lnga/ sangs rgyas dag pas su 'phye/ rang sangs rgyas dag pas su 'phyi/ sems can dag pasu 'phyi/
403a2(phal chen): chos dag pas su lnga/ 'jig rten gang nas 'ongs/ 'jig rten gang du 'gro/ 'jig rten gyi khams ci snyed cig tshim par 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig gnas pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang
403a3(phal chen): nas 'ongs/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhig yongs su zad par 'gyur/ 'khor pa'i mngon gyi mtha' ni gang / 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha' gang zhes bya ba 'di ni lung ma bstan pa'o// de 'di ltar dran pa skyes
403a4(phal chen): te sems can gang su yang rung ste/ kun tu rgyad pa dang / kun nas 'khor ba thams cad kyis chos 'di dag mi shes pa'i phyir ste/ de ltar thos pa dang mi ldan pa'i so so skye bo rnams rgyug go// kun du 'khor
403a5(phal chen): ro// de bas na de ni bdag gis ci nas kyang bsam pa thams cad thos pa'i mdzod bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ mngon par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin nyid kyi don du chos
403a6(phal chen): bstan par bya'o bya ba 'di ni/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thos pa'i gter lnga pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/ stong pa'i gang zhe na/ kye
403a7(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' stong pa dang ldan pa yin/ yongs su stong pa dang ldan pa yin/ nadri stong pa dang ldan pa yin/ phyi rol gyis stong pa dang ldan pa yin/ phyi na stong pa dang
403a8(phal chen): ldan pa yin/ thams cad stong pa dang ldan pa yin/ 'das pa stong pa dang ldan pa yin/ ma 'ongs pa stong pa dang ldan pa yin/ da ltar byung ba stong pa dang ldan pa yin/ shin du stong pa dang ldan pa yin/ kye
403b1(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' stong pa dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis bgo sha byed pa'i ngang nu la yin te/ de rtag tu bgo sha byas
403b2(phal chen): shing bdag kyang shes rab kyi spyod pa yin te/ bdag bde bar bya ba dang / bdag yongs su sbyang ba dang / bdag rim gror bya ba'i phyir yo byad ci snyed du brtsegs pa de dag thams cad kyang / bgo sha byas shing
403b3(phal chen): spyod kyi/ ma gos par ni ma yin no// de dag spyod pa'i tshe yang de 'di snyam du skyed de/ lus 'di la srin po'i rigs/ rnam pa sna tshogs brgyad bcu gnas te/ de dag kyang bdag gis lus bde bas ni bde
403b4(phal chen): bar 'gyur/ bdag gis lus 'di sdug bsngal bas ni sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro zhes/ de gang ci la spyod pa de dag thams cad kyang / myong ba med pa'i sems kyis de dag mi 'chi ba dang / de dag bde
403b5(phal chen): bar bya ba'i phyir gtong ngo // gzhan yang 'di snyam du sems ste/ yun ring po nas zas su lus bde bar la chags par gyur gyis/ nga ni bdag gis lus la chags pa las rnam par 'da' bar bya ba
403b6(phal chen): 'di ni stong pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' yongs su stong pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' la zas sam skom 'am/ bza' ba bca' ba 'am/ ldag pa 'am btung ba 'am/ bzhi pa 'am/
403b7(phal chen): myang ba 'am/ gos sam phreng ba 'am/ byug pa 'am rgyan nam/ ci 'am rung ste/ gang spyod na ni 'tsho'i/ ma spyad na ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba zhig/ nye bar gnas par 'gyur la/ de'i tshe slong ba zhig 'ongs /
403b8(phal chen): de la cig nas kyang zad par 'gyur ba/ lhag ma med par spangs kyang / de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon gyi mtha' de dag tu bdag bkres pas zhi bar 'gyur ba yang / dmig
403b9(phal chen): pas mi slebs te/ lus la phan par ma gyur to// nga ni 'di ltar rims pas sngan chad myong ba'i chos can dang / mnyam pa nyid kyis dus bya bar 'gyur la/ sems can dag kyang bde bar 'gyur ba na
404a1(phal chen): bdag gis thob par bya ba legs par thob po// bdag gis 'di dag kyang zad kyang rung / 'chi ba'i mthar kyang 'thung kyang te/ sems can rnams 'tsho bar bya'o// zhes stong pa 'di
404a2(phal chen): ni yongs su stong pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' nang gi stong pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dang cing bzang por gnas pa/ gzugs mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mdog rgyas pa/ gya
404a3(phal chen): nom pa dang ldan pa/ khrus dang byug pa legs par byas pa/ phreng ba dang / rgyan legs par rtags pa/ gos sar pa ma babs pa gos pa/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyal por dbang skur
404a4(phal chen): bas/ dbang bskur ba rin po che bdun dang ldan pa/ de lta bu'i drug tu slong ba dag cig 'ongs te/ 'di skad du bdag cag ni na dag zer ro// rgas so// 'khogs so// sdug bsngal gyi gnar so// nad
404a5(phal chen): tshabs che'o// nad g.yogs med do// 'chi la thug go// gal te khyod kyi lus las lag pa 'am/ rkang pa 'am/ sha 'am khrag gam/ mgo 'am klad pa 'am/ rus pa 'am rkang ngam/ su la tsi la dgos
404a6(phal chen): ba de dag khyer cig ces rgyal po la thags thogs med par/ rang gi lus bdag cag byin na lus 'di/ bdag cag nad 'di las ldang bar 'gyur ro zhes zer na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di byang chub
404a7(phal chen): sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ lus 'di lta zhig chos kyi de 'dra bar 'gyur yang su la yang phan par ma gyur gyis/ da ni de lta bu'i chos can gyis lus 'dis sems can 'di dag bde bar
404a8(phal chen): 'gyur bar bya'o// zhes nas de la sems bskyed pa/ 'ga' tsam yang 'gyod par 'gyur ba med pa 'di ni nang gi stong pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' phyi rol gyis stong pa gang zhe na/ 'di
404b1(phal chen): la byang chub sems dpa' gzhang de bzhin du rgya cher dbang bskur ba dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid la gnas pa/ gling bzhi pa la dbang ba rin po che sna bdun dang / bde ba'i yo
404b2(phal chen): byad thams cad dang / ldan pa mthog mngon par dbang bskur ba de lta bu'i drung du slong ba bdag ci lhags te/ 'di skad du bdag ni klan no// dbul lo// shin du sdug bsngal lo// nor dang ldan no// khyod
404b3(phal chen): ni bde ba'i yo byad thams cad ldan pa// 'dzam bu gling bzhi pa'i 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal srid bdag cag sbyin ste/ phyis 'di la dbang mi 'gyur bar byas na/ de ni bdag bde bar 'gyur ro zhes zer
404b4(phal chen): na de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems ste/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni da pa'i mthar phyin te/ de'i tshe sus bsam pa yang yongs su dag par bya bar mi nus kyis/ bdag gis
404b5(phal chen): de ni phral du sems can 'di dag gi bsam pa yongs su tshim par bya'o// zhes nas/ de'i rgyus sems skyes pa 'ga' tsam 'gyod par 'gyur ba med par song ba 'di ni phyi rol gyi stong pa zhes bya'o//
404b6(phal chen): de la byang chub sems dpa' phyi nang gis stong pa zhes bya'o// 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la de ltar dbang skur ba bde ba'i yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa rtsegs
404b7(phal chen): par bya ba rnams par brtsegs pa de lta bu'i drung du/ slong ba dag ci 'ongs nas 'di skad du khyod kyi ni/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sngan chad kyang nyo// bdag cag ni dge ba ma nyong pa yin/ byam
404b8(phal chen): bu 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid bdag cag la byin la/ khyed kyis bdag cag rim 'gro bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bas bgyi shig zer nas/ de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems
405a1(phal chen): te bdag gis lus kyi chos nyid dang / srid kyi chos nyid de dag thams cad kyang tha mar med par 'gyur ba ste/ lus kyang rjes su 'brang bar gnas la/ srid kyang che zhing spong ba
405a2(phal chen): rnams kyang mngon du gyur pa 'di ni tshe snying po med pa las snying po blang bar bya'o zhes nas/ de'i rgyus sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam yang 'gyod par 'gyur ba med par rim gro byed cing stong pa 'di ni byang chub
405a3(phal chen): sems dpa' phyi nang gi stong pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' thams cad gtong ba gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid de ltar dbang sgyur zhing / bde ba
405a4(phal chen): thams cad dang ldan pa/ de lta bu'i drung du slong ba bdag cag lhags te/ 'di skad du bdag cag gi khyod kyi legs pa dang / yon tan snyan pa thos nas/ grong dang grong khyer dang grong brdal dang / ljongs
405a5(phal chen): dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i gnas su ma nas khyod ni gdon mi za bar bdag cag gis bsam pa yongs su tshig par 'gyur snyam ste/ 'dir phyin na/ byam bu khyod kyi bdag cig gi bsam pa
405a6(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs par gyi shig ces nas/ la la ni bdag cag la rgyal po'i rin po che sna bdun dgos so zer/ la la ni bdag cag la rgyal po'i gling bzhi dgos so// zhes zer/ la la ni bdag
405a7(phal chen): cag la rgyal po'i bu dgos so la la ni bdag cag la rgyal po'i mi gnyis dgos zhes zer/ la la ni bdag cag la rgyal po'i lag pa gnyis dgos so zhes zer/ la la ni bdag cag la rgyal
405a8(phal chen): po'i rkang pa dgos so zhes zer/ la la ni bdag cag la rgyal po'i sha dgos so// zhes zer/ la la ni bdag cag rgyal po'i khrag dgos so zhes zer/ la la ni bdag cag la rgyal po'i mgo dgos so
405b1(phal chen): zhes zer/ la la ni bdag cag la rgyal po'i snying dgos zhes zer/ de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems ste/ sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong ba thams cad dang bral zhing byed par 'gyur te/
405b2(phal chen): sems can gang gi bsam pa yang yongs su tshim par ma gyur gyis/ de ni bdag gis lus dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i chos can 'dis sems can 'di bdag gis chags sems rtse zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/
405b3(phal chen): bsam pa yongs su tshim par bya'o// brtsal ba dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gnas su ni sems skyed par mi bya'o// zhes nas de dag thams cad stong yang de'i phyir de la sems bskyed pa cig tsam yang 'gyod pa
405b4(phal chen): 'gyur med des/ sems can gang la yang rim gro med par mi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad gtong ba'o// // shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas pal po che zhes bya ba
405b5(phal chen): las// // bam po nyi shu dgu pa'o// // de la byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa'i gtong ba gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa rnams kyi byang chub
405b6(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa thos pa dang / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nyan cing thos nas de dag thams cad la chags pa mi byed/ bral bar mi byed/
405b7(phal chen): dmigs su med pas rab tu 'jug pa ste/ rtog par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par mi byed/ yongs su rtog par mi byed/ smon par mi byed/ chags par mi byed/ zhen par mi byed/ zhen pa'i sems kyi
405b8(phal chen): gnas mi byed te/ rmi lam gyi chos lta bu thob par mi byed kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la snying po'i 'du shes mi skyed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rten pa'i 'du shes su mi byed do// 'on kyang rten pa'i
406a1(phal chen): sems can rnams gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos kyang yongs su min par bya ba'i phyir brjod do// 'chad do// ston to// 'das pa'i chos nyid la rtags na/ shar phyogs su
406a2(phal chen): rjes su mthong ngo // lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs rjes su mi mthong ngo // byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyis phyogs mtshams dang /
406a3(phal chen): nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gis phyogs su rjes su mi mthong ste/ de 'di snyam du gang ci'ang rung ma btang po'o// snyam du sems te/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag de ni byang chub sems dpa'
406a4(phal chen): 'das pa gtong ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' ma 'ongs pa'i stong pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa rnams kyi spyod pa nyan pa na/ mtshan ma'i
406a5(phal chen): tshul dang / dngos po 'dzin pas mi 'dzin te/ 'jig rten gyis khams gzhan la brtson par mi byed pa yin/ tshol bar mi mnga' ba yin/ 'dod chags kyi sems kyi mi smon pa yin/ de la mi sems
406a6(phal chen): mi 'dud pa yin te/ myong bar mi byed do// de dag tu dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi gtong ngo // de dag tu mi dge rtsa ba rnams 'jug par mi byed de/ spyod pa yang rgyun gcod par mi byed do// 'on kyang dmigs pa
406a7(phal chen): des sangs rgyas kyis chos grub par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang tshogs sdud par byed cing chos de ni yul na yang mi gnas/ phyogs na yang ma yin/ nang na yang ma yin/ phyi rol na yang mi
406a8(phal chen): gnas/ rgya ring po na yang ma yin/ drung na yang ma yin no zhes te/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang du yang nam yang spyad pa med par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i gtong ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de
406b1(phal chen): la byang chub sems dpa' da ltar byung ba stong pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po chen po bzhi ris kyis lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / tshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang /
406b2(phal chen): 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs la nyan phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med snang ba dang / shin du
406b3(phal chen): snang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che kha dang / mi rdung ba dang / shin du mthong ba dang / gya nom snang
406b4(phal chen): ba dang / 'og min gyis lha rnams nas nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs par dag kyang nyan te/ de dag thos na yang rmongs par mi 'gyur/ shin du rmongs par mi
406b5(phal chen): 'gyur/ rab tu rmongs par mi 'gyur/ zhum par mi 'gyur/ kun nas zhum par mi 'gyur/ shin du zhum par mi 'gyur/ dma' bar mi 'gyur te/ 'di ltar de ni shes pas 'ad byed du rtogs pa thos
406b6(phal chen): cad rmi lam lta bu mngon du mi byed do// de 'di snyam du gang sbyin par bya ba 'di ni su'i yang ma yin no snyam te/ ngan song gis lam nye bar gnas pa zlog par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos thams
406b7(phal chen): cad grub pa'i phyir chos kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lam kun tu gyur pa'i phyir de la sems la rgyu ba med de/ 'di ni da ltar byung ba pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' shin du bstan pa gang zhe
406b8(phal chen): na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can mig dang mi ldan pa dag rna ba dang mi ldan pa dang / sna dang mi ldan pa dang / lce dang mi ldan pa dang / lus dang mi ldan pa grangs med pa zhig gis 'di
407a1(phal chen): skad du bdag cag la ci med pa des khyod kyis byin la deng mi ldan pa med par bgyi zhig/ khyod ni bskal pa grangs med par mi ldan 'dag zhing ces zer na/ byang chub sems
407a2(phal chen): dpa' des thos ma thag tu sems can de dag mi ldan pa med par sgrub ste/ bskal pa grangs med par dbang po dang mi ldan pa de yang nyams su len te/ de ma'i lto ba na 'dug pa'i tshe ji ltar bur spyod
407a3(phal chen): pa dang / mer mer por 'dug pa ji lta bu'i yin pa dang / rdos par 'gyur ba ji lta bu yin pa dang / 'khregs par 'gyur ba ji lta bu yin pa dang / dbang po sgrub pa ci lta bu yin pa dang / skyes pa ji lta bu
407a4(phal chen): yin pa dang / rga ba ji lta bu yin pa dang / na ba ji lta bu yin pa dang / shi ba ji lta bu yin pa dang / lus kyi thog ma dang bar ma dang / tha ma ji lta bu bzhin du yang dag par rab tu shes te/ ngom du mi rungs
407a5(phal chen): bas ngo cha skye ba 'phags pa ma yin pa dri ma med pa zhim pa/ rjen pa'i dri can ror 'gyur ba rus pa/ sha dang khrag gis g.yogs pa// rma dgu nas rtag tu zag pa'o// zhes sems skyed pa gcig tsam gyis
407a6(phal chen): kyang de'i don du gnyer bar sems te/ sems skyed pa gcig gis kyang chags pa'i sems de shin du stong pa de 'dzin pa med pa'i yid dang ldan pa yin te/ lus 'di ni 'di ltar snying po med pa yin te/
407a7(phal chen): lus 'di ni 'di ltar snying po med pa yin te/ bdag gis lus 'dis snying po med par mthong ba bzhin du lus la chags pa ji ltar byas/ sems can 'di dag ni bsam pa de bzhin du yongs su tshim
407a8(phal chen): par bya'o// lus snying po med pa'i 'dis 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// 'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang shes par bya'o// ye shes kyi tshogs gang yang ba la yang mi gnas
407b1(phal chen): pa'i tshul gyis bzhag par bya'o// zhes nas/ lus kyi 'du shes kyang med/ sems kyi 'du shes kyang med de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa'i gter drug pa'o// kye rgyal
407b2(phal chen): ba'i sras gang la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi gter gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs su rab tu shes so// gzugs kun tu 'byung ba rab tu shes so// gzugs kyi
407b3(phal chen): 'gogs pa rab tu shes so// gzugs kyi 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
407b4(phal chen): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par shes pa kun 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// rnam par shes pa'i 'gog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
407b5(phal chen): shes so// rnam par shes pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ma rig pa rab tu shes so// ma rig pa kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so// ma rig pa 'gog
407b6(phal chen): pa yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ma rig pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sred pa rab tu shes so// sred pa kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so//
407b7(phal chen): sred pa 'gog pa rab tu shes so// sred pa 'gogs pa'i lam ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nyan thos kyi chos rab tu shes so// nyan thos kyis kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so// nyan thos
407b8(phal chen): kyi mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas kyi kun 'byung ba rab tu shes
408a1(phal chen): so// rang sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa' rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i kun
408a2(phal chen): 'byung ba rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ji ltar shes zhe na/ las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / bya ba dang / mngon
408a3(phal chen): par 'du byed pa dang / bso ba dang / gsog dang / snying po med pa dang / bag med pa rab tu shes so// chos gang yang snying po can du rab tu shes so// chos gang yang rang bzhin du 'dogs pa med do//
408a4(phal chen): bo nyid kyis mthas tugs pa thams cad rab tu shes so// sems can rnams la'ang de bzhin nyid kyi don du chos ston to// de ci ston ces na/ 'jig pa med pa'i chos ston te/ 'jig pa med pa'i phyir
408a5(phal chen): zhe na/ gzugs 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ tshor 'jig pa med pa'i phyir// 'du byed 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ston to// ma rig pa 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ nyan thos
408a6(phal chen): dang bcas pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos 'jigs pa med pa'i chos ston to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos ni ma skyes pa/ 'dus ma byas kyi byed pa po med pa/ rtsod pa
408a7(phal chen): med pa/ gnas med pa/ ma skyes pa mi 'byung ba/ ma blangs pa/ nye bar ma blangs pa/ byed pa med pa ste/ de shes rab kyi ster te/ de lta bu dang ldan pas las 'gron chung ngus chos gzhan gyis thams
408a8(phal chen): cad la mkhas pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/ yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// shes rab kyi gter de yang mi zad pa yin te/ de bzhin du btan pa bcus mi zad pa yin no// bcu
408b1(phal chen): gang zhe na/ thos pa la mkhas pa mi zad pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen pa la bsnyen pas mi bzad pa'o// tshig rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pas mi zad pa'o// chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa mngon par sgrub
408b2(phal chen): pas mi zad do// rgyan gcig pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su zhugs pas mi zad do// bsod nams thams cad shin du bstsags pas mi zad do// skye ba med par mngon par sgrub pas mi zad do// gzugs
408b3(phal chen): thams cad kyi sgor zhugs pas mi zad do// sems can gyi skad dang / sgra dang brjod pa sna tshogs kyi phyir mi zad do// 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid gnyis dang / nem nur dang / the tshom yang dag par
408b4(phal chen): bcod pa'i phyir mi zad do// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su bstan pas sems can nye bar tsho ba dang / yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dul ba'i spyod pa shin du rtogs pa'i
408b5(phal chen): phyir mi zad de/ mi zad pa shin du brtan bcu po de dag gis shes rab kyi gter mi zad pa yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab dang ye shes bla na med
408b6(phal chen): pa rnam par 'tshang rgya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dran pa'i gter gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dran pa dang ldan pa yin
408b7(phal chen): te/ de yang rgyud rmongs pa med pa yin te/ de yang rgyud rmongs pa med pa'i dran pas mngon gyi gnas rjes su dran te/ 'di ltar tshe cig kyang rjes su dran to// tshe gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / tshe
408b8(phal chen): rgya stong dang / brgya stong dang / tshe rgya phrag du ma dang / 'jig pa'i skal ba dang / 'jig pa dang bsdu ba'i skal pa dang / 'jig pa'i skal pa du ma dang / 'dul ba'i skal pa du ma dang / 'du ba dang / bskal pa brgya dang /
409a1(phal chen): / bskal pa stong dang / bskal pa brgya stong dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
409a2(phal chen): grangs med pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun du mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa 'tshams med pa/ gzhal tu med pa/ brjod du med pa/ gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bzhud de
409a3(phal chen): bzhin du brjod du med pa yang brjod du med pa dang / sangs rgyas skye bar lung snyan pa shin du brjod pa gcig pa dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / nga lnga dang / sangs rgyas skye bar lung snyan pa shin
409a4(phal chen): du brjod pa dang / brjod du med pa yang brjod du med pa dang / sangs rgyas skye ba gcig snyan pa ste/ de la mtshams sbyor ba'i lung bstan pa gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga nas sangs rgyas
409a5(phal chen): skye ba shin du ston pa ste/ de dang 'tshams sbyor ba lung stan pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod de med pa dang / mdo sde gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga nas brjod du
409a6(phal chen): med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dang / dbyangs kyi snyed pa dang / lung du snyan pa'i sde dang / mdo sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / gleng bzhi dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / 'di ltar 'das pa'i sde dang /
409a7(phal chen): skye b.rab kyi sde dang / shin du rgyas pa'i sde dang / chos slad du byung ba'i sde dang / man dag stan pa'i brten gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum dang / bani dang / lnga nas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa
409a8(phal chen): bar dang / 'khor 'dus pa gcig dang / chos kyi 'tshams sbyar ba gcig nas/ chos kyi 'tshams sbyar ba brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dang / dbang po sna tshogs gcig nas dbang po sna
409b1(phal chen): tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dang / dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs gcig nas dbang po tha dad pa sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i bar dang / nyon mongs pa sna tshogs gcig
409b2(phal chen): nas nyon mongs pa brjod du med pa'i bar dang / ting nge 'dzin gcig sna tshogs gcig nas ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag kyang dran pa dag dang / rnyog pa med
409b3(phal chen): pa'i rnam par brtsal ba rdal med pa/ rdal dang bral ba/ dri ma med pa/ 'od gsal ba/ sang sang po// sgrib pa med pas rjes su dran no// byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa de ni 'jig rten 'khrugs pas mi
409b4(phal chen): 'phrog pa yin// pas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis nye bar nyon mongs par mi nus pa yin/ sngon gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa yin/ 'jig rten gyis chos thams cad kyi ma gos pa yin/ bdud dang
409b5(phal chen): mus stegs dmigs la gnas pa gzhan gyi mi chod pa yin/ tshe rab kun du pho ba'i lus shin du bstan pa thams cad kyis brjod par mi nus pa yin/ mngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
409b6(phal chen): dang / de ltar byung ba'i mtha' rnam par mi mchod pa yin/ 'jig rten gyis khams su skye ba yin/ gnas pa thams cad kyis sngon du ma gyur pa yin/ sangs rgyas skyes pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
409b7(phal chen): du 'jug pa shin du brtan pa thams cad kyi thogs pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis rjes su song ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran
409b8(phal chen): pa'i gter te sa brgyad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa'i gter gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rtogs pa
410a1(phal chen): / dang ldan pa yin te// de yang yi ge de bzhin gzhan ma yin pas mdo'i tshul du chos ston to// de'i tshe rgyud cig yongs su 'dzin to// che'i rgyud brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med
410a2(phal chen): pa'i bar du yongs su 'dzin to// sangs rgyas kyi mtshan cig kyang yongs su 'dzin to// sangs rgyas kyi mtshan brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par du yongs su 'dzin to// bskal pa grangs med par
410a3(phal chen): bstan pa cig kyang yongs su 'dzin to// bskal pa grangs med pa snyan pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yongs su 'dzin to// de bzhin gshegs par lung bstan par brjod pa cig
410a4(phal chen): kyang yongs su 'dzin to// de bzhin gshegs par lung bstan pa brjod pa cig kyang yongs su bstan to// de bzhin gshegs par lung bstan pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yod
410a5(phal chen): su 'dzin to// mdo cag kyang yongs su 'dzin to// mdo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to// 'das pa cig kyang yongs su 'dzin to// 'das pa brjod du med pa'i
410a6(phal chen): yang yongs su 'dzin to// chos kyi 'tshams sbyor ba cig kyang yongs su 'dzin to// chos kyi 'tshams sbyor ba brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to// dbang po rnam pa
410a7(phal chen): tha dad pa sna tshogs kyi cig kyang yongs su 'dzin to// dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yongs su 'dzin to// nyon mongs pa cig kyang yongs su
410a8(phal chen): 'dzin to// nyon mongs pa sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to// ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs cig kyang yongs su 'dzin to// ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs
410b1(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis rtogs pa'i gter te mi zad pa kun du
410b2(phal chen): mtha' yas pa/ dgang dka' ba/ gting snyed par bka' ba/ bsgrubs par bka' ba/ mi 'phrog pa/ thub pa med pa/ bdag nyid che ba'i sangs rgyas kyis yul gyi rjes su song ba ste/ 'di ni ster dgu pa'o//
410b3(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis blo gros kyi gter gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rtogs par byed pa'i brtog
410b4(phal chen): pa dang ldan zhing / blo gros dang ldan pa yin te/ mdo sde thams cad dang mi 'gal ba yin te/ de chos bstan pa'i tshe/ dngos po yongs su ldog pa cig kyang bsnams te chos ston pa nas/ dngos po
410b5(phal chen): yongs su ldog pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi mtshan cig nas tshul bzhin du med pa'i bar dang / 'jig rten gyi khams cig dang / sangs rgyas su
410b6(phal chen): lung bstan cig dang / 'khor 'dus pa cig dang / chos kyi 'tshams sbyor ba cig dang / dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs cig dang / nyon mongs pa sna tshogs cig dang / ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs cig/
410b7(phal chen): kyang tsams te/ chos ston pa nas ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i bar du snyams te/ chos ston to// nyi ma cig kyang zad pa'i chos ston pa nas/ zla ba nas zla ba cig dang / lo cig
410b8(phal chen): dang / lo brgya dang / lo stong dang / lo brgya phrag stong dang / bskal pa dang / bskal pa brgya phrag dang / bskal stong dang / bskal pa brgya phrag stong dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong
411a1(phal chen): dang / bskal pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / bskal pa dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / mtshungs pa med pa dang / kun tu mtha' yas pa dang / mu med pa dang / sa 'tshams med
411a2(phal chen): pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / brjod du med pa dag kyang zad par byed cing / chos ston na/ tshig dang yi ge gcig tsam kyang don dang tshig dang yi ge mtha' thug pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni de
411a3(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gter bcu rab tu thog pa bshad de/ gter de dag thob pas gzungs kyi snying po'i sgo chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba gzungs rgya stong grangs med
411a4(phal chen): pa'i 'khor can du mngon du gyur te/ nga gzungs kyi 'khor rgya stong grangs med par ston par byed do// chos snang ba shin du bstan nas sems can thams cad la chos ston to// chos kyi sgo snang ba'i chos can
411a5(phal chen): lce yangs pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par go bar byed pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag mkhas pas 'gro ba thams cad tshims par byed pa dang / dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du 'gu bar byed
411a6(phal chen): pa dang / nyon mongs pa kun 'khor ba thams cad rnam par zlog pa dang / sgra dang tshig rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad rab tu nyams pa dang / yi ge thams cad kyi spobs pa dang / ston pa'i rjes su song ba dang / sos
411a7(phal chen): can thams cad kyi sa bon drang du bor ba yongs su shes pa'i bsam pa can 'du byed pas chos ston te/ thogs par mi byed do// skyo bar mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ doni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas
411a8(phal chen): nam mkha'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings mtha' dbus med pa rgyas par byas pa'i lus rab tu thob par byas pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i gter bcus blo
411b1(phal chen): gros mi zad pa thags med pa/ 'dres pa med pa rnams par mi mchod pa/ rgyun mchad par mi nus pa/ phyir mi ldog pa/ ting rnyed par bka' ba/ ring du gyur pa/ sgo kun dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad
411b2(phal chen): kyi chos la zhugs pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gter te/ mi zad pa bcus mi zad pa yin no// bla na med pa yin no// mthar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su
411b3(phal chen): 'gyur ba yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad nye bar mtsho ba dang / sngon gyi smon lam legs par yongs su bsngos pa dang / bskal pa thams cad kyi grangs can du med pa dang / nam mkha'
411b4(phal chen): dbyings dang / mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa'i phyir sems tshad med pa dang / 'dus byas kyi ma dgos pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas yongs su bsngos pa dang / de ma thag pa'i yul du gyur pas chos thos
411b5(phal chen): cad mi shes pa dang / smon lam chen po tha dad pa med pa dang / spyod pa la gnas pa'i stobs shin du 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yongs su bzungs pa dang / chos thams cad rgyu ma lta
411b6(phal chen): bur 'jug pa mtha' dang dbus med par zhugs te/ mi zad pa bcu po 'di dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams bya ba thams cad kyis mthar phyin par zad mi shes pa'i shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/
411b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ gter mi zad pa bcu snyan pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu bdun pa'o// // de nas sangs rgyas kyis mthus shar phyogs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
411b8(phal chen): dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyis phyogs 'tshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams dang / nub byang gi
412a1(phal chen): phyogs 'jams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyis 'jig rten gyis khams thams cadan yang gleng bani pa 'di la sogs pa grang reren yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/
412a2(phal chen): bzhugs par snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drang nas yang mkhod par yang shes so// bcom
412a3(phal chen): ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'ad mdzad pa de phyir martul/ byang chub kyi shing drung yang martul/ ri rab kyi rtse mo yang phyir maN+Dal bar rab tshe ma'i gnas na dga' ldan gyis lha'i rgyal rab dag ldan
412a4(phal chen): gyis khang pa rin po che'i brgyan ces bya ba gang na ba der gshegs par snang ngo // ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'di na bcom ldan 'das dag ldan gyis gnas su gshegs par snang ngo // de bzhin du 'jig rten
412a5(phal chen): gyis khams thams cad kyi khams gling bzhi pa dag na yang bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas su gshegs par snang ste/ byin gyis rlabs lnga ma de dag kyang ma 'khrugs par snang ngo // de nas
412a6(phal chen): lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyi brgyad mnas/ bcom ldan 'das khang pa rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan par gshegs par mthong bar rings pa'i gzugs su khang pa rin po che thams cad kyis
412a7(phal chen): brgyan pa'i nang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i bdan nor bu rin po che las byas pa/ lha rdzas kyis rin po che'i rgyu la bsgrubs pas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis rgyu las yongs su bsgrub pa/ de
412a8(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis byung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa meng po byung ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad las byung ba'i chos dkar po las byung ba/ bsod
412b1(phal chen): nams kyi stobs mtha' yas pa sna tshogs thams cad dang ldan pa/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i rnam par smin pa thams cad kyis rnam par dag pa/ mi mthun pa med pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
412b2(phal chen): 'byung ba/ gos pa med pa 'gro ba thams cad du byung ba/ thub pa med pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi lhan gdug pa dang / bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus brgyan pa/ gser gyi dra ba bstod stong bcus kun du
412b3(phal chen): bres pa/ me tog gis bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bres pa/ phreng ba'i bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu lding ba/ spos kyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun du thul bar sbyar ba/ rin po che'i bye
412b4(phal chen): ba brgya stong phrag bcus steng nas bkab pa/ me tog gis bdug bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus nas bres pa/ rin po che'i gdugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bkab pa/ ba ngan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
412b5(phal chen): mngon par ting ba/ rin po che'i phu shugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu brgyan du bsgrub pa/ nor bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin du rnam par phye bas yogs par byas pa/ rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus
412b6(phal chen): 'khor kun du g.yogs pa/ rin po che'i 'phreng ba 'byang ba'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin du spungs pas bkab pa/ lhab lhab kyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin du klubs shing brgyan pa/
412b7(phal chen): bdugs kyis dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas 'khebs par sgrub pa/ gos sna tshogs kyis dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sna tshogs su g.yogs par rin po che'i pad mo'i dri ba bye ba brgya stong
412b8(phal chen): phrag bcus shin du rgyas par gram pa/ spos rin po che'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'thun zhing yid du 'ong bar dri zhim par/ rin po che'i bla re chen po'i dra ba bye ba brgya bcu'i brgyan rnam par bres pa/
413a1(phal chen): rin po che'i dril bu'i brgyan gyis bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba/ tsan dan gyis dri rin po che'i mdog lta ba'i bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus
413a2(phal chen): yid du 'ongs par bka' ba dang / rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i me tog shin du rgyas pas kha dog mtha' yas pa'i bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sna tshogs snang
413a3(phal chen): bar bkab pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bla bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sna tshogs kun nas bkab pa/ bdugs kyi bla re kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu g.yogs shing
413a4(phal chen): rnam par sna tshogs su snang ba gser gyis bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i yid du 'ong zhing bar bkab cing / rnam par dag par byas pa bai dUr+ya'i bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lnga rdzas kyi dri ma med
413a5(phal chen): cing shin du dag par byas pa snying po sna tshogs can gyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bla re bkab pa/ rin po che thams cad kyis bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i nor bu rin po che
413a6(phal chen): bzang po shin du mdzes shin mkhebs par bkab pa rin po che'i brgyan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus phyogs thams cad bkang ba/ rin po che'i gzugs stan gyis bla re brgya stong phrag
413a7(phal chen): bcus shin du rnam par phye zhing / mdzes par brgyan pa rin po che'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus brang ba kun du 'brel bar brgyan pa/ spos kyi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus tshul
413a8(phal chen): dang 'thun pa'i spos kyi dri zhim par bya ba dang / lha la mchog tu bya ba'i spos dang / bdugs spos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog mtha' yas pa dang / dri zhim po
413b1(phal chen): 'dul ba'i mchod pa can dang / lha la mchog tu bya ba'i lhab lhub kyi rgyud bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par klubs shing dang par byas pa/ rin po che'i me tog gis phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag
413b2(phal chen): bcus rin po che thams cad kyi rgyud du mdzes par byas pa/ dpal gyi snying po'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rin po che sna tshogs su rgyan pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba bye ba
413b3(phal chen): brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bris pa/ rin po che'i thams cad kyi rgyun du rnam par dag pa/ nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i rgyun gyis 'phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu bdun gyi snying po
413b4(phal chen): shin du brgyan pa/ dbang po'i rdo rje bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin du sbas pa/ rin po che'i rnam bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun du sbyangs pa/ 'jig rten
413b5(phal chen): mtha' yas pa'i dbang po'i nor bu rin po che bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin du bzang bar brgyan pa/ gser gyi snying po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin du bsgrubs shing dag par byas
413b6(phal chen): pa/ nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus gdul med par snang bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che rgya sbyin mngon par chags pa bye ba brgya stong phrag
413b7(phal chen): bcus snying po mtha' yas pas rnam par brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po ni dpal gyis rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin du 'bar bar bsgrubs pa/
413b8(phal chen): nor bu rin po che snang ba'i 'od zer gyis bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'od zer snang bar byas pa nor bu rin po che lha mchog tu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kar mkhrang shar bus mdzes par
414a1(phal chen): bres pa/ nor bu rin po che bsod nams kyis dag pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog gsal bar gyur pa/ dngul gyi ta babs bye ba brgya
414a2(phal chen): stong phrag bcus bres pas snying po dkar po rnam par phye ba/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho zla gam rnam par bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sbubs shin du grub pa/ nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa bye
414a3(phal chen): ba brgya stong phrag bcus lta na mdzes par shin du brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sems kyi rgyal po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'dabs chags yid 'ong zhing dga' bar kun du
414a4(phal chen): brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che seng ge'i gdong bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin du smras pa'i mchod pa dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus
414a5(phal chen): mthu brtan par shin du brtan pa/ nor bu rin po che'i snying po dag pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par snang zhing mdzes par byas pa/ nor bu rin po che dbang po'i
414a6(phal chen): rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus snang ba'i bdugs su bres pa/ nor bu rin po che dngul gyis snying po can bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus nang rnam pa sna tshogs su bkrams
414a7(phal chen): pa/ nor bu rin po che ri rab kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po shin du brgyan pa mu tig gi phreng ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog mdzes par bres pa/
414a8(phal chen): bai dUr+ya'i phreng babye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dra ba bres pa/ mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par phye ba nor bu yid du 'ong ba'i
414b1(phal chen): phreng ba brgya stong phrag bcus sna tshogs bkod pa/ rin po che shin du snang ba'i phreng ba bye ba bad+ma stong phrag bcus rnam par phye zhing rab tu bzung ba/ rin po che'i 'bru
414b2(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lus shin du brgyan pa/ mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong bar snang ba nor bu rin po che kha dog
414b3(phal chen): tu me'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po'i kha dog sna tshogs kyi mthar phyin pa/ dga' bar byed pa'i phreng ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus dag par sbyangs
414b4(phal chen): pa/ nor bu rin po che dpal gyis phreng ba brgya stong phrag bcus dpal chen po rab tu thob pa thob par 'gyur ba/ nor bu gzugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin du
414b5(phal chen): dpal bar brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dbang po'i kha dog bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus gnas yongs su 'dzin pa/ dus 'thun pa'i tsan dan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus
414b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyis khams thams cad du dri zhim pos rgyas par byas pa/ rim 'gro byed pa'i mi'i tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas kyis zhing thams cad rjes su song
414b7(phal chen): ba/ spos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun du rgyas pa/ gzhan gyis 'bam par byas pa'i spos bye ba brgya stong phrag dris 'gro ba kun du rgyas pa/ spos kyis
414b8(phal chen): gzugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dri kun du 'byung ba yid du 'ong ba'i spos brgya stong phrag bcus dri rab tu byung ba'i snang ba ston pa'i spos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dris 'gro ba kun du
415a1(phal chen): gang ba/ dri sna tshogs kha dog mtha' yas pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du phyir mi ldog par zhim pa/
415a2(phal chen): byug pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin du byug pa/ tsan dan rnam pa tha dad pa'i spos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnon du kun nas mdzes pa/ spos rnam pa tha dad pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus
415a3(phal chen): dri zhim pos shin du dgos pa/ a ka ru nag po'i pad ma'i snying po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sprin gyi snying por byas pa/ gdugs spos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin du bdugs shing yog
415a4(phal chen): pa/ bdugs spos kyis 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dbang po zhi bar zhim pa/ spos kun du babye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong bar zhim pa/ spos kyi 'od zer bye ba
415a5(phal chen): brgya stong phrag bcu sor thams cad du bdugs shing dri zhim pa/ spos rnam par mtshor bar tshor bar byed pa'i dam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dbang po mi 'khrugs par spos thams cad kyis
415a6(phal chen): mchod par byas pa spos kyis rgyal po gzhal du med pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spos kyi gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs shin du brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyis me tog sna tshogs kyi shin du brgyan pa/
415a7(phal chen): lha rdzas kyis me tog gis sprin gyis char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi sprin bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par bab pa/ lha rdzas kyis pad mo'i sprin gyis
415a8(phal chen): char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par bab pa/ lha rdzas rin po che'i me tog gis sprin gyis char mabye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i char mngon par bab pa/ lha rdzas kyis ud dpal
415b1(phal chen): la'i sprin gyis char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun du yogs par bab pa/ lha rdzas kyis rin po che'i me tog gis char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu bab pa lha rdzas kyis me tog pun ta ri
415b2(phal chen): ka'i sprin gyis char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin du 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyis me tog man d+ha ra ba'i sprin gyis char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i tshogs chen po rab tu 'bab pa/ lha rdzas
415b3(phal chen): kyis me tog thams cad kyis sprin gyis char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rgyun du 'bab pa/ na bza'i 'asprin gyis char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus par snang kha dog sna tshogs su gyur pa/
415b4(phal chen): nor bu rin po che'i sprin gyis char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun du 'bab pa/ bdugs kyis sprin gyis char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas ma yogs par bab pa/ ba dan gyis
415b5(phal chen): sprin gyis char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog du mar bab pa/ lha rdzas kyis gcod pan gyi sprin char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sna tshogs su 'bab pa/ lhab lhub kyis char bye ba
415b6(phal chen): brgya stong phrag bcu grub par bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyis char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kha dog sna tshogs su bab pa/ lha rdzas kyis rin po che se mo do'i
415b7(phal chen): sprin gyis char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus brgyan par bab pa/ lha rdzas kyis sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu can dan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kha dog du bab pa/ lha rdzas
415b8(phal chen): kyi a ka ru dang tsan dan gyi sprin char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin du g.yogs par 'bab pa rin po che rgyal mtshan brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu bgrang ba/ rin po che'i ba
416a1(phal chen): / dan bye ba brgya stong drag bcus shin du sbyangs pa/ nor bu rin po lnga ldi bye ba brgya phrag bcus shin du bres pa/ spos kyi snod bye ba brgya stong
416a2(phal chen): phrag bcus shin 'phrul bar rin po che'i phreng ba'i chun po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun du sbyangs pa/ nor bu rin po che lnga ldi bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin du 'khril zhing 'dzin pa/
416a3(phal chen): rdzas kyi rdul yang bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par brlobs 'dzin pa/ rin po che'i dril bu'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin du 'khrol ba/ rin po che'i
416a4(phal chen): stegs bu byi brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas skor ba/ rin po che'i shing bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas 'greng ba/ rin po che'i 'phreng ba brgya stong phrag bcus lnga ldis
416a5(phal chen): brgyan pa/ rin po che'i shing bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas yog cing 'khor ba/ khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i brgyan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus nang gis
416a6(phal chen): brgyan du dgrengs pa rin po che'i khang pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sgo la rin po che thams cad kyis 'phreng ba skyes pa/ gser gyi dra ba dril bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong
416a7(phal chen): babyung ba/ dpal gyi be'u brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'phreng ba rab tu sbyangs pas yongs su dag pa rin po che'i bkra shis bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mtshan bzang po byung ba/
416a8(phal chen): gser gyi dam bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus gser gyis lcags pod kyis sa kun du blas pa/ rin po che'i bdug gcig nas cig tu rgyud pa skye ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rin
416b1(phal chen): po che thams cad kyis yu bas bzung ba/ rin po che'i rgyas/ bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rin po che'i brgyan gyis dra ba thams cad du rnam par bres pa/ rin po che'i
416b2(phal chen): 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'ong zer sna tshogs su rab tu 'phro ba/ snang ba bye ba brgya stong brag bcu'i kun du snang bar byed pa/ 'od bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu che ba
416b3(phal chen): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis snying po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus gzugs rab tu mdzes shing 'phags pa lta ba'i dkyil 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag kha dog du mar bsgrub pa/ spos kyi 'od
416b4(phal chen): zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rab rib med par snang ba/ lha rdzas kyi pad mo dam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu bsgrub shing / snying po shin du 'phags pa rin po
416b5(phal chen): tshe'adra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po kun nas yogs par byed pa/ me tog gis dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas rgyas par sbam pa/ spos kyi dra ba bye ba
416b6(phal chen): brgya stong phrag bcus dri sna tshogs kyis kun nas yogs pa lha rdzas kyis ba dan rin po che brgya stong phrag bcus mdzes par bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che'i bye ba brgya stong phrag
416b7(phal chen): bcus mdzes par smram pa/ lha rdzas kyis gos kha dog sngon po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin du rgyas par bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog ser po bye ba brgya stong phrag
416b8(phal chen): bcus brgyan chen por bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi gos dmar po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dga' bar stong pa/ lha rdzas kyis gos kha dog sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong
417a1(phal chen): phrag bcus gos kyi brgyan du bting ba/ lha rdzas kyis rin po che sna tshogs kyi gos rnams pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus
417a2(phal chen): mkhod legs par sting pa/ spos sna tshogs kyi yongs su bzung ba gos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus gos bzang por sting pa/ rin po che smad byung ba thams cad kyi gos bye ba brgya
417a3(phal chen): stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba'i brgyan du snying pa/ gos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba'i brgyan du snying pa/ gos dkar po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bla gab tu bkab
417a4(phal chen): pa/ lha rdzas kyis dril bu'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba'i sgra byung ba/ gser gyi dra ba'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin du byin
417a5(phal chen): cing yongs su bzung ba/ lha rdzas kyis snam bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rgyal mtshan gyis dra ba'i rgyan du snying pa/ spos kyis rgyal mtshan
417a6(phal chen): bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spos kyis dra ba thams cad kyis rgyan rnam par dag pa/ lha rdzas kyis me tog gis rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus me tog thams cad kyis
417a7(phal chen): char rab tu bab pa/ lha rdzas kyis gos kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus gos thams cad du skyod pa/ lha rdzas kyis nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong
417a8(phal chen): phrag bcus mdzes pa thams cad kyis rgyal mtshan dang ldan par byas pa/ lha rdzas kyis lhab lhub kyis rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lhab lhub thams cad kyis rgyal mtshan
417b1(phal chen): rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur pa/ lha rdzas kyis 'phreng ba rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus phyogs kun nas bgreng ba/ lha rdzas kyis bdugs kyis rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong
417b2(phal chen): phrag bcus dril bu thams cad 'khrol bas yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba'i sgra byung ba/ lha rdzas kyis dung bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus snyan pa phyung ba/ lha rdzas kyis rnga bye ba brgya stong
417b3(phal chen): phrag bcu'i sgra shin du byung ba/ lha rdzas kyis dbang bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dbyangs chen por sgra skrags pa/ lha rdzas kyis sil stan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus klu dang rol
417b4(phal chen): mor sbyar ba dang / ldan pa dang lha rdzas kyis rol mo'i dbyangs kyi dam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sgra yid du 'ong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mngon par grags par byas pa/
417b5(phal chen): sprul pa'i rol mo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'jig rten gyis khams thams cad sgra snyan pa'i tshogs lta bur byas te/ lha rdzas kyis rnga bo che bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i shin du rdung ba'i
417b6(phal chen): sgra 'byung na/ yid kyis rang bzhin gyis lha rdzas kyis rol mo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rol mo'i sgra yid du 'ong ba dang / klu'i dbyangs snyan pa byung ba dang /
417b7(phal chen): lha rdzas kyis rol mor rtogs pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid dga' ba dang / zhi ba'i sgra dbyung tshig gis rim pa yid du 'ong ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bste
417b8(phal chen): cing mchod pa/ bstod pa brgya chen po bye ba brgya stong bcus dga' bar bstod cing mchod pa/ zab mo'i bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin du dgos
418a1(phal chen): shing bstod pa/ bstod pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus las thams cad kyis rnam par smin pa'i las yongs su 'byung bar
418a2(phal chen): babastod pa/ phra bar bstod pa bye brgya stong phrag bcus yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du bstod pa/ sngon gyis spyod pas bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par brjod de
418a3(phal chen): 'das pas bstod pa dge ba'i bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus brten cing bstod pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas snyen bkur ba'i bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par dag
418a4(phal chen): par bstod pa/ chos kyi sgo bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sngon par 'byung bar bstod cing 'jig pa med par bstod pa/ bstod pa rnam pa tha dad pa bye ba brgya stong
418a5(phal chen): phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mi zad par brjod cing sngags te bstod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i klu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa' sa
418a6(phal chen): thams cad grur brjod cing sbyar ba/ sangs rgyas kyis yon tan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus thogs pa med par bstod pa/ sangs rgyas kyis mthong ba'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag
418a7(phal chen): bcus glu ni dbyangs su grangs pa/ chos zab mo'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus thogs pa med pa'i chos kyi snang ba thams cad glur brang ste sbyar ba/ dbyangs brgya chen por
418a8(phal chen): glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba'i sgrar sangs rgyas zhing thams cad du sgrags pa/ sems dang bsam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus thogs pa med cing glu grangs shing
418b1(phal chen): snang ba dang bar byas pa/ khams su rtogs pa'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos thams cad kyis rang bzhin rnam par brtan pa dga' bar byed pa'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus
418b2(phal chen): thogs pa med pas dad pa dang rim 'gro rab tu bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas kyis spyod yul gyi glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos thams cad gsal bar brjod cing sgra phyung ba/
418b3(phal chen): gzugs kyi gru bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos thams cad kyis tshig rab tu dbye bas mkhas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs gi ldem po rab tu rtogs pa
418b4(phal chen): rnams par ston pa thams cad kyi glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos kyis glu dang rol mo dang sil snyan gyi sgra phyung dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
418b5(phal chen): sems dang po bskyed pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / shugs mthong ma thag tu skye bar byed pa/ byang
418b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' las dang po pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sems dga' zhing mos par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la spyod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mos pa rnam par spyod

420b3(phal chen): dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dga' ba'i yid du 'ong bar lta ba/ 'tshangs po'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong bcus zhes sa phud du gnas pa/ 'jig rten gyis dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag
